CommonMsg/Mission/AlternaLogEx.AreaEx_Analyze00_T0:
Recall, for a moment, the first apocalypse that devastated the human race.
Those who escaped into the caverns of Alterna were not the sole survivors.
There were others who escaped via a giant rocket ship—the Ark Polaris.
Launched in the nick of time, this ship was laden with many of Earth's
species that had been placed in a cold sleep. The mission was simple—find
another planet to replace the Earth.
CommonMsg/Mission/AlternaLogEx.AreaEx_Analyze00_T1:
Considering the circumstances of its launch, the Polaris had a smooth
voyage...until it reached the edge of the solar system. It was at that
point that debris struck the vessel, damaging its navigation system.
The crew was able to turn the ship around and head back toward Earth,
but the effort was in vain—there was not enough fuel to attempt a landing.
The Ark Polaris drifted aimlessly for 10,000 years.
CommonMsg/Mission/AlternaLogEx.AreaEx_Analyze00_T2:
Eons passed. The once-stable orbit of the Polaris decayed over time until
the ship found itself in the inescapable pull of the Earth's gravity.
Reentry was not kind to its inhabitants—all perished, save one. Bear #03,
an experimental subject who had retained consciousness within his cold
hibernation, survived. For 12,000 years he had dreamed. And plotted.
CommonMsg/Mission/AlternaLogEx.AreaEx_Analyze00_T3:
Fully awakened, Bear #03 came to a terrible realization. He had not
landed on a new planet at all. He was back on Earth. And yet, it was
not an Earth he knew. This Earth, it seemed, was dominated by sea
creatures. Not a single mammal to be found.
CommonMsg/Mission/AlternaLogEx.AreaEx_Analyze00_T4:
In the course of his search for even a single fellow mammal, Bear #03 used
navigational equipment from the wreckage of the Ark Polaris to discover
Alterna. It was a wasteland, of course, but a few of the liquid crystals
that had once covered the walls and ceiling remained. With knowledge built
during his thousands of years of dreaming, he repaired some of Alterna's
facilities and began researching the crystals...
CommonMsg/Mission/AlternaLogEx.AreaEx_Analyze00_T5:
This research bore fruit when Bear #03 compounded some of the liquid
crystals with his own fur. The experiment created an entirely new
substance with one terrifying property—it could transform any living
creature into a mammal. Bear #03 realized the implications immediately.
He could restore the planet to a mammalian paradise! He began stockpiling
Fuzzy Ooze, as he called it, within Alterna's still-intact rocket...
CommonMsg/Mission/AlternaLogEx.AreaEx_Analyze00_T6:
For such a venture, he would require the acquisition of thousands of
Golden Eggs. These were used in the creation of the Fuzzy Ooze, although
the exact details have never been recorded in my memory banks. But Bear #03
had a plan. He founded a corporation that would go on to employ locals
to collect his Golden Eggs under the name Grizzco Industries. Mr. Grizz,
as he was now known, would pay handsomely for them...
CommonMsg/Mission/AlternaLogEx.AreaEx_Analyze00_T7:
With Fuzzy Ooze production peaking thanks to the assistance of
unsuspecting Inklings and Octolings, Mr. Grizz took the final
steps to set his plan in motion. The rocket was loaded...
It wouldn't be long now.

the exact details have never been recorded in my memory banks. But Bear #03
had a plan. He founded a corporation that would go on to employ locals
to collect his Golden Eggs under the name Grizzco Industries. Mr. Grizz,
as he was now known, would pay handsomely for them...
CommonMsg/Mission/AlternaLogEx.AreaEx_Analyzed_L08:
With Fuzzy Ooze production peaking thanks to the assistance of
unsuspecting Inklings and Octolings, Mr. Grizz took the final
steps to set his plan in motion. The rocket was loaded...
It wouldn't be long now.

CommonMsg/Mission/TalkChoiceEvent.LotteryDrone00_00:
You're gonna need [group=0003 type=0017 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00]999 Power Eggs to get the
Shel-drone moving.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkChoiceEvent.LotteryDrone00_01:
Y'know, [group=0003 type=0017 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00]999 Power Eggs is a lot. You sure you wanna
use those to run the Shel-drone?[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] It'll search Alterna
for goodies to bring back.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkChoiceEvent.MakeCommander00_00:
Take a gander at that—it's a portrait of the New
Squidbeak Splatoon's [color=0001]Captain[color=ffff]. Not a bad likeness, eh?
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkChoiceEvent.MakeCommander00_01:
The Captain was Agent 3 before you were Agent 3,
Agent 3. Nothin' complicated about it.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkChoiceEvent.MakeCommander00_02: You...you know about the Captain, right?
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkChoiceEvent.MakeCommander01N_00:
Well, I s'pose we were a secret squad...doin' our
hero-ing outside the public eye. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]How could you know?
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkChoiceEvent.MakeCommander01P_00:
I knew it! The Captain's a real celebrity.
...You know I used to be Captain, right?
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkChoiceEvent.MakeCommander01P_01: Ah, never mind that. But how's that likeness lookin'?
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkChoiceEvent.MakeCommander02N_00:
It's a masterpiece! Thanks for the input, kiddo.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
Lemme know when you want me to immortalize YOU!
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkChoiceEvent.MakeCommander02P_00:
No? Well, that's no good! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]How'd the Captain look
to your eye?
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkChoiceEvent.MakeCommander02P_02:
I think you're onto somethin' here! Got any more details
for me?
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkChoiceEvent.MakeCommander03_00:
I knew the look in your eye would help me settle the
look in MY eye when it comes to this. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Thanks, kiddo!
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkChoiceEvent.Msg_DepartureRocket0:
I think it's pretty clear that we have to get into that
rocket somehow. Are you ready to try this?
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkChoiceEvent.Msg_DepartureRocket1: Oh, hey! Is all your Hero Gear the way you want it?
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkChoiceEvent.Msg_DepartureRocket2:
The Captain's saying, "This is the final confirmation.
Are you really, super-ultra-mega sure you're ready?"
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkChoiceEvent.Msg_ReturnAlterFromRocket:
If you go back to the Squid Sisters Camp, all
progress up to this point will be reset.
Note: Completed stages can be skipped.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkChoiceEvent.Negative_DepartureRocket1: Not quite... Hold on a sec.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkChoiceEvent.Positive_DepartureRocket2: For the last time, I AM READY!

In this mission, you must destroy all of the

In this mission, you must destroy every target

Use [group=0003 type=0004 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to check each weapon description.

In this mission, you must destroy all of the targets
within one minute.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.forwardShootA:
Squeezer: Give [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] a quick press to fire ink a long
way, or hold it down to spray ink over a wider area.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.forwardShootB:
H-3 Nozzlenose: Fire three ink shots at once, which
can break several lined-up targets in a single blast.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.forwardShootC:
Classic Squiffer: Fully charge your shot to blast
through several targets all at once.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.indoor00:
In this mission, you will hone your hide-and-seek skills
by hunting for hidden keys.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.indoorA: A loadout selected from your own Hero Gear.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.inkLimitHard00:
This mission will test your resourcefulness. You must
use a limited amount of ink to reach the goal.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.inkLimitHard01:
Think carefully about when and where to fire your ink
as you progress toward the goal.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.inkLimitHardA:
Splash-o-matic: A shooter that fires ink with
high precision.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.inkLimitPaintFes00:
This mission will test your resourcefulness. You must
use a limited amount of ink to reach the goal.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.inkLimitPaintFes01: Use your ink wisely. No refills.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.inkLimitPaintFesA:
Range Blaster: Blast your targets with
explosive ink balls.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.inkRailMountain00:
In this mission, you'll demonstrate your agility and look
extremely cool. Ride on inkrails to reach the goal.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.inkRailMountain01:
Note: Skillful and confident use of bombs may be
your key to success.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.inkRailMountainA: Rapid Blaster Pro: The blaster with the longest range.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.inkRailMountainB: Splattershot: A no-frills, easy-to-handle ink shooter.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.jetPack00:
In this mission, you'll use the Inkjet to overcome
various challenges and reach the goal.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.jetPack01:
Remember! An extended inkfurler will return to its
original furled state after a certain length of time.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.jetPackA:
Inkjet: Attack with [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00]. You can still submerge
in ink with [group=0003 type=000b params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00].
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.kagidumeClimb00:
In this mission, you'll reach the goal by zipping around
with the Zipcaster.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.kagidumeClimbA: Zipcaster: Zip and stick to distant walls with [group=0003 type=000a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00].
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.kanitank00:
In this mission, you will master the use of the
Crab Tank to reach the goal.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.kanitankA:
Crab Tank: Fire ink with [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] or [group=0003 type=000a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00]. Press [group=0003 type=000b params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00]
to curl into a ball and roll around.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.liftOnTheWater00:
This mission will test your multitasking capabilities.
Use propellervators to reach the goal.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.liftOnTheWaterA: A loadout selected from your own Hero Gear.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.liftOnTheWaterB:
Nautilus 47: A modified splatling gun that can
store charged shots.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.liftOnTheWaterC:
Goo Tuber: Capable of holding a charged shot for
a long period of time.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.lineMarker00:
In this mission, you'll use the Angle Shooter to navigate
through a series of obstacles and reach the goal.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.lineMarkerA:
Sploosh-o-matic: The Angle Shooter sub weapon will
rebound off any surface it hits.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.mazeClimb00:
This mission will test your innate sense of direction.
Navigate the maze to reach the goal.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.mazeClimbA: .96 Gal: Offers high attack power with a long range.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.miss_ippatsu_damage: Mission...failed. You touched the enemy's ink.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.miss_ippatsu_ink: Mission...failed. You touched the enemy's ink.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.miss_mato: Mission...failed. You let a target escape.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.miss_ng_hako: Mission...failed. You broke an incorrect crate.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.miss_ng_mato: Mission...failed. You popped a fail balloon.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.miss_oneshot: Mission...failed. You did not break all of the targets.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.missileAirship00:
This mission invites you to perform "trust falls" with
yourself. Reach the goal with a few fearless leaps.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.missileAirship01: N-ZAP '85: A nimble shooter with a high rate of fire.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.missileAirship02:
Splat Roller: Press [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] while jumping to fling ink
forward with a vertical swing.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.missileAirship03:
Classic Squiffer: Hold [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to charge up an ink shot,
then release to fire.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.ninjaParkour00:
In this mission, you must use the Zipcaster to reach
the goal at the top.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.ninjaParkourA: Zipcaster: Zip and stick to distant walls with [group=0003 type=000a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00].
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.notEnoughIkura: You do not have enough Power Eggs for this challenge.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.oneStroke00:
In this mission, you must activate every splat switch
within the time limit to reach the goal.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.oneStroke01: Be mindful of your time limit.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.oneStrokeA:
Octobrush: Hold [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to leave a trail of ink on the
ground as you advance at a regular pace.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.oneStrokeB:
Inkbrush: Hold [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to leave a thin trail of ink on the
ground as you advance at a quick pace.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.race00:
In this mission, you must reach the goal within the
time limit.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.race01:
Your remaining time will be extended each time you
reach a checkpoint.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.raceA: Aerospray MG: A shooter with high inking capability.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.railBaloonEasy00:
This mission will test your hand-eye-rail coordination.
Break every target you see as you ride the ride rails.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.railBaloonEasyA:
Jet Squelcher: Skillful use of the Burst Bomb
sub weapon may be the key to success.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.railBaloonEasyB:
Rapid Blaster Pro: Enjoys a longer range, and its blast
radius can break multiple targets at once.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.railBaloonEasyC:
Hydra Splatling: A heavyweight splatling with a longer
range...and charge time.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.railBoxHard00:
This mission will test your stress-management skills.
Please try to survive for 60 seconds.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.railBoxHard01:
While unregulated leaping can be quite enjoyable,
we recommend jumping with survival in mind.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.railBoxHard02:
Only collect Power Eggs within the range of your
jumping capabilities.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.railBoxHardA:
To ensure safe jumping conditions, weapons are
prohibited on entry.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.railBoxStringer00:
This mission will test your hand-eye-rail coordination.
Break every target you see as you ride the ride rails.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.railBoxStringerA:
Heavy Splatling: Hold [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to charge it up, then
release to spray long-range ink shots.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.railBoxStringerB:
Rapid Blaster: Its explosions are capable of breaking
multiple targets at once.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.railBoxStringerC:
Tri-Stringer: Hold [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to hit a wall with a charged
shot and splatter ink all over its surface.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.railFirst00:
In this mission, you will destroy targets as you
progress toward the goal.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.railFirstA:
Jet Squelcher: Has a long range and can break
far-off targets.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.railFirstB: Slosher: Can break several targets all at once.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.railFirstC: Nautilus 47: A splatling that can recharge while firing.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.roller00:
In this mission, you must use a roller to defeat your
enemies and reach the goal.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.rollerA: Splat Roller: A basic, easy-to-use roller.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.rollerB: Carbon Roller: A roller with more nimble movements.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.shootBack00:
In this mission, you must use skill and cunning to aim
at enemies from behind and reach the goal.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.shootBackA: A loadout selected from your own Hero Gear.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.shootBackB:
Splat Roller: Press [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] while jumping to fling ink
forward with a vertical swing.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.shootBackC:
Dapple Dualies: To do a Dodge Roll, press [group=0003 type=0001 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] while
you are moving and shooting at the same time.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.shootingLong00:
In this mission, you must use long-range weapons
to reach the goal.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.shootingLongA:
Explosher: Fires high-powered exploding shots over
a long distance.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.shootingLongB:
Ballpoint Splatling: A splatling with a range that
increases after you begin to fire it.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.shootingLongC:
Dynamo Roller: A heavyweight roller that can
ink large areas.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.shortRail00:
This mission will test your ability to look cool during
tricky maneuvers. Use ride rails to reach the goal.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.shortRail01:
The next ride rail will appear only after you activate
each of its splat switches.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.shortRailA: Jet Squelcher: A shooter that offers a longer range.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.shortRailB: Tri-Stringer: Hold [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to charge up a shot.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.shortRailC:
Bamboozler 14 Mk I: A charger that can quickly
charge up its shots.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.snakeBomb00:
In this mission, you'll learn to use ink wheels
as you head toward the goal.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.snakeBombA: A loadout selected from your own Hero Gear.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.snakeBombB:
Tri-Slosher: Fling ink in three forward-facing
directions all at once.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.snakeLecture00:
In this mission, you must reach the goal while making
skillful use of soaker blocks.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.snakeLectureA: A loadout selected from your own Hero Gear.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.snakeLectureB: Bloblobber: Lobs four bouncing ink blobs.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.snakeLectureaC: Octobrush: Hit [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] repeatedly to splash ink all over.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.snakeSalmon00:
In this mission, you must reach the goal while making
skillful use of soaker blocks.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.snakeSalmonA:
Sploosh-o-matic: Has a shorter range, so cooperation
with your Smallfry companion will be required.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.snakeSalmonB: Tri-Stringer: Hold [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to use a charged shot.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.spin00:
In this mission, you will navigate your way through a
gauntlet of spinning objects to reach the goal.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.spinA: A loadout selected from your own Hero Gear.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.spinB:
Mini Splatling: A fast-charging splatling that's
great for getting off a quick shot.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.spinC:
Range Blaster: Blast your targets with
explosive ink balls.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.spongeClimb00:
In this mission, you will soak up knowledge and expand
your skills by using sponges to reach the goal.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.spongeClimbA: A loadout selected from your own Hero Gear.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.spongeClimbB:
Dualie Squelchers: To do a Dodge Roll, press [group=0003 type=0001 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] while
you are moving and shooting at the same time.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.spongeClimbC:
Bamboozler 14 Mk I: Hold [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to charge up a shot,
then release to fire.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.stamp00:
In this mission, you must defeat all of the enemies
within the time limit.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.stamp01:
Plan your route ahead of time to ensure an efficient
and enjoyable pummeling experience.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.stamp02:
The countdown will begin as soon as you pummel
the first enemy.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.stampA:
Ultra Stamp: Slam the area in front of you with [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00].
Press [group=0003 type=000a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to throw the whole weapon forward.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.stampB:
NOTE: Please make use of the complimentary
canned specials as provided within the stage.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.stringer00:
In this mission, you will master the eccentricities of
the Tri-Stringer to reach the goal.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.stringerA:
Tri-Stringer: Use this weapon to spray ink in three
directions with a single shot.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.superLanding00:
In this mission, you must master the use of
Splashdowns to reach the goal.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.superLandingA:
Splashdown: Leap up high and build up power, then slam
into the ground with a powerful splash of ink.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.takoAllStars00:
In this mission, you'll be greeted by various and sundry
types of enemies. Prepare accordingly.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.takoAllStars01: A loadout selected from your own Hero Gear.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.takoAllStars02: Luna Blaster: A blaster with a wide blast radius.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.takoAllStars03:
Splattershot Jr.: A shooter that offers low, efficient
ink consumption with each shot.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.takoHouse00:
This mission will test your reaction time with a series
of lively, life-threatening surprises.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.takoHouseA: A loadout selected from your own Hero Gear.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.takoHouseB:
Undercover Brella: Hold [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to fire ink while keeping
your brella open.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.takoHouseC: Blaster: Blast your targets with explosive ink balls.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.takoTower00:
In this mission, you must break through your enemies'
defenses and reach the goal.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.takoTowerA: A loadout selected from your own Hero Gear.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.takoTowerB: Classic Squiffer: A charger that charges up quickly.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.takoTowerC:
Flingza Roller: Flings ink quickly when used horizontally
or across long distances when used vertically.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.takohopper00:
In this mission, foes will look down upon you...literally.
Defeat enemies as you climb toward the goal.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.takohopperA: A loadout selected from your own Hero Gear.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.takohopperB:
Slosher: Toss out a splash of ink to attack enemies
from raised platforms or behind walls.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.takohopperC:
Dark Tetra Dualies: This set of dualies will allow you to
perform up to four Dodge Rolls in a row.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.takopod00:
This mission will challenge your powers of navigation.
Proceed through the stage until you reach the goal.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.takopodA: A loadout selected from your own Hero Gear.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.takopodB: Splat Brella: Press and hold [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to open your brella.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.takopodC:
Heavy Splatling: Hold [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to charge it up, then
release to spray long-range ink shots.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.takostrikeFall00:
In this mission, you'll learn to go AGAINST the flow.
Dodge falling enemies as you head toward the goal.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.takostrikeFall01: A loadout selected from your own Hero Gear.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.takostrikeFall02:
Classic Squiffer: Charge up a shot with [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to fire
ink over a longer distance.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.takostrikeFall03: Octobrush: Hold [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to ink on the go.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.wiper00:
In this mission, you will make effective use of the
Splatana Stamper to reach the goal.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkStageDolphin.wiperA:
Splatana Stamper: Hold [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to perform a powerful
charged slash.

CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Area1_0: Wow, whoever made these statues must've been HUGE!
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Area1_1:
This is the weirdest snow ever. It looks normal, but
it's not cold. And you can ink it! What a mystery!
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Area1_3:
What if we put on a concert here? We could
sell the place out, don't you think?
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Area1_4:
I know it doesn't look like the Captain is doing anything,
but I'm sure they're thinking up a plan. Go, Captain!
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Area1_7: Doesn't this view just make you wanna...snowboard?
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Area2_1:
I guess this used to be some kind of factory. At least,
that's what Mar— I mean, that's what Agent 2 says...
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Area2_2: Now, how would I stage a battle here...
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Area2_4:
If you wanna reach the highest spot here,
look for an [color=0001]inkrail[color=ffff]!
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Area2_5:
I bet this factory could have made anything.
It's so huuuge!
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Area3_0:
Eee! That shiny ice is freaking me out.
It never melts, no matter what!
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Area3_1: I suppose it's a bit lonely here...
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Area3_2:
I guess those orange buildings are houses.
But no one's home...right?
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Area4_0:
OK, does it smell funny here, or...is it just me?[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]
Don't say it's me.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Area4_1:
Ooo! I'd love to drive this submarine. I'd take it
straight down to the bottom of the ocean. VROOM!
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Area4_2:
...Do you have a submarine license, by any chance,
Agent 3?
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Area4_3:
I don't know about you, but I always get nervous
walking over grates.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Area5_0: Have you seen the [color=0001]gushers [color=ffff]all around here?
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Area5_1:
I heard that there's still some active flora around
here! Credit Agent 2 with that scoop.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Area5_2:
Did you know that ink is super good for plants?
I read that online a while back. It could be true!
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Area6_0:
Is it weird to love hanging out on a rooftop but
be too scared to look down? Asking for Agent 2.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Area6_1:
"Oh. This must have been a research facility."
...How was my Agent 2 impression?
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Area6_2: We can get around using those [color=0001]ride rails[color=ffff]!
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Area6_3:
Don't tell Agent 2, but I don't really like
high places either...
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Bored_01:
Ooo! I had something else I wanted to say,
but I forgot. Don't you hate that?
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Bored_02: Oh! But maybe I told you that already...
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Bored_03:
Wait. Did we have this exact conversation, or was
that just a dream...
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Gift_00:
Surprise! I've got some bonus [color=0001]Power Eggs[color=ffff] for you,
Agent 3! I hope Smallfry likes them...
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Gift_01:
Who's got pointy ears and some extra [color=0001]Power Eggs[color=ffff]
for you? THIS GIRL!
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Gift_02:
Guess what. I've got some extra [color=0001]Power Eggs[color=ffff] for you,
courtesy of the Captain. They said, "You're welcome"!
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.LaunchPad_00:
Now that Agent 2 is the boss of Deep Cut, we should
definitely be able to rescue Gramps!
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Progress_boss1_00:
Go, go, Agent 3! If you can't do it...no one can!
No pressure.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Progress_boss1_01: Hey, do you have a favorite Squid Sisters track?
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Progress_boss1_02:
You're "supposed" to sneak behind the shielded
Octarians, but I like to just BLAST 'em!
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Progress_boss1_03:
There's gotta be something more to that "treasure."
I wonder what we could do with it...
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Progress_boss2_00:
You're doing a great job exploring Alterna...
Look how much you've filled out the map!
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Progress_boss2_01:
Just to say it out loud... Thank you for joining
the New Squidbeak Splatoon, Agent 3!
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Progress_boss3_00:
Let's go get Gramps RIGHT NOW! I mean...
when you're ready, Agent 3.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Progress_clear_00:
If they can dehydrate Gramps, surely we can
REhydrate him somehow...right?
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Progress_clear_01: Hey, is it snack time yet? You hungry?
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Progress_clear_02:
Agent 2 doesn't think I should drive the rocket.
But what do YOU think, Agent 3?
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Progress_clear_03:
You were like a rock star out there fighting in space!
And Smallfry was your backup dancer!
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Progress_clear_04: Who would have thought there'd be ANOTHER rocket?!
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Progress_ortana_00: Let's get this show on the road, shall we?
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Progress_ortana_01:
Agent 2 says she can look at spreadsheets all day
and not get a headache. It's like a superpower!
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Progress_ortana_02:
Solo albums are OK, but don't you think collabs
are much more fun?
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Progress_ortana_03: Where did you meet Smallfry, by the way?
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Progress_ortana_04:
Don't be shy with your ink! Splat everywhere, fill up
your [group=0003 type=0020 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00]gauge, and you'll get [color=0001]Upgrade Points[color=ffff]!
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Progress_ortana_05:
Did you know you can jump back to any previous
kettles directly from the menu?
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Progress_ortana_06:
Your Hero Gear is looking good, but I bet you
can power it up even more!
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Progress_ortana_07_01:
I mean...it's not really a sky...right? Does that
make it less beautiful? Or not? Whoooa...
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Progress_surimi_00:
I was so impressed with Deep Cut's choreography.
We've gotta step up our game!
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Progress_surimi_03:
Are there even any clean-shaven Octarians
around anymore?
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Progress_surimi_04:
The more [color=0001]Fuzzballs [color=ffff]and [color=0001]Fuzzy Ooze you destroy[color=ffff],
the more you'll fill up your [group=0003 type=0020 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00]gauge!
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Progress_surimi_05:
Short on Power Eggs? Dive into a kettle,
and see if you can collect some more!
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Progress_surimi_06:
You'll need plenty of Power Eggs to register for the
missions inside [color=0001]silver kettles[color=ffff]. Keep 'em handy!
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Progress_surimi_07:
Have you been upgrading your Hero Gear? Could come
in handy, especially for [color=0001]golden kettles[color=ffff].
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAori.Progress_surimi_08:
Is it just me, or is O.R.C.A. actually really funny?
Who knew they could program deadpan humor?!

CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAtarime.Bored_01: [group=0004 type=0005 params=][color=0000](What I wouldn't give for a fresh crabby cake now...)[color=ffff]
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAtarime.Bored_02:
[group=0004 type=0005 params=][color=0000](Yesterday's lunch was mighty tasty. Maybe I shoulda
brushed my teeth a bit more carefully...)[color=ffff]
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAtarime.Bored_03:
[group=0004 type=0005 params=][color=0000](I sure wish someone woulda told me about
moisturizer when I was younger...)[color=ffff]
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAtarime.Bored_04:
Go on, now. Give those Octarians a fresh coat
of ink for me!
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAtarime.Bored_05:
How can I help you, Agent 3? Need another
pearl of wisdom?
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAtarime.Bored_06:
[group=0004 type=0005 params=]... ... ... GYAH! I wasn't sleeping. That was just
tactical eyeball moistening, y'see?
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAtarime.Location_00:
You eatin' well these days? Don't go into battle
hungry, y'hear?
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAtarime.Location_01:
You wonderin' about that upside-down tower?
That makes two of us, friend.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAtarime.Location_02:
You really know what you're doin' out there, don'tcha?
Makin' me look like a genius for recruiting you!
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAtarime.Location_03:
You know Agent 1 and Agent 2? I heard they've got
a side gig. Like bein' pop stars or somethin'.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAtarime.Location_04:
I'll be watchin' your progress from afar, Agent 3.
These eyes don't miss much!
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAtarime.Location_05: That is a looooooooooooooooooooong way down...
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAtarime.Normal_00:
We gotta get the Great Zapfish back from
those Octarian punks!
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAtarime.Normal_01:
Y'know, that Hero Suit fits you just fine. Kids these
days like things a little baggy, don't they?
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAtarime.Normal_02:
Those darn Octarians! I oughta be enjoying my
retirement, not retiring my enjoyment!
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAtarime.Normal_03:
When all of this is over, maybe we oughta think
about some security for the Great Zapfish...
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAtarime.Normal_04:
It's nice that you got your li'l buddy with you
throughout all...this.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAtarime.Normal_05:
That Fuzzy Ooze is trouble. Don't touch it unless you
wanna spend the next 10 years shavin'!
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAtarime.Normal_06:
Whaddaya like to eat these days, kiddo? Food?
Are kids still eatin' food?
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAtarime.Normal_07:
Those kettles lead to the Octarian bases—blast 'em
with ink to open 'em. Don't try it on your home kettle.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAtarime.Normal_08:
When you're throwin' Smallfry, hold down [group=0003 type=000a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] and
take your time. Know before you throw!
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAtarime.Normal_09:
The coolest thing about that Hero Suit? It'll heal itself
if you let it! Just be patient.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAtarime.Normal_10:
If you're ever feelin' discombobulated, just relax your
hands for a sec and press [group=0003 type=0003 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00].
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAtarime.Normal_11:
Don't let steel grates and fences ruin your day.
Press [group=0003 type=000b params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] and squidaddle right through 'em!
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAtarime.Normal_12:
You can't spell WIN without IN, and you can't
spell INK without IN either. Just sayin'.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAtarime.Normal_14:
A little too much enemy ink flyin' around? Hide behind
a wall! It ain't fancy, but it gets the job done.
CommonMsg/Mission/TalkWorldAtarime.Normal_15:
I've said it before and I'll say it again...
Ink before you think!

my back...)[color=ffff]
