CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaAmiibo.Aori_DoneAllReward:
Sorry—no more encores of the
gift variety. You got 'em all![page break]I knew you could do it from the
first time I met you! We're still
besties, right?
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaAmiibo.Aori_DoneSomeBattle:
Hey! I see you. I mean, I really
SEE you out there battling.[page break]Here—a little present from me!
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaAmiibo.Aori_FarReward:
Don't worry—I've got eyes on all
your battles. Keep it up!
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaAmiibo.Aori_FollowOtherHello:
Hey, you![page break]I'm ready to ROCK! Greetings from
[color=0001][group=0002 type=0001 params=00 00][color=ffff]!
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaAmiibo.Aori_NearReward:
Whoa! You've been going all out!
I could probably find a li'l something
for you soon...
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaAmiibo.Aori_NoAppDataHello:
Ah...I feel so SEEN in Splatsville![page break]Oh, hey! I'm Callie from the Squid
Sisters. You know—stay fresh!
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaAmiibo.Aori_NoAppDataHelloHC:
Oh, hey! I'm Callie from the Squid
Sisters. You know—stay fresh!
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaAmiibo.Aori_NoRewardAsOffline:
Ugh, the internet is out! Now what?[page break]Head to the [color=0001]lobby[color=ffff], get connected,
and then come see me, OK? I might
have something for you!
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaAmiibo.Aori_OtherAppDataHello:
Ah...I feel so SEEN in Splatsville![page break]Oh, do we know each other?
I'm Callie from the Squid Sisters.
You know—stay fresh!
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaAmiibo.Aori_OtherAppDataHelloHC:
Yoo-hoo! Callie here, from the
Squid Sisters, of course.
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaAmiibo.Aori_PostRewardAsFollowNow:
Keep splatting, and I'll have more
stuff for you soon. Stay fresh!
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaAmiibo.Aori_Reward:
You've been high-key CRUSHING it.
Here you go. Keep it up!
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaAmiibo.Aori_RewardAsFollowNow:
Oh yeah! I've got something for you.
No big deal—I have stuff like this
just lying around.
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaAmiibo.Aori_RewardAsOtherAppData:
Hey! Always nice to meet someone
SUPER fresh like you.[page break]I can already tell this is gonna be
a great collab. Here—let's mark the
occasion!
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaAmiibo.Aori_WantFollow:
Hey! You seem pretty fresh.
And unlike some things, I bet
you get fresher over time![page break]Look, this isn't just because I view
you as a potential rival, but...I kinda
want to [color=0001]keep tabs on you[color=ffff].[page break]Want me to memorize your [color=0001]control
settings[color=ffff] and favorite [color=0001]gear[color=ffff]? I can
totally keep track of your [color=0001]Freshest
Fits[color=ffff] too![page break]That way you can put them on
quickly from the [color=0001]Equip[color=ffff] menu.[page break]Think of it as ME being a superfan
of YOU, instead of the reverse.
Although you better be a superfan
of me too...
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaAmiibo.Aori_WhatDo:
What do you want to know?
I'll spill the juicy deets!

This is the last one I got![page break]But don't sweat it. I'll always have
your back. Never a doubt!
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaAmiibo.Boy_DoneSomeBattle:
Oh! Right![page break]I've got a present for the
big battler here!
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaAmiibo.Boy_FarReward:
I hope you know I'm checkin' out all
your battles. It's what friends do!
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaAmiibo.Boy_FollowOtherHello:
Yo![page break]I'm here to splat! Greetings from
[color=0001][group=0002 type=0001 params=00 00][color=ffff]!
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaAmiibo.Boy_NearReward:
Those other fools never knew what
hit 'em! I'll have a gift for you later.
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaAmiibo.Boy_NoAppDataHello: So this is Splatsville! Awesome![page break]Oh, nice to meet you!
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaAmiibo.Boy_NoRewardAsOffline:

CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaAmiibo.Boy_OtherAppDataHello: So this is Splatsville! Awesome![page break]Oh, hey there!
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaAmiibo.Boy_PostRewardAsFollowNow:
More battles means more gifts.
Easy, yeah?
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaAmiibo.Boy_Reward:

Hello, hello! How are things going

CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaAmiibo.Squid_OtherAppDataHello:

CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaNpcFocus.Msg_MiniGameNoValidDeck:
You'll need a deck of 15 cards before you can
play against someone. Open the menu and go to
Status, then Tableturf Battle to set up your
deck using the [color=0001]Card List[color=ffff].
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaNpcFocus.VendorAlreadyOrdered: You know you already ordered that one, right?
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaNpcFocus.VendorCatalogNotHave:
Sorry, chum. That one's WAY too popular right now.
I'd get laughed at just for askin'.
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaNpcFocus.VendorNoOrder: I don't have any orders for you, chum.
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaNpcFocus.VendorNotSell:
Sorry, chum. That one's way too hot for me to get my
hands on.
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaNpcFocus.VendorOrder:
OK, gear orders will arrive [color=0001]1 per day[color=ffff] in the order they
were, um...ordered. Don't forget to come [color=0001]pick 'em up[color=ffff]!
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaNpcFocus.VendorOrderListFull:
Hey, whoa, slow down! That's too many orders. If you're
gonna place a new one, cancel an old one first.
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaNpcFocus.VendorOrderSwapQ: So you wanna swap out these orders, then?
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaNpcFocus.VendorOrderedArrived:
C'mon, chum! You can't cancel an order after it's been
delivered! Not cool.
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaNpcFocus.VendorOrderedCancel: Gotcha. It's like it never happened.
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaNpcFocus.VendorOrderedCancelQ: And you're sure you wanna cancel this order?
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaNpcFocus.VendorOrderedList: Is this what you were looking for?

CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaNpcFocus_Fsodr.VendorCatalogNotHave:
You've got a good eye, haven't you? That item's
way too hot for the likes of me to procure.
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaNpcFocus_Fsodr.VendorNoOrder: You've got no open orders, love.
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaNpcFocus_Fsodr.VendorOrder:
Alright. I can only get [color=0001]one item a day[color=ffff], so [color=0001]come
round later[color=ffff], yeah?
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaNpcFocus_Fsodr.VendorOrderListFull: Gotta cancel an open order if you wanna order more.
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaNpcFocus_Fsodr.VendorOrderSwapQ: You wanna exchange the orders for this and this?
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaNpcFocus_Fsodr.VendorOrderedArrived:
That gear's already been delivered, mate.
You can't cancel it now.
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaNpcFocus_Fsodr.VendorOrderedCancelQ: Changed your mind about this gear, then?
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaNpcFocus_Fsodr.VendorOrderedList: This is what you wanted, yeah?

CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaOekaki.Msg_CannotPost:
You cannot post drawings at the moment because
either you're not connected to the internet or
Communicating with Others is restricted by
Parental Controls.
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaOekaki.Msg_FirstExplain:
This mailbox is where you can make drawings and
post them for others to see. Your drawings may be
viewable by other players, so please don't post
personal information or inappropriate content.
These drawings may be displayed as signs or
graffiti in Splatsville or other cities.

CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor.Clean_Done:
Check it out—clean as a whistle!
Also, these [color=0001]ability chunks[color=ffff] popped
out. They're all yours, chum!
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor.Clean_First:
You ever gotten your gear [color=0001]scrubbed[color=ffff]
before?[page break][color=0001]Scrubbing[color=ffff] gear wipes out all of its
[color=0001]secondary abilities[color=ffff] at once, leaving
it as clean as new.[page break]Take your newly [color=0001]scrubbed[color=ffff] gear into
battle, and you could end up with a
few new abilities on it![page break]Scrubbing also leaves behind a bunch
of [color=0001]ability chunks[color=ffff]. Those are all yours.
I don't need 'em.[page break]Once you get enough [color=0001]ability chunks[color=ffff],
mash 'em together, and you can make
whatever ability you like.[page break]Trust me, chum, you won't be the
only one with [color=0001]scrubbed[color=ffff]-up gear
out there.[page break]And you should SEE some of the fresh
gear folks are coming up with. Wow![page break]Anyway, if you've got any gear you
want scrubbed and you've got the
cash, then I'm your urchin![page break]Now, let's see...
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor.Clean_NoSkill:
Uh... This gear's already sparkling
clean. If there aren't any [color=0001]secondary
abilities[color=ffff] in it, then there's nothing for
me to scrub!
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor.Clean_NotEnoughMoney:
You're a little light on cash, chum.
You oughta be careful about that.
An empty wallet's a sad wallet.
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor.Clean_Select:
Which [color=0001]gear[color=ffff] do you want [color=0001]scrubbed[color=ffff],
chum? I'll get it cleaned up and
like new in no time.
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor.ExplainFestT:
Got yourself a [color=0001]Splatfest Tee[color=ffff], huh?
Check this out, chum...[page break]If you ever wanna get that Splatfest
Tee [color=0001]scrubbed[color=ffff] so you can [color=0001]change out
its gear abilities[color=ffff], I'll give you a real
good deal.[page break]The scrub is just [group=0003 type=0027 params=85 eb 91 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0001]2,000[color=ffff] a pop.
Not bad, eh? It gets better.[page break]I'll also slot new abilities onto it
using [color=0001]way fewer ability chunks[color=ffff]!
It's a special trick I know.[page break]You're probably wondering what the
deal on this [color=0001]deal[color=ffff] is... Really, I just
like seeing everyone in their Splatfest
Tees. Things feel festive, y'know?[page break]So throw on that Splatfest Tee,
battle like mad, then bring it to me
for a good scrub. Oh, and the deal's
good for [color=0001]as many scrubs as you like[color=ffff].
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor.FirstRank_10_15:
Going for full-fledged freshness,
I see. Looking good, chum![page break]But something tells me you've got
sights set somewhere even fresher![page break]And that's got me thinking... Where
are MY sights set? Maybe I oughta
be aimin' higher too.[page break]What that all boils down to is this:
if you're gonna be a big deal, then
I wanna be a big deal's gear hookup.[page break]So keep those orders coming. If
you're in the square checking out
folks with [group=0003 type=0000 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] and they've got gear
you want, I need to know!
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor.FirstRank_16_19:
Oi! When did you get so crazy fresh?[page break]Hang on, you want to get even
FRESHER?! Is that possible?
Is that safe?[page break]I'm not judging. In fact, I wanna help.
Let's conquer the world, you and me![page break]Which brings me right back to it...
If you're in the square checking out
folks with [group=0003 type=0000 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] and you see gear you
want, call me so I can order it for ya!
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor.FirstRank_20_20:
Oi! Seriously? I can't decide if your
freshness is scary or awesome.[page break]So this means you're a legend now,
right? What am I saying—just LOOK
at you![page break]Well, there's no way I'm gonna go
anywhere. I wanna see just how far
you're gonna take it. And, y'know,
do my part to get you there.[page break]So yeah, same deal as always—if
you're in the square checking out
folks with [group=0003 type=0000 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] and they've got gear
you want, I can order it for ya!
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor.FirstRank_4_9:
Well, look who earned themselves
a little freshness![page break]Of course, feelin' fresh and dressin'
fresh are two different things. And if
you wanna rule this town, your [color=0001]gear[color=ffff]'s
gotta look the part.[page break]For instance, ever seen someone walk
by, and been like, "Whoa! What gear
is THAT?!" Sure you have, chum.[page break]Well, the next time you're scoping
someone out with [group=0003 type=0000 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] and they're
wearin' gear you wish was on you,
ring me up, and I'll [color=0001]order[color=ffff] it for you![page break]I might not be able to [color=0001]order[color=ffff] you one
with the exact same abilities, but I'll
do my best. Here's my number.
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor.FirstRank_4_9_Short:
Well, look who earned themselves
a little freshness![page break]Of course, feelin' fresh and dressin'
fresh are two different things. And
if— Oh. You've heard all this, eh?
Right, right. I'll fast-forward a bit.[page break]You find yourself scopin' some fresh
[color=0001]gear[color=ffff] with [group=0003 type=0000 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00], you ring me, and I'll
[color=0001]put in an[color=ffff] [color=0001]order [color=ffff]for you.[page break]Caveat emptor, though, eh? That
means buyer beware—I can't
guarantee the exact same abilities, or
nothin'. Anyway, here's my number.
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor.FirstSdodr_AfterRankMsg:
By the by, you come to Inkopolis
Square often? I lived here when I
was a tyke.[page break]Now that I'm back, everything looks
so much smaller than I remember.
Suppose it was me that grew.[page break]These days, I split my time between
Inkopolis Square and Splatsville. Hit
me up for whatever you need,
wherever you are.

Whoa, whoa, WHOA! Is that a
[color=0001]Super Sea Snail[color=ffff]?![page break]Hey, I don't suppose you'd be willing

to [color=0001]boost your gear's star power[color=ffff]. It's

three of its ability slots full, I know
how to [color=0001]reroll its abilities for a random
bunch of new ones[color=ffff].[page break]I'll do the rerolls for free. It's my way
of proving that I won't do you wrong.
Just get me those [color=0001]Super Sea Snails[color=ffff].

Whoa, whoa, WHOA! Is that a

CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor.RareUp_First:
If you've got any [color=0001]Super Sea Snails[color=ffff]
you feel like giving me, I can use 'em
to [color=0001]boost your gear's star power[color=ffff].[page break]More star power means more [color=0001]slots[color=ffff],

Oi! Sorry, chum, but I'm kinda tied

CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor.RareUp_Select:
Which [color=0001]gear[color=ffff] needs more star power?
If you've got [color=0001]Super Sea Snails[color=ffff] for me,

CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor.RecieveGeso_First:
Just so you know, any gear you order
from the [color=0001]SplatNet Shop[color=ffff] can be picked

has lots of [color=0001]different gear abilities[color=ffff]

up on [color=0001]how it works[color=ffff].[page break]Anyway, let me check on your order...

I'm still gonna need a little time to

[color=0001]end of the day[color=ffff]. Otherwise it's gone.
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor.Recieve_NotBuyGeso:
Don't want it? Fine, whatever. Get at
me if you change your mind.
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor.Recieve_NotEnoughMoney:
You're a little light on cash, chum.
You oughta be careful about that.
An empty wallet's a sad wallet.
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor.Recieve_NotOrder:
Chill out, chum. You haven't [color=0001]ordered[color=ffff]
anything yet.
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor.Skill_ExSkillDouble:
Careful, chum! Once you break that
[color=0001]Ability Doubler[color=ffff] and slot in another
ability, [color=0001]there's no getting it back[color=ffff]!
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor.Skill_First:
Oi! Have you ever [color=0001]added a gear ability[color=ffff]
before? No big deal if you haven't.[page break]How it works is there's these [color=0001]ability
chunks[color=ffff] you'll find everywhere.[page break]Mash a few of those together,
and they can be made into any
ability you want.[page break]Also, if a slot's got an ability in it,
just break the one that's there and
stick the new one in. They [color=0001]break into
more ability chunks[color=ffff] too, which is nice.[page break]Maybe that was a lot to take in...but
give it a quick whirl, and you'll see
it's pretty straightforward.
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor.Skill_Select:
Pick out the [color=0001]gear[color=ffff] and which [color=0001]ability[color=ffff]
you'd like.
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor.Skill_Set:
All set! Hope it ups your battle game.
And if it doesn't, well...you'll still look
cool, so don't sweat it.

CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor_Fsodr.Clean_Done:
Ahhh, there we are. Nice and clean,
innit? And these [color=0001]ability chunks[color=ffff] came
out in the wash. Cheers, mate.
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor_Fsodr.Clean_First:
First time [color=0001]scrubbing[color=ffff] gear, innit?
Let's get you sorted.[page break][color=0001]Scrubbing [color=ffff]gear cleans all of the
[color=0001]secondary gear abilities[color=ffff] away, yeah?
Leaving it fresh and sparkling, ready
for you to take into battle so you
can unlock new secondary abilities.[page break]And you get some [color=0001]ability chunks[color=ffff]
back in the deal. Gather enough of
'em, and you can have your pick of
abilities added back on. It's grand,
if I do say so myself.[page break]No pressure, mate, but [color=0001]scrubbing[color=ffff]
gear is the fastest way to sort
yourself some extremely fresh gear.[page break]Just let me know if you're interested,
and we can talk cost. You didn't fink
it was free, didja?

Sorry, love, but I can't scrub gear
that doesn't have [color=0001]secondary gear
abilities[color=ffff]. Wot were you finking?

YOU WOT, MATE?! Look, I'm seein'
fings a bit different these days,
but that don't mean you can take
advantage of ol' Spyke.
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor_Fsodr.Clean_Select:
What [color=0001]gear[color=ffff] do you want to [color=0001]scrub[color=ffff]?
I'll make it sparkle.
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor_Fsodr.ExplainFestT:
Oi, you got a [color=0001]Splatfest Tee[color=ffff], didja?
Nuffin beats a Splatfest, eh, mate?
Listen...I'll tell you something good.[page break]Your ol' pal Spyke can give ya a good
deal on [color=0001]scrubbing [color=ffff]and [color=0001]rerolling gear
abilities[color=ffff] on them Splatfest Tees.[page break]How does [group=0003 type=0027 params=85 eb 91 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0001]2,000 [color=ffff]a pop sound for
scrubbing? Not too shabby, eh?[page break]And if we're changin' out abilities,
you need ability chunks, but it's a
[color=0001]bloomin' steal [color=ffff]compared to regular
gear, yeah?[page break]Fink of it as me [color=0001]gettin' in the spirit
of things[color=ffff]. I ain't much for the
festival proper, but I like to see
folks celebratin'.[page break]What are you waitin' for? Go break
in that Splatfest Tee in battle, then
come back anytime you want a deal
on spiffin' it up. [color=0001]As many times as

Well, well, we've got a right proper
veteran on our hands now, don't we?[page break]Ah, but I see that gleam in your eye.

at. Not by a long shot.[page break]I'm excited to see how far you can
go, mate. Might get myself a cuppa
while I sit back and watch.[page break]Anyhow, not that you need the
reminder, but use [group=0003 type=0000 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to scope out
anyone in the plaza, and then call me
if you fancy a piece of gear.

Hold it, love! Izzat really you? Oi!

A-list, and you're well on your way.[page break]You let ol' Spyke know if there's
anything he can do to help you
out, yeah?[page break]Always happy to place an order.
So stay lively wif [group=0003 type=0000 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00], and call
me anytime.

the likes of me now that you're

up to put in an order.

yeah? And that means more abilities.
Once it's all maxed on slots, then it'll
start to earn extra [color=0001]gear experience[color=ffff].
Brilliant, innit?[page break]So if you've got a favorite somefin
or other, it's a no-brainer to pump
up the star power on it. Trust me
on that, mate![page break]Now, I won't haggle over [color=0001]Super Sea
Snails[color=ffff]. But I will tell ya up front that
the higher the star power, the
more it's gonna cost ya.
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor_Fsodr.RareUp_NoShell:
Wot are you on about? You expect
me to help you when you don't have
a single [color=0001]Super Sea Snail[color=ffff]?[page break]Come back when you find at least
one of 'em, yeah?
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor_Fsodr.RareUp_NotEnoughShell:
Oi! You're a bit short on [color=0001]Super Sea
Snails[color=ffff], mate. I get it—they don't
exactly grow on trees, do they?
But I'm afraid my prices are firm.
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor_Fsodr.RareUp_NotFirstShell:
Ah, sorry, love, but it's a bit early
for you to be doing that.
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor_Fsodr.RareUp_Select:
Which [color=0001]gear[color=ffff]'s star power are we
raising, love? If you've got the
[color=0001]Super Sea Snails[color=ffff], I can make
it happen.
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor_Fsodr.RecieveGeso_First:
Been doing a bit of that online
shopping? Good on ya, mate.
Some deals to be had over in
the [color=0001]SplatNet Shop[color=ffff]. And the best
part? You can still collect from me.[page break]Might even find somefing rare wif
[color=0001]different gear abilities[color=ffff] than you
can find in town. That Annie curates
a proper selection.[page break]I'll stop yakkin' now, but go on and
hit [group=0003 type=0006 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] for [color=0001]more info[color=ffff] about the
[color=0001]SplatNet Shop[color=ffff], yeah?[page break]Now, what was that order number...
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor_Fsodr.Recieve_ArriveGeso:
I've got the SplatNet Shop gear you
ordered, mate.
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor_Fsodr.Recieve_ArriveNearOrder:
This'll do, won't it? Maybe not quite
wot you wanted, but sometimes that
turns out to be wot's needed.
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor_Fsodr.Recieve_ArriveNotOrder:
Oi, this was the best I could do.
Hope it does the job, mate.
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor_Fsodr.Recieve_ArriveOrder:
Don't ask no questions, but I found
exactly wot you had in mind. Not too
shabby, innit?
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor_Fsodr.Recieve_HaveSameGear:
You've already got some [color=0001]gear[color=ffff] just
like this. Want to [color=0001]replace[color=ffff] the gear
you've got wif this [color=0001]new gear[color=ffff]?
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor_Fsodr.Recieve_NotArrive:
Sorry, love, but I need a little time to
find the stuff you ordered. Try comin'
back [color=0001]tomorrow[color=ffff], yeah?
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor_Fsodr.Recieve_NotBuy:
Not interested? Come see me [color=0001]before
tomorrow[color=ffff] if you change your mind,
else I'll bin it.
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor_Fsodr.Recieve_NotBuyGeso:
Nah? Not wot you had in mind?
Well, come see me again if that
changes, love.
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor_Fsodr.Recieve_NotEnoughMoney:
YOU WOT, MATE?! Look, I'm seein'
fings a bit different these days,
but that don't mean you can take
advantage of ol' Spyke.
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor_Fsodr.Recieve_NotOrder:
You ain't [color=0001]ordered[color=ffff] anyfing! Try
[color=0001]ordering[color=ffff] somefing first.
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor_Fsodr.Skill_ExSkillDouble:
Careful, mate. If you swap out
the [color=0001]Ability Doubler [color=ffff]for a different
ability, you [color=0001]can't get it back again[color=ffff].
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor_Fsodr.Skill_First:
Oi, don't tell me you never [color=0001]added gear
abilities[color=ffff] before![page break]It's child's play if you've got the
[color=0001]ability chunks[color=ffff] for the job. You can
even swap in a new ability for an
existin' one, yeah?[page break]It's not even wasteful, mate. You
get some [color=0001]ability chunks in return[color=ffff]
for the old ability, so don't let that
stop ya.[page break]Go on, then. If you've got some
ability chunks and some abilities
that need addin' or changin', give
it a try!
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor_Fsodr.Skill_Select:
Right. Go on and choose the [color=0001]gear[color=ffff]
and [color=0001]ability [color=ffff]you want.
CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaVendor_Fsodr.Skill_Set:
You're all sorted, mate. Hope it helps
you out in battles.

CommonMsg/Plaza/PlazaWalkThrough.FirstExplain:
Oh my! Welcome, sweetie.[page break]You new around here? That's just
fine. We all started somewhere.[page break]I'm the local Recon Guide. I'll send
you to any battle stage in any mode
you like for a nice, safe stroll. It's
a great way to get to know a place.[page break]And that's it! Have fun out there,
alright?[page break]Oh! I plumb forgot to tell you how
to leave recon. Well, it's easy as
pie—just press [group=0003 type=0005 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00], and you'll see
it on the menu. And NOW that's it!

CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorGroup.Auto_Explanation:
Drone-tone color chips boost the Pearl Drone's
abilities by granting special actions and helping
them charge easier. You've got a friend in Pearl!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorGroup.Continuity_Explanation:
Support-tone color chips do things like increase
ink efficiency, help with targeting, and more.
They're great for shoring up your weak points!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorGroup.Fire_Explanation:
Power-tone color chips help you go on the
offensive by increasing damage dealt, firing
rate, and more. Get them before they get you!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorGroup.Luck_Explanation:
Lucky-tone color chips litter the field with
armor, ink refills, helpful bombs, and more.
With enough luck, you'll believe in miracles!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorGroup.Move_Explanation:
Mobility-tone color chips are all about moving.
Move faster, recover gauge on the go, and so
on. Stay nimble and never get cornered!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorGroup.Range_Explanation:
Range-tone color chips can ink more turf, shoot
further, pierce enemies, and more. Keep your
foes where you like them—at arm's length!

CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.BlastBrushAwayUp_Explanation:
Increases the distance enemies are blown
back by explosions.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.BlastSizeUp_Explanation:
Increases the radius of damage and turf
inked by explosions.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.BulletCorePaintUp_Explanation:
Allows you to ink more turf with your
main weapon while moving, such as with
a roller or brush.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.BulletSizeUp_Explanation:
Increases the size of your main weapon's
shots, making it easier to hit enemies.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.ChargeKeepTimeUp_Explanation:
Allows you to store a charge. Having two
or more of this color chip increases how
long the charge can be stored.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.ChargeTimeSave_Explanation: Increases your main weapon's charge speed.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.ComboGraceTimeUp_Explanation:
Increases the duration of a Lucky Chain.
The larger the chain, the more likely
enemies are to drop items.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.ComboItemDropUp_Explanation:
Increases the Lucky Chain maximum. The
longer the chain, the more likely enemies
are to drop items.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.DefeatEnemyBlastFreqUp_Explanation:
Increases the chances of enemies dropping
Lucky Bombs. Lucky Bombs explode from
the closest enemy to the farthest.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.DefeatEnemyItemDropArmor_Explanation:
Increases the chances of enemies dropping
armor. Armor will absorb damage and break
so you don't lose a Life.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.DefeatEnemyItemDropDroneActiveUp_Explana:
Increases the chances of enemies dropping
drone batteries. A drone battery fills the
drone gauge by 100 points.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.DefeatEnemyItemDropInkUp_Explanation:
Increases the chances of enemies dropping
ink bottles. An ink bottle fills half of your
ink tank.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.DefeatEnemyItemDropSpecialUp_Explanation:
Increases the chances of enemies dropping
canned specials. A canned special fills half
of the special gauge.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.DefeatEnemyItemStunBomb_Explanation:
Increases the chances of enemies dropping
disc pieces. Get three, and the Pearl Drone's
Step-Off Song will temporarily close portals.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.DirectAttackBrushAwayUp_Explanation:
Push enemies further with rushing attacks,
like Reefslider, inking while moving with
a roller or brush, etc.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.DirectAttackUp_Explanation:
Increases damage dealt by rushing attacks,
like Reefslider and inking while moving with
a roller or brush.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.DisableCanopyShot_Explanation:
Prevents the brella shield from launching,
allowing you to keep shooting with it open.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.DroneActionBombQuick_Explanation:
Allows the Pearl Drone to use Burst Bombs.
Having two or more of this color chip
reduces the required points accordingly.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.DroneActionBombSplash_Explanation:
Allows the Pearl Drone to use Splat Bombs.
Having two or more of this color chip
reduces the required points accordingly.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.DroneActionItemDrop_Explanation:
Allows the Pearl Drone to generate items.
Having two or more of this color chip
reduces the required points accordingly.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.DroneActionSprinkler_Explanation:
Allows the Pearl Drone to spray ink.
Having two or more of this color chip
reduces the required points accordingly.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.DroneActionSuperLaser_Explanation:
Allows the Pearl Drone to use Killer Wail.
Having two or more of this color chip
reduces the required points accordingly.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.DroneActionTornado_Explanation:
Allows the Pearl Drone to use Inkstrike.
Having two or more of this color chip
reduces the required points accordingly.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.DroneActionTrap_Explanation:
Allows the Pearl Drone to use Ink Mines.
Having two or more of this color chip
reduces the required points accordingly.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.DroneCadenceDefeatEnemyUp_Explanation: Fills the drone gauge by defeating enemies.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.DroneCadenceMoveUp_Explanation: Fills the drone gauge by moving.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.DroneCadencePaintUp_Explanation: Fills the drone gauge by inking surfaces.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.EnemySinkUp_Explanation:
Decreases the movement speed of enemies
on your ink.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.FarDamageRatioUp_Explanation:
Increases damage dealt with your main
weapon's shots to far-off targets.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.HomingShot_Explanation:
Causes your main weapon to track targets.
Having two or more improves the tracking.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.HumanMoveUp_Explanation: Increases movement speed in Octoling form.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.KnockBackUp_Explanation:
Attacks from your main weapon push
enemies away. Does not affect certain
heavy enemies.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.LoadingBulletUp_Explanation:
Increases the number of shots fired from a
single charge with a splatling.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.MainInkSave_Explanation:
Decreases amount of ink consumed by your
main weapon.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.MainPaintUp_Explanation:
Allows you to ink more turf with your
main weapon's shots.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.MainShotRateUp_Explanation: Increases your main weapon's firing rate.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.ManeuverSlideAttack_Explanation:
Causes a Dodge Roll with dualies to deal
damage. This damage is increased by having
the Rush Attack color chip.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.ManeuverSlideUp_Explanation:
Increases the number of times you can
Dodge Roll in a row with dualies.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.MoveSpecialIncreaseUp_Explanation: Fills the special gauge by moving.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.NearDamageRatioUp_Explanation:
Increases damage dealt with your main
weapon's shots to nearby targets.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.PaintCombo_Explanation: Inking the ground adds to the Lucky Chain.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.PenetrateNumUp_Explanation:
Your main weapon's shots pierce enemies,
with damage decreasing per enemy.
More chips means more enemies pierced.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.PoisonInk_Explanation:
Increases the damage enemies take when
they're on your ink.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.Recharge_Explanation:
Allows you to begin a new splatling charge
before the previous charge is depleted.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.RollerDashUp_Explanation:
Increases movement speed when moving
while inking with a roller or brush.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.SaberStepAttack_Explanation:
Causes a lunge with a charged splatana swipe
to deal damage. This damage is increased by
having the Rush Attack color chip.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.ShelterNakedTimeSave_Explanation:
Speeds up brella canopy regeneration after
the brella shield is launched or broken.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.ShotBiasRatio_Explanation:
Reduces the shot spread on your
main weapon.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.ShotDamageUp_Explanation:
Increases damage dealt by your weapons
and the Pearl Drone.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.SpecialIncreaseUp_Explanation:
Increases special-gauge fill rate from
inking surfaces.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.SquidMoveUp_Explanation: Increases movement speed in swim form.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.SquidSomersaultAttack_Explanation:
Causes Squid Rolls and Squid Surges to deal
damage. This damage is increased by having
the Rush Attack color chip.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.SubInkSave_Explanation:
Decreases amount of ink consumed by your
sub weapon.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.TowerBoss2_2_Auto_Explanation:
A gestalt of the countless thoughts that
have been pulled into the Memverse. With
Pearl at your side, anything is possible!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.TowerBoss2_2_Continuity_Explanation:
A gestalt of the countless thoughts that
have been pulled into the Memverse. You
feel like the world has your back!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.TowerBoss2_2_Fire_Explanation:
A gestalt of the countless thoughts that
have been pulled into the Memverse. You
feel like you're brimming with strength!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.TowerBoss2_2_Luck_Explanation:
A gestalt of the countless thoughts that
have been pulled into the Memverse. You
feel like luck is on your side this time!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.TowerBoss2_2_Move_Explanation:
A gestalt of the countless thoughts that
have been pulled into the Memverse. You
feel like you're everywhere at once!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.TowerBoss2_2_Range_Explanation:
A gestalt of the countless thoughts that
have been pulled into the Memverse. You
feel like nothing is out of reach!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.WeakSwingRateUp_Explanation:
Increases your splatana's horizontal-
slash rate.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTip.WeakenEnemyDamageRateUp_Explanation:
Increases damage dealt to enemies when
they're slowed by your ink or Toxic Mist.

CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.BlastBrushAwayUp_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.BlastBrushAwayUp_UnlockComment_02:
Explosions from bombs or blasters
will knock foes around even more.
The further the better, I say.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.BlastBrushAwayUp_UnlockComment_03:
If you've set any bombs to Pearl,
like Drone Burst Bomb, this applies to
those too.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.BlastBrushAwayUp_UnlockComment_04:
And if you ALSO set Splat Drone
Gauge... Wait, can we count on
getting all of these at once?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.BlastDamageUp_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.BlastDamageUp_UnlockComment_02:
Gives oomph to bombs, blasters,
and the explosions from breaking
portals or splatting enemies.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.BlastDamageUp_UnlockComment_03:
It makes a good team with the
Splash Radius chip. Any bombs
Pearl throws get the boost too!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.BlastDamageUp_UnlockComment_04:
What if explosions...but MORE.
You can't not take it! It wouldn't
be fair to ME!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.BlastSizeUp_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.BlastSizeUp_UnlockComment_02:
This plus Splash Damage chips
equals big explosions that deal
big damage. Class dismissed.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.BlastSizeUp_UnlockComment_03:
It works with Triple Inkstrikes and
Booyah Bombs, too, to catch even
more enemies in your blasts.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.BlastSizeUp_UnlockComment_04:
It even affects portals when they
blow?! That's the biggest boom
there is, and now it gets BIGGER!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.BulletCorePaintUp_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.BulletCorePaintUp_UnlockComment_02:
You'll ink a wider swath when on the
move with a roller or brush. Also
when launching the brella canopy.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.BulletCorePaintUp_UnlockComment_03:
Some chips only show up for you
if you have the right weapon.
Like this one!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.BulletCorePaintUp_UnlockComment_04:
I love running around like a maniac
with these things! Let's give our
enemies a brush...with DEATH!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.BulletSizeUp_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.BulletSizeUp_UnlockComment_02:
Good if you need a little help with
aiming. Just one of these makes
a noticeable difference.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.BulletSizeUp_UnlockComment_03:
The bounding box around each
shot shows its effective size. Set
this chip and see for yourself!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.BulletSizeUp_UnlockComment_04:
So...even the shots from a
charger would be huge? Can I
bring this into Turf War?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.ChargeKeepTimeUp_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.ChargeKeepTimeUp_UnlockComment_02:
This one lets you store your
charge with a charger, splatling,
or stringer.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.ChargeKeepTimeUp_UnlockComment_03:
You can swim around without
losing your charge! Useful for
quickly maneuvering into a good
vantage point for taking the shot.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.ChargeKeepTimeUp_UnlockComment_04:
That explains the time I got one-
shot by a charger popping out of
ink. Guess they weren't cheating!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.ChargeTimeSave_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.ChargeTimeSave_UnlockComment_02:
A must-have for charger users.
The only thing better than having
one is having lots.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.ChargeTimeSave_UnlockComment_03:
This helps with the main drawback
of chargers and splatlings! But
they still use a lot of ink, so...
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.ChargeTimeSave_UnlockComment_04:
"Be suuuper-duuuper careful not
to run out of ink, Eight!" How do
you like my Marina impression?!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.ComboGraceTimeUp_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.ComboGraceTimeUp_UnlockComment_02:
The longer your chain, the more
items you'll see. This helps you
rack up those long chains.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.ComboGraceTimeUp_UnlockComment_03:
Set Max Lucky Chain with this,
and your odds get even better!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.ComboGraceTimeUp_UnlockComment_04:
Lucky Chain, huh? I say splatting
a bunch of fish in a row is its own
reward, but this is cool too!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.ComboItemDropUp_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.ComboItemDropUp_UnlockComment_02:
The chance of an item drop
doubles when the chain hits 10
and triples when it reaches 20.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.ComboItemDropUp_UnlockComment_03:
Having Lucky Chain Window helps
keep your Lucky Chain as high
as it can go!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.ComboItemDropUp_UnlockComment_04:
It seriously goes up to 99?! Do
we...usually splat that many fish
per floor?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DefeatEnemyBlastFreqUp_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DefeatEnemyBlastFreqUp_UnlockComment_02:
When you have Lucky Bombs, it
only takes a few splats to put the
hurt on a whole mob of fish.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DefeatEnemyBlastFreqUp_UnlockComment_03:
And enemies splatted by Lucky
Bombs can drop more Lucky
Bombs. It's a self-feeding cycle!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DefeatEnemyBlastFreqUp_UnlockComment_04:
Lucky Bombs, huh? The reward
for splatting a bunch of fish in a
row is...splatting more fish!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DefeatEnemyInkRecover_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DefeatEnemyInkRecover_UnlockComment_02:
With this, you could probably take
out a swarm of smaller ones and
not lose any ink.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DefeatEnemyInkRecover_UnlockComment_03:
You recover the same amount of
ink for every splat, so it's most
effective against a horde of
weaker enemies.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DefeatEnemyInkRecover_UnlockComment_04:
I bet one bomb in the right place
could get a whole ink tank back!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DefeatEnemyItemDropArmor_UnlockComment_0: Haven't seen this color chip yet.

I recommend Marina hack things
to up your armor count. Can't
ever be too protected.

Yes, I'd love to! See me before
you head into the Spire, alright?

Armor's the stuff I see floating
around Eight, yeah? Ha! So we
have that in common!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DefeatEnemyItemDropDroneActiveUp_UnlockC: Haven't seen this color chip yet.

They fill a good amount of Pearl's
drone gauge. Keep her equipped,
or these won't do anything.

My hacks can help with that! I can
give Pearl more action slots or
set it so the system will give you
chips that grant her actions.

If we set, I dunno, Drone Inkstrike
or something, that's powered by the
drone gauge!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DefeatEnemyItemDropInkUp_UnlockComment_0: Haven't seen this color chip yet.

If there's an ink bottle on the field
and you're set for ink, it's a good
time to toss out a sub weapon.

Does Acht just hate to see things
go to waste? Never mind them,
Eight. No need to go out of your
way if your tank is full.

So splatting enemies can get us
ink bottles with this? Then why
keep warning me not to run out?!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DefeatEnemyItemDropSpecialUp_UnlockComme: Haven't seen this color chip yet.

A canned special at the right time
can be a game changer when it
feels like all hope is lost.

Not only will your special make a
splash, it'll fully restore your ink
for the start of a big comeback!

I like to dive right in with a good
Reefslider and juke around to mop
up whatever's left standing.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DefeatEnemyItemStunBomb_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DefeatEnemyItemStunBomb_UnlockComment_02:
The Step-Off Song is Pearl's
secret weapon. It triggers once
you pick up a third disc piece.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DefeatEnemyItemStunBomb_UnlockComment_03:
Pearl's song jams all the portals,
which ought to give you some
breathing room, Eight.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DefeatEnemyItemStunBomb_UnlockComment_04:
Grab every disc piece you see,
Eight. That way I can bust out the
Step-Off Song over and over!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DirectAttackBrushAwayUp_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DirectAttackBrushAwayUp_UnlockComment_02:
You'll want this if you're going
with chips like Squid Attack and
Dodge Roll Attack.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DirectAttackBrushAwayUp_UnlockComment_03:
Sending enemies flying off the
edge of the floor is a knockout
no matter how tough they are!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DirectAttackBrushAwayUp_UnlockComment_04:
Serve, volley, GAME! Knocking
stuff out-of-bounds is how you
win in table tennis, right?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DirectAttackUp_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DirectAttackUp_UnlockComment_02:
This powers up Squid Attacks,
Dodge Roll Attacks, you name it.
It's a solid chip, no lie.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DirectAttackUp_UnlockComment_03:
Well...that's IF you have any rush
attacks to work with. Though if
you don't, this also affects the
shell from those spinny things.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DirectAttackUp_UnlockComment_04:
We can body-slam enemies even
harder?! You heard 'em, Eight!
Get in there and CHAAARGE!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DisableCanopyShot_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DisableCanopyShot_UnlockComment_02:
Your brella canopy won't launch
even if you hold [group=0003 type=0050 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00], so you
get the shield and the shots.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DisableCanopyShot_UnlockComment_03:
Isn't that great, Pearl? Now you
don't need to worry about
launching your brella by accident!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DisableCanopyShot_UnlockComment_04:
Yeah, isn't that wonderful, Eight?
Oh, and while I'm at it, CAREFUL
NOT TO RUN OUT OF INK!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DroneActionBombQuick_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DroneActionBombQuick_UnlockComment_02:
Burst Bombs aren't the biggest
bang, but they explode on
contact whenever they hit.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DroneActionBombQuick_UnlockComment_03:
If you already have Splash Damage
or Drone-Gauge Charge, Pearl will
be a force to be reckoned with.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DroneActionBombQuick_UnlockComment_04:
That's right! Beast mode ON!
Get all the chips you can for
me, Eight!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DroneActionBombSplash_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DroneActionBombSplash_UnlockComment_02:
This lets Pearl throw Splat Bombs,
which explode after rolling around
a little bit.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DroneActionBombSplash_UnlockComment_03:
But she'll hold off if there are no
enemies around Eight, so get in
close if you want her to attack.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DroneActionBombSplash_UnlockComment_04:
I know better than to waste good
gauge. No bombs until I get
something in my sights!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DroneActionItemDrop_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DroneActionItemDrop_UnlockComment_02:
Pearl will generate random items
for you. Just don't expect any
drone batteries.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DroneActionItemDrop_UnlockComment_03:
They'll appear right underneath
Pearl. So don't forget they're
there, Eight!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DroneActionItemDrop_UnlockComment_04:
I can even create items? Yo, is
there anything Drone Me CAN'T
make happen?!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DroneActionSprinkler_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DroneActionSprinkler_UnlockComment_02:
Pearl's drizzling ink is there to
help you ink turf and splat fish.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DroneActionSprinkler_UnlockComment_03:
With enough of these and some
Drone-Gauge Charge chips on top,
Pearl will be gushing ink!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DroneActionSprinkler_UnlockComment_04:
Yeah, like a Sprinkler! Wait, but
don't throw me anywhere!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DroneActionSuperLaser_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DroneActionSuperLaser_UnlockComment_02:
Killer Wail's a special weapon, so
it needs more gauge than bombs
or other sub weapons.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DroneActionSuperLaser_UnlockComment_03:
Sound-Wave Damage amplifies it,
so if you can set that too, this
can really clear the floor.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DroneActionSuperLaser_UnlockComment_04:
No 5.1, huh? Well, even in mono,
there's nowhere to hide from my
deadly pipes!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DroneActionTornado_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DroneActionTornado_UnlockComment_02:
This needs a lot of gauge to use.
Setting multiple copies of it or taking
Turf Drone Gauge helps some.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DroneActionTornado_UnlockComment_03:
Make your Inkstrike bigger with
Splash Radius so even more
enemies get swept up in it!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DroneActionTornado_UnlockComment_04:
No Triple version, huh? Who
cheaped out there? Oh well...
so long as I aim good, we're set!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DroneActionTrap_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DroneActionTrap_UnlockComment_02:
If you want Pearl to drop Ink
Mines, here you go. Ideally she'll
place them on high-traffic paths.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DroneActionTrap_UnlockComment_03:
Splash Radius and Splash Damage
enhance its effect, so see if you
can grab those too!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DroneActionTrap_UnlockComment_04:
Don't sweat getting flanked. I'll
make sure no one sneaks up
on you!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DroneCadenceDefeatEnemyUp_UnlockComment_: Haven't seen this color chip yet.

If you're going to go up against
lots of enemies, might as well fill
Pearl's gauge while you're at it.

Splat Ink Recovery also kicks in
when you take out fish, so having
both gives you double benefits!

It works when I splat stuff too!
I'm thinking...RAMPAGE!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DroneCadenceMoveUp_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DroneCadenceMoveUp_UnlockComment_02:
Pearl's drone gauge will fill up
anytime you move. Run, swim,
whatever. It all works.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DroneCadenceMoveUp_UnlockComment_03:
It's especially effective if you
can pair it with Run Speed Up or
Swim Speed Up!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DroneCadenceMoveUp_UnlockComment_04:
My gauge fills up if Eight runs?!
Eight! I need to get you an
exercise wheel or something!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DroneCadencePaintUp_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DroneCadencePaintUp_UnlockComment_02:
It's useful for weapons that ink
lots of turf. Especially if you've
set some Main Ink Coverage chips.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DroneCadencePaintUp_UnlockComment_03:
Know what's cool? If you give
Pearl the Drone Sprinkler chip,
this lets her fill her own gauge!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DroneCadencePaintUp_UnlockComment_04:
I'd be like a Pearl-petual motion
machine! Think of the damage I
could do that way!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DroneCadenceTimeUp_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DroneCadenceTimeUp_UnlockComment_02:
Set a few of these, and Pearl's
drone gauge will fill faster than
paint dries.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DroneCadenceTimeUp_UnlockComment_03:
And if you set Mobile Drone Gauge
to go with it, she'll be giving you
assists left and right!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.DroneCadenceTimeUp_UnlockComment_04:
But remember—there's no point in
building gauge unless you gimme
a chip that lets me do stuff!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.EnemySinkUp_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.EnemySinkUp_UnlockComment_02:
Slowing down enemies on your
turf means Poison Ink is even
more effective if you have it.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.EnemySinkUp_UnlockComment_03:
And if you've set Hindrance Damage,
that synchronizes nicely too!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.EnemySinkUp_UnlockComment_04:
The ink's so gunky. Eight's not
gonna get bogged down in this
stuff, right?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.FarDamageRatioUp_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.FarDamageRatioUp_UnlockComment_02:
This goes great with chargers or
splatlings. Hit hard from far away
so they never get close.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.FarDamageRatioUp_UnlockComment_03:
Imagine what it's like with a few
Main Range chips! Oh, except
Pearl doesn't like chargers.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.FarDamageRatioUp_UnlockComment_04:
The thing about chargers is
I can't hit anything, and for some
reason everything can hit me!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.HomingShot_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.HomingShot_UnlockComment_02:
It hits marked enemies without
having to aim. It can be quirky,
so not everyone's a fan.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.HomingShot_UnlockComment_03:
If you struggle with aiming, this
is for you. But it can be hard to
ink turf when the shots would
rather hit enemies.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.HomingShot_UnlockComment_04:
Shooting is awesome, and aiming
is boring. So it gets the Pearl
seal of approval!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.HumanMoveUp_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.HumanMoveUp_UnlockComment_02:
Some ground can't be inked. This
chip is situational, but when you
need it, you really need it.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.HumanMoveUp_UnlockComment_03:
It makes you go faster while
shooting too! That way, they
can't catch you and...and...
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.HumanMoveUp_UnlockComment_04:
Chill, Marina, before we all start
to panic! But yeah, I like this chip.
Move fast, keep shooting, and win!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.InkRecoveryUp_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.InkRecoveryUp_UnlockComment_02:
This doesn't just refill ink faster
in swim form, by the way. It also
works while in Octoling form.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.InkRecoveryUp_UnlockComment_03:
It's tough when you're out of ink
but not out of enemies. But with
this, maybe things will be OK!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.InkRecoveryUp_UnlockComment_04:
So with enough of these, it won't
matter if we run out? And people
will get off our case about it?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.KnockBackUp_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.KnockBackUp_UnlockComment_02:
It makes your main weapon push
enemies away. Might be fun to try
to knock them clean off the floor.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.KnockBackUp_UnlockComment_03:
Even if you get cornered, this can
give you a fighting chance! Just
remember one thing...
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.KnockBackUp_UnlockComment_04:
"Careful you don't run out of ink,
Pearl!" Name ONE time!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.LoadingBulletUp_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.LoadingBulletUp_UnlockComment_02:
This lets you fire for longer on a
single charge. Doesn't take up
extra ink either. Good deal.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.LoadingBulletUp_UnlockComment_03:
Taking Main Piercing along with it
is a good way to get the most out
of every shot in the barrage!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.LoadingBulletUp_UnlockComment_04:
Line 'em up and extermin-Eight
'em! Heheh, see what I did there?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.MainInkSave_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.MainInkSave_UnlockComment_02:
If you took Main Firing Speed and
are worried about your ink levels,
this should ease your mind.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.MainInkSave_UnlockComment_03:
Yep! It's nice to enjoy those kinds
of perks without running out of
ink all the time. Right, Pearl?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.MainInkSave_UnlockComment_04:
Why are you telling me?! This is
Eight's thing, not mine! Eight's!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.MainPaintUp_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.MainPaintUp_UnlockComment_02:
Claiming more turf is important in
battle. Fills your special gauge
too. I'd advise getting this one.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.MainPaintUp_UnlockComment_03:
It combos well with Poison Ink and
Sticky Ink to turn your turf into
a damaging slog. So much fun!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.MainPaintUp_UnlockComment_04:
Poison what? Sticky which? What
you're saying is that inking turf
leads to victory—I got that right?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.MainShotRangeUp_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.MainShotRangeUp_UnlockComment_02:
It's nice for taking out far-off
enemies. Even nicer if you can
pick up Main Damage (Distant).
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.MainShotRangeUp_UnlockComment_03:
Some weapons have a bigger
spread the further they fire,
so you might also want
Shot-Spread Reduction.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.MainShotRangeUp_UnlockComment_04:
But the whole reason I love close
combat is because I can't hit
anything over five feet away!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.MainShotRateUp_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.MainShotRateUp_UnlockComment_02:
This'll let you fire more quickly, 
which has obvious benefits, but
you'll also use up ink faster.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.MainShotRateUp_UnlockComment_03:
Pairing it with Ink Saver (Main) or
Ink-Recovery Rate helps. I also
recommend Ink-Bottle Drop!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.MainShotRateUp_UnlockComment_04:
Who cares about running out of
ink as long as you splat 'em all
first? BAMBAMBAMBAMBAM!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.ManeuverSlideAttack_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.ManeuverSlideAttack_UnlockComment_02:
This way, you can do some
damage as you Dodge Roll your
way out of a tough situation.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.ManeuverSlideAttack_UnlockComment_03:
Try it out on the target in front
of the elevator. Just tilt [group=0003 type=004b params=48 e1 3a 3f fe ff ff ff]
and press [group=0003 type=0047 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] while firing your
dualies with [group=0003 type=0050 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00].
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.ManeuverSlideAttack_UnlockComment_04:
Body-slamming baddies with Dodge
Rolls? I wanna try! How come you
get to do the cool stuff, Eight?!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.ManeuverSlideUp_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.ManeuverSlideUp_UnlockComment_02:
Multiple Dodge Rolls can get you
anywhere fast. It's extra good if
you also have Dodge Roll Attack.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.ManeuverSlideUp_UnlockComment_03:
Ooo, Dodge Rolls! Pearl's favorite!
You can get as many as six in a
row if you max it out.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.ManeuverSlideUp_UnlockComment_04:
Eight, you gotta do ALL the Dodge
Rolls for me, 'K? Dodge Roll to the
fridge! Dodge Roll to the sofa!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.MoveInkRecoverUp_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.MoveInkRecoverUp_UnlockComment_02:
This should ease your worries
about running out of ink. Keep
moving and you can keep shooting.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.MoveInkRecoverUp_UnlockComment_03:
If you have the Charge Storage
chip, you can recover ink even
while keeping a charge stored.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.MoveInkRecoverUp_UnlockComment_04:
The best part is it works with my
dualies' Dodge Rolls! Shoot, roll,
shoot, roll—it pays for itself!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.MoveSpecialIncreaseUp_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.MoveSpecialIncreaseUp_UnlockComment_02:
Running or swimming triggers it,
but it works on distance traveled.
So swimming's a bit better.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.MoveSpecialIncreaseUp_UnlockComment_03:
There's a third trigger too.
Using Pearl to glide counts as
moving for this chip!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.MoveSpecialIncreaseUp_UnlockComment_04:
Here's my big idea, Eight. Let's fly
around to charge your special,
then drop down and let it rip!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.NearDamageRatioUp_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.NearDamageRatioUp_UnlockComment_02:
Doesn't affect subs or specials,
but it packs more punch per chip
than Ink Damage.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.NearDamageRatioUp_UnlockComment_03:
You'll really appreciate having it
when the enemies get a little too
close for comfort!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.NearDamageRatioUp_UnlockComment_04:
OR! Run right up to the enemy
and blast away! Nothing beats
the rush of close combat.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.PaintCombo_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.PaintCombo_UnlockComment_02:
Guess this makes sure you can
always keep a Lucky Chain going
by inking the ground.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.PaintCombo_UnlockComment_03:
Well, even so, there won't be any
item drops unless you splat
some enemies.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.PaintCombo_UnlockComment_04:
Easy—ink turf to build up the
chain, then splat everything!
Problem solved!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.PenetrateNumUp_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.PenetrateNumUp_UnlockComment_02:
If you put this together with
Main Range, you should be able to
shoot through the biggest foes.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.PenetrateNumUp_UnlockComment_03:
With this, you can take out a
whole swarm at once! That's good
news for your Lucky Chain count.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.PenetrateNumUp_UnlockComment_04:
The way this works is wild! Think
we could get all the enemies to
line up? What if we said please?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.PoisonInk_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.PoisonInk_UnlockComment_02:
It's all you need for the big, slow-
moving ones. It's even better with
Main Ink Coverage to take turf.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.PoisonInk_UnlockComment_03:
Just remember that this won't do
much against the little fish who
leave trails of ink as they go.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.PoisonInk_UnlockComment_04:
It's always the small ones that're
the biggest problems! Yo, Marina,
what's that look for?!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.Recharge_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.Recharge_UnlockComment_02:
Hold [group=0003 type=0050 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] while firing to get
a new charge going. Though it'll
stop your current barrage.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.Recharge_UnlockComment_03:
Goes great with Splatling Barrage.
If you charge during a lull, you
could keep shooting forever!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.Recharge_UnlockComment_04:
Firing all day long with a splatling
sounds like a party! Uh, assuming
nobody shows up with a charger.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.RollerDashUp_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.RollerDashUp_UnlockComment_02:
You can double your speed with
enough of these. You'd practically
be a blur on the battlefield.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.RollerDashUp_UnlockComment_03:
That sounds even faster than
swimming! Careful, Eight. Don't
go so fast you run off the edge!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.RollerDashUp_UnlockComment_04:
We oughta race to see who's
faster—Drone Me or Eight! Last
one there's a rotten fish!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.SaberStepAttack_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.SaberStepAttack_UnlockComment_02:
This adds an area effect to the
lunge attack. Tilt [group=0003 type=004b params=48 e1 3a 3f fe ff ff ff] forward
during a charged [group=0003 type=0050 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] slash.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.SaberStepAttack_UnlockComment_03:
It's three attacks in one! The hit
with the splatana, the ink it gives off,
and now the lunge itself does damage
too. Works great on portals!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.SaberStepAttack_UnlockComment_04:
It's so satisfying when a lunge
attack lands! Let's go find some
suckers to practice on, Eight!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.ShelterNakedTimeSave_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.ShelterNakedTimeSave_UnlockComment_03:
Even when you launch the brella
to clear some space, it won't be
long before you can guard again!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.ShelterNakedTimeSave_UnlockComment_04:
Great for all those people who
keep launching the brella on
accident! Not me. Other people.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.ShotBiasRatio_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.ShotBiasRatio_UnlockComment_02:
This reduces the spray from your
ink shots. Always helps to hit
whatever you're aiming at.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.ShotBiasRatio_UnlockComment_03:
You don't always want less spread
in a target-rich environment. But
any sharpshooters will love this!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.ShotBiasRatio_UnlockComment_04:
You sound like Sheldon. This one's
OK if you like to be precise, but if
you'd rather make a mess, pass.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.ShotDamageUp_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.ShotDamageUp_UnlockComment_02:
Beefs up all your weapons—main,
sub, and special. The more you
set, the stronger you get.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.ShotDamageUp_UnlockComment_03:
If you ever feel indecisive, you
can't go wrong with these! Unless
you have nine already. Can't help
you there.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.ShotDamageUp_UnlockComment_04:
This one chip can power up, like,
ALL your stuff! What's there to
think about? Just take it!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.SpecialIncreaseUp_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.SpecialIncreaseUp_UnlockComment_02:
I'll just let you imagine how good
this is with Main Ink Coverage.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.SpecialIncreaseUp_UnlockComment_03:
Remember that using a special
refills your ink. So this can help
to make sure you never run out!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.SpecialIncreaseUp_UnlockComment_04:
Whaaat?! Who doesn't use their
special as soon as it's ready?!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.SquidMoveUp_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.SquidMoveUp_UnlockComment_02:
Whether you're closing in or
retreating, swimming fast is an
advantage in combat.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.SquidMoveUp_UnlockComment_03:
It's tough running from those fish
when they never give up. I hate to
think of you getting cornered...
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.SquidMoveUp_UnlockComment_04:
Easy there, Marina. But yeah, this
is a good chip to have around if
things start to look bad.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.SquidSomersaultAttack_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.SquidSomersaultAttack_UnlockComment_02:
Hitting the smaller fish with a
Squid Roll splats them instantly.
The move also knocks foes away.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.SquidSomersaultAttack_UnlockComment_03:
Try a Squid Roll into the target just
outside the elevator to get a feel
for the move's range.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.SquidSomersaultAttack_UnlockComment_04:
Whoa...it's like your body is
registered as a weapon now.
How do you keep getting cooler?!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.SubInkSave_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.SubInkSave_UnlockComment_02:
At max level, this could bring your
ink consumption down 75 percent.
That buys a lot of bombs.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.SubInkSave_UnlockComment_03:
It's one to watch out for! In fact,
with Splash Damage, you might
not even need your main weapon!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.SubInkSave_UnlockComment_04:
Great idea! Hear that, Eight?
[group=0003 type=0050 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] is out. We're all about
[group=0003 type=004e params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] now!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.WaveDamageUp_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.WaveDamageUp_UnlockComment_02:
Not many attacks use sound
waves. But you don't need many
of these to make them count.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.WaveDamageUp_UnlockComment_03:
Speaking of powerful sounds,
this also enhances Pearl's
signature Killer Wail!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.WaveDamageUp_UnlockComment_04:
My Killer Wail? Oh yeah, the one
from the Drone Killer Wail chip!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.WeakSwingRateUp_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.WeakSwingRateUp_UnlockComment_02:
This lets you keep slashing so
that you don't have to stop until
everything around you is gone.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.WeakSwingRateUp_UnlockComment_03:
Be careful, because it also uses
up more ink. Though I'm sure
Pearl has thoughts about that.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.WeakSwingRateUp_UnlockComment_04:
I was just... I was gonna... Uh,
yeah, don't get careless and run
outta ink, Eight!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.WeakenEnemyDamageRateUp_UnlockComment_00: Haven't seen this color chip yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.WeakenEnemyDamageRateUp_UnlockComment_02:
Main Ink Coverage helps to spread
your ink around, and Sticky Ink
makes it a trap.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.WeakenEnemyDamageRateUp_UnlockComment_03:
It also works on enemies in your
Toxic Mist. If you don't have that,
try the vending machines!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_ColorTipComment.WeakenEnemyDamageRateUp_UnlockComment_04:
It's kinda like kicking enemies
when they're down...which is the
best time to kick them, really!

CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.BallKing_UnlockComment_00: No clue what this thing is yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.BallKing_UnlockComment_02:
When it's rolling around, aim for
its exposed parts. If it hits a
bumper, it'll bounce off and leave
behind a swarm of fish. Not ideal,
but a chance for a Lucky Chain.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.BallKing_UnlockComment_03:
The other thing that happens
when it bounces is the shell opens
a little, making the insides easier
to hit. Go with whatever tactic is
best for your weapon.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.BallKing_UnlockComment_04:
Nobody's gonna talk about how it
suddenly charges you full steam,
huh? Better lay down some ink
and scram when that happens!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.BarrierKingIida_UnlockComment_02:
I'm just glad Marina's OK. We have
Eight and Pearl to thank for that.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.BarrierKingIida_UnlockComment_03:
Thanks for getting me out of
there, everyone! I'll try to repay
the favor with my hacking skills.
We can stop Order if we all work
together!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.BarrierKingIida_UnlockComment_04:
How DARE Order put Marina
through the wringer like that!
That thing's on my LIST!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.BarrierKingOdako_UnlockComment_02:
Order was vicious. But we're no
slouches ourselves. I always knew
Eight and Pearl could do it. And so
we returned to the real world,
happily ever after.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.BarrierKingOdako_UnlockComment_03:
Wasn't that li'l Order cuuute?
I wonder where it went.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.BarrierKingOdako_UnlockComment_04:
That's the last we'll see of THAT
creep, I bet. And if not, then
Eight, Marina, Acht, and me are
gonna fry it up all over again!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.BarrierKingOdako_UnlockComment_Conclusio: Even here, we stay Off the Hook!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.BombBlow_UnlockComment_00: No clue what this thing is yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.BombBlow_UnlockComment_02:
Shoot down the capsules it
spews. It'll self-destruct and
save you some trouble.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.BombBlow_UnlockComment_03:
You can also shoot the capsules
after they're launched to convert
them to your ink! They contain
things like bombs and Toxic Mist.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.BombBlow_UnlockComment_04:
Huh?! You're telling me THAT'S
what was spamming those Splat
Bombs at us?!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.ChargerTower_UnlockComment_00: No clue what this thing is yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.ChargerTower_UnlockComment_02:
The head at the top is where you
want to aim. Take that out, and
what's left will explode to damage
any enemies nearby.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.ChargerTower_UnlockComment_03:
If the head's out of reach, cut
the body down to size. But finish
the job, or they'll regrow the
tower part! They'll get more
aggressive, too, so watch out.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.ChargerTower_UnlockComment_04:
They attack like someone gave
'em a charger! If they miss with
the first shot, don't give them a
second chance, Eight!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.ChargerTower_UnlockComment_Conclusion: Take it out at the head!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.Escape_UnlockComment_00: No clue what this thing is yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.Escape_UnlockComment_02:
These cowards run when Eight
gets close. But your ink slows
them down, so chase them onto
ground you've inked, and it's like
shooting fish in a barrel.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.Escape_UnlockComment_03:
They'll run from your bombs
too. You can use that to your
advantage to flush them onto
your own turf.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.Escape_UnlockComment_04:
You're never gonna outrun these
suckers, so you've gotta
outsmart them instead. Make
me proud, Eight!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.Escape_UnlockComment_Conclusion: They can't escape a good plan!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.ExplodeSpawner_UnlockComment_00: No clue what this thing is yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.ExplodeSpawner_UnlockComment_02:
They'll regenerate any amount of
damage if you let them. So once
you start attacking, don't let up
until the job is done.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.ExplodeSpawner_UnlockComment_03:
Actually, my research shows they
won't regenerate if you ink the
ground at their base. If you have
Poison Ink, you can even damage
them further that way.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.ExplodeSpawner_UnlockComment_04:
It's the best feeling to watch 'em
go BOOM! Get splatted, all you
fishy freaks! Hahahahahaha!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.Hopper_UnlockComment_00: No clue what this thing is yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.Hopper_UnlockComment_02:
They'll try to splash down on you
when you get close. But you can
fix that. Just look up and splat
them before they hit the ground.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.Hopper_UnlockComment_03:
The pedestal they leave behind
can launch you if you touch it.
It can be a handy escape route if
you ever find yourself swarmed!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.Hopper_UnlockComment_04:
It's also just fun! Are you cool
with heights, Eight? Because
I LOVE THEM!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.RivalKing_UnlockComment_00: No clue what this thing is yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.RivalKing_UnlockComment_02:
They're tough opponents who
look...a lot like Eight. It goes past
looks too. The more powered-up
your Palette is, the more
resourceful they get.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.RivalKing_UnlockComment_03:
Don't get caught in a pincer
maneuver! Use the high ground
in the middle to force one-on-
one skirmishes.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.RivalKing_UnlockComment_04:
They can do Triple Splashdowns
out of nowhere?! Where'd these
biters learn THAT trick?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.RivalKing_UnlockComment_Conclusion: Pick 'em off one at a time!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.Shell_UnlockComment_00: No clue what this thing is yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.Shell_UnlockComment_02:
Their heads are their weak spot.
Wait until it pokes out before you
shoot. Until then, while they're
spinning around...hope you're
light on your feet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.Shell_UnlockComment_03:
When you defeat one, it leaves
the shell behind. They make great
weapons! Just touch one, and it'll
slam into enemies and ink a path
for you as it goes!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.Shell_UnlockComment_04:
So we can splat 'em to turn the
tables, huh? You know what to
do, Eight. Take these out, and
make its friends regret it ever
showed its sorry face!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.Shell_UnlockComment_Conclusion: Primo targets to use as weapons!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.Sprinkler_UnlockComment_00: No clue what this thing is yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.Sprinkler_UnlockComment_02:
I can't stand these things. They'll
spill ink all day if you let them.
Do yourself a favor, and take
them out before the whole floor's
a mucky mess.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.Sprinkler_UnlockComment_03:
If you defeat them early, they
don't pose much of a threat. And
they don't have much health
either. Try to take them down
as soon as you see them!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.Sprinkler_UnlockComment_04:
They're a good reminder to look
up every now and then. Keep your
head on a swivel, Eight!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.Sprinkler_UnlockComment_Conclusion: Keep it your turf, not theirs!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.TowerKing_UnlockComment_00: No clue what this thing is yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.TowerKing_UnlockComment_02:
The face-like nodes on the rim
are its weak spots. Bad things
happen if the searchlight catches
you, so hide in its blind spots or
duck into your ink until it passes.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.TowerKing_UnlockComment_03:
You'll need to destroy the lit-up
layers to win. You can work your
way up from the bottom, or try
for the higher layers first if you
have a long-range weapon!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.TowerKing_UnlockComment_04:
Wait, is that a symbol under the
searchlight? I think it's showing
what kind of attack it'll do or
something.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.TowerKing_UnlockComment_Conclusion: Don't get caught in the searchlight!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.TreeMissile_UnlockComment_00: No clue what this thing is yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.TreeMissile_UnlockComment_02:
These are the missiles that come
flying if you leave those weird
tree things alone. They home in
on you, but slowly, so don't panic.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.TreeMissile_UnlockComment_03:
Don't try to run from them, Eight!
They'll just chase you down. They
leave nasty ink splatters wherever
they hit too.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.TreeMissile_UnlockComment_04:
Yo, you do NOT want to take one
of these to the face. Get 'em
before it's too late, Eight!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.Tree_UnlockComment_00: No clue what this thing is yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.Tree_UnlockComment_02:
The seeds growing out of them
become missiles that home in on
you. Never mind the base. Break
all the seeds, and they'll self-
destruct in a big explosion.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.Tree_UnlockComment_03:
Destroying at least SOME seeds
is a good idea. Otherwise you'll
