wind up with missiles seeking you
from every angle!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.Tree_UnlockComment_04:
That sounds like work! Can't we
just go for the body? Ugh, looks
like it has WAY too much health
for that.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.ZakoLarge_UnlockComment_00: No clue what this thing is yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.ZakoLarge_UnlockComment_02:
If you let them in close, their
lunge attack seriously hurts. But
they don't ink turf, so draw them
into your territory and finish
them off once they're weakened.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.ZakoLarge_UnlockComment_03:
Sometimes they give enemies
rides, and sometimes they push
others out of the way. Does that
make them good or bad allies?
They're weirdly drawn to ∞-balls.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.ZakoLarge_UnlockComment_04:
Do NOT let these bruisers
headbutt you, not even on a dare.
I like to ink the ground in front of
'em and laugh as they crawl
through it.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.ZakoSmall_UnlockComment_00: No clue what this thing is yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.ZakoSmall_UnlockComment_02:
These ink the ground to ease the
way for the big guys. Get rid of
them quick, Eight, before they
bog you down with their trails.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.ZakoSmall_UnlockComment_03:
I've noticed them getting faster
and more aggressive if left alone.
They're easy to defeat, but that
doesn't mean you can ignore them.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.ZakoSmall_UnlockComment_04:
Sure, they're small and weak,
but they can be trouble too!
Squash 'em, Eight!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.ZakoStandard_UnlockComment_00: No clue what this thing is yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.ZakoStandard_UnlockComment_02:
These can take a little more of a
beating. They'll paint over your
ink if you let them. So don't.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.ZakoStandard_UnlockComment_03:
They're about as tough as the
practice targets you see around.
Does that help give you an idea
of what it takes to beat one?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_EnemyComment.ZakoStandard_UnlockComment_04:
Getting mobbed by these punks
is bad news! Treat 'em like target
practice, Eight!

CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_Hacking.DoubleTip_Explanation:
Increases the chance of getting double
chips during floor selection.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_Hacking.DroneActionBombQuickTip_Explanation:
Unlocks color chips that let the
Pearl Drone use Burst Bombs.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_Hacking.DroneActionItemDropTip_Explanation:
Unlocks color chips that let the
Pearl Drone generate items.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_Hacking.DroneActionSlot_Explanation:
Increases the number of action slots to set
color chips for the Pearl Drone.
Note: Hacking is required to set any color
chips for the drone other than Drone Killer
Wail and Drone Splat Bomb.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_Hacking.DroneActionSprinklerTip_Explanation:
Unlocks color chips that let the
Pearl Drone spray ink.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_Hacking.DroneActionTornadoTip_Explanation:
Unlocks color chips that let the
Pearl Drone use Inkstrikes.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_Hacking.DroneActionTrapTip_Explanation:
Unlocks color chips that let the
Pearl Drone use Ink Mines.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_Hacking.DroneCadenceDefeatEnemyTip_Explanation:
Unlocks color chips that increase the
drone gauge by defeating enemies.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_Hacking.DroneCadencePaintTip_Explanation:
Unlocks color chips that increase the
drone gauge by inking the ground.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_Hacking.FloorShopDiscount_Explanation:
Gives you a discount on purchases from
the vending machine.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_Hacking.ForceFloorShopHigh_Explanation:
Ensures that 25F will always have a
vending-machine corner.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_Hacking.ForceFloorShopMiddle_Explanation:
Ensures that 15F will always have a
vending-machine corner.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_Hacking.IkuraRewardRate_Explanation:
Receive more Membux as a reward for
clearing floors.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_Hacking.JemHardMode_Explanation:
The fewer hacks that are active, the
more Prlz you get for clearing the Spire,
up to 3x. However, if you don't clear the
Spire, you get nothing.
(Existing hacks can be freely adjusted.)
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_Hacking.PlayerArmorDieJump_Explanation:
Automatically launch into the air when
all armor is broken. Extra investment
increases launch height.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_Hacking.PlayerArmorMax_Explanation:
Increases the maximum pieces of
additional armor you can have at once.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_Hacking.PlayerArmorPoisonedReduce_Explanation:
Increases movement speed when all armor
is broken.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_Hacking.PlayerArmorRecover_Explanation:
Increases the speed at which broken
armor repairs itself. Swimming in ink
restores it even faster.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_Hacking.RechooseFloorShop_Explanation:
Allows you to pay Membux to change a
vending machine's selection.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_Hacking.RechooseStage_Explanation:
Enables you to reset the offered floor
types and rewards.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_Hacking.RetryAdmission_Explanation:
Allows you to pay Membux to keep going
after losing all your Lives.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_Hacking.RetryNumMax_Explanation:
Increases how many Lives you get per
run at the Spire.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_Hacking.Reveal1stBoss_Explanation:
Learn what boss you'll face on 10F before
the fight.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_Hacking.Reveal2ndBoss_Explanation:
Learn what boss you'll face on 20F before
the fight.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_Hacking.TipFreqBias_Explanation:
Your Palette's common color chips will be
offered even more frequently.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_Hacking.WeakenEnemy_Explanation:
Enemies on Normal floors up to 10F and
Easy floors up to 20F will spawn in a
weakened state.

CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_Palette.Agent4_ClearText:
THIS is who Mawina wanted in charge of
Memverse secuwity? This unfwappable,
fwee-spiwited so-and-so? I would never
abide it!

Buuut...no weason such stwength
shouldn't be used to pwotect a world
of order.

An Order Defense Force is MUCH cooler
than a New Squidbeak Splatoon anyway!
No lawless do-gooder would be beyond
our gwasp!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_Palette.Agent8_ClearText:
Oh, hiii, Eight! Can you tell I'm behaving
myself and doing a good job as boss
of the Spire?

I have all the Jelletons here with me,
so it doesn't get too wonely. But I still
want you and Peawl and Mawina and Acht
to come pway sometimes! You'll always
have a fwiend in Smollusk!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_Palette.Agent8_Explanation:
The more hacking effects you have active, the
fewer color chips you can set in this Palette.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_Palette.Aori_ClearText:
This Cawwie and her foolish, airheaded
ways are a menace to any self-
wespecting fan of order. She never
wistens to her betters!

Huh? She's friends with some Octolings,
you say? Not only is she cute, she's a
nice wady too!

WAIT! Is her twue plan to lure Octolings
to the squid world with her charms?!
How wepwehensible! She must be
PUNISHED!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_Palette.Bukichi_ClearText:
I personawwy saw this so-called Sheldon
person taking on two small, adowable
disciples a lot like me!

WHICH MEANS...he took two young,
impwessionable children who've known
him since they were babies and waised
them to inhewit his wegacy.

What sort of tewwible person would drill
a wuv for weapons into children so
young? This is an outwage! He must
be PUNISHED!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_Palette.Fuuka_ClearText:
I saw this Shiver person call a giant
beast "Master"!

But I didn't see this "Master" teaching
her any wessons. Maybe this so-called
Shiver is just twying to suck up to it?

NOT OK! Fwatterers like her can never
twuly be twusted. Her chaotic lies must
be PUNISHED!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_Palette.Hime_ClearText:
Did you know I study my enemies' moves
in the name of order?

Thanks to the digital tickets those jerks
sent me, I watch all the livestweams of
their shows! Then I check the VODs to
examine evewy detail of their evewy move.

CURSE THAT PEAWL! She's too cool...
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_Palette.Hotaru_ClearText:
What was this one's name? Mawie?
She's pwobably the most pwomising of
the bunch.

Her bwilliant, sharp mind cuts through
the noise and stwaightens out chaotic
airheads! She's pwactically a guardian
of order alweady!

Except...she kinda seems OK with chaos?
And that's a big no-no for sewious order
fans! BLEH! NO THANKS!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_Palette.Iida_ClearText:
Mawina used to understand the value of
an unchanging world. But then SHE
changed! What happened?!

Phooey! I'll never forgive whoever got to
Mawina! And I won't forgive Mawina
either for betwaying her pwinciples!

I'm gonna punish ALL of them!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_Palette.Mantarou_ClearText:
I've seen how this big manta was waised
with wuv in a warm, caring household!

Life seems tough for him wight now. He's
got wesponsibiwities as head of his
cwan, fwiends who give him all sorts of
gwief, and a job that keeps him up wate
writing songs.

So why is there always such a happy
gweam in his eyes?! BWECH! It annoys
me, so he must be PUNISHED!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_Palette.Murch_ClearText:
I saw this guy conducting some sketchy
business with that suspiciouswy spiky-
headed old guy!

Although now it seems like maybe he's
wondering if he's satisfied with his
cuwwent station in life?

Don't give up! There's always a future in
order for industwious young men. Wash
your hands of these chaotic ways as
soon as you can!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_Palette.Takowasa_ClearText:
HWAAAT?! This is a big-shot Octarian!
He seems to spend most of his time
these days fwying around in his bwand-
new robot.

But this is no time to be gwinding wasabi!
The happiness of all Octokind depends
on you! Pull yourself together!

The magistwate of order doesn't pway
favowites, not even for big shots. I
sentence him to PUNISHMENT!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_Palette.Utsuho_ClearText:
GWAAAH! What a chaotic mess! Is this
what souls are like in Spwatsville?!

And get this. Sometimes it pways a
stwange flute and POOF! A bunch of
yellow cweatures appear and do twicks!
Incwedible! Wow, they seem so tame and
fwiendwy with the—

NO! Keeping someone capable of such
feats around would only distwact me
fwom my mission. For the sake of order,
they must all be PUNISHED!

CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_Cage_01:
Speaking of pace. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]I wanted to remind you that you can
make the cage go faster by tilting [group=0003 type=004b params=ec 51 38 3f fe ff ff ff].
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_Cage_02:
There's nothing wrong with letting it go on its own.[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]
But if you're in a hurry, why not give it a nudge?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_CollectionEnm_01:
One thing first. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]We're recording data from your fights
with Jelletons in the [color=0004]Jelleton Field Guide[color=ffff].
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_CollectionEnm_02:
We made some notes about behavior and weak points
and things. It's on [group=0003 type=0052 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00], if you're interested.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_CollectionInElv_00:
We're clear. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]You two are making good progress.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
Setting more color chips should help you keep it up.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_CollectionInElv_01:
And speaking of color chips...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]we're gathering info about
the ones you've set in the [color=0004]Color-Chip Collection[color=ffff].
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_CollectionInElv_02:
You can see it from here in the elevator by
pressing [group=0003 type=0052 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00]!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_CollectionInElv_03:
Oh snap! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]What kinda juicy deets you got for us?[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
Let's check it out every now and then, Eight!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_CompleteEnm_01:
One note for you. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]We've been updating the
Jelleton Field Guide as you splat more of them.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_CompleteEnm_02:
With enough field data, we could become the world's
first experts in Jelletonology!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_CompleteEnm_04:
I ain't in this for tenure or nothing, but it could be
worth our while to keep adding notes!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_CompleteTip_00: I'm really pleased with our progress so far!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_CompleteTip_01:
Yo, Marina! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]I was checking the Color-Chip Collection
and saw these lines connecting some chips. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]What's
the deal there?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_CompleteTip_02:
Huh? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Weird. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]It looks like the connected color chips
share the same color, but besides that...
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_CompleteTip_03:
Maybe it'll be clearer once we set enough color chips?[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
Who knows, we might learn something useful.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_Difficulty_02:
Eight, did I tell you yet that you'll get more Membux
for clearing harder floors?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_Difficulty_03:
So if you ever run low on Membux, you could take on
some tougher floors to fill your virtual wallet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_Difficulty_05:
This all reminds me of this old guy who used to say,[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]
"Hard work is the best spice for a meal." [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Or something.
Never paid that much attention.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_Difficulty_06:
Ahaha, I forgot all about that! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Then he'd start
hollering, and out come the wasabi sticks...
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_Difficulty_07:
Is this for real? [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]I guess Octolings have weird old men
too. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Do you know who they're talking about, Eight?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_Drone_00:
You're holding steady, Eight! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]And I like to think I'm doing
pretty good myself.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_Drone_01:
You SO are! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Eight, my hacks can do a lot to upgrade the
Pearl Drone, you know.[page break]For example, I can set it so that [color=0004]color chips [color=ffff]that give
Pearl extra abilities will show up in the Spire.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_Drone_02:
Or I can add [color=0004]drone action slots[color=ffff] so Pearl has even more
ways to use her drone gauge.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_Drone_03: For real?! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Hook me up, 'Rina!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_Drone_04:
That's not all I can do for the drone either. Come talk to
me outside of the Spire if you're curious!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_FleaMarket_00: BAM! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]We're on pace to score a TON of Prlz this run!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_FleaMarket_01:
Oh yeah. Think there was this weird shop just outside
the Spire. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]It sold some random stuff for Prlz.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_FleaMarket_02:
Oh, yeah, that place seemed cool! There was all kinds
of decorations and gear and stuff. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]We should stop by
if we have Prlz to spare!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_FleaMarket_03:
Huh? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]I don't remember building a shop like that into
the Memverse...
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_HackingRetry_00: Made it! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]But we're not home free yet, Eight.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_HackingRetry_01:
Eight? [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Even if you don't get all the way to the top,
we're recording all your runs.[page break]If you talk to me outside of the Spire, I can help you
[color=0004]resume[color=ffff] a run that didn't end so well!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_HackingRetry_02:
Then what do we got to lose? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Might as well go for
broke every time! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Heheheheh!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_HackingRetry_03: Not sure "broke" is what you should be going for.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_JemHardMode_00:
Say, Eight...[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] Have you ever wished you could rack up
a whole pile of Prlz in a single run?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_JemHardMode_01: If so, then I recommend the [color=0004]Risky Rewards[color=ffff] hack!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_JemHardMode_02:
This amazing hack will boost the number of Prlz you get
after clearing the top floor of the Spire.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_JemHardMode_03:
The downside is that if you get kicked out of the Spire
first...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]you won't earn any Prlz at all.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_JemHardMode_04:
Oh yeah? [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]So we make it all the way through, we'll be
swimming in Prlz—but if we fail, the pool's empty?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_JemHardMode_05:
Exactly! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]That's what makes it Risky Rewards. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]If you're
confident in your skills, this hack is a good way to put
them to the test!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_JemHardMode_06: Feels like I just sat through a sales pitch.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_JemHardMode_07:
Guess we have done a bunch of commercial work
lately, huh?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_LookPalette_01:
So what color chip are we gonna snag next? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Hope we
can get one of the REALLY cool ones.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_LookPalette_02:
Nothing wrong with getting another copy of a chip you
already have. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]In fact, some color chips really come into
their own once you have a few.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_LookPalette_03:
If you can't remember which color chips you've taken
so far, [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]press [group=0003 type=0048 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] for a refresher on your Palette!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_RechooseStage_00:
Welcome back, Eight. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Give yourself a second if you
need it before we hit the next floor.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_RechooseStage_01:
Before you go, Eight...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]have you ever looked at the
objectives or color chips and thought, "None of these
sound good to me"?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_RechooseStage_02:
When that happens, press [group=0003 type=0049 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] for a [color=0004]Floor Reset[color=ffff]![group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
For a few Membux, you can reset all three of the
options for that floor!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_RechooseStage_03:
But Floor Reset isn't a standard feature of the Spire.[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]
So if you don't have that hack yet, come ask me about
it outside of the Spire!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_SelectTip_00: Great work, Eight! You're a monster out there!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_SelectTip_01:
Hey, wanna know something neat? [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Each Palette has
certain [color=0004]common tones[color=ffff], which determine what color chips
you see in the Spire.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_SelectTip_02:
To see which tones you're most likely to find for your
current Palette, just press [group=0003 type=0048 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00]!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Hint_SelectTip_03:
If you can't decide on a color chip to pick, the common
tones are usually a safe bet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_00F_First00:
Listen...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]the going might be tough ahead, but if we
don't give up, I know we can make it.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_00F_First01: You know it! Let's get this party started!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_00F_First02: Don't worry about me. I'm in this to the end.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_00F_First03: Hey! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]The [group=0003 type=0038 params=cd cc 8c 3f 02 00 00 00]Palette's all empty.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_00F_First04:
Yeah, because all the color chips you had got converted
into [group=0003 type=0040 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00]Prlz. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]No color chips, no upgrades.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_00F_First05:
You also have fewer [color=0004]Lives[color=ffff] than you did before, Eight.[page break]So be careful. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]If you lose all your Lives, you'll be thrown
out of the Spire and have to [color=0004]start all over again[color=ffff].
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_00F_Rnd00_00: We'll climb this Spire as many times as it takes.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_00F_Rnd00_01: That's right! Look out, Order! We're gunning for you!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_00F_Rnd01_00: NEW RUN! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]GET PUMPED! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]ANYTHING COULD HAPPEN!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_00F_Rnd01_01: Rein it in a little. Though I agree with the sentiment.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_00F_Rnd02_00:
Here goes. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]How far do you think we can take it
this time?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_00F_Rnd02_01:
Whether or not this is the run where we stop Order,
it has to happen sometime! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Do your best, Eight.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_05F_First00: Noice! [group=0001 type=0000 params=05 00 00 00]We made it past 5F!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_05F_First01:
And we got [group=0003 type=0040 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00]Prlz for clearing it. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]The Spire is set up
to give you some good bonuses if you can clear 5F.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_05F_First02:
For example, [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]if you get kicked out after that, you'll
start with [group=0003 type=003f params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0004]500 Membux [color=ffff]on your next run.[page break]And there'll be a guaranteed [color=0004]Vending-Machine Corner[color=ffff]
on 5F where you can spend it.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_05F_First03:
A Vending-Machine Corner sounds like a great place
to take a breather! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Not that I breathe.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_05F_First04:
It's worth your while to get past 5F on every run if
you can.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_05F_First05:
But don't stop there! Let's make this THE run where we
reach Order and blast it to bits! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]You feel me, Eight?!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_09F_First00:
Heads up. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]There's something on the next floor way
past anything we've fought so far. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Brace yourselves.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_09F_First01:
If this Spire kept anything from my original design,[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]
then there should be a [color=0004]boss[color=ffff] at 10F.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_09F_First02:
So we're in for a real fight, huh? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Stay on your toes,
Eight, and don't push your luck!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_09F_Rnd00_00:
We're in good shape so far! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]I think this run is going
pretty well.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_09F_Rnd00_01:
Well, this next floor will be the test. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]You as pumped
as I am, Eight?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_09F_Rnd01_00: No big problems so far, huh, Eight?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_09F_Rnd01_01:
Yeah. But 10F is next. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]You could be in for a rough time,
so don't get reckless.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_09F_Rnd02_00: It's been pretty smooth sailing up to now.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_09F_Rnd02_01:
Hmm, we're about to face a boss though. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Keep your
eye on it, and don't get cooked!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_10F_First00:
Everyone still in one piece? Sweet! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]What even
was that?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_10F_First01:
Definitely stronger than any Jelleton we've seen.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
What did you pick up at the end? A [group=0003 type=003e params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0004]locker key[color=ffff]?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_10F_First02:
That's interesting. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Based on this, [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]I think you'll get a
key every time you clear certain floors for the first time
with each Palette.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_10F_First03:
So...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]if we clear 10F again with another Palette,
we'll get another key?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_10F_First04:
Exactly, Pearl! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]That said...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]I don't think we've wrung
this Palette dry of keys yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_10F_First05:
Yeah. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]I expect we'll find more as we take this one
further along.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_10F_Rnd00_00:
Eight, the Jelletons will start to swarm you after this.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
So don't let yourself get cornered.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_10F_Rnd00_02:
One enemy or a hundred, we gotta do what we gotta do,
am I right? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Eight knows!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_10F_Rnd01_00: Awesome! It's good to be on the other side of 10F.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_10F_Rnd01_01: That's one milestone down. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Very nice.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_10F_Rnd01_02:
Yeah, but we still got plenty of floors to go. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Keep your
foot on the gas, Eight!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_10F_Rnd02_00:
We got the sauce to beat the boss! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]This is going
pretty good so far.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_10F_Rnd02_01:
Yeah! If we can keep this momentum going, we might
actually make it all the way!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_10F_Rnd02_02:
The Jelletons might beg to differ. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Don't assume they'll
give us a free ride to the top.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_15F_First00:
Think we're past the Spire's halfway point. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]This place
doesn't let up, does it?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_15F_First01:
How you holding up, Eight? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]You should rest a little
before we hit the next floor.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_15F_First02:
I'm so sorry you have to go through all this. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]If only
Order hadn't found a way into my mind...
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_15F_First03: Yo, don't feel bad! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]None of this is your fault, Marina.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_15F_First04:
I mean...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]somewhere deep down, I did wish for a perfect
world of peace where nothing had to change.[page break]It was a weakness in me that Order took advantage of.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_15F_First05: Lots of people are afraid of change. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Even me sometimes.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_15F_First07:
Personally, it's never been in my top ten fears.[page break]But I know that whatever you wished for, it wasn't
THIS. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]You don't got nothing to apologize for.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_15F_First08:
So dry those eyes! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Eight and me are gonna pump the
brakes on Order. Just sit back and enjoy the fireworks!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_15F_First10:
No! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]I can't just sit back. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]I'm going to do whatever
I can to help fix this!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_15F_First11: Good. With all of us pitching in, we'll make this right.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_19F_First00:
Eight...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]odds are good that we're coming up on a [color=0004]boss[color=ffff].[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
You'll need to be smart at the core and careful on top.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_19F_First01:
Marina, you worry too much! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Eight's gonna be just fine.
The two of us got this!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_19F_First03: There's that unsolicited advice I'm so familiar with.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_19F_First04:
I can't help it! Pearl's just too precious. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]She's fearless
at the core and adorable on top!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_19F_First05: Huh. This side of you is less familiar.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_19F_Rnd00_00: At 20F already, huh? [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]I smell trouble, and it stinks bad.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_19F_Rnd00_01:
Awww, I bet you two will be fine! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Although...maybe
don't go rushing in without a plan.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_19F_Rnd01_00:
Whew! We made it to 20F, but we can't stop here.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
Let's keep pushing onward!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_19F_Rnd01_01: We could be up against a wall here. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Careful, you two.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_19F_Rnd02_00:
We'll be seeing a boss next. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]These things
mean business.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_19F_Rnd02_01:
Yeah? Well, I'm in the BUSINESS of splatting suckers![group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
Let's go waste 'em, Eight!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_20F_First00:
Good going, Eight! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]And we got a [group=0003 type=003e params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0004]locker key[color=ffff] out
of the deal!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_20F_First01:
That boss though, huh? [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]This Order creep ain't
pulling its punches anymore.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_20F_First02:
It must've made these to stop anyone from ruining its
plan. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]I remember it said it wants to turn the Memverse
into a "colorless world of order."
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_20F_First03:
A world of mindless puppets, huh? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Sounds exactly like
where I was before I came here.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_20F_First04: Acht...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]you weren't in the Deepsea Metro, were you?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_20F_First05:
Hold up—the Deepsea Metro?! That's where we pulled
Eight out from!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_20F_First06:
That's the place. Someone or something there took my
will away. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]I was forced to DJ for it.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_20F_First07:
I don't remember much about my time there. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Except...
I heard this voice...
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_20F_First08: Point is, it's better left in the past.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_20F_First09: I can't believe you went through something so awful!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_20F_First10:
You know, I developed the Memverse in the first place
to restore the minds of "sanitized" Octarians like you.[page break]And since we're having this conversation, [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]that means it
must've worked!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_20F_First11:
Huh. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]So that was you, was it? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]I'm racking up quite
the debt.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_20F_First12:
All this is even more reason to take back the Memverse
from Order. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Those other Octolings need help too!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_20F_Rnd00_00:
BA-BAM! Ya done! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Hey, we're just a few floors from
the top, huh?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_20F_Rnd00_01:
Sure enough. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]But let's not pat ourselves on the back
just yet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_20F_Rnd00_02:
Yeah. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]We're not finished until we stop Order from
draining all the color from the Memverse!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_20F_Rnd01_00: Pearl! Eight! You were both SO cool just now!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_20F_Rnd01_01:
We don't back down! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]We'll track down that wack clown
and reclaim Marina's hack town! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]I mean, Memverse.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_20F_Rnd01_02:
That should be the end of the fight. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]I'm looking
forward to it.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_20F_Rnd02_01: Any serious injuries? [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]No? Good.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_20F_Rnd02_02:
We're not too far off from Order's crib, huh?[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
Yo, Eight! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Let's floor it all the way to the end!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_25F_First00:
This run's going pretty good, huh, Eight? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Feel like we
GOTTA be getting close now.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_25F_First01: You're right! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]We're almost at the top floor!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_25F_First02:
Awww yeah! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Shouldn't be long before we get this
wrapped up. Then it's back to our world tour!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_25F_First03:
Off the Hook, was it? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]I'm eager to get out of here so
I can catch your act.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_25F_First04:
Our science is TIGHT! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Peep the disclaimer first,
'cause we've been known to blow minds!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_25F_First05:
We still have a few shows left in our tour. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]You and
Eight are more than welcome to come see one!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_25F_First06:
I'll think about it. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Though it'd mean flying. Never been
on a plane before.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_29F_First01: Order must be waiting for us there.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_29F_First02:
I'm partly responsible for what's going on, so...[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]I'll go
out there with you, Eight.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_29F_First03: Without a weapon?! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Forget THAT!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_29F_First04: I know, I know! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]But I have to.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_29F_First05:
Look, it's pretty much impossible to change Marina's
mind once it's set.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_29F_First06:
But she can handle herself without a weapon.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
There shouldn't be a problem.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_29F_First07: That's so sweet of you, Acht!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_29F_First08:
Alright, I can see when I'm outvoted. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]No big blazes
of glory though, OK?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_29F_First11:
Nah. I'd rather not get in your way. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]I'll watch from here
in case things go south.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_29F_First12:
Good looking out. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]And yo, if things go real bad,
keep Marina safe!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_29F_First13:
Get hyped! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Get psyched! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Get ready for a big ol'
messy FIGHT!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_29F_Rnd00_00: Here we are. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Once again at the top.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_29F_Rnd00_01: We're not gonna take another L from that Order creep!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_29F_Rnd00_02: I'll be right there with you. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]It's time we stopped Order!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_29F_Rnd00_03:
Think I'll hang back here. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Remember what you learned
last time.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_29F_Rnd00_04:
You know it! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]We're gonna settle that thing's hash
for sure this time!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_29F_Rnd01_00:
The top floor is next. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]So we'll be going up against
Order again.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_29F_Rnd01_01:
I want to come with you again! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]There must be
something I can do to help.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_29F_Rnd01_02:
Whatever you want, 'Rina! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Just leave the fighting
to us, OK?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_29F_Rnd01_03:
It's all yours. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]I wouldn't do you much good out there,
so I'll stay here to keep an eye on things.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_29F_Rnd01_04: Roger that! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]OK, Eight, let's finish this!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_ProgressMiddle_00_00:
How come you're so glued to that laptop all the time?[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]
What are you doing?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_ProgressMiddle_00_01:
It's complicated. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]But basically, to keep my hacks for
you working, [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]I'm constantly fighting with Order over
control of the Spire's systems.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_ProgressMiddle_00_02:
Like just now, it looked like the root password was about
to be reset. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]And if the admin got back the system for
[size=75%]decentralizing permissions, our access would mumble mutter mumble...[size=100%]
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_ProgressMiddle_00_03: Maybe...[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]we should ask fewer questions.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_ProgressMiddle_01_02:
I'm feeling like my normal take-no-prisoners self again.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
Maybe it's 'cause I got Marina back?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_ProgressMiddle_01_03:
Eight, Acht, thank you SO much for freeing me. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]I need
to figure out how to repay the favor soon.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_ProgressMiddle_01_04:
Don't worry about it. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Get me out of here, and we'll
call it even.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_ProgressMiddle_01_05:
I don't think any of us are going home until we do
something about Order. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]But after that, I'm ABSOLUTELY
going to make it up to you!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_ProgressMiddle_02_00: I meant to say, it's been a while, Acht!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_ProgressMiddle_02_01:
You're bringing that up now? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]But you're right. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]I don't
think we've spoken since before your assignment to
that Octavio unit.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_ProgressMiddle_02_02: This was back when Marina lived in Octo-land, right?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_ProgressMiddle_02_03: Right. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]That was about eight years ago, wasn't it?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_ProgressMiddle_02_04: Eight years? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]It's really been that long?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_ProgressMiddle_02_05:
Yo, I bet you have TONS of fun Marina stories I've
never heard! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Gimme the scoop, Acht!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_ProgressUpper_00_00: Acht, don't you get bored staying in the elevator?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_ProgressUpper_00_01:
Nah. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]On its own, this elevator heads back to its
default position.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_ProgressUpper_00_02:
Without someone to stay inside and keep watch, [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]you'd
all be trapped on the current floor. Game over.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_ProgressUpper_00_03: Whoa, for real?! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]No one mentioned that part!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_ProgressUpper_00_04:
I don't know if that's the full story. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]As long as I've
known Acht, they've liked cramped spaces and leaning
against walls. Isn't that true?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_ProgressUpper_00_05:
I don't know what you're... [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Hmm. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Now that you mention
it, there is something soothing about this elevator.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_ProgressUpper_01_00: Hey, Pearl. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Have we met? You seem familiar.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_ProgressUpper_01_01:
What?! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Acht, come on! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]You can't seriously be hitting
on Pearl in front of...
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_ProgressUpper_01_02:
Nope. Relax. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]I just get the feeling I've heard Pearl's
voice before somehow.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_ProgressUpper_01_03:
Hmmm, not sure where from. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Maybe you heard some of
my early noise tracks, before Off the Hook?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_ProgressUpper_01_04: Could be. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]But I don't know... I can't quite place it.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_ProgressUpper_02_00:
I'm surprised you recognized me, Marina. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]I don't look
quite how I used to.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_ProgressUpper_02_01:
Hm? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Well, sure, but...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]your voice and whole general
vibe were a dead giveaway.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_ProgressUpper_02_03:
PICS PLEASE! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]I wanna see what you two looked like
way back when!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_ProgressUpper_02_04:
Er...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]I didn't take very much with me when I left the
Octoling world, sooo...
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_ProgressUpper_02_05:
Yeah, there's like no chance your stuff isn't in a
garbage compactor somewhere.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase2_ProgressUpper_02_06:
I figured. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Wish I'd brought some of my keepsakes and
mementos along...
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_00F_First00: Yo, Acht! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Keeping the world safe for elevators, I see!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_00F_First01: Pearl. Eight. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]You seem ready to set out again.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_00F_First02:
I'm actually kind of looking forward to climbing the
Spire again with all of you!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_00F_First03:
We're headed for the control room at the top floor.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
Can't we just push the button and go now?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_00F_First04: Still no. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Remember—it goes one floor at a time.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_00F_Rnd00_00: Yo, Marina! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Got any words of encouragement for us?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_00F_Rnd00_01: Sure! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Uhhh...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]go get 'em, tigerfish!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_00F_Rnd01_00: Yo, Eight! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]It's all riding on you again.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_00F_Rnd01_01: Not ALL. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]You'll be there backing Eight up, right?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_00F_Rnd02_00: All set? [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Then let's hit it.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_05F_First00:
5F CLEARED! This party is officially ON! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]And we snagged
some Prlz too.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_05F_First02:
Yeah! Our world tour finished without a hitch, but we
haven't gotten that "us time" I promised! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]I wanna get
this over with so we can go have some REAL fun.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_05F_First04: Psst, Eight. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Are these two always like this?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_09F_First00: Next is 10F, yeah? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Which means you-know-what?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_09F_First02:
Guess not that much has changed about this place
since we beat Order.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_09F_First03:
Apparently not. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]I'm reluctant to mess with the system
too much, [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]since there's an issue with the Palettes.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_09F_First04:
Whaaatever. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]It won't be a cakewalk, but we can
handle it, no sweat. Right, Eight?!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_10F_First00:
We're infallible, always invaluable, worth incalculable!
We catch in fools' throats—call us un-Palette-able!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_10F_First01:
Hey, speaking of Palettes. We've seen ones for me and
Marina...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] Do Eight and Acht have 'em too?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_10F_First02:
I did get a signal from one that seemed like Eight's![group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
But...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Acht doesn't seem to have a Palette.[page break]My guess is that when their soul got pulled into the
Memverse,[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] it fixed onto Acht before it could get
turned into a Palette.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_10F_First03: Not sure what that means. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Guess I got lucky?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_10F_First04:
So if Eight's Palette is in those lockers, we'll find it
eventually if we keep opening them?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_10F_First05:
We can't just leave Eight's soul to rot! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Let's get
busy hunting down locker keys!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_15F_First00:
So, that Order— [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Well, I guess it's Smollusk now.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
What's it been up to since our big win?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_15F_First01:
I wondered about that too. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]I looked into it, and I
couldn't find any sign that it left the Memverse.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_15F_First02:
No trace of it outside the Spire though. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Odds are
good that it's still here.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_15F_First03:
It doesn't have enough power to get its tentacles on
the real world anymore. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]So I don't think it's a threat
we need to worry about, exactly, but...
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_15F_First04:
Maaan, I hope it's not up to any big schemes or
whatever. I do NOT want a rematch.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_15F_First05:
Don't worry. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]We're keeping an eye out for Smollusk.
It won't slip through our fingers.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_15F_First06:
Right. Meanwhile, you two should still focus on getting
through all the floors.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_15F_First07: Can do! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Speaking of which. After you, Eight!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_19F_First00:
You're killing it so far, Eight! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]But be careful with
the boss fight ahead.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_19F_First01:
Yo, 'Rina! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]You got any secret weapons stashed that
could one-shot a boss for us?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_19F_First02:
Since you asked nicely... [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Want to try the prototype
Spittin' Fire Trip Wires I made while developing
the Memverse?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_19F_First03:
Oooh, that sounds AWESOME! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]I say we bust 'em out
to blow this boss sky-high!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_19F_First04:
Fair warning—[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]they're a bit overtuned. My last simulation
showed an 88.8 percent chance of destroying the Spire.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_19F_First05: Let's retire those trip wires before we expire.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_20F_First00: That was impressive, Eight. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]How'd you get so skilled?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_20F_First01:
Huh. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Acht, didn't you say you came back to the
Memverse to "confirm something"?[page break]Was that "something" the secret to how Eight
got to be so good?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_20F_First02:
Ha! Nah. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]I'm not interested in being a better soldier
or anything.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_20F_First03:
Hee-hee! That's for sure. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]I remember how often
you'd skip out on combat drills back at school.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_20F_First04: So then, what did you wanna know?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_20F_First05:
Well, not to make a big deal of it, but...[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
You ever been to the Deepsea Metro, Pearl?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_20F_First06:
Whoa, where'd that come from? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]No, I've never been.[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]
Though I got pretty close to it once...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] Must've been
five or so years back?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_20F_First07:
Oh, right! The day we went to extract Eight! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]I still
get goose bumps thinking about the force of your
shout that day.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_20F_First08: There it is. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]So it's confirmed that was Pearl's voice.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_20F_First09: That's what you were wondering about?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_20F_First10: Yep. And now I know. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]So...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]thanks, Pearl.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_20F_First11: Huh?[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] Thanks for what? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]And, also, you're welcome?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_25F_First00:
Huh...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]we're a long way up. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Must be almost at the
top floor, yeah?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_25F_First01:
Eight! Pearl! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Guess what? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]We figured out where
Smollusk went!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_25F_First02:
Seriously?! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Ohhh no. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]We haven't seen it yet, so I bet
I know what you're gonna say.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_25F_First03:
I bet you're right. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Smollusk is in the control room on
the top floor.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_25F_First05:
I don't like this at all, but I guess we've gotta go
there anyway. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Eyes on the prize, Eight!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_ClearedPlt00_00: Woot woot! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]One floor to go!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_ClearedPlt00_01: Which means another fight with Smollusk.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_ClearedPlt00_02:
Yeah, probably. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]But I'm not worried. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]We've proven
we can do it, and we'll do it again!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_ClearedPlt01_00: Wow, what a run! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Next stop, top floor!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_ClearedPlt01_01:
That Smollusk twerp is probably gonna be a pain again.[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]
But we'll deal with that when we come to it!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_ClearedPlt01_02: It's good to be confident. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Just don't take it too far.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_ClearedPlt02_00: We're coming up on the top floor.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_ClearedPlt02_01: Smollusk might be lying in wait for another fight.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_ClearedPlt02_02:
If that's what it wants, that's what we'll give it![group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
Weapons ready, Eight. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Here we go!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_Complete00_00: We're on a hot streak! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]And it DON'T STOP!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_Complete00_01: How many times do you think we've climbed the Spire?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_Complete00_02: Oh, I stopped keeping track a while ago.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_Complete01_00: One last step. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]The control room.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_Complete01_01: Think that Smollusk squirt is waiting for us?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_Complete01_02:
I don't think it ever leaves. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]The place must feel like
home for it!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_Complete02_00: Oh! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Are we here already?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_Complete02_01: I'm sure Smollusk is waiting with bated breath.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_Complete02_02: Yeah? You think it has lungs?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr00_00:
Good ol' top floor. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]You think that Smollusk twerp
is here?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr00_01: Yeah. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Looks like it's holed up in the control room.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr00_02:
Fingers crossed it lets us reconfigure the Palette
in peace. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]But I'm not holding my breath.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr00_03:
We might have to fight that creep again.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
Stay sharp, Eight!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr01_00:
Top floor, coming up. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Even money on Smollusk trying
to stop us again.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr01_01:
Why do you think that thing's so hung up on its
"world of order"?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr01_02:
Maybe if we knew where Smollusk—[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]or rather, Order—[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]
came from, we could figure that out.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr01_03: It doesn't seem like the sharing type.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr01_04:
Doesn't really matter. We're here to reconfigure this
Palette, and that's it. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Lead the way, Eight!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr02_00: We're just about at the control room, but...
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr02_01:
We gotta go through Smollusk again, huh?[page break]Is this gonna keep happening until we reconfigure
every single Palette?!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr02_02: Unless Smollusk decides to give up, probably.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr02_03:
UGGGHHH! Cut me a break here! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]New plan, Eight.[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]
This time, we're gonna make Smollusk see reason!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr03_00:
Hey, you know how Smollusk said "everyone helped
make the Memverse" or whatever?[page break]I thought Marina built this place though. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]So what did
it mean, "everyone"?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr03_01:
I did recruit some Octoling engineers to help with
Memverse development. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]But it can't mean them, right?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr03_02: There could be a connection there to Smollusk.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr03_03: Then let's go in and ask it!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr04_00:
So Order was born from the Memverse developers'
desire for a world that would never change?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr04_02: I'm hoping Smollusk can tell us. But will it want to?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr04_03:
I doubt this is the last we'll see of Smollusk.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
Who knows? Maybe it'll feel talkative sometime.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr05_00:
Based on last time, it seems like Smollusk thinks
I "backstabbed" it somehow.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr05_01:
If Smollusk was born from the desires of the Memverse
devs, then it might see Marina as a parent.[page break]Here's a weird thought. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Is Smollusk acting out because
it can't get Marina to understand what it wants?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr05_02: So what if it is? [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]We still can't let it win!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr05_03:
We got one job, and that's to get this Palette
reconfigured. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]So let's go do it, Eight!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr06_00:
Smollusk's right about the Octoling world going through
a lot of rapid change these past few years.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr06_01:
I can see how the Memverse devs might have
trouble adjusting.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr06_02:
Yeah...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]I can sympathize with feeling lost or confused
when something or someone important to you changes.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr06_03:
But what's the problem if it turns out better than
before? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Nothing! Zero problems detected!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr06_04: Yo, Eight! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]What do you think?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr07_00:
Feels like we're reconfiguring Palettes at a pretty
good clip.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr07_01: Yeah! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Keep it up, everyone!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr07_02:
Out of all the Palettes I've detected in the Memverse,[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]
we should have reconfigured over half!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr07_03: SWEET! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Then let's go add one more to the pile!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr08_00:
Wow, this was a great run. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]And look—we're already
at the top floor!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr08_01:
Now to take care of Smollusk and reconfigure
that Palette.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr08_02:
Yo, I've lost count of how many times we've pulverized
that puny punk. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]When is it gonna throw in the towel?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr08_03: It could happen. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]But it probably won't.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr09_00:
That Smollusk REALLY ain't down with letting us
reconfigure the Palettes.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr09_01:
Yeah, it's weird. Our mission here doesn't even have
anything to do with it.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr09_02:
So how come it keeps getting in our way? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Does it
want payback that bad?!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr09_04: Yo, Acht, let us in on the joke.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr09_05: Don't ask me. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Ask Smollusk.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr10_01:
Once we reconfigure Eight's Palette, we can finally
rest easy!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr10_02: Eight, Pearl, Acht, [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]I owe you all SO much!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr10_03: Yo, save it for when we win!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_29F_NotClr10_04:
First, we've gotta reconfigure Eight's Palette.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
It's go time, Eight!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_00_00: That weapon seems almost like part of you now.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_00_01:
Speaking of which, my Palette has dualies, right?[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
I main those, yo! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]I'm happy Eight picked 'em up.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_00_02:
Good eye! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Each Palette is automatically set with a
weapon favored by its owner's soul.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_00_03: Whoa, no way! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]That explains why yours is a brella.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_00_04: This place is the first I've heard of these "brellas."
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_00_05:
Yeah, they're new! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Well, newish. They only came on
the scene a few years ago.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_00_06:
They open with a FWOOMP! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]And then, TA-DAAA! You get
to go KCHOW, KCHOW![group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] They're SUPER fun!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_01_00: Alright. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]NOW we're in business!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_01_01:
I don't know about you, but I'm getting sick of seeing
Jelleton faces.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_01_02:
Jelletons were supposed to be like tower staff.[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]
But Order modified them to be this instead.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_01_03: My original design for them was a lot cuter!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_01_04: I dunno—these ones are pretty grody.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_01_05:
Ugh. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]I wish you could see them the way they were
meant to be! It'd be wuv at first sight!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_02_00:
Hey, Acht. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Do you remember that game I made way
back when? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]You were the only one of our classmates
who ever managed to beat it.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_02_01:
Oh, right, the rhythm game that ran at like 888 BPM.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
Yeah, I remember now...[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]and I'm getting nauseous
thinking about it.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_02_02: I actually made an even harder sequel.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_02_03:
Are you kidding? [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Why? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]I told you over and over to widen
the timing window and reduce the number of notes!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_02_04:
I just thought...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]it would be boring if it was too easy.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
And Pearl beat it without even blinking, so...
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_02_05:
That thing when you hear a sound and press a button?[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
That was supposed to be hard?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_03_00:
Yo, Acht! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]You gonna let me hear any of those funny
Marina stories you got saved up?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_03_02:
Let me think. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]There was the time she talked to nobody
about excavators for two hours straight.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_03_03:
Whoa, for real?! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Wow, 'Rina. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]I can't believe how short
your speeches used to be!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_03_04:
I was a younger, less experienced nerd. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Nowadays,
I feel confident in my ability to fully convey the joys
of excavators accurately and in painstaking de—
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_03_05: Think we're ready for that next floor now, Eight.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_04_00:
Maaan, I just remembered our world tour is over.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
I had such a blast! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Can we do another one?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_04_01:
Your shows really were off the hook. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]And the crowds
were...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]almost unnaturally enthusiastic.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_04_02: You think so?! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]I wonder...
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_04_04:
Could Pearl's voice during the battle with Order have
imprinted on the unconscious minds accessing the
Memverse? [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]That can't be...but in theory...[size=75%]mumble mumble...[size=100%]
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_04_05:
Guess it's true that Pearl's voice leaves an impression
on the folks who hear it.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_05_00:
Hey, Acht...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]were people mad when I left the
Octoling world?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_05_01:
Mad isn't the word. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]More like shocked. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]They couldn't
believe an elite soldier would up and vanish.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_05_02:
HAH! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]That's Marina for you. When she makes up her
mind, you do NOT want to be in her way!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_05_03:
I didn't really understand the implications then.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
I'm sorry for up and leaving without a word.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_05_04: No need to apologize. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]It didn't bother me...much.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_05_05:
Anyone talking smack about Marina is gonna catch
these rotors! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]I don't care HOW good a friend they
were in the old days!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_05_06: Thanks, Pearl. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]You're so cool...
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_06_00:
Yo, Marina! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Wouldn't it be more fun if this elevator
went up and down real fast, like a theme-park ride?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_06_01:
Pearl! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]It's designed to help people, not make them
throw up.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_07_01: What's up, Marina? [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Getting tired?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_07_02:
Oh, sorry! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]I was just daydreaming about how adorable
you are in this drone form.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_08_00:
Oh NO! Nobody panic, but...[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]I think I might've forgotten
my umbrella on the plane!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_08_01: What?! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]The one we took home from the tour?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_08_02: Just reach out to the airport. I'm sure they can help.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_08_03:
Nah. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]If it's on the plane, it's still in our backyard,
so I'll just grab it once we're done here.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_08_04:
Backyard? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]We're talking about the same kind of
airplane, right?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_09_00:
Drone Me gets to fly waaay up high and look down at
Marina! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]You look like a tiny little speck. It's so funny!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_Chat_09_01: Well, don't fly so high that the wind carries you off.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_PostBoss_00_00: What a relief to see you both OK!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_PostBoss_00_01: Nice moves. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Though I shouldn't be surprised.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_PostBoss_00_02:
We had it on LOCK! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Remember this feeling as we keep
climbing, Eight!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_PostBoss_01_00:
HAHAHA! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]The smelly-finned Jelleton fell again!
That boss had no bars, while we toss the big bombs!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_PostBoss_01_01: You two are so cool, it's scary!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_PostBoss_01_02: No joke. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]I'm glad we're on the same side.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_PostBoss_02_00:
That was incredible, Eight. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]I already knew you were
good—but not this good.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_PostBoss_02_01: Oh, you finally noticed? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Eight is INCREDIBLE!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_PostBoss_02_02:
And Pearl is incredibly, INCREDIBLY incredible![group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
Isn't that right, Acht?!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_PostBoss_03_00:
Gotta say, you make that look easy. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]You don't get
nervous fighting those things?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_PostBoss_03_01:
They're a pain but not really scary. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Fighting Marina
in that first tower was WAY scarier.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_PostBoss_03_03:
Obviously! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Wondering if you were stuck that way
forever, never going back to normal...[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] I was scared!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_PostBoss_03_05: Uhhh. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Times like this, Eight...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]I'm glad you're here.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_PreBoss_00_00:
This next floor will be a tough fight. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Please, PLEASE
be careful, you two.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_PreBoss_00_02:
Yeah, yeah, we know. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Come on, Eight—let's go out and
have some fun!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_PreBoss_01_00:
So we're up against a boss next? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]We'll cross-check
that reject until it's a lost wreck! No respect!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_PreBoss_02_00:
There's a serious fight waiting on the next floor.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
Don't bite off more than you can chew.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.Phase3_PreBoss_02_02:
You two gotta quit it with that talk! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Eight and me
aren't gonna go out like chumps!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.PhaseX_00F_After5FClear00:
Oh, nice! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Since we cleared 5F in our last run, this time
we get [group=0003 type=003f params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0004]500 Membux [color=ffff]off the bat!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.PhaseX_00F_After5FClear01:
That works out well. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]I remember you saying there's a
guaranteed [color=0004]Vending-Machine Corner[color=ffff] on 5F to spend it.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.PhaseX_00F_After5FClear02: So once we get to 5F, we can take five!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkElevator.PhaseX_00F_After5FClear03:
That oughta give us a good head start. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Let's make
the most of it, Eight!

CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.Floor_Shop_00: I notice the higher we go, the more Lives cost.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.Floor_Shop_01:
It's so quiet here without any Jelletons bugging us.
I'm bored. Let's go back to the elevator!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.Floor_Shop_02: Everything checks out! On to the next floor!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.Floor_Shop_03:
Yo, check under the vending machine. Might be some
Membux there! Or...not.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.Floor_Shop_04: Get back to the elevator when you're done, Eight.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.Floor_Shop_06: These vending machines don't sell snacks? What a rip.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.Floor_Shop_08: Sigh. It's too quiet. I hate quiet.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.Floor_Shop_09: You get everything on your shopping list, Eight?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.Floor_Shop_10:
I always get thirsty when I see a vending machine.
Not that I can drink anything like this.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.Floor_Shop_11: Where have I seen that vending machine before?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.Floor_Shop_12:
Nice of them to stock extra Lives when you're
running low.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.Floor_Shop_13:
They won't stock color chips if the Palette is full.
Instead, you can buy Prlz and sub or special weapons.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.Floor_Shop_14:
If there are color chips for sale, you should stock up!
Although they jack up the prices with every purchase.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.Floor_Shop_15:
You can get rock-bottom prices with the [color=0004]Vending-
Machine Discount[color=ffff] hack. Ask for it outside the Spire!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.Floor_Shop_16:
The [color=0004]Vending-Machine Reset[color=ffff] hack lets you change the
selection. Ask me about it outside the Spire!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.Floor_Shop_17: Did you find anything worth buying, Eight?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.Floor_Shop_19: Skipping a floor to go shopping? Works for me!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.Floor_Shop_Enter_First:
Oh, so that's the vending machine! Let's see what
we can get outta this thing.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.Floor_Shop_Leave_First:
Done shopping, Eight? Cool. Nothing else to do here
but head on back to the [color=0004]elevator[color=ffff]!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.HackingRetry_First:
Hey, Eight! Thanks to my hacks, you can spend some
Membux to continue.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.HackingRetry_Random1:
Bad news: we bit the dust. Good news: they can't
count us out yet!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.HackingRetry_Random2:
Eh, you win some, you lose some. And we just lost,
so that means we're due a win!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.HackingRetry_Random3:
We don't give up—we GET up! C'mon, Eight, let's get
right back in there!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.HackingRetry_Random4: Yooo, what?! I ain't gonna stop there if you won't!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.HackingRetry_Random5:
Let's try this again, Eight. This time there's no stopping
us until it's done!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.Return_Elevator:
Uh-oh, you don't have enough Membux to hightail it.
Guess we're doing this the hard way!
