CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.armorLv0_00: GUH! Mayday, Eight! Get outta there!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.armorLv0_01: This ain't good, but keep a cool head, and you'll be OK!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.armorLv0_02: Eight! Find a safe place to recover!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.armorLv0_03: Oh no! Eight, are you OK?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.armorLv0_04: Stay calm, Eight. Assess the situation.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.armorLv0_05: That's a problem. Lay low for a bit, Eight.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.badevent_allpaint_00:
Gross! The enemies got their ink all over the place.
Let's paint it a cooler color!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.badevent_allpaint_fog_00:
It's too dark to see, AND the ground is all sticky?
Well, it's still gonna take more than this to beat us!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.badevent_enemypowerup_00:
The enemies on this floor are gonna be a handful.
We gotta fight smart and...ugh...play it safe!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.badevent_fog_00:
Who turned out the lights?! Stay alert, Eight, and don't
rush into what you can't see!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.badevent_missile_00:
Those flying things are gonna come at us thick and
fast. Don't forget to look up, Eight!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.badevent_missile_enemypowerup_00:
We're gonna be fighting for our lives the whole time
here. Hope you're ready, Eight!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.badevent_nodrone_00:
Yooo, Eight! I'm kinda stuck here. Good luck clearing
the floor without me!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.badevent_nodrone_unlucky:
Yooo, Eight! Without me or item drops, it's all up to
you. But I got faith! Show me what you got!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.badevent_unlucky_00:
NO drops from enemies?! Guess we'll have to do this
the hard way, Eight!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.checkpoint_06: Nice work. Just don't get careless.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.checkpoint_final_00: BOOYAH! Now for the big finish!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.checkpoint_final_01: Looking good! Just a little to go!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.checkpoint_final_02: You're nearly there, Eight! Stay focused!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.checkpoint_final_05: Almost there. Bring it home, Eight.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.checkpoint_final_area_00: Time's almost up! Keep it together!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.checkpoint_final_area_01: Almost done, Eight! Hold the line!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.checkpoint_final_area_02: You're nearly in the clear, Eight.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.checkpoint_final_ball_03: Score! Now let's get that last one.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.checkpoint_final_chase_01: Just gotta catch that last one!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.checkpoint_final_chase_02: Noice! This one's almost in the bag!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.checkpoint_final_lift_00: We're at the final push! Just gotta get it to the goal!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.checkpoint_final_lift_01: You're so close to the goal! Come on...
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.checkpoint_final_lift_02: Don't stop till it's done, Eight.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.drone_item_00: Got an item for you, Eight!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.drone_item_02: Item hot off the press, Eight!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.drone_microLaser_02: All warmed up for a Killer Wail!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.drone_stan_00: Get ready for my Step-Off Song!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.drone_stan_01: My secret weapon: the Step-Off Song!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.drone_stan_02: Crank it up! It's Step-Off Song time!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.drone_trap_00: Here's a li'l Ink Mine for ya!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.drone_trap_01: Laying an Ink Mine! Aaand done.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.drone_trap_02: How's this spot for an Ink Mine?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.event_bonus_attack00:
Whoa, you got a TON of chips just for this floor.
Press [group=0003 type=004a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to pause and check out your [group=0003 type=0048 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0004]Palette[color=ffff]!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.event_bonus_attack01:
Oooh, scope out all the temporary Power chips! This'll
be like shooting Jelletons in a barrel!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.event_bonus_auto00:
Whoa, you got a TON of chips just for this floor.
Press [group=0003 type=004a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to pause and check out your [group=0003 type=0048 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0004]Palette[color=ffff]!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.event_bonus_auto01:
Oooh, scope out all the temporary Drone chips! Time to
go PEARLSERK! Stick close, Eight!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.event_bonus_continuity00:
Whoa, you got a TON of chips just for this floor.
Press [group=0003 type=004a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to pause and check out your [group=0003 type=0048 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0004]Palette[color=ffff]!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.event_bonus_continuity01:
Oooh, scope out all the temporary Support chips!
This floor's as good as cleared!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.event_bonus_luck00:
Whoa, you got a TON of chips just for this floor.
Press [group=0003 type=004a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to pause and check out your [group=0003 type=0048 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0004]Palette[color=ffff]!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.event_bonus_luck01:
Oooh, scope out all the temporary Lucky chips! Good
things are coming our way, Eight. You'll see!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.event_bonus_move00:
Whoa, you got a TON of chips just for this floor.
Press [group=0003 type=004a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to pause and check out your [group=0003 type=0048 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0004]Palette[color=ffff]!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.event_bonus_move01:
Oooh, scope out all the temporary Mobility chips!
Stick and move, Eight, stick and move!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.event_bonus_range00:
Whoa, you got a TON of chips just for this floor.
Press [group=0003 type=004a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to pause and check out your [group=0003 type=0048 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0004]Palette[color=ffff]!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.event_bonus_range01:
Oooh, scope out all the temporary Range chips! Lemme
get my binoculars so I can see what you're splatting.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.random_00: Any floor is a piece of cake for me and Eight!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.random_01:
Let's clear this floor quick so we can go hang out with
Marina and Acht some more.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.random_02: Here goes. Team Eight rides again!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.random_03: Good luck, Eight! You too, Pearl!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.random_05: You've got this one, Eight. After all, Pearl's with you!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.random_06:
I know we're high up, but don't sweat it. You can clear
any floor you put your mind to.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.random_07:
The floors get rough up here. But you'll find your
way through them.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.random_08: Eight. Pearl. We'll keep the elevator warm for you.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.random_09:
We just gotta defend our turf, right? How hard
can it be?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.random_10:
Here we go with these things. Yo, Eight, see if you can
get a hole in one!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.random_11:
Aw, c'mon, these cowards? Alright, Eight, what's our
battle plan here?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.random_12: It's portal-smashing time! Let's get in there, Eight!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.random_13:
This is a "shoot the tower to make it move" floor,
yeah? Don't get caught with an empty ink tank!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.respawn_00:
Eh, so we slipped up. Long as we have Lives left,
we're still good!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.respawn_01: Welp. We got got. So let's go get 'em back!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.respawn_02: We're not gonna go down like last time! C'mon, Eight!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.respawn_03:
This ain't over, Eight! We still got Lives, so we're
still in the fight!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.respawn_04:
This floor's tougher than it looks. Keep your chin
up, Eight!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.respawn_05:
It's a tricky floor. But Eight and Pearl are the right
people to handle it.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.respawn_boss_00:
Shoulda figured a boss would be tougher than normal.
But it messed with the wrong Octoling!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.respawn_boss_01:
We'll call that a test run. You'll win this time!
Good luck!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.respawn_boss_02:
Good thing that wasn't your last Life. Wrap this up and
come back soon, OK?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.respawn_last_00:
One more splat and we're toast! This time, anyway.
But we get as many next times as we want!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.respawn_last_01:
Last chance for this run, Eight. If we're going out,
let's make it a blaze of glory!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.respawn_last_02:
This is our last shot! I LOVE the feeling of it all riding
on one last chance. Get psyched!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.respawn_last_03:
Eight, you know you're on your last Life, right?
Be extra careful!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.respawn_last_04:
Get splatted now and the run's over. Though you two
aren't the type to take that lying down.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.respawn_last_boss_00:
One more strike and we're out. Well, we're not letting
the game get called here, Eight!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.respawn_last_boss_01:
There's no fight harder than this one, I guess.
This is your last try for now, Eight! Make it count!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.respawn_last_boss_02: One Life left. It's clutch time, you two.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.save_damage_00:
Clear the floor without taking damage? Oh, well, I was
gonna take a bunch, but NOW...
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.save_human_move_00:
No running around this time, huh? Down with the
tyranny of legs! TENTACLES FOR LIFE!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.save_jump_00:
Clear the stage without jumping? For serious?
Think you're up to it, Eight?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.save_kite_move_00:
Clear without gliding too much... Guess that means we
can't hang out! You can stop gliding with [group=0003 type=004f params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00].
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.save_main_weapon_00:
Your MAIN weapon is off-limits? You gotta win with
just subs and specials? Oh, and me too. Well, maybe!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.save_special_00:
No specials?! Well, they're not off-limits, I guess.
But it might make a fun challenge.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.save_squid_move_00:
You'll get a bonus if you don't swim around too much!
But like, how else are you supposed to get anywhere?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkStageRandom.save_sub_weapon_00:
Try not to use your sub weapon if you can help it!
Unless, y'know, you gotta.

CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.FailureAllLayer_00: Shake it off, Eight! Our next run is gonna be the one!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.FailureAllLayer_01:
Don't beat yourself up over losing, Eight. Come up with
a game plan for next time, and then do even better!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.FailureBallKing_00:
Call it a stress ball, because it stresses me out!
How can we fight it if every hit pushes it away?!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.FailureBallKing_01:
That boss was tough as nails. Let's be ready so that
next time, we'll stomp it soft as putty!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.FailureBarrierKingOdakoEx_00:
Ugh, splatted by Smollusk! We gotta be less squeamish
about picking on a baby.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.FailureBarrierKingOdakoEx_01:
Smollusk's strong, but you two beat Order before.
I'm sure you can do it again!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.FailureBarrierKingOdako_00:
Order ain't playing! But we got what it takes to stand
up to it, right, Eight?!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.FailureBarrierKingOdako_01:
Order's on a whole other level. But I know you two
can pull through!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.FailureBombBlow_00:
Which one got us?! The one chilling in back, spouting
its little jet? I barely noticed that thing!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.FailureChargerTower_00:
DOWN WITH CHARGERS! But I gotta hand it to 'em,
hitting us from that far away.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.FailureEscape_00:
Bad enough those cowards gotta run away all the time,
but they gotta leave bombs behind too?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.FailureFall_00:
Whoops, we must've slipped. Isn't that "uh-oh"
sensation while you're falling awful?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.FailureFall_01:
So you fell. Don't worry, Eight! Just pick yourself right
back up again!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.FailureHighLayer_00:
Aw maaan, we came so close. Next time let's see if
we can go all the way!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.FailureHighLayer_01:
What an incredible run! Are there any hacks I can
help with to get you further next time?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.FailureHopper_00:
Oh man, we got stomped! Boing, boing, boing...bleah!
I hope their springs get all tangled up.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.FailureLowLayer_00:
We got a little sloppy, but that's OK! We'll tighten up
our game and try again!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.FailureLowLayer_01:
Whoops. It's always the one you don't see, right?
Let's keep our eyes peeled and try again, Eight!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.FailureMiddleLayer_00:
Hey, that run went pretty good up to the end there.
Let's see if we can get even further next time, Eight!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.FailureMiddleLayer_01:
Awww, I hate to see it end there. But you'll do great on
your next run. I just know it!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.FailureRivalKing_00:
It feels more personal to get splatted by something
that looks like you—know what I mean?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.FailureRivalKing_01:
That boss looked a lot like Eight and Pearl. But you
two are the real deal, so you'll win in the end!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.FailureShell_00:
Those things think they're sooo smart, rushing us
from the safety of their shells. We'll show 'em!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.FailureSpawner_00:
Eight, check me on this. Did we really just get splatted
by a portal?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.FailureSpawner_01:
Wow. You got splatted by a portal? Were you
daydreaming about something?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.FailureTowerKing_00:
That spinny thing takes no prisoners! How's it spin
forever like that without getting dizzy?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.FailureTowerKing_01:
All the bright lights on that boss gave me flashbacks to
our shows. Well, don't worry! You'll get it next time!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.FailureTreeMissile_00:
Those missiles HURT! We just gotta make sure our
aim is better than theirs.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.FailureZakoLarge_00:
Those massive fishy JERKS! You always think you can
outrun 'em, but if you get cornered, it's over.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.FailureZakoLarge_01:
The big fish usually aren't so ferocious, but they're
dangerous when they get agitated.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.FailureZakoSmall_00:
Splatted by the little guys! You never notice 'em until
it's too late.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.FailureZakoStandard_00:
Those fish are meaner than they look, huh? We gotta
be more careful around 'em!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.FailureZakoStandard_01:
Those fish are a pain to deal with. And the worst part
is, they're everywhere!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.FloorShopIkuraShortage: Um, Eight, do you have the Membux to buy anything?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.FloorSkipIkuraShortage: You're low on Membux for that, Eight.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.Phase3_PaletteCleared_01:
You catch what Smollusk said about doing this "for
everyone's dreams"? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Who's the "everyone" there?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.Phase3_PaletteCleared_02:
Smollusk didn't back down an inch. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Eh, [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]I can respect
the hustle.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.Phase3_PaletteCleared_03:
I give up arguing with Smollusk. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]It's just gonna do what
it's gonna do. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Ignore that thing and keep at it!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.Phase3_PaletteCleared_04:
Hmm... [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]What's so great about a world that never
changes? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Do you get it, Eight?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.Phase3_PaletteCleared_05:
Smollusk seemed legit upset, huh?[page break]Well, it's not like we're out of Palettes to reconfigure.[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]
We can see what's up next time.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.Phase3_PaletteCleared_06:
What was that trash about anyone who left Octo-land
being a traitor? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Don't listen to that dope, Eight!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.Phase3_PaletteCleared_07:
Man! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]How many more times do we gotta go through
this? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Wanna rest a bit before heading up again?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.Phase3_PaletteCleared_08:
Hey, Eight. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Did Smollusk seem kinda off that last time?[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
Eh, who knows with that thing.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.Phase3_PaletteCleared_09:
Another great run, Eight! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]That Smollusk weirdo sure
is cagey, huh?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.Phase3_PaletteCleared_10:
Gotta admit, this place is growing on me. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]But...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]that
colorful Inkopolis Square vibe still has it beat.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.Phase3_PaletteCleared_11:
We're all done reconfiguring the Palettes. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]This really
does wrap everything up! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Way to go, Eight![page break]The real world's got nothing to worry about. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]But...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]
maybe we should go say hi to Smollusk now and then!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.RechooseStageIkuraShortage: You're low on Membux for that, Eight.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.entracnce_phase2_random_00:
Relive the first climb with the thingy by the elevator!
Those who don't remember, something something.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.entracnce_phase3_random_00: Yo, can we hang here a minute to listen to the music?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.entracnce_random_00:
Look at all this stuff. Seems like a great place to
test your Palette, Eight!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.entracnce_random_01_0:
Yo, check out the foyer! It's colored kinda like the chips
you collected last run.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.entracnce_random_01_1:
At least, that's what Marina said. I dunno if I see it.
Do you know what she's talking about, Eight?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.entracnce_random_02:
Which Palette you gonna go with? You can press [group=0003 type=004a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00]
to see all the ones you got so far!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.entracnce_random_03:
You ever read up on our enemies in the Jelleton Field
Guide? You can read it from the [group=0003 type=0048 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] menu!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.entracnce_random_04:
You can see what all the chips we've found do in the
Color-Chip Collection. Check it out from the [group=0003 type=0048 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] menu!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.entracnce_random_05:
If you change Palettes with [group=0003 type=004a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00], you can test 'em out
here. Once you're ready, we can go in anytime, Eight!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.fleamarket00: Octoling, I have a pleasing announcement.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.fleamarket01: Cipher's Siftings eagerly awaits your visit, Octoling.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.iidaHacking00: Eight, come and see me if you have a minute.
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.iidaHacking01: I'm ready for some hacking if you are, Eight!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.key01: Eight, don't forget about the lockers!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.key02: Wanna crack open one of those lockers, Eight?
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.nokey00: We could open this if we just had a [color=0004]locker key[color=ffff]!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.palette00:
Why not try a Palette you haven't used yet? You might
find a weapon you like better!
CommonMsg/Sdodr/Sdodr_TalkWorldRandom.palette01:
Oh yeah! Eight, didn't we pick up a new Palette?
Check it out with [group=0003 type=004a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00]!

CommonMsg/SystemWindow/SystemMsg_Lobby.Msg_StartSoloContinueConfirm_XMatch:
Do you want to continue the challenge from
where you left off? (Wins: [group=0002 type=0000 params=00 01 00 00] Losses: [group=0002 type=0000 params=01 01 00 00])
CommonMsg/SystemWindow/SystemMsg_Lobby.Msg_UdemaeReset_Already:
You can only reset your rank once per season.
No more resets remain this season.
CommonMsg/SystemWindow/SystemMsg_Lobby.Msg_UdemaeReset_Confirm1:
Reset your rank to [group=0004 type=0003 params=00 00 00 00]?
(You can only reset once per season.)
CommonMsg/SystemWindow/SystemMsg_Lobby.Msg_UdemaeReset_Confirm2: Are you SURE you want to reset your rank?
CommonMsg/SystemWindow/SystemMsg_Lobby.Msg_Unlocked: Sorry, but you haven't unlocked that mode yet.
CommonMsg/SystemWindow/SystemMsg_Lobby.Msg_WeaponDuplication:
Sorry, but you can't choose the same weapon as
a teammate.
CommonMsg/SystemWindow/SystemMsg_Lobby.Msg_WeaponMayDiffer:
If you join Eggstra Work as a team of two, you
may be supplied with a different weapon from
the one you selected.

CommonMsg/SystemWindow/SystemMsg_MainMen.Msg_PhotoAlbumCantPinning: You can set up to [group=0002 type=0000 params=00 02 00 00] photos as Favorites.
CommonMsg/SystemWindow/SystemMsg_MainMen.Msg_PhotoAlbumFirst:
Here you can send the pictures you've taken
in-game over to SplatNet 3.

SplatNet 3 is a service for Splatoon 3 that you
can access from your smartphone. Check out the
official Splatoon 3 website for more information.
CommonMsg/SystemWindow/SystemMsg_MainMen.Msg_PhotoAlbumOffline:
Cannot upload while offline. Please try again
after connecting to the internet in the lobby.
CommonMsg/SystemWindow/SystemMsg_MainMen.Msg_PlayerMakeConfirm:
Wanna change up your look? Or Smallfry's look?
(You won't lose any of your gear or cash.)

CommonMsg/SystemWindow/SystemMsg_Plaza.Msg_EShopBack:
To access this content, close the Splatoon 3 game
after your download is complete, then reopen
the game.
CommonMsg/SystemWindow/SystemMsg_Plaza.Msg_EShopJump:
To enter this area, you need to purchase and
download the Splatoon 3: Expansion Pass – 
Inkopolis & Side Order. For more info, please
visit Nintendo eShop.

CommonMsg/SystemWindow/SystemMsg_Versus.Msg_NoContest:
One or more players disconnected shortly
after the battle began. Disconnected players
will be assigned a loss, but the battle will not
count for players who remained connected.
CommonMsg/SystemWindow/SystemMsg_Versus.Msg_NoContest_Group:
The battle ended because one or more players
that you joined with disconnected. You will be
assigned a loss.
CommonMsg/SystemWindow/SystemMsg_Versus.Msg_NoContest_Private: [color=0001][group=0004 type=0000 params=00 00 00 00][color=ffff] has ended the battle.
CommonMsg/SystemWindow/SystemMsg_Versus.Msg_SpectatorCannotPhoto: You can't take pictures as a spectator.

CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_InGame_AppearBank: The egg basket is ready and waiting. Don't let me down.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_InGame_AppearBank_BigRun:
The egg basket is ready and waiting. Get to work
and protect the city! And don't let me down.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_InGame_AppearBoss:
Got a [color=0001]King Salmonid[color=ffff] coming in. That means mandatory
overtime! Here's an [color=0001]egg cannon[color=ffff]. Now get to work!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_InGame_AppearTarget: You've got a [color=0001]Boss Salmonid[color=ffff] incoming. DO YOUR JOB!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_InGame_AppearTarget_BigRun:
I'm not going to sugarcoat it—there are Salmonids
everywhere. Just stay focused on the task at hand,
and you'll get through. I hope you had your coffee...
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_InGame_Boss_Start_Giant_00:
That is a [color=0001]Cohozuna[color=ffff]. Now, don't get squished by it, or
that's going in your file. Oh, and it'll splat you too.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_InGame_Boss_Start_Jaw_00:
That's [color=0001]Megalodontia[color=ffff]... Its hunger knows no bounds.
I'd say more, but I'll just shut my trap and let you
focus on staying OUT of that thing's trap!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_InGame_Boss_Start_Rope_00:
That's a [color=0001]Horrorboros[color=ffff]. Do I even need to tell you to
avoid the bombs that it periodically launches out
of its mouth?
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_InGame_DisappearBank:
Come to papa, little eggs... Adequate job so far.
NOW BRING ME MORE!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_InGame_DisappearBank_BigRun:
I'm pleased to report that you're turning the tide.
Keep up the good work. And come to Papa, little eggs...
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_InGame_DisappearBank_Final:
Good. That's the last of 'em. Now get in the chopper
and head back.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_InGame_DisappearBank_Final_BigRun:
Way to show those Salmonids who's the boss!
It's me. I'm the boss.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_InGame_DisappearBoss:
Never had a doubt! Great work. Now get back to the
helicopter. Fuel isn't free.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_InGame_EvtDozer_First:
Here comes a [color=0001]Griller[color=ffff]. Aim for its exposed tail. They say
it's what's inside that matters, right? Same here.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_InGame_EvtDozer_Increment:
Looks like there are two Grillers out there...
Guess they got lonely being on their own.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_InGame_EvtFog_Start:
[color=0001]Fog[color=ffff]'s rolling in. That's no good...but don't give up hope.
I need you to stay sharp out there.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_InGame_EvtFog_Start_WaterLow:
Smells like a [color=0001]school[color=ffff] of Salmonids has spawned by
the [color=0001]shoreline[color=ffff]. Curse this [color=0001]fog[color=ffff]...
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_InGame_EvtGeyser_Appear:
There's the [color=0001]Goldie[color=ffff]! This is your chance. Get your head
in the game, and hurry after it!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_InGame_EvtGeyser_Reset:
Hm... Looks like that sneaky [color=0001]Goldie[color=ffff] is hiding
somewhere. Find it!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_InGame_EvtGeyser_Start:
[color=0001]Gushers[color=ffff]... The [color=0001]Goldie[color=ffff] is hiding nearby! Don't just
sit there! Everyone, look for it!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_InGame_EvtMissile_Start:
There's a [color=0001]mass of Cohocks[color=ffff] down by the [color=0001]shoreline[color=ffff].
I'll leave some cannons. You know what to do.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_InGame_EvtNone_Start_WaterLow:
A [color=0001]school of Salmonids[color=ffff] is swarming down at the
[color=0001]shoreline[color=ffff]. Group up and bring 'em down.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_InGame_EvtRally_Attack:
MY [color=0001]EGG BASKET[color=ffff]! Don't let those slimy Salmonids touch
my eggs!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_InGame_EvtRally_Prepare: The [color=0001]Mothership[color=ffff] is moving in on my egg basket!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_InGame_EvtRally_Start:
A [color=0001]Mothership[color=ffff]? Everyone, just go after it together.
You'll be fine. Probably.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_InGame_EvtRally_Start_WaterLow:
There's a [color=0001]Mothership[color=ffff] by the [color=0001]shore[color=ffff]. Don't panic.
Everyone, gang up on it.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_InGame_EvtRelay_BoxBreak:
It's a long way to the egg basket. Fine! I'll [color=0001]count each
Golden Egg as 2[color=ffff]. Good thing I do my own accounting...
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_InGame_EvtRelay_Start:
A [color=0001]giant tornado[color=ffff]! Salmonids that get sucked up will fall
[color=0001]around the shore[color=ffff]. Oh, and it looks like the egg basket
by the sea is blocked too. Great...
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_InGame_EvtRush_Start:
[color=0001]Glowflies[color=ffff]. That explains why the Salmonids are
restless. If you start glowing...well, good luck.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_InGame_EvtTamaire_Gold:
Hey, I thought I saw a [color=0001]Golden[color=ffff] [color=0001]Mudmouth[color=ffff] out there!
Also, what's with the Cohocks on parade? Weird.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_InGame_EvtTamaire_Start:
There's an old saying about [color=0001]Mudmouths[color=ffff]... "If you see
one pop up from underground, throw a bomb in its
mouth." Yes, it is a VERY specific saying.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C1_Failure_AllDead_00:
Crew wipe, eh? Well, let's see how you did... You got [group=0002 type=0000 params=00 01 00 00].
Not terrible.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C1_Failure_AllDead_00_BigRun:
Crew got wiped, huh? Happens to the best of us.
Besides, the Golden Egg count is what really matters.
And it looks like you got...[group=0002 type=0000 params=00 01 00 00].
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C1_Failure_Boss_AllDead_00:
That must've been terrifying... If you're going to have
nightmares, policy requires that you do it off the clock.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C1_Failure_Boss_TimeUp_00:
Didn't expect a King Salmonid... Thanks for sticking
around, everyone!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C1_Failure_GoldenIkura0_00:
You couldn't even grab ONE Golden Egg? GRRR... Guess I
should have made you read the handbook.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C1_Failure_TimeUp_00:
TIME'S UP! At least you tried. Let's count those
Golden Eggs... Just [group=0002 type=0000 params=00 01 00 00]? Eh, better than nothing.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C1_Failure_TimeUp_00_BigRun:
Time to clock out! Is it just me, or is the workday
too short? Anyway, nice job on the Golden Eggs.
You got [group=0002 type=0000 params=00 01 00 00]!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C1_Success_00:
Let's see here... You harvested [group=0002 type=0000 params=00 01 00 00] Golden Eggs
this time. Nice—that's a good haul.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C1_Success_00_BigRun:
Well done. You've saved the city and, more importantly,
increased my egg count by [group=0002 type=0000 params=00 01 00 00]. I'll remember this when
it's time for your performance review.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C1_Success_Boss_00:
Great work on that King Salmonid situation. It's like
I always say—[color=0001]trust the sea[color=ffff] and profits will follow!
Yes, I always say that.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C1_Success_DifficultyMax_00:
You...finished the job? At [color=0001]hazard level 333%[color=ffff]? Forget
the sea—you could best even the [color=0001]boundless cosmos[color=ffff]...
That's like the sea, except bigger.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C1_Success_Legend_00:
Spend enough time out there, and you become one with
[color=0001]the sea itself[color=ffff]! If that doesn't make you [color=0001]Eggsecutive VP[color=ffff]
material, I don't know what does!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C1_Success_Legend_Boss_00:
Wow! You took down a King Salmonid. Never thought I'd
say this, but you're [color=0001]scarier[color=ffff] than the sea!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C1_Success_Legend_Many_00:
Outstanding! No notes. Just outstanding. In fact,
I'd say the [color=0001]sea's got itself a new[color=ffff] [color=0001]legend[color=ffff] for folks
to hear about!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C1_Success_Many_00:
So many eggs! The sea provides, and [color=0001]it must LOVE you[color=ffff]!
Remind me to put that in your next review.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C1_Success_Master_00:
Color me impressed. You are a true [color=0001]Profreshional[color=ffff]!
I can see how much you [color=0001]love the sea[color=ffff]!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C2_Failure_00:
Salmonids can't climb walls. Ink some walls ahead of
time for shortcuts when things go belly-up.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C2_Failure_01:
Salmonids tend to come at you from one direction all at
once, but that direction is liable to change over time.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C2_Failure_02:
If you're far from the egg basket, you can throw your
Golden Egg with [group=0003 type=0000 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00]. A coworker near the basket
might snag and dunk it for you.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C2_Failure_03:
If you try to hide in your own ink, the Salmonids WILL
find you. Those suckers have a wicked sense of smell...
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C2_Failure_04:
Throwing a Golden Egg uses ink. If Salmonids have you
surrounded, think twice before you throw.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C2_Failure_05:
If there's a Snatcher near the egg basket, you can use
that to your advantage.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C2_Failure_06:
Different weapons work better on different Salmonids,
so pick your targets carefully. Efficiency equals profit!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C2_Failure_07:
Always put Boss Salmonids at the top of your task list.
If there's a lot of 'em, start with the biggest threat and
work your way down.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C2_Failure_Boss_00:
At least you got a LOT of Golden Eggs! I can't wait to
see how many you'll get next time.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C2_Failure_Dozer_00:
If you're targeted by a Griller, just RUN. Those jerks
are hard to beat without help.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C2_Failure_Fog_00:
When the fog rolls in, communication becomes the key
to survival. Use [group=0003 type=000e params=29 5c 4f 3f 00 00 00 00] to call for your coworkers.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C2_Failure_Geyser_00:
When you're searching for a Goldie, divide and conquer.
Look for the gushers that shine the brightest.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C2_Failure_Missile_00:
Use the cannons to fight off the Cohock Charge.
Just don't forget to keep collecting Golden Eggs!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C2_Failure_Rally_00:
If a Mothership goes for the egg basket, rush to
defend it. Do NOT let it steal those Golden Eggs!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C2_Failure_Relay_00:
It's everyone's job to get Golden Eggs into that basket.
Carrying, passing, depositing... Smart delegation is key!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C2_Failure_Rush_00:
If you get swarmed by Glowflies...well, good luck.
Once they're on you, every Salmonid in the area
will try to splat you.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C2_Failure_SakeArtillery_00:
From the suggestion box: "Put a Golden Egg into
a Big Shot's launcher to fire it toward the egg basket."
Good advice!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C2_Failure_SakeDolphin_00:
Flipper-Floppers are easy to beat if you ink their rings.
If your ink's low, withdraw, regroup, and try again.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C2_Failure_SakePillar_00:
Try to ink a Fish Stick's sides as soon as you spot it.
A Squid Surge will make it easy to climb to the top.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C2_Failure_SakeSaucer_00:
Get the Slammin' Lid to drop, then hop on top of it. And
if you can make it squash a few Salmonids along the
way, even better!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C2_Failure_Sakediver_00:
You can take out Maws in no time if you make it swallow
a bomb. Try to keep a bomb's worth of ink in your tank
so you can throw one at any moment.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C2_Failure_SakelienBomber_00:
Don't go up against a Steelhead with a short-range
weapon unless you wanna get splatted. Long-range
weapons like chargers are the way to go!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C2_Failure_SakelienCupTwins_:
When lobbing bombs at a Flyfish, don't lose your cool.
Look for a safe place with good line of sight.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C2_Failure_SakelienShield_00:
When you stop a Scrapper by blasting it, try to keep its
location and the direction it's facing in mind.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C2_Failure_SakelienSnake_00:
A Steel Eel never gives up on its target. Try to lead
it on a wild squid chase, or use teamwork to beat it.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C2_Failure_SakelienTower_00:
Move side to side to dodge a Stinger's attacks.
And if you see a coworker under attack by one,
get over there and take it out!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C2_Failure_Sakerocket_00:
Shoot a Drizzler's torpedoes to send them right back.
That's a surefire way to bring one down in a snap.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C2_Failure_Tamaire_00: It takes teamwork to topple a Mudmouth. And bombs.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C2_Failure_WaterHigh_00:
Salmonids can overrun your workplace in a flash at
high tide. Watch each other's backs out there.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C2_Failure_WaterLow_00:
Low tide gives you more room to work, but that makes
it easy to get separated. Salmonids will surround you
before you know it, so don't wander off alone.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C2_Success_00:
THAT'S what I like to see! You've got a future here, kid.
This'll go in your performance eval.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Result_C2_Success_RareWeapon_00:
Notice that fancy weapon you had there? That's one of
my special models. How'd it feel?
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Artillery_01:
This crafty cannoneer sets up a [color=0001]Big Shot launcher [color=ffff]on
the shore to fire cannonballs brought in from the sea.
Just [color=0001]jump[color=ffff] over the shock waves from the cannonballs.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Artillery_02:
If you're hauling a Golden Egg and you're near the
[color=0001]Big Shot launcher[color=ffff], try pressing [group=0003 type=0000 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00]. That'll launch
the egg toward the egg basket.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Bagman_00:
That filthy Salmonid is stealing Golden Eggs!
Looks like they came flying out of the ocean.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Bagman_01:
THAT SLIMY THIEF JUST STOLE MY EGGS! Next time that
happens, splat it before it gets back to the water!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Bank_01:
All Golden Eggs should be taken straight to
the [color=0001]egg basket[color=ffff].
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Bomber_01:
This overgrown appetizer has armor all over its giant,
slimy body. It also lobs giant, smelly [color=0001]bombs[color=ffff].
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Bomber_02:
Shoot the [color=0001]bomb on its head[color=ffff] as it expands to pop it
early and cook the Steelhead in its own juices.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Cup_01:
This glorified mosquito flies through the air in an
ink-powered aircraft, launching [color=0001]missile barrages[color=ffff].
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Cup_02:
[color=0001]Toss a bomb[color=ffff] into both of its missile launchers to take
it down from the inside out.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_DeadSkip_00:
You're having a tough time with this one, huh?
Fine—I'll take care of it.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Diver_01:
This bottom-feeding mouth breather follows its prey
while submerged in ink, then suddenly leaps out and
swallows them whole.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Diver_02:
One strategy for taking down Maws is to [color=0001]place a bomb[color=ffff]
on the spot it'll appear so it chews on that instead
of you.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Dolphin_01:
This one throws out an ink ring, then [color=0001]dives[color=ffff] into it. Do
NOT get caught inside the ring, or... Well, you'll see.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Dolphin_02:
Cover the ring in your own ink before it can dive.
That'll leave it flopping out in the open. Splat it!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Enemy_BankIkura: Go put the egg in the basket.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Enemy_PickIkura: OK. Grab one of those Golden Eggs.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Failed_00: You didn't meet your quota in time.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Failed_01: Might have to reconsider your future with Grizzco...
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Failed_02: Ha! Just messin' with you. I'll let it slide this time.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_First_01:
Alright, rookie. Listen up. Vicious, unfeeling [color=0001]Salmonids[color=ffff]
will approach from the water.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_First_02:
Your job is to splat 'em with ink to make them drop
their [color=0001]Power Eggs[color=ffff].
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_First_03:
As a Grizzco Industries employee, you are contractually
obligated to collect as many [color=0001]Power Eggs[color=ffff] as possible.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Ikura_00:
Mmm... Yes. The Boss Salmonid dropped its perfect
[color=0001]Golden Eggs[color=ffff]. Touch one to pick it up.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Ikura_01:
Grizzco is a results-based organization. If you don't hit
the Golden Egg [color=0001]quota[color=ffff] each round, you're finished.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Ikura_02: OK. Grab one of those Golden Eggs.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Ikura_Already:
Already got one, eh? You work quick and clean—
a gifted go-getter!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Ikura_Throw_00:
If you're a long walk from the egg basket, carrying
Golden Eggs all that way can eat up time...
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Ikura_Throw_01:
Instead, press [group=0003 type=0000 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to use some ink to [color=0001]throw your
Golden Egg[color=ffff]. Convenient, right?
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Ikura_Throw_02:
You'll be low on ink afterward, so think carefully about
when and where you use it.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_NormaClear_00: Three Golden Eggs. You've met your quota. Good work.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_NormaClear_01:
Now just stay alive until the end of your shift...
Or, if you want a bonus, you can collect even more
Golden Eggs and surpass your quota.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Norma_00:
That's one egg down. Your quota is three, so you need
to get two more.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Norma_01:
Just head back and grab the other two e—
HUH?!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Pillar_01:
These screwy Salmonids plant a [color=0001]pillar[color=ffff] in the ground,
then fly in circles around the top and spray ink all over.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Pillar_02:
Climb up there and splat them all. [color=0001]The pillar will stick
around[color=ffff] once they're gone, so put it to good use.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_RareAppear_00:
The most important part of your job is to harvest
[color=0001]Golden Eggs[color=ffff]. Only [color=0001]Boss Salmonids [color=ffff]have those.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_RareAppear_01:
Ah, right on cue! A [color=0001]Boss Salmonid[color=ffff] just appeared.
Go hunt it down.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Rescue_00:
If you get splatted by a Salmonid or fall in the water,
you'll wind up in a [color=0001]life ring[color=ffff]. That's bad, in case you
couldn't guess.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Rescue_01:
To get out of the life ring, one of your coworkers has
to revive you with their ink.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Rescue_02:
I'll revive you this time...but it's coming out of
your paycheck.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Rocket_01:
This scaly scuzznuzzler fires torpedoes that create
clouds that rain ink. When it's under its umbrella, your
attacks can't hurt it.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Rocket_02:
Take your shot when the Drizzler peeks out from
under its umbrella. You can also hit its rockets to
[color=0001]knock them back[color=ffff].
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Saucer_01:
OK, these ones ride on a flying machine that makes
[color=0001]force fields[color=ffff]. Walk under it, and it'll try to squash you!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Saucer_02:
But! If it tries to squash you, and you dodge, you can
climb on top of it and take out the pilot!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_SecondIkura_Bank: Now take the Golden Egg back to the egg basket.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_SecondIkura_ComeOn:
Huh? It sounds like one of your coworkers
is calling you. Go see what they want.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_SecondIkura_Help:
Looks like another one of your coworkers is down.
Spray 'em with ink to revive 'em.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_SecondIkura_HelpPost_00:
Always help your coworkers when they're in need.
If your [color=0001]entire crew gets taken out[color=ffff], you're finished.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_SecondIkura_HelpPost_01:
Press [group=0003 type=000e params=29 5c 4f 3f 00 00 00 00] to [color=0001]rally your coworkers[color=ffff] or [color=0001]ask them
for help[color=ffff].
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_SecondIkura_Pick: GRRR... Go find me some more Golden Eggs.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_SecondIkura_Picked:
Mmm... Another sweet little egg. Communicating with
your coworkers is an essential part of egg collection.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Shield_01:
This lily-livered coward covers its frail body in [color=0001]shields[color=ffff]
made of cookware and putters forward, making it a
tough enemy to take out.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Shield_02:
The trick is to get behind it, either by distracting it or
attacking it until it's stunned.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Snake_01:
This giant eel thing is actually a vehicle piloted by a
tiny Salmonid. Don't let it touch you, or it's lights out.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Snake_02:
The slimy pilot is sitting in the tail end.
Sneak behind to take it out!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Special:
Oh, and I've also arranged for two uses of your
[color=0001]special ability [color=ffff]while you work. Try not to waste 'em.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_SquadAppear: BACK TO WORK! Go harvest some more [color=0001]Power Eggs[color=ffff].
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_SquadDefeat:
Hm... Not too bad, kid. You have middle management
written all over you.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Targets_01:
There are lots of different kinds of [color=0001]Boss Salmonid[color=ffff] out
there—[color=0001]11 kinds[color=ffff], to be exact...
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Targets_02:
I can lure in a Boss Salmonid if you want. Just tell me
which one you'd like to practice on.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Targets_03: Alright, what kind should I lure in?
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_ThirdIkura_Bank:
Now, get a Golden Egg in that basket already!
Don't forget you can throw 'em with [group=0003 type=0000 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00].
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_ThirdIkura_Pick:
Let's find one more Golden Egg, and then I'll let you
clock out.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Timer_00:
You've collected two Golden Eggs. Just one more to
fulfill your quota.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Timer_01:
You're always on the clock, so you have to hit your
quota before [color=0001]time runs out[color=ffff].
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Tower_01:
This spineless sniper sits on top of a tower,
taking dirty potshots at you from the shoreline.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_Tower_02:
Attack the [color=0001]stack of dirty cooking pots[color=ffff] to cut this
baddie down to size. When all the pots are done,
the Stinger will be too.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_WaveClear_00:
OK, let's call that enough training for now. Time to get
you back to the chopper.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_WaveClear_01: Nice work. That wraps up your training.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_WaveClear_Nobody:
Oh, you want to cut your training short? I like your
enthusiasm. Consider it done!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkCoop.Coop_Tutorial_ZakoDefeat:
You just got some [color=0001]Power Eggs[color=ffff] for splatting that
Salmonid. I'm counting on you to collect as many
of those as you can.

CommonMsg/Talk/TalkFleaMarket_Sdodr.FleaMarket_Buy_Item: Many obligations. Delivery will be to the [color=0004]lobby terminal[color=ffff].
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkFleaMarket_Sdodr.FleaMarket_Buy_Lottery: Many obligations. Delivery will be [color=0004]tomorrow[color=ffff] at the [color=0004]lobby terminal[color=ffff].
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkFleaMarket_Sdodr.FleaMarket_Confirm: You can transpose Prlz for that item.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkFleaMarket_Sdodr.FleaMarket_Enter_LotterySoldOut: The time for that is past. First accept delivery at the [color=0004]lobby terminal[color=ffff].
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkFleaMarket_Sdodr.FleaMarket_Enter_NewItemUnlock: Your strivings have swelled my lineup, Octoling.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkFleaMarket_Sdodr.FleaMarket_Enter_Welcome_00: Welcome, Octoling. What do you desire?
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkFleaMarket_Sdodr.FleaMarket_Enter_Welcome_01: Welcome, Octoling. I knew of your coming.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkFleaMarket_Sdodr.FleaMarket_Enter_Welcome_02: Hello, Octoling. How do I appear to your eyes?
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkFleaMarket_Sdodr.FleaMarket_Enter_Welcome_03: How do you fare, Octoling? Do not answer. I know already.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkFleaMarket_Sdodr.FleaMarket_Enter_Welcome_04: Octoling, your visits bring change to the world—and to my shop.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkFleaMarket_Sdodr.FleaMarket_Enter_Welcome_05: Cipher's Siftings is open for dealing, anytime and for all time.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkFleaMarket_Sdodr.FleaMarket_Select_InsufficientJem: You do not have satisfactory Prlz.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkFleaMarket_Sdodr.FleaMarket_Select_Locked: Its time is not yet come. First, [color=0004]continue to clear[color=ffff] the Spire of Order.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkFleaMarket_Sdodr.FleaMarket_Select_SoldOut: Your purchase of that is bygone.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkFleaMarket_Sdodr.Talk_ExchangedAll:
All that was once mine is now yours.[page break]I thank you from the bottom of my
core, Octoling. You are adequate to
receive this [color=0004]badge[color=ffff].[page break]Let us now speak of after.[page break]From now on, there is a restraint of
one item per day. I will deliver it by
lobby terminal [color=0004]1 day following[color=ffff].[page break]Gratitude for your persistent
support is warranted. I hunger to
see what changes you bring.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkFleaMarket_Sdodr.Talk_FavorabilityLevelUp_00:
Do you find lack in sifting through
my wares?[page break]It is possible for my stock to swell.
But the trigger for this is in your
hands, Octoling.[page break][color=0004]Clearing the Spire of Order[color=ffff] brings
change to this simulation. And change
is the wellspring of newness.[page break]Become a virtuoso at clearing the
Spire. Newness is a virtue of this
virtual world.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkFleaMarket_Sdodr.Talk_FavorabilityLevelUp_01:
Are you compelled by the lockers
manifesting here?[page break]The lockers in the Order Sector seem
to protect rare and prizable things.[page break]You may achieve keys for them by
[color=0004]defeating bosses[color=ffff] in the Spire.[page break]However, [color=0004]only singularly[color=ffff] may you
gain a key per Palette per boss floor.
For multitudinous keys, you must
climb with [color=0004]different Palettes[color=ffff].
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkFleaMarket_Sdodr.Talk_FavorabilityLevelUp_02:
Octoling, when you leave the
Spire of Order, the color chips
and Membux hoarded there
become Prlz.[page break]There are many avenues of exit.
Any of them result in Prlz.[page break]Repeated scalings result in repeated
hoardings. The Prlz pile will swell.[page break]No scaling is wasted. Even losses
end in wealth.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkFleaMarket_Sdodr.Talk_FavorabilityLevelUp_03:
The greatest hazards sometimes
lead to the happiest of windfalls.[page break]Octoling, have you actuated the
unique hack of [color=0004]Risky Returns[color=ffff]?[page break]Risky Returns does not frolic well
with other hacks. Disactuate as many
as you can if you intend to use it.[page break]Clearing the Spire with this antisocial
hack results in more Prlz. But failure
will result in none.[page break]Do you hold conviction in your own
strength? This hack will put your
Prlz where your maw is.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkFleaMarket_Sdodr.Talk_FavorabilityLevelUp_04:
Octoling with multitudinous scalings
under your belt, have you attained
what you seek?[page break]Even if you are yet on your way, your
finish line is not far. I know this.[page break]My shop atrophies of product. And
after the last bauble is divested?[page break]Rest assured. Cipher's Siftings will
remain open for dealing.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkFleaMarket_Sdodr.Talk_First:
Courageous Octoling. I have been
awaiting your appearance.[page break]Already you bring change to this
world. But there is more change to
come. Your bringing is incomplete.[page break]I am Cipher. You shop within Cipher's
Siftings.[page break]My preferred currency of exchange
is Prlz. My delivery system is leaving
purchases at the [color=0004]lobby terminal[color=ffff].[page break]I hope that your desire is found
among my siftings.

CommonMsg/Talk/TalkHacking_Sdodr.000: Want me to do some hacking?
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkHacking_Sdodr.001: Want to spend some Prlz on that?
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkHacking_Sdodr.002: Are you sure you want to deactivate that?
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkHacking_Sdodr.003: Um...Eight, you don't have the Prlz for that!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkHacking_Sdodr.004: Which run do you want to start from?
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkHacking_Sdodr.005: You don't have any runs you can start from.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkHacking_Sdodr.006:
Oh, Eight! Guess what?[page break]I just finished a feature that lets
you [color=0004]start[color=ffff] a run from a floor where
it ended![page break]You can choose a run to start from
with [group=0003 type=0049 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00]. It'll be a real time-saver!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkHacking_Sdodr.007:
Eight! I have even more hacks ready
to deploy now. Take a look!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkHacking_Sdodr.008:
Guess what, Eight? The hack I'm
calling [color=0004]Risky Rewards [color=ffff]is finally
ready for you![page break]The fewer hacks you have active
when you clear the Spire of Order,
the more Prlz you get. Up to three
times as many, in fact![page break]But you do have to clear it. Wash out
partway through—no Prlz for you.[page break]Once you get the hang of clearing
the Spire and think you don't need
help with it, give this hack a try!

CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Clothes_BasicSkillSame_00:
No, no, no, no, no. The item in
question already has the same
primary gear ability. Trading in
your item in this case has no
meaning. No function, no fashion!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Clothes_ExpFirst_00:
Now then, surely you are aware of
[color=0001]gear abilities[color=ffff], yes? These can help
you fight and win battles.[page break]Do you wish to attain the same level
of knowledge as me? Then press [group=0003 type=000b params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00]
and prepare to learn!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Clothes_ExpRarityUpAndReplace_00:
Ah, now we encounter what I call
a "fashion conundrum." You will
have a choice to make...[page break]When clothing that you already own
is in stock, you can [color=0001]raise its star
power[color=ffff] or [color=0001]trade in[color=ffff] your clothing
to reset its abilities.[page break]So? What say you? In this matter,
Jel La Fleur cannot advise you.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Clothes_MoneyShortage_00:
...Are you testing Jel La Fleur's
patience? You do not have enough
cash for this transaction!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Clothes_Offline_00:
Ah, you are here. Good.[page break]Or not. It seems you are disconnected
from the [color=0001]internet[color=ffff]. Is this the style
now? I WILL NOT ABIDE IT. Make your
way to the [color=0001]lobby [color=ffff]and connect before
fashion changes again.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Clothes_RankShortage_00:
Ah, you are here. Good.[page break]Or not. Tell me—can one below [color=0001]level 4[color=ffff]
not see one's own level? The audacity
of shopping at such a low level![page break]Please, visit the [color=0001]lobby [color=ffff]and partake of
many [color=0001]Turf War battles[color=ffff] before you
return. I REQUIRE IT.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Clothes_RarityMax_00:
No, no, no, no, no. The item in
question already has maximum star
power. How could you want more?
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Clothes_RarityUp_00:
An opportunity presents itself.
Will you [color=0001]raise the star power[color=ffff] of
your clothing, or [color=0001]trade it in[color=ffff] to
reset the abilities?
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Clothes_ReplaceConfirm_00:
I offer now this reminder. You will
reset the [color=0001]star power[color=ffff] and [color=0001]abilities[color=ffff]
if you do this. Are you sure?
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Clothes_SoldOtherHome_00:
Ah, that item has unfortunately
been sold. You just missed it.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Clothes_SoldOut_00:
You're in need of a duplicate?
Perhaps I should not complain.
But perhaps this is a mistake.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Clothes_ThankYouButFestT_00:
Thank you very much. But you
cannot change clothes now—we
are in the middle of a Splatfest.
IT SIMPLY ISN'T DONE.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Clothes_ThankYou_00:
Very well. Now then, if you wish to
change clothes, you must open the
[group=0003 type=0005 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0001]Equip[color=ffff] menu.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Clothes_ThanksBadgeA_00:
Ahem. There is something I should
bring to your attention.[page break]You have bought many clothes from
me and worn them with respect and
panache. Therefore I have prepared
an item of thanks.[page break]BEHOLD. I give you now the [color=0001]badge [color=ffff]of
fashion. It is yours to wear in style.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Clothes_ThanksBadgeB_00:
And now you must allow me one
minor indulgence.[page break]You have been such a wonderful
customer. And always of the highest
fashion sense! It is my honor to give
you the most special [color=0001]badge [color=ffff]of all.[page break]DO NOT SHARE THESE WORDS WITH
ANYONE. But do wear the badge at
all times with honor. Thank you and
come again.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Clothes_WelcomeRank04_00:
Ah, you are here. Good. Welcome to
Man-o'-Wardrobe.[page break]I see that you are a fresh and
fashionable person, so I will allow
you to shop here. HOWEVER! You
must respect the merchandise.
Filthy hands are a lifetime ban.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Clothes_WelcomeRank10_00:
Ah, you are here. Good. Welcome to
Man-o'-Wardrobe.[page break]You think I haven't noticed? That you
have attained level 10? I NOTICE ALL!
Do not think that you have become so
fresh that our clothing cannot make
you fresher yet!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Clothes_WelcomeRank20_00:
Ah, you are here. Good. Welcome to
Man-o'-Wardrobe.[page break]Your freshness has risen yet again.
I detect it! However, do not make the
mistake of believing the student has
become the teacher. I remain the
fashion teacher!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Clothes_WelcomeRank30_00:
Ah, you are here. Good. Welcome to
Man-o'-Wardrobe.[page break]The day has come. You have become
fresh enough to impress even me.
Will you become the next great
fashion icon? I will do everything
in my power to make it so.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Goods_AfterReleaseABXY_00:
...Oh, hey. Welcome to Hotlantis.[page break]Uhhh, I think I had something else
I wanted to say.[page break]Oh, right. I have a message for you.
Um... I'm just gonna read it, OK?
"Yo! Chirpy Chips coming at you
with two new songs!"[page break]"The first one was something we
only played live in the beginning.
It's called Slopping Spree, and I
hope you dig this new recording!"[page break]"Harmony, you better be reading this
word for word, because I put a lot of
time into it." Oh, maybe I wasn't
supposed to read that part.[page break]"Be sure to tell 'em about your
dope random humming. It's what
we based the whole song on."[page break]"The next song is called No Quarters,
and we really hope everyone will dance
to it, because none of us in the band
can dance at all."[page break]Ugh, that was a lot. Orion talks like
they're playing bass—EXTRA. Anyway,
I hope you like the songs, I guess.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Goods_BeforeReleaseABXY_00:
...Oh, hey. Welcome to Hotlantis.[page break]Uhhh, I think I had something else
I wanted to say.[page break]Oh, right. Chirpy Chips have two new
songs coming soon. That's it.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Goods_ExchangeCatalogAfter_00:
Keep trucking. Ugh, you're definitely
not trucking. Just keep after it.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Goods_ExchangeCatalog_00:
Oh. You got everything in that
catalog? Uh, wow![page break]Well, uh...here's a new one.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Goods_FirstCatalog_00:
Oh, and I'm supposed to give you
one of these. It's a [color=0001]catalog[color=ffff].
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Goods_FirstRewardAfter_00:
OK...I'll let you get back to shopping
or whatever.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Goods_FirstReward_00:
Do you do battles and work shifts
at Grizzco and stuff? I guess you
get [color=0001]Catalog Points[color=ffff] for doing things
like that.[page break]And then every time your [color=0001]catalog level[color=ffff]
goes up, you get a prize. And I get to
dig through all this stuff to find it
and give it to you. Yay.[page break]Anyway, let's get the first one out
of the way right now. Your very first
prize. Cherish it.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Goods_First_00:
...Oh, hey. Welcome to Hotlantis.[page break]I don't really work here, but you can
shop around, and I'll sell you stuff.[page break]Don't ask me what to do with any
of it. Put it in your [color=0001]locker[color=ffff], I guess?
It's all pretty random. You'll see.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Goods_First_01:
Uh, your [color=0001]locker [color=ffff]is in the [color=0001]locker room[color=ffff].
Duh. You can go look at it later.[page break]If there's anything in there, I guess
it's yours by default.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Goods_MoneyShortage_00: Uh, but that's not enough cash?
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Goods_NewRewardAfter_00:
Keep up the good...work? Is it work?
Whatever. Keep doing it.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Goods_NewReward_00:
Oh. Your catalog level went up.
Well, here's your reward.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Goods_Offline_00:
...Oh, hey. Welcome to Hotlantis.[page break]Ughhh, you're offline. I get it.
Gonna need you to plug back in
to the [color=0001]internet [color=ffff]if you wanna buy
stuff though. Try the [color=0001]lobby[color=ffff].
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Goods_RankShortage_00:
...Oh, hey. Welcome to Hotlanti—
Wait. I take it back. Not yet.[page break]You have to be [color=0001]level 4[color=ffff] to shop here.
I don't make the rules. Just go to
the [color=0001]lobby [color=ffff]and do a few [color=0001]Turf War
battles[color=ffff] or whatever, OK?
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Goods_ThankYou_00:
Cool, thanks. I, uh, hope your locker
is looking really fresh, or something.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Goods_ThanksBadgeA_00:
Oh. Hey. You've bought a lot of
stuff from this place...[page break]Barry had a special message for that.[page break]He wanted me to thank you for being
such a loyal customer.[page break]Then he had this whole bit where I'm
supposed to give a "funny" speech
and present you with a [color=0001]badge[color=ffff]...[page break]I'm just gonna give this to you.
Way to consume, consumer.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Goods_ThanksBadgeB_00:
Oh. Hey. You've bought a LOOOT of
stuff from this place...[page break]Barry had another message for this.[page break]He wanted me to get super sappy if a
regular customer became a super-big
spender here. Like you. So congrats
on...buying a lot of stuff. You did it.[page break]Then he wanted me to do another
[color=0001]badge[color=ffff] ceremony with a handshake,
publicity photos, singing a parody
song that he wrote himself...[page break]So anyway...here. Badge. Ta-daaa.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Goods_WelcomeRankA_00:
...Oh, hey. Welcome to Hotlantis.[page break]Uhhh, I guess Barry had something
he wanted to say to you? He's the
owner of this shop, obviously.[page break]Anyway, he said you were really fresh
or something. Then he did, like, a
weird dance that's supposed to mean
something? I don't know. I think he's
looking for more stuff to sell you.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Goods_WelcomeRankB_00:
...Oh, hey. Welcome to Hotlantis.[page break]Oh yeah, Barry the owner had
another message for you.[page break]I am NOT going to make a heart
symbol with my hands like he told me
to, but...he said something to the
effect of, "You're a great customer"
and, "Please keep coming back."[page break]Then he said, "Yo," like, 30 times
in a row, and I think he was doing
a different dance. Not sure if I was
supposed to tell you that part.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Head_BasicSkillSame_00:
Uh...I'm not sure I understand what
you're doing. Those two items have,
like, the same primary abilities...
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Head_ExpFirst_00:
So, um...we sell stuff that you wear
on your head. You know, like hats...
and, uh...other head-related gear.[page break]Oh, but they're not just regular hats!
I always forget this part. They've
got, like, [color=0001]gear abilities[color=ffff].[page break]I think those help you in battles.
I don't know too much though.
I just work here. You should
probably push [group=0003 type=000b params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] at some point.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Head_ExpRarityUpAndReplace_00:
Oh, hey...there's a complicated new
thing you can do that I gotta tell
you about. Um...[page break]So we have an item that's the same
as one you already own. That means
you can [color=0001]raise the star power[color=ffff] of the
one you already own.[page break]Or you can [color=0001]trade yours in[color=ffff] for a new
one that's, like, exactly the same, but
different. It's like hitting the reset
button on its abilities. Whoa. I guess
it wasn't that complicated.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Head_Offline_00:
Yo...welcome to Naut Couture.[page break]Oh NO. You're all the way offline!
Um...I think you have to go to the
[color=0001]lobby [color=ffff]to connect to the [color=0001]internet[color=ffff].
Then hit me up later, OK?
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Head_RankShortage_00:
Oh, hey.[page break]Um...this is kinda awkward, but...
I'm not sure you're fresh enough
to shop here yet. I think you need
to be at least[color=0001] level 4[color=ffff].[page break]Maybe go to the [color=0001]lobby [color=ffff]and try a few
[color=0001]Turf War battles[color=ffff]? I hear those
can help with freshness...
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Head_RarityMax_00:
Um...that gear already has the
highest star power possible.
You can't boost it any higher!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Head_RarityUp_00:
Oh, so, like...you already have that
item. Did you want to [color=0001]raise its star
power[color=ffff] or [color=0001]trade in your old one[color=ffff]?
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Head_ReplaceConfirm_00:
So, your item's [color=0001]secondary gear
abilities[color=ffff] and [color=0001]star power[color=ffff] will be reset.
Your head fully wrapped around that?
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Head_SoldOtherHome_00:
Oh...I think we're sold out of
that item...
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Head_ThankYou_00:
Sounds good... Enjoy your new gear.
If you wanna change your setup, just
check out the [group=0003 type=0005 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0001]Equip [color=ffff]menu, OK?
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Head_ThanksBadgeA_00:
Oh, um...do you have an extra
moment right now?[page break]Sorry—it's just...you're one of our
best customers and, like, we wanted
to show our appreciation.[page break]It's not much, but we got you this
special [color=0001]badge [color=ffff]to show off. Y'know...
if you want to.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Head_ThanksBadgeB_00:
Heyyy, uh... Sorry to bother you
with something like this again, but...[page break]Like, you're REALLY one of our best
customers. Probably the best ever,
actually. So we got you an even more
exclusive [color=0001]badge[color=ffff].[page break]It would be pretty cool if you showed
it off sometime. But y'know...no
pressure, or anything.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Head_WelcomeRank04_00:
Yo...welcome to Naut Couture.
Whoa. You're pretty fresh, huh?
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Head_WelcomeRank10_00:
Yo...welcome to Naut Couture.[page break]Whoa. You're fresher than last time.
That's good, 'cause I think we got
some fresh new gear for you, or
something. Right, Boss?
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Head_WelcomeRank20_00:
Yo...welcome to Naut Couture.[page break]Wow. You are WAY fresh, bud.
I'm not, like, overflowing with retail
spirit or anything, but...I'm proud
to have you as a customer!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Head_WelcomeRank30_00:
Yo...welcome to Naut Couture.[page break]Oh, siiick! I've never seen anyone
as fresh as you. You're, like, TOO
fresh. Are you sure you even wanna
shop here?
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Shoes_BasicSkillSame_00:
Hold up—you're about to trade for
a pair that has the same primary
ability. Think twice!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Shoes_ExpFirst_00:
You know about [color=0001]gear abilities[color=ffff], right?
They make the freshest kicks even
fresher so you can play as good as
you look. Maybe even better? Nah![page break]Anyway, press [group=0003 type=000b params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] if you wanna
hear more about 'em. Or not if you
just wanna keep shopping!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Shoes_ExpRarityUpAndReplace_00:
Woo! This is exciting. We're gonna go
through some informational text
together. You ready? GET PUMPED![page break]So, you already own some of the
sneaks I'm selling today. That means
that you could [color=0001]raise the star power[color=ffff]
of the ones you have, or [color=0001]trade yours
in[color=ffff] to reset their abilities.[page break]You took that info like a champ!
Now all you gotta do is decide...
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Shoes_MoneyShortage_00: Oh nooo! You don't have the cash!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Shoes_Offline_00:
Come in, come in! Welcome to
Crush Sta— OH![page break]Oh NO! You're offline! Alright, you
got this. Take a deep breath, head
to the [color=0001]lobby[color=ffff],[color=0001] [color=ffff]and connect to the
[color=0001]internet[color=ffff]. I BELIEVE IN YOU!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Shoes_RankShortage_00:
Come in, come in! Welcome to
Crush Sta— OH![page break]You're not looking so fresh.
Is everything OK?[page break]Listen, we're gonna get through this.
Here's how. Go to the [color=0001]lobby[color=ffff]. Get in
some [color=0001]Turf War battles[color=ffff]. CRUSH 'EM!
Get that level up![page break]Come back when you hit [color=0001]level 4[color=ffff],
and we'll move forward together
in freshness, friendo! HAAA!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Shoes_RarityMax_00:
Aw, PHOOEY! Those are already at
the highest possible star power.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Shoes_RarityUp_00:
Aha! You already own those, friendo!
Do you want to [color=0001]raise the star power[color=ffff]
of your pair, or [color=0001]trade 'em in[color=ffff] to reset
their abilities?
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Shoes_ReplaceConfirm_00:
Sounds like a plan! Just to remind
you...the [color=0001]star power[color=ffff] and [color=0001]secondary
abilities[color=ffff] will reset. Cool?
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Shoes_SoldOtherHome_00:
Aw, NUTS! Those are straight-up
sold out. Sorry!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Shoes_SoldOut_00:
You ARE a sneakerhead! You already
got a pair of those today!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Shoes_ThankYou_00:
Thank you, thank you! Remember—
anytime you want to change out
your shoes, just hit up the
[group=0003 type=0005 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0001]Equip[color=ffff] menu!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Shoes_ThanksBadgeA_00:
Hey! Mind if I bend your ear for
just a second?[page break]You are a regular, and one of the
biggest sneakerheads I've ever met.
I love that about you![page break]So I hope you'll do me the honor
of accepting this commemorative
[color=0001]badge[color=ffff]. It's only for regulars like you!
Don't sell it on the internet! HAAA!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Shoes_ThanksBadgeB_00:
Hey, um...I've got something non-
sneaker related to discuss...[page break]You know how I gave you that special
badge before? Well...[page break]You have gone WAY above and WAY
beyond what I dreamed! You inspire
ME every day to be the freshest I
can BE! So I got you an even more
special [color=0001]badge[color=ffff]. You're the best!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Shoes_WelcomeRank04_00:
Come in, come in! Welcome to
Crush Station.[page break]Ooo! You are looking FRESH today!
But you could look even fresher
with something new on your feet.
Am I right? Of course I am!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Shoes_WelcomeRank10_00:
Come in, come in! Welcome to
Crush Station![page break]Whoa. Your fresh factor is fabulous
and phenomenal! Let me see what I
can find that would be suitable for
an afreshionado like you!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Shoes_WelcomeRank20_00:
Come in, come in! Welcome to
Crush Station![page break]HAAA! You are crazy fresh right
now! Have you been lifting? How
do you even increase freshness with
lifting? COACH ME! Anyway, I'll try to
find some fits for your fresh feet.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Shoes_WelcomeRank30_00:
Come in, come in! Welcome to
Crush Station![page break]DAAANG! The sheer freshocity
coming off your feet is mind-
bedazzling! I surrender! HAAA!
Just playing, but you are one fresh
fiend. What can I do for you?
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Weapon_Complete_00:
Wow! You've managed to collect all
of the weapons I offer in my shop.
Congratulations, fellow artillery
enthusiast![page break]If you've also collected a few extra
[group=0003 type=001c params=29 5c 4f 3f 00 00 00 00]Sheldon Licenses, you can trade
them in for [group=0003 type=0022 params=e1 7a 94 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0001]Shell-Out Tokens [color=ffff]at
the Shell-Out Machine in the [color=0001]lobby[color=ffff].
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Weapon_EndCloseUpWithSaveTransfer_00:
And you can get [group=0003 type=001c params=29 5c 4f 3f 00 00 00 00]Sheldon Licenses
by battling and leveling up...or even
just developing your skills by using
a particular weapon a lot.[page break]AH! You've surprised me yet again.
You already have at least one
[group=0003 type=001d params=29 5c 4f 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0001]Gold Sheldon License[color=ffff]?! You
ARE a true collector![page break]In that case, I'm pleased to inform
you that you'll be able to unlock
a larger selection than usual right
off the bat. Congratulations!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Weapon_EndCloseUp_00:
And you can get [group=0003 type=001c params=29 5c 4f 3f 00 00 00 00]Sheldon Licenses
by battling and leveling up...or even
just developing your skills by using
a particular weapon a lot.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Weapon_FirstWithSaveTransfer_00:
Hello, hello! Let me guess—you're
looking for some new weapons?
You've come to the right place![page break]Hold the phone... What is THAT?!
I didn't know you were a collector of
vintage weapons! I must say—it's
fascinating, but you'll need something
far fresher for the Splatlands.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Weapon_FirstWithSaveTransfer_01:
Of course, before you walk out of
here with something shiny and new,
you're aware you'll need the correct
[group=0003 type=001c params=29 5c 4f 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0001]Sheldon License[color=ffff], yes?
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Weapon_First_00:
Hello, hello! Let me guess—you're
looking for some new weapons?
You've come to the right place![page break]Our weapons come in sets—
a [color=0001]main weapon [color=ffff]on [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00],
a [color=0001]sub weapon[color=ffff] on [group=0003 type=000a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00],
and, yes, a [color=0001]special weapon[color=ffff]![page break]Sound complicated? Don't fret!
You can always press [group=0003 type=0003 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to try
out my products before buying.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Weapon_First_01:
Now then, you do know that you'll
need to exchange [group=0003 type=001c params=29 5c 4f 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0001]Sheldon
Licenses [color=ffff]to walk out of here with
something shiny and new, right?
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Weapon_GoldLicenseConfirm_00:
Oh, this is unfortunate. You don't

now. You do have [color=0001]1[color=ffff] [group=0003 type=001d params=29 5c 4f 3f 00 00 00 00]Gold Sheldon
License, and I can accept that, but...[page break]It seems like it would be a waste.
Are you sure you want to use your
[group=0003 type=001d params=29 5c 4f 3f 00 00 00 00]Gold Sheldon License on that?
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Weapon_GoldLicense_00:
Hm...judging by your current [color=0001]level[color=ffff],

this somehow...[page break]I suppose if you simply MUST HAVE
IT, I could let you trade [color=0001]1 [color=ffff][group=0003 type=001d params=29 5c 4f 3f 00 00 00 00]Gold
Sheldon License for it right now!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Weapon_LicenseShortage_00:
I'm afraid you're a bit lacking in the
license department. I can't part
with any of my wares for less than
they're worth!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Weapon_License_00:
Hm...judging by your current [color=0001]level[color=ffff],
that weapon is a little too spicy for
you. But maybe there's a way around
this somehow...[page break]I suppose if you simply MUST HAVE
IT, you could trade [color=0001]3[color=ffff] [group=0003 type=001c params=29 5c 4f 3f 00 00 00 00]Sheldon
Licenses for it right now!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Weapon_LowRankS: Price: 1 [group=0003 type=001c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] @ Lv. [group=0002 type=0000 params=00 02 00 00]
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Weapon_Offline_00:
Hello, he— [page break]Oh... You seem to be offline. Come
back when you're connected to the
[color=0001]internet[color=ffff]. You can get connected by
visiting the lobby!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Weapon_RankShortage_00:
Hello, he— Oh my, is that truly the
only weapon in your possession?[page break]I would love to talk your tentacles
off about the stuff I've got in stock,
but I'm not sure you can handle the
sheer firepower at lowly level 1.[page break]Listen—I've got a plan, and it will
work. Go to the [color=0001]lobby [color=ffff]and play some
[color=0001]Regular Battles[color=ffff]. Get to...let's say...
[color=0001]level 2[color=ffff]. Then come back and see me!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Weapon_SoldOut_00:
I admire your devotion, but you
already have that weapon!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop.Weapon_ThankYouGoldLicense_00:
Thank you! I know you'll give it a
good home. Remember—you can equip
new weapons in the [group=0003 type=0005 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0001]Equip [color=ffff]menu.[page break]Wondering how many [group=0003 type=001d params=29 5c 4f 3f 00 00 00 00]Gold Sheldon
