of the original but with a new look
and a new loadout to help you
write a different story![page break]Pepper the field with [color=0001]Ink Mines[color=ffff]
to bookmark your enemies for
easy splatting later.[page break]And use the [color=0001]Ink Vac [color=ffff]special to set
up the ultimate plot twist—literally
reversing enemy progress and making
it easier for your team to move
around the map and splat freely![page break]Just remember—even if you fancy
yourself a brilliant writer, you could
use a coauthor. This set is designed
with teamwork in mind, so don't be
afraid to collaborate!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShopWeaponExp.Spinner_HyperShort_00:
The [color=0001]Heavy Edit Splatling[color=ffff] boasts the
fastest fire rate of any splatling
and—despite the name—a surprisingly
lightweight feel, allowing you to move
quickly and shoot quickly-er.[page break]Oh, I wish I could edit what I just
said as quickly as this weapon edits
enemies out of the picture. No one
shot hits particularly hard, but with
this fire rate, it hardly matters![page break]And speaking of speed, your [color=0001]Curling
Bombs[color=ffff] can put you on the glide path
to victory, and the [color=0001]Tacticooler[color=ffff]
special can help you get there
even sooner with a speed burst![page break]You don't need to read between the
lines here. I'm saying this set is
built for one thing—going fast.
Why not buckle up and give it
a try?
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShopWeaponExp.Spinner_Hyper_00:
The [color=0001]Hydra Splatling[color=ffff] is designed to
impose extreme pressure on your
opponents' turf through superior
firepower.[page break]However, because the weapon takes
so long to charge, it's definitely
a liability in close quarters.[page break]I recommend using your [color=0001]Autobombs[color=ffff]
to fend off incoming bogeys—and
they can even help reveal far-off
opponents who can be splatted from
long range![page break]If anyone DOES make it past your
defenses, the unwelcome surprises
aren't over. This loadout allows you
to greet them with a [color=0001]Booyah Bomb[color=ffff]!
Mi casa is NOT su casa![page break]I recommend this setup for all you
homebodies who want to set up
camp and never leave—supporting
your team through long-range
firepower instead!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShopWeaponExp.Spinner_Quick_00:
Ooo, let me tell you all about the new
and improved [color=0001]Mini Splatling[color=ffff]. Thanks
to a few revisions with the firing
mechanism, it charges more quickly
than ever![page break]This loadout also comes with
[color=0001]Burst Bombs[color=ffff], which are excellent
for inking walls, allowing you to
get vertical in a hurry when the
situation demands it.[page break]And speaking of situational strategy,
with the [color=0001]Ultra Stamp [color=ffff]as your special,
you can push the front line at the
drop of a splat. Try this set out if
you fancy yourself a field general!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShopWeaponExp.Spinner_Quick_01:
The [color=0001]Zink Mini Splatling [color=ffff]stands out
with a fancy new look and an updated
suite of complementary weapons,
although its performance is identical
to the original Mini Splatling.[page break]First of all, we now have the [color=0001]Toxic
Mist[color=ffff] sub weapon to slow enemies
down. Slow enemies make for good
targets, so you're less likely to
"mist" them with the Mini Splatling![page break]Another good strategy with this
loadout is to fire up the [color=0001]Big Bubbler[color=ffff]
and take cover while you're charging.
Then you can burst forward, ready
to launch an offensive![page break]If you're new to splatlings, this set
is user-friendly and ready to rock.
Give it a try!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShopWeaponExp.Spinner_Serein_00:
The [color=0001]Nautilus 47[color=ffff] was the first
splatling to allow you to [color=0001]store your
charge [color=ffff]while swimming in ink![page break]It sounds like a small detail, but let
me assure you...it's huge! It means
you can charge undetected until
you're ready to leap out and splat
an unsuspecting opponent.[page break]Of course, this state-of-the-art
weapon has a few other tricks up
its sleeve as well...[page break]It can be [color=0001]paused midshot to charge[color=ffff].
It has a stabilizer to keep your aim
steady while you jump. And it makes
an inkredible grilled cheese! Oh, I may
have dreamed the last one...[page break]Anyway, with the [color=0001]Point Sensor [color=ffff]sub
and [color=0001]Ink Storm [color=ffff]special to help read
opponent positions, this loadout can
make you feel like you're playing in
Cod Mode!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShopWeaponExp.Spinner_Serein_01:
The [color=0001]Nautilus 79[color=ffff] functions like the
Nautilus 47 but comes with an
all-new coat of paint![page break]The [color=0001]Suction Bombs [color=ffff]are the rock, and
your main weapon is the hard place.
I trust you know where to trap your
enemies, hmm?[page break]Once your [color=0001]Triple Splashdown[color=ffff] special
is ready, you can even try your hand
at making an impact on the front line![page break]With this set's sub and special,
plus the ability to store a charge,
PLUS the ability to charge while
firing, this one weapon gives you
a world of opportunities!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShopWeaponExp.Spinner_Standard_00:
The mechanics of the [color=0001]Heavy Splatling[color=ffff]
are similar to those of a charger, but
it's in a weapon class of its own![page break]Hold down [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to compress your ink,
and then release [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to unleash a
monster stream![page break]Now, as you might expect, each
charge takes a while to get ready
and uses a huge amount of ink,
leaving you wide-open while you wait.[page break]That's why the [color=0001]Sprinkler [color=ffff]is a great
sub weapon here. It'll help your turf
stay inked and keep a little distance
between you and your enemies.[page break]The pro move is to fire up your
[color=0001]Wave Breaker [color=ffff]to expose enemy
locations while the Heavy Splatling
charges up. Then it's open season
from way downtown![page break]With power like this, even enemies
with chargers will be jelly!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShopWeaponExp.Spinner_Standard_01:
The [color=0001]Heavy Splatling Deco [color=ffff]is simply
a Heavy Splatling that's been
cosmetically enhanced.[page break]That said, it also comes with a new
loadout, including the [color=0001]Point Sensor[color=ffff]!
Fire up that sub to pinpoint a target,
and...ba-ba-ba-BOOSH! Lay 'em out
with the Heavy Splatling inkpower.[page break]Find yourself in a tight spot? That's
when it's [color=0001]Kraken Royale [color=ffff]time, friend.
The only thing an enemy can do in
the face of that special is run away.[page break]This is a unique loadout that will
set you apart on the battlefield.
Why not give it a shot?
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShopWeaponExp.Stringer_Normal_00:
I am so excited to share this new
weapon tech with you. Behold the
[color=0001]Tri-Stringer[color=ffff]—a [color=0001]stringer[color=ffff]-type weapon
that fires in three directions at once![page break]Press [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] while standing or running,
and the ink will [color=0001]fire[color=ffff] [color=0001]horizontally[color=ffff].
Press [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] while jumping for a shot
that's concentrated [color=0001]vertically[color=ffff]. The
flexibility is unparalleled![page break]And that's not even the best part.
You can hold down [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to charge a
shot! The ink will fly farther AND
explode if it hits a wall or the floor.[page break]I could go on all day about stringers,
but I should mention that the [color=0001]Toxic
Mist[color=ffff] sub is great for keeping enemies
at bay, or at least slowing them down.[page break]And for enemies that you can't even
reach with a charged shot, you've
got the [color=0001]Killer Wail 5.1 [color=ffff]with supersonic
range at your disposal.[page break]I hope you'll give one of the new
stringers a try!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShopWeaponExp.Stringer_Normal_01:
The [color=0001]Inkline Tri-Stringer[color=ffff] is a fresh
collab between the makers of the
original Tri-Stringer and Inkline.
With a new loadout and look, I hope
Tri-Stringer fans will check it out![page break]For those on the fence, I've got ideas
about how to take advantage of this
set's strengths. Try luring enemies
with the [color=0001]Sprinkler[color=ffff]—a fully charged
Tri-Stringer shot will take 'em out![page break]And you have the [color=0001]Super Chump [color=ffff]decoy
to help you take advantage of the
main weapon's ultra-long range and
firepower.[page break]I think this setup really lets the
Inkline Tri-Stringer shine, so give
it a fully charged shot!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShopWeaponExp.Stringer_Short_00:
The [color=0001]REEF-LUX 450 [color=ffff]is a lighter version
of the Tri-Stringer that's a bit more
user-friendly for folks who are new
to stringer-type weapons.[page break]Like most lightweight weapons, it
doesn't pack the biggest punch or
range—no exploding charged shots
here—but it does offer the ability
to [color=0001]store a charge[color=ffff]![page break]This set comes with [color=0001]Curling Bombs[color=ffff]
to help you close the gap into enemy
turf quickly, letting you take full
advantage of the nimble nature of
your main weapon.[page break]And when you want to make a big
impact in a hurry, don't forget about
your [color=0001]Tenta Missiles[color=ffff]. You can make it
rain missiles on opponents out of
range of the REEF-LUX.[page break]This is a highly mobile loadout that
lets you fight with flexibility and still
take down powerhouse opponents.
I hope you give it a try!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShopWeaponExp.Stringer_Short_01:
On the surface, the [color=0001]REEF-LUX 450
Deco[color=ffff] is what you might expect—a
decorated version of the REEF-LUX
450. But with a fresh loadout,
it offers new possibilities.[page break]For instance, you can now stake out
a safe area with the [color=0001]Splash Wall[color=ffff] sub,
allowing you a window of opportunity
to snipe far-off foes with fully
charged shots.[page break]And when that special gauge is full,
don't hesitate to twist the wrist and
fire off a [color=0001]Reefslider [color=ffff]special. It's a
great way to help push the front line
forward for your team.[page break]I recommend this set for folks who
simply love inking turf but also want
the option to boldly venture behind
enemy lines when the moment is right.

CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop_Fsodr.Clothes_BasicSkillSame_00:
Hmmm. I'd advise against doing that.
Both of those body cloths contain
the same primary abilities.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop_Fsodr.Clothes_ExpFirst_00:
Funny thing about body cloths...
They have their own [color=0001]abilities[color=ffff]![page break]If you want to learn more, go ahead
and press [group=0003 type=000b params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] anytime.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop_Fsodr.Clothes_ExpRarityUpAndReplace_00:
Ah, so you want to learn more about
[color=0001]star power[color=ffff] and [color=0001]trading in[color=ffff] items?
This is what I've trained for![page break]It's pretty simple, actually. Raising
an item's [color=0001]star power[color=ffff] adds more
ability slots to the item and also
makes it possible to gain body-cloth
XP faster.[page break]On the other hand, [color=0001]trading in[color=ffff] body
cloths gives fresh abilities to the
body cloths. I hope that makes
sense! Happy shopping!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop_Fsodr.Clothes_MoneyShortage_00:
BLUUUH. Oh, pardon me. I have an
uncontrollable reaction like that
when a customer is short on cash.
Which you, uh, are...
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop_Fsodr.Clothes_Offline_00:
Welcome to Jelly Fresh! Thanks for
sho— BLUUUH! Oh no. You're offline!
Sorry, but I'll need you to go to the
[color=0001]lobby [color=ffff]and connect to the [color=0001]internet[color=ffff]
again before shopping.

midsummer's dawn. My gratitude

CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop_Sdodr.Clothes_WelcomeRank10_00:
To splat, or not to splat: that is
the question.[page break]'Tis a question thou hast answered,
for thy level tells no lie. I have
fine gear to offer thee today.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop_Sdodr.Clothes_WelcomeRank20_00:
Some be born fresh, some achieve
freshness, and some have
freshness thrust upon them.[page break]And whilst a rose by any name would
smell as fresh, thy rose doth wear
the finest cloth in the land.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop_Sdodr.Clothes_WelcomeRank30_00:
A coward suffers a thousand
splats; a hero is splatted but once.
Thou art that hero, cousin.[page break]Thy presence makes me rich, thou
incomparable ink slinger, and far
surmounts my labor to attain it.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop_Sdodr.Head_BasicSkillSame_00:
Hmm...that gear's abilities have the
same aura. No sense swimming in
circles like that, my little inkfish.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop_Sdodr.Head_ExpFirst_00:
You know, of course, that each
piece of gear can grant you an
[color=0001]ability[color=ffff], don't you?[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00][page break]Well,[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] if you want the nitty-gritty,[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
just push [group=0003 type=000b params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to read up on it.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop_Sdodr.Head_ExpRarityUpAndReplace_00:
Ah, my little inkfish, we have an item
just like one you already own. If you
like, you can [color=0001]raise its star power [color=ffff]or
[color=0001]trade it in[color=ffff].[page break]If you [color=0001]raise its star power[color=ffff], it might
get more experience or a new slot.
[color=0001]Trading it in[color=ffff], on the other hand, is an
invitation to see what new abilities
the universe has in store for it.[page break]Either way, I foresee good things.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop_Sdodr.Head_MoneyShortage_00:
You may be rich in spirit, but we
don't accept spirit here...
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop_Sdodr.Head_Offline_00:
Ah,[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] hello, friend. I'd love to help you,
but I'm not feeling a connection.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
Come back once you're connected to
the [color=0001]internet[color=ffff] in the [color=0001]lobby[color=ffff], and we'll
start fresh.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop_Sdodr.Head_RankShortage_00:
Whoa, friend...[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] I could feel your
aura before you even set foot in my
shop.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] Your eagerness is palpable.[page break]But I'm afraid I can't sell you my
wares until you're truly ready for
them.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] Until you're able to channel
that energy into bettering yourself.[page break]Once you make it to [color=0001]level 4[color=ffff], I think
you'll be ready,[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] but I don't want to
rush it.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] It should happen
organically or not at all.[page break]Now, go![group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] Realize your potential,
friend![group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] I have no doubt you'll find
yourself after a couple dozen
[color=0001]Regular Battles[color=ffff].
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop_Sdodr.Head_RarityMax_00:
Sorry. The star power of that gear
is already at its very starriest.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop_Sdodr.Head_RarityUp_00:
But you already have that gear, my
little inkfish. Can I redirect your
energy to [color=0001]raising its star power [color=ffff]or
[color=0001]trading it in[color=ffff]?
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop_Sdodr.Head_ReplaceConfirm_00:
Fair warning...the current [color=0001]star power[color=ffff]
and [color=0001]secondary gear abilities [color=ffff]will be
reset. A joyous reincarnation!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop_Sdodr.Head_SoldOtherHome_00:
Oh...I thought we had that in stock.
But sometimes my memory plays
tricks, you see.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop_Sdodr.Head_SoldOut_00:
Put on your inking cap, darling.
You already own that one.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop_Sdodr.Head_ThankYou_00:
Thanks, sweetie. If you're looking
to renew yourself, just press
[group=0003 type=0005 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0001]Equip[color=ffff]!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop_Sdodr.Head_ThanksBadgeA_00:
A moment, my little inkfish.[page break]This is a certain special [color=0001]badge [color=ffff]we
only give out to customers with
persistent spirits.[page break]I think you have such a spirit, don't
you? So in that sense, this already
belonged to you.
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop_Sdodr.Head_ThanksBadgeB_00:
Oh, my radiant little inkfish.[page break]There is a [color=0001]badge [color=ffff]we reserve for
patrons with the brightest of auras.[page break]Since you have been drawn to this
shop again and again, I must do my
duty and unite it with the one
destined to have it. That's you!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop_Sdodr.Head_WelcomeRank04_00:
Ah...[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] Hello, my little inkfish.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
Welcome to Headspace.[page break]Your aura is quite strong.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] Let's find
some nice new gear for you, yes?
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop_Sdodr.Head_WelcomeRank10_00:
Ahhh![group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] It's my little inkfish![page break]Just look at you![group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] Your aura
is stronger than ever!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop_Sdodr.Head_WelcomeRank20_00:
Welcome to Headspace![group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
Please take your time loo—[page break]Wait a minute![group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] Is that you, my little
inkfish?![group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] I hardly recognized you
behind that aura of yours![group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] Your
spirit is just so...[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]fresh!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop_Sdodr.Head_WelcomeRank30_00:
AH![group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] IT'S YOU![page break]I can't believe my little inkfish
has blossomed into a spiritual
powerhouse.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] I've never basked
in an aura like yours!
CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop_Sdodr.Shoes_BasicSkillSame_00:
Trade-in? Naw, dude. Those have the
same ability as these ones.

All my gear comes with [color=0001]abilities[color=ffff] that

CommonMsg/Talk/TalkShop_Sdodr.Shoes_ExpRarityUpAndReplace_00:
Whoooa...some of the shoes we got
today match a pair you have. You can
[color=0001]boost their star power[color=ffff] or [color=0001]trade them

you want, you can [color=0001]trade 'em in[color=ffff] for
a new pair.[page break]What do I recommend? Search me,

Looks like you need to get your

feel like I'm supporting you too.[page break]In fact, I wanna give you something.

Loosen up, duder! I got you.

CommonMsg/Weapon/WeaponExp_Special.SpBlower:
Make your ink shots more powerful by sucking up
enemy attacks! Hold [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to generate a vortex
that sucks up enemy ink attacks. Once the tank is
full, or after the timer runs out, let go of [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00],
and you'll launch a souped-up super ink shot!
CommonMsg/Weapon/WeaponExp_Special.SpCastle:
If you ever wanted to become a giant squid or
octopus, this weapon is for you. While transformed,
you can move around and repel enemy attacks.
Jump and splat your enemies with powerful spin
moves, or hold [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] and then release to charge
forward aggressively.
CommonMsg/Weapon/WeaponExp_Special.SpChariot:
Leave your foes in a pinch with this scuttling tank's
superior inkpower. Press [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] for rapid-fire
shots—[group=0003 type=000a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] will fire your cannon. Its back is
vulnerable to enemy attacks, but you can shift into
mobile mode with [group=0003 type=000b params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to protect yourself.
CommonMsg/Weapon/WeaponExp_Special.SpChimney:
Not quite a shield but unlike any other offensive
weapon, this device produces a large, slowly moving
sheet when you press [group=0003 type=000a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to deploy. Enemies
who touch the sheet will take damage and briefly
lose the ability to perceive color! Anyone who even
LOOKS upon the sheet will be mildly disturbed.
CommonMsg/Weapon/WeaponExp_Special.SpEnergyStand:
Deploys a fridge stocked with drinks that enhance
some of your abilities for a brief time. There are
four drinks, but you can only have one—the rest
are for sharing! You'll lose the enhancement if
you're splatted while the drink is in effect, but
you'll respawn right away.
CommonMsg/Weapon/WeaponExp_Special.SpFirework:
Tired of getting jumped immediately after a Super
Jump? Use the Super Chump to fire several decoys
that appear to be Super Jump landing points into a
wide area using [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00], then giggle as your enemies
move in just as the decoys explode with ink.
CommonMsg/Weapon/WeaponExp_Special.SpGreatBarrier:
Deploy this device at your feet to shield yourself
with a large, spherical barrier. This bubble will block
outside ink attacks, but it can't prevent opponents
themselves from entering. Damage to the top section
or the inner device will cause the barrier to pop
more quickly.
CommonMsg/Weapon/WeaponExp_Special.SpInkStorm:
Throw this device to generate a rain cloud of ink.
The cloud gradually moves away from where the
device was thrown.
CommonMsg/Weapon/WeaponExp_Special.SpJetpack:
This launches you into the air by spraying out
ink, allowing you to attack opponents with the
attached launcher. You can fly higher temporarily
by pressing [group=0003 type=0001 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00].
CommonMsg/Weapon/WeaponExp_Special.SpMicroLaser:
Unleashes six speaker-shaped, laser-emitting
devices to surround and devastate your enemies.
Lock onto an opponent, and the emitters will track
and blast them wherever they go! You can continue
to use your main weapon and sub weapon while the
Killer Wail 5.1 is firing.
CommonMsg/Weapon/WeaponExp_Special.SpMultiMissile:
Press [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to fire missiles at any enemies
within your targeting reticle. Locking on to
several enemies will change the number of
missiles that hit each target.
CommonMsg/Weapon/WeaponExp_Special.SpNiceBall:
Funnel power into an explosive ink ball, and launch it
at the enemy. By sending and receiving "Booyahs"
from your team, you can build power more quickly.
Teammates who send Booyahs will be rewarded by
having their special gauge filled a little.
CommonMsg/Weapon/WeaponExp_Special.SpPogo:
What's better than splashing down with one fist in
a burst of ink-splattered devastation? Splashing
down with THREE fists in a burst of ink-splattered
devastation! You can even use this special at the
end of a Super Jump, but its power will be dialed
back to one fist in that case.
CommonMsg/Weapon/WeaponExp_Special.SpShockSonar:
Deploys a device that generates sonic waves to drive
hidden opponents out into the open. Waves expand
along the ground, marking and dealing damage to any
opponents they touch. To avoid damage, simply jump
over each wave.
CommonMsg/Weapon/WeaponExp_Special.SpSkewer:
Hop onto a shark-shaped, ink-propelled float, and
charge forward. When you reach the end of the path,
or if you press [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00], the float will explode and
deal damage.
CommonMsg/Weapon/WeaponExp_Special.SpSuperHook:
Transform into an ink-cloaked acrobat, and sling
your stretchy arm to zip around the battlefield!
Use [group=0003 type=000a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to aim and stick to walls. You can still
use your main weapon like normal with [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00]. When
your ink runs out, your transformation will end, and
you'll Super Jump back to your starting location.
CommonMsg/Weapon/WeaponExp_Special.SpTripleTornado:
Throw and deploy a guidance device with [group=0003 type=000a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to
cause a tornado-generating ink strike to land on that
spot from above. You can deploy up to three guidance
devices to activate three separate ink tornadoes.
CommonMsg/Weapon/WeaponExp_Special.SpUltraShot:
Press [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to launch three blasts of spiraling ink
in a single shot. You can fire it up to three times.
CommonMsg/Weapon/WeaponExp_Special.SpUltraStamp:
Attack with an enormous hammer. Press and hold
[group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to advance while striking with the hammer.
If you press and release [group=0003 type=000a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00], you'll throw the
hammer far into the distance to attack and the
special will end.

CommonMsg/Weapon/WeaponExp_Sub.Beacon:
A device that emits a signal that Inklings and
Octolings can detect. You can Super Jump to a
teammate's Squid Beakon by selecting it and
pressing [group=0003 type=0000 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00]. You can place up to three at a time.
They're usually single use, but allies who don't have
the Squid Beakon equipped can use them twice.
CommonMsg/Weapon/WeaponExp_Sub.Bomb_Curling:
A bomb that moves in a straight line, inking the
ground before it explodes. It also bounces off
walls! You can adjust the length of time until
detonation by holding down [group=0003 type=000a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00].
CommonMsg/Weapon/WeaponExp_Sub.Bomb_Fizzy:
A bomb loaded with special carbonated ink.
Hold [group=0003 type=000a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to build power, then unleash up
to three explosions. Shake the controller,
move the Stick, or mash buttons to build
power faster!
CommonMsg/Weapon/WeaponExp_Sub.Bomb_Quick:
A bomb that explodes when it touches something.
It's a small, weak explosion, but it doesn't consume
much ink, so you can throw one after another.
CommonMsg/Weapon/WeaponExp_Sub.Bomb_Robot:
A bomb that automatically seeks out opponents.
It will search for opponents in the area that you
throw it, and if it finds one, it will automatically
start walking toward them. When it approaches
an opponent, it stops and explodes.
CommonMsg/Weapon/WeaponExp_Sub.Bomb_Splash:
A bomb that explodes a short time after it lands.
It inks the area around it when it explodes and can
even take out opponents.
CommonMsg/Weapon/WeaponExp_Sub.Bomb_Suction:
A bomb that attaches to the ground and walls.
It takes longer to explode than the Splat Bombs
and spreads ink farther.
CommonMsg/Weapon/WeaponExp_Sub.Bomb_Torpedo:
A sub weapon that flies toward your enemies. When
thrown near an enemy, it changes shape and targets
the foe, exploding on impact and splatting ink
everywhere. You can shoot down enemy torpedoes.
CommonMsg/Weapon/WeaponExp_Sub.LineMarker:
A sub weapon that fires straight forward and leaves
a line in its path. Opponents that are hit directly will
take damage, and those that touch the remaining line
will be marked. When a shot hits a solid surface, it
will bounce off of it and continue in a straight line.
CommonMsg/Weapon/WeaponExp_Sub.PointSensor:
A device that marks opponents nearby where it's
thrown. It reveals the opponents' locations to
your teammates.
CommonMsg/Weapon/WeaponExp_Sub.PoisonMist:
A bottle that sprays the fluid of a certain creature in
mist form. Opponents caught in the mist move slower
and their ink is slightly reduced. The longer an enemy
is in the mist, the stronger the effect becomes.
CommonMsg/Weapon/WeaponExp_Sub.Shield:
A device that erects a wall of ink in front of you that
blocks enemy intrusion and attacks. Attacks from
enemies will speed up the time it takes for the wall
to come down. You can only place one at a time.
CommonMsg/Weapon/WeaponExp_Sub.Sprinkler:
A device that attaches to the ground or to walls and
sprays ink. It operates at full power right when you
place it but gradually gets weaker. You can only place
one at a time.
CommonMsg/Weapon/WeaponExp_Sub.Trap:
A trap that you place on the ground. When an
opponent gets close, it activates, marking that
opponent. It'll also activate if inked by an opponent.
You can place two at once.

EventFlowMsg/Fsodr_Plaza_Intro.000:
Welcome to Inkopolis Plaza![page break]This is the [color=0001]plaza[color=ffff], where all the freshest folk
come to chill like krill.[page break]Most Inklings and Octolings are obsessed with
the hottest sport in Inkopolis Plaza...INK BATTLES!
EventFlowMsg/Fsodr_Plaza_Intro.003:
That crazy-tall building is [color=0001]Inkopolis Tower[color=ffff].
The city's most famous landmark!
EventFlowMsg/Fsodr_Plaza_Intro.004:
There's a [color=0001]lobby[color=ffff] on the first floor of
Inkopolis Tower for online battles.
EventFlowMsg/Fsodr_Plaza_Intro.005:
This is the [color=0001]Booyah Base[color=ffff], a shopping mall for
all your Inkling and Octoling needs.[page break]You can buy all kinds of fresh [color=0001]gear [color=ffff]and
[color=0001]weapons[color=ffff] to use in battle.[page break]But the shops are pretty exclusive, and they
won't serve you if you're not fresh enough!
EventFlowMsg/Fsodr_Plaza_Intro.008:
Looking for part-time work? Not particular
about employer reputation? [color=0001]Grizzco [color=ffff]is for you!
EventFlowMsg/Fsodr_Plaza_Intro.009:
If you want to visit another city, you can hit
up the [color=0001]train station[color=ffff] here.[page break]But also...
EventFlowMsg/Fsodr_Plaza_Intro.010:
Don't miss [color=0001]the Shoal[color=ffff]! It's THE place to splat
and be splatted in Inkopolis.[page break]Local Inklings and Octolings meet here with
friends for co-op and competitive local play.
EventFlowMsg/Fsodr_Plaza_Intro.012:
You might wanna steer clear of that [color=0001]back alley[color=ffff].
Smells a little fishy.
EventFlowMsg/Fsodr_Plaza_Intro.013:
That's it for the tour![page break]Whether you're hopping right into battle, working
at Grizzco, or just vibing, enjoy Inkopolis Plaza!

EventFlowMsg/LobbyCoop_BigRunTutorial.Comment_00:
Welcome to Grizzco Industries.[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] And congrats on
making the kind of sound business decision that
future you will no doubt appreciate.[page break]I take it my advertisements for help with the [color=0001]Big Run[color=ffff]
have been effective. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]We are...somewhat short-staffed
at the moment. You've come at just the right time!
EventFlowMsg/LobbyCoop_BigRunTutorial.Comment_01:
Oh, by the way, you may have heard that there is a
[color=0001]Big Run [color=ffff]going on right now.
EventFlowMsg/LobbyCoop_BigRunTutorial.Comment_02:
You...are aware of the [color=0001]Big Run [color=ffff]phenomenon, yes?
Where Salmonids stray far from their own turf and
invade our city?[page break]It is business critical that we prevent the Salmonids
from damaging the city. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Stopping them is no small task,
but Grizzco employees are willing to risk it all.[page break]The primary objective of stopping the Salmonids just
so happens to dovetail nicely with our core business
model—collecting Golden Eggs. It's all about synergy![page break]Now, we at Grizzco recognize the risk associated with
this challenging task. That's why we're [color=0001]increasing our
payout[color=ffff] for all surviv— Um...for all top producers.[page break]We've even prepared a [color=0001]special decoration[color=ffff] for everyone,
regardless of job performance. For more details, just
press [group=0003 type=0006 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] when you're talking to me before a job.[page break]This has been productive. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]I'm looking forward to
seeing what you can do with this opportunity.
Good luck!

EventFlowMsg/LobbyCoop_RankShortage.Comment_00:
Welcome to Grizzco Industries. And congrats on taking
your first step toward financial securi—[page break]Just got here, huh? Look, there's no way I'd hire
you right now. You'd only get hurt, and that's far
more paperwork than I want to deal with.[page break]Hey, don't give me the sad face... OK, how's this—if you
really want it that bad, bootstrap yourself up to [color=0001]level 4[color=ffff]
and come back. THEN I'll hire ya!

EventFlowMsg/LobbyCoop_Tutorial00.Comment_00:
Hey, kid. You look like you've got potential. I think you
could help shape the future of the Splatlands![page break]I'm Mr. Grizz. Yes, Grizzco is my company. That's my
name on the door...and everything else. But I'm here
to show you how Grizzco is different.[page break]See, from the top level—that's me—to fresh, young
talent like you, we're committed to making the world
a better place.[page break]So allow me to officially welcome you to the crew.
It's good, honest work with an honest paycheck.
I just know you'll fit right in.
EventFlowMsg/LobbyCoop_Tutorial00.Comment_01:
Now that you're on board, let's make sure your
[color=0001]training [color=ffff]is up to date.[page break]Can we get started now?
EventFlowMsg/LobbyCoop_Tutorial00.Comment_02:
That's what I like to see! You're a go-getter,
just like a young me.
EventFlowMsg/LobbyCoop_Tutorial00.Comment_03:
I see.[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] Well, we can reschedule the final onboarding
process, I suppose. Just don't make this a habit!
EventFlowMsg/LobbyCoop_Tutorial00.Comment_04: Now then, I'll just check your records...
EventFlowMsg/LobbyCoop_Tutorial00.Comment_05:
Everything is in order. And the helicopter is ready.
Are you ready to hop in?[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] Time is money, and money
is helicopters, so let's go!
EventFlowMsg/LobbyCoop_Tutorial00.Comment_06:
Hold the phone...you're a returning employee!
Welcome back![group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] I know how hard it is to stay away.[page break]Well, I think you'll find your way around just fine.
But if you are interested in a refresher, it's not
a bad idea to look over the basics again.
EventFlowMsg/LobbyCoop_Tutorial00.Comment_07:
Of course, of course. As long as you're following
protocols TO THE LETTER, it's a safe job.[page break]Ah, I'm told the helicopter is ready. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Shall we head out?
EventFlowMsg/LobbyCoop_Tutorial00.Comment_08:
I appreciate the confidence! I'm not sure HR would
approve of deviating from mandatory training,
but...let's not tell them, just this once.
EventFlowMsg/LobbyCoop_Tutorial00.Comment_09:
Oh, yeah! This may be old news to someone with your
experience, but word around the watercooler is some
[color=0001]new Boss Salmonids[color=ffff] were spotted in the Splatlands.
EventFlowMsg/LobbyCoop_Tutorial00.Comment_10:
We usually require all employees to take a training
course on how to defeat Boss Salmonids...[page break]But really, it's all in the manual. Read that over and—
Oh! Sounds like the next helicopter's about to head out.[page break]Why don't you head down to the site for a little
sink-or-swim time?[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] We can haul you—or whatever's
left of you—back any time you like.
EventFlowMsg/LobbyCoop_Tutorial00.Comment_11: What do you say? Ready for some on-the-job training?
EventFlowMsg/LobbyCoop_Tutorial00.Comment_12: I like that can-do attitude![group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] Now get on the helicopter.
EventFlowMsg/LobbyCoop_Tutorial00.Comment_13: Understood.[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] We can table that until you're ready.

EventFlowMsg/LobbyCoop_Tutorial00After.Comment_00:
Welcome back![group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] I've got a fuzzy feeling you're going to
be a great addition to team Grizzco.[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] But first...[page break]There's another round of training I'd like you to do. It's
just a silly requirement after...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] I won't bore you with
the details. We just don't want you to get hurt.[page break]So we're going to teach you how to deal with all the
many types of [color=0001]Boss Salmonids[color=ffff], including the new ones
they've been finding in the Splatlands.[page break]But honestly, if you just read the manual, you'll see—
Oh! Sounds like the next helicopter's about to head out.[page break]Well...sink or swim, I always say!
EventFlowMsg/LobbyCoop_Tutorial00After.Comment_01:
Let's get you down to the site and finish your training.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
Ready to go?
EventFlowMsg/LobbyCoop_Tutorial00After.Comment_02: Fantastic![group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] Into the helicopter and off you go!
EventFlowMsg/LobbyCoop_Tutorial00After.Comment_03:
Fine. No rush.[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] Come back whenever you can fit it into
your schedule.

EventFlowMsg/LobbyCoop_Tutorial01.Comment_00:
THERE you are, kid. I was wondering when you'd show up
to finish your training.[page break]As I was saying, this is required training for every
employee.[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] I know, I know... But you know how lawyers
are.[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] Or if you're lucky, you don't.
EventFlowMsg/LobbyCoop_Tutorial01.Comment_01:
We're going to teach you how to deal with the many
types of [color=0001]Boss Salmonids[color=ffff] out there, including the new
ones they've been finding in the Splatlands.[page break]You can read all about them in the manual later—the
next helicopter's about to head out. That means it's
sink-or-swim time!
EventFlowMsg/LobbyCoop_Tutorial01.Comment_02:
Are you ready to head down to the site to finish up
your training?
EventFlowMsg/LobbyCoop_Tutorial01.Comment_03: Fantastic![group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] Into the helicopter and off you go!
EventFlowMsg/LobbyCoop_Tutorial01.Comment_04:
Still?[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] That's OK. I'm sure your schedule will clear
eventually.

EventFlowMsg/LobbyCoop_Tutorial01After.Comment_00:
Congrats, kid! And welcome to the Grizzco family.[page break]Trust me when I say this job is a dream come true...[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
as long as your dream is risking life and limb to collect
Golden Eggs for your boss.[page break]But you won't be doing it alone! From here on out, you'll
be teaming up with coworkers, which means more lives
and a LOT more limbs to risk![page break]Oh! [color=0001]One last thing.[color=ffff][group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] When you're out there, remember
that every wave is gonna be different, just like the sea.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
And there's no training for the sea.
EventFlowMsg/LobbyCoop_Tutorial01After.Comment_01:
The sea is always changing. Every single wave brings
something new...[page break]And you'll have to change with it.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] We all will, if we want
to succeed. That's the [color=0001]most important thing [color=ffff]of all...[page break]Hm? Sorry. My mind started wandering for a bit there.
But my point still stands![page break]The next time you're out there, it'll be the real deal,
and you never know what the sea will throw at you.[page break]Good luck!
EventFlowMsg/LobbyCoop_Tutorial01After.Comment_02:
Whenever you want to take a shift, just let me know.
There's always plenty of work to go around!

EventFlowMsg/LobbyLocal_FirstEnter.First_00:
Welcome to [color=0001]the Shoal[color=ffff]! You've come to the right
place to play via [color=0001]local wireless[color=ffff] connection.
EventFlowMsg/LobbyLocal_FirstEnter.First_01: Just talk to the receptionist to get started.
EventFlowMsg/LobbyLocal_FirstEnter.First_02:
After you choose your battle mode and stage,
we'll get you right into the action!

EventFlowMsg/LobbyVersus_AfterFirstBattl.AfterFirstBattle_00:
Whew! So that's what battles are like![page break]Hey, did you happen to notice how some of your
opponents had cool-looking [color=0001]name displays[color=ffff]?[page break]Those are called [color=0001]Splashtags[color=ffff], and they're fully
customizable to show off your personality![page break]Wait...
EventFlowMsg/LobbyVersus_AfterFirstBattl.AfterFirstBattle_01:
You haven't even set up a [color=0001]nickname [color=ffff]for your
[color=0001]Splashtag [color=ffff]yet!
EventFlowMsg/LobbyVersus_AfterFirstBattl.AfterFirstBattle_02:
You gotta show up in style to your next battle!
Hit the [color=0001]lobby terminal[color=ffff] and set a nickname, OK?
EventFlowMsg/LobbyVersus_AfterFirstBattl.AfterFirstBattle_Reward_00:
Hm, it looks like you might have a bit of older
data on your Splashtag...[page break]Let's see if we can get that sorted out.
EventFlowMsg/LobbyVersus_AfterFirstBattl.AfterFirstBattle_Reward_01:
Now you just need to register a new
nickname, and you'll be all set!

EventFlowMsg/LobbyVersus_FestMikoshi100.001:
Thanks to your fast inking, you get to board
a [color=0001]Splatfest Float [color=ffff]in Splatsville square![page break]Head to the [color=0001]Splatfest Pledge Box [color=ffff]to climb
aboard. And be sure to get some selfies!

EventFlowMsg/LobbyVersus_FestMikoshi333.001:
Thanks to your fast inking, you get to board
a [color=0001]Splatfest Float [color=ffff]in Splatsville square![page break]Head to the [color=0001]Splatfest Pledge Box [color=ffff]to climb
aboard. And be sure to get some selfies!

EventFlowMsg/LobbyVersus_FirstEnter.FirstEnter_00:
Welcome to the [color=0001]lobby[color=ffff]! It's your portal to online
battles...and where you stash all your gear.
EventFlowMsg/LobbyVersus_FirstEnter.FirstEnter_01:
As you splat forth in online battles, you'll
[color=0001]level up[color=ffff] and [color=0001]earn cash[color=ffff], to boot.[page break]Why level up and get cash? So you can access
and afford the [color=0001]freshest gear[color=ffff] in Splatsville![page break]And some [color=0001]battle modes[color=ffff] are restricted to players
at a higher level too. So get that level up!
EventFlowMsg/LobbyVersus_FirstEnter.FirstEnter_03:
First things first. Why don't you check out the
[color=0001]battle pot[color=ffff] over there and select [color=0001]Regular Battle[color=ffff].[page break]That'll get you into a [color=0001]Turf War [color=ffff]battle. Your team
will have three minutes to ink the most turf!
EventFlowMsg/LobbyVersus_FirstEnter.FirstEnter_03_Fest:
Well, this is exciting. There's a [color=0001]Splatfest [color=ffff]going
on right now![page break]You can head right over to the [color=0001]battle pot [color=ffff]and
select [color=0001]Splatfest Battle [size=75%](Open)[size=100%] [color=ffff]if you want to join.[page break]That'll launch you into a [color=0001]Turf War[color=ffff], where your
team has three minutes to ink the most turf!
EventFlowMsg/LobbyVersus_FirstEnter.FirstEnter_04: Eh, less chat, more splat. Let's get started!
EventFlowMsg/LobbyVersus_FirstEnter.FirstEnter_FestVote_00:
Ooo, there's a [color=0001]Splatfest [color=ffff]going on right now![page break]That means you'll need to [color=0001]pick a side[color=ffff] before
you can join in the fun.[page break]Just pop outside and check out the
[color=0001]Splatfest Pledge Box [color=ffff]to make your choice!
EventFlowMsg/LobbyVersus_FirstEnter.Msg_Legal00:
Nintendo's Community Guidelines apply to
online play and can be found on our website.
Please be considerate to your fellow players.

When you play online, your nickname
and player data may be made public.

EventFlowMsg/LobbyVersus_FirstLocker.FirstLocker_00:
Welcome to the [color=0001]locker room[color=ffff]![page break]Here you can customize your [color=0001]personal locker[color=ffff]
with cool stickers, fun decorations, and more.[page break]And you can check out other lockers for
inspiration! See an idea you like? Nab it![page break]Find one that's extra nice? Give the owner
a virtual fist bump by tapping "Fresh!"
EventFlowMsg/LobbyVersus_FirstLocker.FirstLocker_01:
Ah, that one's yours.[page break]Harmony from Hotlantis came by earlier to put
a few things in there for you too. Take a look!
EventFlowMsg/LobbyVersus_FirstLocker.Legal00:
When you edit your locker, its contents will be sent
to the server and may be viewed publicly by your
friends and other users. Lockers with inappropriate
content may be banned from public viewing.

EventFlowMsg/LobbyVersus_IntroduceNamePl.NamePlate_00:
Ooo, looks like you got something you can
use to spiff up your [color=0001]Splashtag[color=ffff]!
EventFlowMsg/LobbyVersus_IntroduceNamePl.NamePlate_01:
Remember—you can change up your Splashtag
anytime at the lobby terminal.[page break]You can change the background [color=0001]banner[color=ffff],
add [color=0001]badges[color=ffff], and show off a fun [color=0001]title[color=ffff].

EventFlowMsg/LobbyVersus_IntroduceWeapon.WeaponShop_00:
Hey, you leveled up! Congrats![page break]Didja know you can use the [group=0003 type=001c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0001]Sheldon License[color=ffff]
you got on shiny new [color=0001]weapons[color=ffff]? Well, you can![page break]Head outside and check out [color=0001]Ammo Knights[color=ffff].
Happy shopping!

EventFlowMsg/LobbyVersus_IntrouceShop.Shop_00:
Pardon the interruption, but we're picking up
a pretty fresh vibe from you lately...[page break]Did you know that there are a few [color=0001]shops [color=ffff]around
here with [color=0001]gear [color=ffff]that can help you out?[page break]I'm talking [color=0001]clothes[color=ffff], [color=0001]shoes[color=ffff], [color=0001]headgear[color=ffff], and
even new [color=0001]weapons[color=ffff]. And a [color=0001]general store[color=ffff] too![page break]Check 'em out...and tell 'em this disembodied
voice sent ya!

EventFlowMsg/LobbyVersus_UnlockBankaraMa.UnlockBankaraMatch_00:
Whoa, you've made quite a splash already.
I bet you're ready for [color=0001]Anarchy Battles[color=ffff]![page break]Anarchy Battles are the next level—you put
[color=0001]Rank Points [color=ffff]on the line before you engage.[page break]And you can also try some new modes, like
[color=0001]Splat Zones [color=ffff]and [color=0001]Tower Control[color=ffff]. Check 'em out!
EventFlowMsg/LobbyVersus_UnlockBankaraMa.UnlockBankaraMatch_01:
Press [group=0003 type=0006 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] when you're in the battle pot to
[color=0001]brush up on the rules[color=ffff] before you get started!
EventFlowMsg/LobbyVersus_UnlockBankaraMa.UnlockBankaraMatch_02:
Oh, by the way...there are two types of
Anarchy Battles: [color=0001]Open [color=ffff]and [color=0001]Series[color=ffff].[page break]If you only have a little time or you want to
join friends in battle, choose [color=0001]Open[color=ffff].[page break]It's just a single battle, so you're in and
out in no time.[page break]On the other hand, if you want to play solo and
commit to a longer session, give [color=0001]Series [color=ffff]a try![page break]It's a best-of-five challenge with serious upside
AND serious risk when it comes to your rank.
EventFlowMsg/LobbyVersus_UnlockBankaraMa.UnlockBankaraMatch_03:
Of course, Regular Battles are always a good
choice. You can keep earning experience there!
EventFlowMsg/LobbyVersus_UnlockBankaraMa.UnlockBankaraMatch_04:
And if you're looking for something different,
why not check out a [color=0001]Challenge[color=ffff]?[page break]Each Challenge may have [color=0001]special rules or
restrictions[color=ffff], or be a [color=0001]tourney qualifier[color=ffff].[page break]There isn't always a Challenge running, so check
Stages in the main menu to see if one's open.
EventFlowMsg/LobbyVersus_UnlockBankaraMa.UnlockBankaraMatch_99:
That's enough from me—time to get out there
and splat! May your ink never run dry.

EventFlowMsg/LobbyVersus_UnlockXMatch.XMatchOpen_00: Hey, you're X-tremely good at this...
EventFlowMsg/LobbyVersus_UnlockXMatch.XMatchOpen_01:
But did you know your rank can get even higher?
From Ｓ+[size=75%]０[size=100%] to Ｓ+[size=75%]５０[size=100%]! Don't stop now!
EventFlowMsg/LobbyVersus_UnlockXMatch.XMatchOpen_03:
Instead of Rank Points, you'll gain or lose
[color=0001]X Power[color=ffff] when you face off in an X Battle.
EventFlowMsg/LobbyVersus_UnlockXMatch.XMatchOpen_04:
Win enough X Power, and you could find yourself
on the X Rankings leaderboard on [color=0001]SplatNet 3[color=ffff]!
EventFlowMsg/LobbyVersus_UnlockXMatch.XMatchOpen_05:
The X Rankings leaderboard will [color=0001]reset every
season[color=ffff]. So you always have a chance!
EventFlowMsg/LobbyVersus_UnlockXMatch.XMatchOpen_07: Alright, that's enough X-planation. Go get 'em!

EventFlowMsg/LobbyVersus_XRankingReward.XRankingReward_00: Special announcement for an X Battle boss...
EventFlowMsg/LobbyVersus_XRankingReward.XRankingReward_01:
The latest X Rankings are out...and you
ranked up! Congratulations!
EventFlowMsg/LobbyVersus_XRankingReward.XRankingReward_02:
Check out the full rankings in [color=0001]SplatNet 3[color=ffff], and
keep splatting in style!

EventFlowMsg/Mission_AfterBreakKebaInkTu.Comment_00:
Look at that—it gobbled up the ooze like it was nothin'.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
That little monster has quite an appetite!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AfterBreakKebaInkTu.Comment_01: Anyway, it cleared the path for you. Go on!

EventFlowMsg/Mission_AfterClearBossStage.C4_S01_01:
Whew! That was some great work, Agent 3.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
And you got this...thing! But not Gramps.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AfterClearBossStage.C4_S01_02:
It's treasure. Or at least, I think that's what it is.
We can keep it here for now.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AfterClearBossStage.C4_S01_03: [group=0004 type=0005 params=]...copy! Do you copy? Over![page break]Anyone listenin'? Do you read me?! Over!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AfterClearBossStage.C4_S01_05: Gramps, where are you right now?
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AfterClearBossStage.C4_S01_07:
Yep, we're A-OK![group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] WAIT. We should be asking if
you're OK! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Are you OK, Gramps?
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AfterClearBossStage.C4_S01_08:
Oh, sure.[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] I mean, I'm locked in some kinda dark
room, which I guess ain't exactly ideal...[page break]I'll see if I can break out. Over!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AfterClearBossStage.C4_S01_09:
Don't do anything too rash! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]We're tracking your signal
right now and on our way. Call us if anything happens!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AfterClearBossStage.C4_S01_10:
Whew... I'm so glad he's OK. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]C'mon, let's take a
look at the new readings from his signal!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AfterClearBossStage.C4_S01_11:
Agent 3, if you want to go back to a previous kettle,
just open the menu. It might be useful at some point...

EventFlowMsg/Mission_AfterClearBossStage.C4_S02_00:
Good work, Agent 3.[page break]I mean, we didn't find Gramps, but we found another
"treasure." That's something!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AfterClearBossStage.C4_S02_01: [group=0004 type=0006 params=]Ksss-ksssh![group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00][group=0004 type=0006 params=] Kssssssht![page break]...Do you read me? Come in!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AfterClearBossStage.C4_S02_02: Gramps is on the line! Hellooo, Gramps!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AfterClearBossStage.C4_S02_03:
Oh, Agent 1! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Good to hear your voice.[page break]I'm, uh...still locked in some kinda room. Finding the
exit is like lookin' for a needlefish in a coral reef![page break]OH![group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] I mean, [size=75%]oh... I better shout whisper. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]SOMEONE'S COMING![size=100%]
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AfterClearBossStage.C4_S02_04:
Ah. You've woken from your hibernation,
have you? CUTTLEFISH!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AfterClearBossStage.C4_S02_05:
Hmph! That's, uh...former CAP'N Cuttlefish to...
whoever you are![page break]...Who ARE you, anyhow? Identify yourself!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AfterClearBossStage.C4_S02_06:
Grrrahahaha! You're lively for an old bag of...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] Does
your species have bones? [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]No matter![page break]You can call me...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00][color=0001]Mr. Grizz[color=ffff].
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AfterClearBossStage.C4_S02_07:
...izz? [group=0001 type=0000 params=0a 00 00 00][group=0004 type=0006 params=]Ksss-ksssh! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0a 00 00 00]...know any Grizz...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0a 00 00 00][group=0004 type=0006 params=] Ksss-ksssh![group=0001 type=0000 params=0a 00 00 00]
...mister or otherwise!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AfterClearBossStage.C4_S02_09:
Nooo! It was getting so good![group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] Gramps?
Are you still there?[page break]Argh! I think we lost him. But we'll find him for real
if we keep tracking the signal.[page break]That's all you, Agent 3. Let's go!

EventFlowMsg/Mission_AfterClearBossStage.C4_S03_01:
The Captain says you crushed it, Agent 3![page break]And they also had some CHOICE things to say about
Deep Cut. Wouldn't want to be them right now!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AfterClearBossStage.C4_S03_02: [group=0004 type=0006 params=]Ksssh! ...ead me?[page break]Come in! Do you copy?!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AfterClearBossStage.C4_S03_03:
Gramps! We read you! Not, uh...exactly loud and
clear, but we read you! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]What's up?
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AfterClearBossStage.C4_S03_04: Are you OK? [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]What's happening where you are?
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AfterClearBossStage.C4_S03_05:
Hah! Finally got this dadblasted thing workin' again.
OK, so...here's my report.[page break]I'm bein' held captive by someone or something callin'
themselves Mr. Grizz. I heard THAT loud and clear.[page break]As for where I am? Beats me. But my left knee is
achin' somethin' fierce, which means I'm at altitude.
Somewhere high up!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AfterClearBossStage.C4_S03_06:
Well, that's a pretty good hint. There's only one
place that fits the bill, right?
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AfterClearBossStage.C4_S03_07:
Well, well. Your injured knee may have betrayed this
location, but don't expect any workers' comp![page break]Thank you for this, by the way. I won't underestimate
the legendary leader of the Squidbeak Splatoon again.[page break]I'll just go ahead and deal with you now...before
you become an actual inconvenience.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AfterClearBossStage.C4_S03_08:
Wait a min— HEY! What's that? Whaddaya think
you're doin'?[page break]Gyaaah!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AfterClearBossStage.C4_S03_09: ...Huh. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]That didn't sound great for Gramps...
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AfterClearBossStage.C4_S03_10: Gramps! We're coming for you! Stay strong!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AfterClearBossStage.C4_S03_11:
Just as soon as we figure out how to get to
wherever you are...
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AfterClearBossStage.C4_S03_12:
Do you think some of this stuff we collected
might come in handy?[page break]Agent 3, why don't you go take a closer look at it?
It might just be our ticket into that rocket.

EventFlowMsg/Mission_AfterLastBoss.Comment_01:
But it's time to clock out. In a few moments, Earth will
be ruled by mammals once again.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AfterLastBoss.Comment_02: GYAH HA HA! Not if I crash your big finish!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AfterLastBoss.Comment_03: You're not dropping this beat on OUR turf!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AfterLastBoss.Comment_04: We'll hype you up from here, Agent 3!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AfterLastBoss.Comment_06: Repping the Splatlands, we are DEEP CUT!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AfterLastBoss.Comment_16: Look! Marine-life energy is flowing up there!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AfterLastBoss.Comment_19: It is as it was foretold. Behold! HUGEFRY!

EventFlowMsg/Mission_AppearBossA.001: You're pretty tough. I can tell!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AppearBossA.002:
How 'bout this.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] You call it quits, join my crew,
and we split the treasure!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AppearBossA.003: Bah. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]You wanna resolve this Splatlands-style, huh?
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AppearBossA.004: Fine by me! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]DANCE BATTLE TO THE DEATH!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AppearBossA.005: Eels, get your wriggly butts out here!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AppearBossA.102:
I got a li'l problem, see?[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] When I get beat,
I just can't let it go!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AppearBossA.103: Ohhh, that's right. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Almost forgot.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AppearBossA.104: You and me?[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] We've got deadly dance moves.

EventFlowMsg/Mission_AppearBossB.001: After the treasure?[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] You have excellent taste.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AppearBossB.002:
But you're too delicate to claim this particular item.[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]
Don't you agree?
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AppearBossB.003: Ah, I see. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]The cold-shoulder routine.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AppearBossB.004: Guess you're pretty wicked after all.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AppearBossB.005: We'll have to teach you some manners.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AppearBossB.101: You're back, which can only mean...you missed me!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AppearBossB.102:
How sweet of you, coming all this way just to
give me a win.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AppearBossB.104: You grow more wicked with every battle...
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AppearBossB.105: And that's supposed to be MY thing.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AppearBossB.107: Pedal to the megalodon! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]AGAIN!

EventFlowMsg/Mission_AppearBossC.000: Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Hold it right there!)
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AppearBossC.001: Aaay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](This treasure isn't yours! You can't have it!)
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AppearBossC.002: Aaay... [group=0004 type=0005 params=](I wouldn't fight you if I didn't have to, but...)
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AppearBossC.003: AAAY! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](THIS IS FOR SPLATSVILLE!)
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AppearBossC.101: Aaay? [group=0004 type=0005 params=](You want to fight me? Again? Really?)
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AppearBossC.102: Aaay...[group=0004 type=0005 params=] (Still not a big fan of fighting, but...)
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AppearBossC.103: Aaay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](The other two will yell at me if I run away!)

EventFlowMsg/Mission_AppearSmallWorldBos.Comment_00: Incoming! Something's headed this way FAST!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AppearSmallWorldBos.Comment_01: GYAH HA HA![group=0001 type=0000 params=3c 00 00 00] I finally found you,[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] Cuttlefish!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AppearSmallWorldBos.Comment_02: My Octarian troops have gone missing...
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AppearSmallWorldBos.Comment_03: and I know you're behind it!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AppearSmallWorldBos.Comment_05: Up to your old tricks, eh?[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] Give the Great Zapfish back!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AppearSmallWorldBos.Comment_06:
Agent 3! This dirty DJ is the headliner of the entire
Octarian army! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Take him out!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AppearSmallWorldBos.Comment_07: Quit spewin' nonsense and listen up!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AppearSmallWorldBos.Comment_08: I'm about to drop my latest hit...
EventFlowMsg/Mission_AppearSmallWorldBos.Comment_09: right on your smug little FACE!

EventFlowMsg/Mission_BeforeBreakKebaInkT.Comment_00:
Oh, right. I plumb forgot about all this [color=0001]Fuzzy Ooze[color=ffff].[page break]And that blasted [group=0003 type=0016 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0001]Fuzzball [color=ffff]is just wobblin' back and
forth, taunting us...
EventFlowMsg/Mission_BeforeBreakKebaInkT.Comment_01:
Is that your Smallfry buddy chirpin' about something?[page break]You know...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]that species is rumored to have a BIG
reaction to [group=0003 type=0017 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0001]Power Eggs[color=ffff]...[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] Why don'tcha toss a
few of 'em to the little scamp?
EventFlowMsg/Mission_BeforeBreakKebaInkT.Comment_02:
Anything's worth a shot, right? Try pressing the
Right Stick ([group=0003 type=0008 params=cd cc 4c 3f 00 00 00 00]) to power up your little buddy!

EventFlowMsg/Mission_BigWorldFirstAfterC.000_01: I'm so glad you're OK! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]I mean...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]I knew you would be.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_BigWorldFirstAfterC.001:
Nicely done.[page break]We saw it all. The daring. The bravery. The inkredible
skills. Who knew Smallfry could do all that![group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] A-and you
were there too!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_BigWorldFirstAfterC.002:
Yeah! Agent 3 basically saved the planet.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
Does anyone other than us even realize that?
EventFlowMsg/Mission_BigWorldFirstAfterC.003:
Bein' a hero, well...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]it's a real trip. A voyage, if you will.[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]
Some kinda...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]tour...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]where you go places...
EventFlowMsg/Mission_BigWorldFirstAfterC.004:
Uh...well said, Gramps. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Oh, the Captain was full
of praise for you too. There was a heartfelt
nod of approval.

EventFlowMsg/Mission_BigWorldStageFirst.001:
[group=0004 type=0005 params=]《... [group=0001 type=0000 params=05 00 00 00]...[group=0001 type=0000 params=05 00 00 00] Activated!》[page break]《System check...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] OK.》[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
《Authentication...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] All systems nominal.》[page break]《Commencing biometric scan.》
EventFlowMsg/Mission_BigWorldStageFirst.002: 《Scan complete...[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] No matches found!》[page break]《Commencing registration sequence.》
EventFlowMsg/Mission_BigWorldStageFirst.004:
Good day. My name is [color=0001]O.R.C.A. [color=ffff]I am what you might
call a...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]navigation system...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]for Alterna citizens.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_BigWorldStageFirst.005: Whoa![group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] Where's that voice coming from?!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_BigWorldStageFirst.005_01:
Welcome to Alterna, citizen.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] Please enter your
identification to proceed.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_BigWorldStageFirst.006:
Ugh, it's like setting up a phone for the first time.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
I guess just follow the instructions, Agent 3.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_BigWorldStageFirst.007:
Processing... [group=0001 type=0000 params=05 00 00 00]Processing...[group=0001 type=0000 params=05 00 00 00] Processing...[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
♪DING!♪[page break]Your name has been accepted.[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] Thank you for
registering, [color=0001]Agent 3[color=ffff].
EventFlowMsg/Mission_BigWorldStageFirst.009:
My circuits are designed to measure your intellectual
and physical prowess as demonstrated by your ability
to complete missions throughout Alterna.[page break]In each mission, you must reach a goal mechanism or
complete an objective. Extraordinary citizens will
complete many missions and receive many [color=0001]Power Eggs[color=ffff]![page break]You can expect a substantial Power Egg payday in
particular for this first mission...[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] May your
enthusiasm result in success, citizen!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_BigWorldStageFirst.010:
Is all of that going to be on the test?
Because all I really heard was POWER EGGS.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_BigWorldStageFirst.011:
That seems like the important part. We'll need plenty
of those if we're going to find Gramps.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_BigWorldStageFirst.012:
One last thing. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]As you complete missions and become
an ever-more-exceptional citizen, you will naturally
gain increased access to the [color=0001]Alterna Log[color=ffff].[page break]Do not attempt to share the Alterna Log without
permission.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] Please handle the information with care.[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]
And please consider this a threat. Have a nice day!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_BigWorldStageFirst.015:
Alterna Log, huh... [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Well, something's been added to
your menu. I wanna peek...[page break]Ah, but I won't. I guess all we can do for now is collect
Power Eggs and work on removing that Fuzzy Ooze.[page break]I mean...all YOU can do, Agent 3.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_BigWorldStageFirst.016:
Equipment initializing...[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] Please select a [color=0001]weapon[color=ffff]
for this mission.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_BigWorldStageFirst.100:
The mission will begin as soon as you pass
through that gate.[page break]If [color=0001]Power Eggs[color=ffff] are required, you will be given an
opportunity to make your payment before entering.[page break]《Initialization complete!》
《Data harvesting and analysis...commencing.》[page break]Best of luck, Agent 3.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_BigWorldStageFirst.101: So that's it, then? [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Great![page break]C'mon, Agent 3. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Let's get moving!

EventFlowMsg/Mission_BigWorldTutorial.000:
We've never been here before either, but here's
the tour anyway...
EventFlowMsg/Mission_BigWorldTutorial.001:
We think this place is called [color=0001]Alterna[color=ffff]. Who knew it
was beneath the Crater this whole time?!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_BigWorldTutorial.002:
We count six different islands so far. What should
we call them? [color=0001]Sites [color=ffff]or something?
EventFlowMsg/Mission_BigWorldTutorial.003:
Uh, are you even gonna mention the HUMONGOUS
rocket over there?! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Look at that!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_BigWorldTutorial.004:
Way to steal my thunder. Anyway...we put a tracking
device on Gramps, as one does. But now we're getting
a [color=0001]strong signal[color=ffff] from three different areas!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_BigWorldTutorial.005:
Agent 3! Your mission is to [color=0001]check all 3 of
those places out[color=ffff]!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_BigWorldTutorial.006:
We upgraded your map a little bit. Tell us how much
you love it!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_BigWorldTutorial.007:
Now it tracks the [color=0001]places you've already visited [color=ffff]and
lights up when you're near anything interesting.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_BigWorldTutorial.008: Like when I'm nearby?[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] Or...buried treasure, I guess.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_BigWorldTutorial.009:
We're here to look for Gramps. Not treasure. And I
hardly think Agent 3 needs a Callie tracker. Anyway...
EventFlowMsg/Mission_BigWorldTutorial.010:
Wait! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Agent 3 is totally out of Power Eggs. Did you lose
them all in the fall?[page break]YIKES![group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] Your Hero Suit is all messed up too!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_BigWorldTutorial.011:
Oh, don't be dramatic. I mean, sure, Agent 3 will have
to collect Power Eggs...and upgrade from scratch...[page break]Hmmm. I guess an explanation would help.[page break]First, they'll need [color=0001][group=0003 type=001f params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00]Sardinium [color=ffff]to [color=0001]unlock[color=ffff] access
to different types of upgrades...[page break]Then they can spend [color=0001]Upgrade Points[color=ffff] to do the
actual upgrading!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_BigWorldTutorial.012:
There's gotta be some [color=0001][group=0003 type=001f params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00]Sardinium [color=ffff]down here in
Alterna, right?[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] If anyone can find it, it's Agent 3!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_BigWorldTutorial.013:
Wait... Did you tell Agent 3 how to actually GET
[group=0003 type=0020 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0001]Upgrade Points[color=ffff]? [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]No? [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]I'm on it![page break]Agent 3, just [color=0001]ink lots of stuff [color=ffff]and [color=0001]find items[color=ffff]! I guess
it isn't rocket science. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Which is a shame, because it
seems like we might NEED some rocket science...
EventFlowMsg/Mission_BigWorldTutorial.014:
Never mind that for now! I'm getting a strong Gramps-
like signal from the next site over. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Go check it out!

EventFlowMsg/Mission_DefeatBossA.000: Grrr![group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] You're WAY stronger than you look...
EventFlowMsg/Mission_DefeatBossA.001: But you haven't heard the last of Deep Cut!

EventFlowMsg/Mission_DefeatBossB.001: Owww... I think that's enough of a lesson for today...
EventFlowMsg/Mission_DefeatBossB.003: But you haven't seen the last of Deep Cut.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_DefeatBossB.004: Until next time.[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] Huh? OH N—

EventFlowMsg/Mission_DefeatBossC.001: AAAY! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Well, that was a flop.)
EventFlowMsg/Mission_DefeatBossC.002: Aaay... [group=0004 type=0005 params=](I really tried too!)

EventFlowMsg/Mission_DefeatLastBoss.Comment_00: It seems all of my work...has been for nothing.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_DefeatLastBoss.Comment_01:
The times have changed. The world can never be as
it was. Moving forward...is the future.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_DefeatLastBoss.Comment_02: I suppose this is it, then.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_DefeatLastBoss.Comment_03: You will not receive severance paaa[size=75%]aaay...[size=100%]

EventFlowMsg/Mission_DestroyLaunchPadKeb.Comment_02: It's smoother than my skin now. No fair!

EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstArea02.000: Hm. This second site has a lot going on, doesn't it?
EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstArea02.002: I'm getting a strong reading from waaay up there!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstArea02.003: Could be Gramps. Let's go check it out!

EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstArea03.000: Watch out! It's all slippery over there!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstArea03.001:
Between the fake snow and lack of Gramps's signal,
it seems like NOTHING is chilling here.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstArea03.002:
Well...we should investigate just in case. We'll follow
your lead, Agent 3. Watch your step!

EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstArea04.000: Ew. This place is kind of a mess. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]But WAIT!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstArea04.001:
Something on that high ground over there is blasting
out a SUPER-strong signal!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstArea04.002: That must be Gramps![group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] Let's get going, Agent 3!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstArea04.100: Ew. This place is kind of a mess. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]But WAIT!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstArea04.101:
Something on that high ground over there is blasting
out a SUPER-strong signal!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstArea04.102: That must be Gramps![group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] Let's get going, Agent 3!

EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstArea05.000: Phew! You've made it pretty far, huh?
EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstArea05.001: Looks like you can get to another site from there.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstArea05.002: Aha! There's even a pipe on the other side!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstArea05.003: Still no sign of Gramps though...
EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstArea05.004: Well, let's see what we can find here. Good luck!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstArea05.100: Phew! You've made it pretty far, huh?
EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstArea05.101: Looks like you can get to another site from there.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstArea05.102: That pipe must be the way back.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstArea05.103: Hm... Still no response from Gramps. Figures.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstArea05.104: Well, let's see what we can find here. Good luck!

EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstArea06.000: Huh! I see lots of sea, but...there's hardly any land!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstArea06.001: I wonder how long it's been like this...[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] Oh, hey!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstArea06.002:
I'm getting a whooole buncha readings from the top of
that weird building over there.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstArea06.003: That's gotta be Gramps! C'mon, Agent 3. Let's go!

EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstKebaInk.000:
OK, now that is one big pile of [color=0001]Fuzzy Ooze[color=ffff].[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
That big ol' bubble on top is probably the [group=0003 type=0016 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0001]Fuzzball[color=ffff].
EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstKebaInk.001:
I bet if you could POP that, the whole thing would
BOOF! Disappear! But I doubt your ink'll do the trick.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstKebaInk.002:
Eh...let's worry about that later. For now, keep
lookin' for a way into the Octarians' base!

EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstLaunchPad.000:
You and Smallfry did great, but...it must be a
relief to have your gear back!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstLaunchPad.001: Don't you think we should get a move on?
EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstLaunchPad.002:
Look for another way in, Agent 3. There's got
to be one around here...

EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstLaunchPadEnter.001: You simply can't go on? You sprained a tentacle?
EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstLaunchPadEnter.002: Well, we won't let you down. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]We'll go on without you!

EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstRocketStage01.000: Whoa! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]They took everything! All of your Hero Gear!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstRocketStage01.001:
Oof. I mean, we didn't exactly surprise them, did we?
We just charged right in.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstRocketStage01.002:
If I were setting a trap for you, I'd be doing the
"yay, the trap worked" dance right now.[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] I may
do it anyway... It's a fun dance!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstRocketStage01.003:
Ay! Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](I see your gear! You should be able to get
it back if you make it through this.)
EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstRocketStage01.004:
What do you think, Agent 3? You have your Smallfry.
Are you good to give it a try?
EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstRocketStage01.005:
Would YOU be going in there fresh out of ink?
Who am I kidding? Of course you would!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstRocketStage01.100: Ooo, you got your gear back!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstRocketStage01.101:
Careful, Agent 3. We've already seen a few traps—
there could be more.

EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstStageClear.Comment_00:
Well done, Agent 3! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]You remind me of a young
Cuttlefish...heroically saving the day...[page break]Anyway, the good news is you got a [color=0001]Zapfish[color=ffff]!
They're a source of energy on their own.[page break]But the better news is that the [color=0001]Great Zapfish[color=ffff]
may be up ahead...

EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstTakolien.000: Gah! [color=0001]Octotrooper[color=ffff] ahead! It's a real live enemy!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_FirstTakolien.001: Get ready to splat it with [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00], Agent 3!

EventFlowMsg/Mission_FourthStageClear.000: You're on a roll! Nicely done, Agent 3.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_FourthStageClear.001:
That oughta be the last kettle, but...[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]do you see
anything else that looks fishy around here?

EventFlowMsg/Mission_IntroduceComrade.Comment_01: Whew![group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] I'm so glad you're alright.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_IntroduceComrade.Comment_02:
You...are Agent 3, right? Gramps fully enlisted you
and your Smallfry?
EventFlowMsg/Mission_IntroduceComrade.Comment_03:
Yeah, I knew it. I see the look in your eyes that
he's always looking for.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_IntroduceComrade.Comment_04:
Well, it's nice to meet you! I guess we should
introduce ourselves...
EventFlowMsg/Mission_IntroduceComrade.Comment_05: I'm [color=0001]Agent 1[color=ffff] of the New Squidbeak Splatoon!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_IntroduceComrade.Comment_07:
C'mon, Agent 2. Get PUMPED! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Anyway, one last crew
member to introduce... This is our captain!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_IntroduceComrade.Comment_08: We're...[group=0001 type=0000 params=14 00 00 00][group=0001 type=0001 params=00 00 80 3e]the NEW New [group=0001 type=0000 params=19 00 00 00][group=0001 type=0001 params=cd cc 8c 3f]Squidbeak Splatoon![group=0001 type=0000 params=19 00 00 00]
EventFlowMsg/Mission_IntroduceComrade.Comment_10:
...Anyway, it looks like you and Gramps got separated
in that fall.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_IntroduceComrade.Comment_11:
This place is huge, and it's filled with that horrible
Fuzzy Ooze stuff.[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] And now we have to find Gramps
before he, like, tastes it or something.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_IntroduceComrade.Comment_12: [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Aw, you make it sound like it's not gonna be fun!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_IntroduceComrade.Comment_13: ...But seriously, please help us look for Gramps.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_IntroduceComrade.Comment_14: So, uh...[page break][group=0004 type=0005 params=]...[group=0001 type=0000 params=05 00 00 00] ...[page break]...[group=0001 type=0000 params=05 00 00 00] ...[group=0001 type=0000 params=05 00 00 00] ...
EventFlowMsg/Mission_IntroduceComrade.Comment_15:
Oh, they're in. Probably just too excited about
looking for someone else's grandpa to speak.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_IntroduceComrade.Comment_16: So Gramps reeled in a new Agent 3...[group=0001 type=0000 params=3c 00 00 00] Glad to have you!

EventFlowMsg/Mission_IntroduceTrinity.Comment_01: Who are you supposed to be?
EventFlowMsg/Mission_IntroduceTrinity.Comment_02: We're not SUPPOSED to be anything.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_IntroduceTrinity.Comment_03: But I'll tell you who we ARE.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_IntroduceTrinity.Comment_04: Say it with sizzle...[color=0001][group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] [color=ffff]I'm [color=0001]Frye[color=ffff]!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_IntroduceTrinity.Comment_05: You think you're cool? Sharks call ME cold-blooded.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_IntroduceTrinity.Comment_07: Ay![group=0004 type=0005 params=] (Make money! Get fish quick!)
EventFlowMsg/Mission_IntroduceTrinity.Comment_08: Ay![group=0004 type=0005 params=] ([color=0001]Big Man [color=ffff]in the house!)
EventFlowMsg/Mission_IntroduceTrinity.Comment_14: Whatever. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]What do you want, anyway?
EventFlowMsg/Mission_IntroduceTrinity.Comment_15:
Wait...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] Did you say Deep Cut?[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] The Deep Cut from
that Anarchy Splatcast thing?
EventFlowMsg/Mission_IntroduceTrinity.Comment_16:
Yeah, it's called a day job. You should look into it.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
Banditing is our REAL passion. Nothing can stop us!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_IntroduceTrinity.Comment_17:
Hate to interrupt, Frye...but have you looked around?
We've hit the jackpot! Who knew this was here?
EventFlowMsg/Mission_IntroduceTrinity.Comment_18:
All this time...treasure was just sitting here under
the Crater. Now it's ours for the taking.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_IntroduceTrinity.Comment_20: So...are you gonna try and stop us or what?
EventFlowMsg/Mission_IntroduceTrinity.Comment_21:
Because you totally can't! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]We're taking all
of it for ourselves. Hahahah!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_IntroduceTrinity.Comment_22:
Wow, it's like they rehearsed this whole thing...
They are total pros.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_IntroduceTrinity.Comment_23:
Awww, they don't seem scared. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]What do you have to do
to scare someone these days?!
