EventFlowMsg/Mission_IntroduceTrinity.Comment_24: Ay![group=0004 type=0005 params=] (...I got a little bit scared.)
EventFlowMsg/Mission_IntroduceTrinity.Comment_25: Not that anyone asked, but I'm OVER this conversation.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_IntroduceTrinity.Comment_26:
The treasure is ours. I'd wish you luck, but...[group=0001 type=0000 params=28 00 00 00]
I don't want to.

EventFlowMsg/Mission_LastBoss02Failed.000: No! NO! We didn't make it...
EventFlowMsg/Mission_LastBoss02Failed.002: Aaay... [group=0004 type=0005 params=](We were too late...)
EventFlowMsg/Mission_LastBoss02Failed.003: [group=0001 type=0001 params=9a 99 99 3e][group=0001 type=0000 params=3c 00 00 00]On that day...[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]a massive Fuzzball was born in space.

EventFlowMsg/Mission_LastBoss02First.000: WHOA![group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] Smallfry and Mr. Grizz got HUGE-IFIED!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_LastBoss02First.002:
"The bear is filled with Fuzzy Ooze! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0a 00 00 00]Eliminate the
Fuzzballs to help Hugefry!"
EventFlowMsg/Mission_LastBoss02First.003: Er, just quoting the Captain down here.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_LastBoss02First.004:
He's trying to deliver the Fuzzy Ooze himself!
You've got to stop him!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_LastBoss02First.005: You ooze, you lose. Go back to Ursa WHINER!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_LastBoss02First.007: GYAH HA HA![group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] Pilot hatch unlocked!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_LastBoss02First.008: [group=0003 type=0016 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0001]Fuzzballs[color=ffff]...meet my [color=0001]Ink Vac[color=ffff]! Hop in, Agent 3!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_LastBoss02First.009:
You heard him![group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] Steer the Octobot King and vacuum
those Fuzzballs up!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_LastBoss02First.010:
We only have [color=0001]3 minutes and 33 seconds[color=ffff] before he
slams into the Earth![group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] Hurry!

EventFlowMsg/Mission_LaunchPadStage02Sta.000: Warning: this is a restricted area. Entry is prohibited.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_LaunchPadStage02Sta.001:
All routes closed while launch sequence initiates.[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]
Have a nice day!

EventFlowMsg/Mission_LaunchPadStage03Sta.000: Can...can we turn on a light or something?
EventFlowMsg/Mission_LaunchPadStage03Sta.001: We'll have to rely on other senses. Like sharks do.

EventFlowMsg/Mission_LaunchPadStage04Sta.001: Looks like we've got more climbing to do.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_LaunchPadStage04Sta.002:
Ay, ay![group=0004 type=0005 params=] (We'll be rooting for you! Safely...from the
ground far, far below...)

EventFlowMsg/Mission_LotteryDroneDepartu.000: WOOO! Go, little Shel-drone! Do your thing!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_LotteryDroneDepartu.001:
You can pick up whatever it finds at the [color=0001]lobby terminal[color=ffff].[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
Maybe tomorrowish? I'd give it a little time.

EventFlowMsg/Mission_LotteryDroneFirst.000:
Oh, that? That's the [color=0001]Shel-drone[color=ffff]. I bet you can
guess who designed it...
EventFlowMsg/Mission_LotteryDroneFirst.001:
...Sheldon, right? [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Anyway, he said that thing can help
find hidden items, even here in Alterna. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Well, he said
a LOT more than that, but you get the gist.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_LotteryDroneFirst.002:
One of the important things he said is that you need
[group=0003 type=0017 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0001]Power Eggs [color=ffff]to operate it. So if you have extras,
maybe give it a try!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_LotteryDroneFirst.003:
Yep! And it supposedly takes anything it finds
directly back to the lobby, so check out the
[color=0001]lobby terminal [color=ffff]to pick them up.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_LotteryDroneFirst.004:
Once you pick up the item, the Shel-drone will return
here automatically. Fly free, little Shel-drone!

EventFlowMsg/Mission_Phase1StartBossA.001: You ready to fEEL the pain?

EventFlowMsg/Mission_Phase1StartBossB.002: I need you to REALLY focus this time, OK?

EventFlowMsg/Mission_Phase1StartBossC.001: Aaay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](But I won't lose!)
EventFlowMsg/Mission_Phase1StartBossC.002: AAAY![group=0004 type=0005 params=] (I've been training TOO HARD to lose!)

EventFlowMsg/Mission_Phase1StartLastBoss.000: You're not clocking out that easily.

EventFlowMsg/Mission_Phase1StartSmallWor.000: Think my beats suck, eh? Then you'll love THIS!

EventFlowMsg/Mission_Phase2StartBossA.000:
Hey! You think you can treat my eels like shrimp?
WRONG! NUH-UH!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_Phase2StartBossA.001: All you did was wake us up.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_Phase2StartBossA.002: I'm firing it up...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] MORAY POWER! Good luuuck!

EventFlowMsg/Mission_Phase2StartBossB.002: Master, you had better get serious...or else!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_Phase2StartBossB.004: Time to show you our REAL power!

EventFlowMsg/Mission_Phase2StartBossC.000: Aaay...[group=0004 type=0005 params=] (You've got moves, it's true...)
EventFlowMsg/Mission_Phase2StartBossC.001: Aaay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](But I've got...uh...MORE MOVES!)
EventFlowMsg/Mission_Phase2StartBossC.002: AAAY! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](No more kid gloves. It's Big Man time!)

EventFlowMsg/Mission_Phase2StartLastBoss.000: Ah, a setback. But this is a GROWTH INDUSTRY!

EventFlowMsg/Mission_Phase2StartSmallWor.000: GRAAARGH! NOW you've made me MAD!

EventFlowMsg/Mission_PrevLastBoss.Comment_05:
Phew! Somebody got the drop on me! Anybody else
feelin' a bit parched?
EventFlowMsg/Mission_PrevLastBoss.Comment_06: Also feelin’ a bit lighter. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]And waaay flatter.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_PrevLastBoss.Comment_09: Hey, wait! We're still in danger!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_PrevLastBoss.Comment_11: But we'll never catch that rocket. It's impossible.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_PrevLastBoss.Comment_14: Sounds like you folks need some help...
EventFlowMsg/Mission_PrevLastBoss.Comment_15: ...and Deep Cut is here to steal the spotlight!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_PrevLastBoss.Comment_21: The fate of the world is in your hands!

EventFlowMsg/Mission_PrevLastBoss01.Comment_02: Well, well. Such dedication to your work.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_PrevLastBoss01.Comment_03: I think you've earned yourself a break.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_PrevLastBoss01.Comment_04: Now come here...SO I CAN BREAK YOU.

EventFlowMsg/Mission_ReadyForLastBossSta.Comment_00: Graaamps! We're here to save you!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_ReadyForLastBossSta.Comment_06:
Hey, you overgrown furball![group=0001 type=0000 params=3c 00 00 00] Turn Gramps back
into...[group=0001 type=0000 params=2d 00 00 00]Gramps!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_ReadyForLastBossSta.Comment_07:
Valued employees...we appreciate your feedback.
However, it will not be implemented at this time.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_ReadyForLastBossSta.Comment_09: It means the end of your employment.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_ReadyForLastBossSta.Comment_10: ...And the end of the world as you know it, to be clear.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_ReadyForLastBossSta.Comment_11:
As per my memo, I will be coating the planet in
Fuzzy Ooze in an effort to restore balance.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_ReadyForLastBossSta.Comment_12: Don't call it "Hairmageddon." HR doesn't like it.

EventFlowMsg/Mission_RocketStage05.000:
Launch preparations nearing completion.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
Please exercise care near closing bulkheads.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_RocketStage05.001: Rude! It shut us out![group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] Guess that way's a no-go...
EventFlowMsg/Mission_RocketStage05.003: Hold on...look at those floating [color=0001]energy cores[color=ffff]!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_RocketStage05.004: Ay! Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](And that's a [color=0001]switch[color=ffff]. Look at me—I'm helping!)
EventFlowMsg/Mission_RocketStage05.005:
OK, hear me out. We get the [color=0001]energy cores[color=ffff], we flip the
[color=0001]switch[color=ffff], and then...SOMETHING! Right?
EventFlowMsg/Mission_RocketStage05.006: Won't know unless we try! Let's steal 'em!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_RocketStage05.100:
Emergency systems activated.[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] Releasing bulkhead
number one.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_RocketStage05.101: Aaay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Now we're getting somewhere!)
EventFlowMsg/Mission_RocketStage05.102:
There's still another bulkhead and more energy cores.[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]
Get after 'em, Agent 3!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_RocketStage05.200:
Emergency systems activated.[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] Releasing bulkhead
number two.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_RocketStage05.202:
I think that's the way out.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] I bet it opens the same
way as the bulkheads.

EventFlowMsg/Mission_SecondLaunchPad.000:
OK, I know we've had a few false Gramps signals.
But I'm pretty sure he's on that launchpad.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_SecondLaunchPad.001:
Oh. And how in the world are we supposed to get
over there?!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_SecondLaunchPad.002:
I don't know for sure, but if we can get into this
[color=0001]building on the right[color=ffff], maybe we'll find an answer.

EventFlowMsg/Mission_SecondStageClear.000:
Nicely done, Agent 3.[page break]But did those Octarians look different?[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] They used
to be a little more...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]smooth...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]if memory serves.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_SecondStageClear.001:
Hey, I ain't one to judge a deadly tentacle creature
by its cover. More power to 'em. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Uh...but not really.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_SecondStageClear.002:
Anyhow, as long as you're sportin' that Hero Suit,
you can stand up to any Octarian, [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]bearded or not!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_SecondStageClear.003:
Didja even read the label? [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Here, I'll do it for ya...[page break]"You're wearing the latest in apocalyptic survival
fashion! Avoid enemies and navigate the Splatlands in
style with your own [color=0001]high-end sensor[color=ffff]! Dry clean only."
EventFlowMsg/Mission_SecondStageClear.004:
You gotta learn everything about your gear![group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] That's
another battle-tested rule of the battlefield!

EventFlowMsg/Mission_SmallWorldBossDefea.Comment_00: [group=0001 type=0001 params=33 33 33 3f]Every [group=0001 type=0000 params=05 00 00 00]time... [group=0001 type=0000 params=05 00 00 00]So[group=0001 type=0000 params=05 00 00 00] sad...
EventFlowMsg/Mission_SmallWorldBossDefea.Comment_01: Guh... [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]No fair! Your gear is way too strong!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_SmallWorldBossDefea.Comment_02:
You put on a weak show, Octavio! Your set list is
gettin' old...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]or maybe it's just you!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_SmallWorldBossDefea.Comment_03:
Seriously, that was too easy. It's like you weren't even
usin' the Great Zapfish's power...
EventFlowMsg/Mission_SmallWorldBossDefea.Comment_04: Mute it, fool! I didn't steal the Zapfish this time!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_SmallWorldBossDefea.Comment_06: But if it wasn't you, then...[group=0001 type=0000 params=46 00 00 00]who was it?!

EventFlowMsg/Mission_SmallWorldFirst.Comment_00: [group=0001 type=0001 params=00 00 00 3f]Th-th-[group=0001 type=0000 params=2a 00 00 00]the Oc-[group=0001 type=0000 params=23 00 00 00]Oc-Oct...
EventFlowMsg/Mission_SmallWorldFirst.Comment_03:
Oh, uh, hi... Did we do this once before?
The ol' noggin ain't what it used to be.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_SmallWorldFirst.Comment_04:
Anyhow, the name's [color=0001]Cuttlefish[color=ffff]. [color=0001]Senior advisor[color=ffff] to
the New Squidbeak Splatoon, at your service!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_SmallWorldFirst.Comment_05:
That look in your eye...[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] It's the look I've
been lookin' for!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_SmallWorldFirst.Comment_06:
The [color=0001]Great Zapfish[color=ffff] that powers [color=0001]Splatsville[color=ffff] has
been squidnapped!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_SmallWorldFirst.Comment_07:
It's the Octarians again. You can bet your
bottom sand dollar on it!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_SmallWorldFirst.Comment_08:
See, the [color=0001]Great Zapfish[color=ffff] has gone missing before.
Twice, in fact! And those Octojerks were behind
it both times.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_SmallWorldFirst.Comment_09:
I've been keepin' an eye on 'em even though I'm
technically retired. And with eyes like these, there
ain't much that escapes me![page break]But they still made off with the [color=0001]Great Zapfish[color=ffff].
And now WE'VE got to get it back. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Right?
EventFlowMsg/Mission_SmallWorldFirst.Comment_10: So, uh...[page break][group=0004 type=0005 params=]...[group=0001 type=0000 params=05 00 00 00] ...[page break]...[group=0001 type=0000 params=05 00 00 00] ...[group=0001 type=0000 params=05 00 00 00] ...
EventFlowMsg/Mission_SmallWorldFirst.Comment_11:
...That was a job offer, kid. The pay is...[size=75%]zero[size=100%]...but you
might just save the world. You're in, right? RIGHT?!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_SmallWorldFirst.Comment_12:
Course you are![group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] Starting today, [group=0001 type=0001 params=00 00 a0 3f]you are [color=0001]Agent 3[color=ffff] of
the [color=0001]New Squidbeak Splatoon[color=ffff]!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_SmallWorldFirst.Comment_13:
This is your brand-new [color=0001]Hero Suit[color=ffff]! It'll help you
fight the Octarians.[page break]Huh. Is there such a thing as somethin' GROWING
in the wash? It's a little baggy on ya...[page break][group=0004 type=0005 params=][color=0000](Funny, I don't remember ever washin' it...[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] Bah!
That last Agent 3 was clean as a catfish!)[color=ffff]
EventFlowMsg/Mission_SmallWorldFirst.Comment_14:
Now, let's go get those Octoclowns!
[group=0001 type=0000 params=2d 00 00 00]I'm countin' on you, buck— OH!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_SmallWorldFirst.Comment_15:
You've already got another agent there with ya, huh?[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]
Well, I'm fresh outta Hero Suits, unfortunately...[page break]Ah, but it's a salty li'l scamp, ain't it? It'll do fine.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_SmallWorldFirst.Comment_16:
Now, where was I... [group=0001 type=0000 params=2d 00 00 00]Oh, right! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Let's go get those
Octojerks! I'm countin' on you, bucko!

EventFlowMsg/Mission_ThirdLaunchPad.000:
Well...we climbed, we un-climbed...and now we're here.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
I hope Gramps really is at the launchpad!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_ThirdLaunchPad.001: I'm still not sure how to get there...
EventFlowMsg/Mission_ThirdLaunchPad.002: Hey! I can see a [color=0001]pipe [color=ffff]that's connected to the rocket!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_ThirdLaunchPad.003:
Good eye, Frye. The [color=0001]pipe [color=ffff]is definitely big enough for
Agent 3 to fit through. What could go wrong?
EventFlowMsg/Mission_ThirdLaunchPad.004: Very brave to volunteer Agent 3 like that...

EventFlowMsg/Mission_ThirdStageClear.Comment_00:
Keep it up, Agent 3![group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] You're making me proud.[page break]Now, I don't wanna ruffle your tentacles any further
than they've already been aruffled, but...[page break]Those fuzzy Octarians are freakin' me out. I think
we oughta consider callin' some backup.[page break]Lemme just fire up the ol' communicator...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] Check,
check! This is Cuttlefish, over. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Do you copy?
EventFlowMsg/Mission_ThirdStageClear.Comment_02:
Wait—Gramps?[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] Is that you?[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] Where are you?[page break]Agent 1, this is Agent 2. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Gramps has wandered
off again. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Over.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_ThirdStageClear.Comment_03:
Well, what are we waiting for, Agent 2?[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]
Let's go collect him!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_ThirdStageClear.Comment_06: [group=0004 type=0005 params=]...[group=0001 type=0000 params=3c 00 00 00]Did they just hang up on me?![page break]Agents these days, am I right? So impatient...
EventFlowMsg/Mission_ThirdStageClear.Comment_07: [group=0004 type=0006 params=]Ksss-ksssh![group=0001 type=0000 params=2d 00 00 00][group=0004 type=0006 params=] Kssssssht!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_ThirdStageClear.Comment_08: GYA...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]A HA...[group=0001 type=0000 params=3c 00 00 00] Cuttl...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] I foun... you!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_ThirdStageClear.Comment_09: Dagnabbit, this ol' thing is busted. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Oh well.[page break]C'mon, let's go!

EventFlowMsg/Mission_TreasureMarge.Comment_00: Alright. Gramps has to be up there somewhere.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_TreasureMarge.Comment_01: But there's too much Fuzzy Ooze in the way.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_TreasureMarge.Comment_04:
I just know this would be useful somehow if
we could combine it all...
EventFlowMsg/Mission_TreasureMarge.Comment_05: You've always got the answer, Agent 2!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_TreasureMarge.Comment_06: It's totally worth a shot. Let's do it!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_TreasureMarge.Comment_09: Look out, fuzz. Here comes the Captain!

EventFlowMsg/Mission_TrinityBecomeFriend.Comment_01:
You didn't think we were going to just GIVE UP,
did you? Tell me you didn't!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_TrinityBecomeFriend.Comment_02: Giving up is for the weak. Do we look weak?
EventFlowMsg/Mission_TrinityBecomeFriend.Comment_03:
So! Last chance. If you don't want to tangle with
Deep Cut, put down the treasure and walk away.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_TrinityBecomeFriend.Comment_05: Oh, that thing? [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Yeah, we're done with it.[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] It's all yours.
EventFlowMsg/Mission_TrinityBecomeFriend.Comment_06:
You're done with it? [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Done...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]with treasure?[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]
What's wrong with you?
EventFlowMsg/Mission_TrinityBecomeFriend.Comment_07:
Plenty! But don't worry about that. If this pile of
junk makes you happy, you can have it!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_TrinityBecomeFriend.Comment_10:
You expect us to believe you're just going to give us
the treasure? After, [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]well, [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]everything?
EventFlowMsg/Mission_TrinityBecomeFriend.Comment_11: Wait...why am I fighting this? WOW, thanks!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_TrinityBecomeFriend.Comment_12:
I feel kind of...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]not good...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]about each of us fighting you
to the death. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Our bad. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]And you're just GIVING us this!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_TrinityBecomeFriend.Comment_13:
Seriously. Such a boss move.[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] Actually...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]why don't
YOU be our boss?
EventFlowMsg/Mission_TrinityBecomeFriend.Comment_14: Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](New boss! Can I get a raise?)
EventFlowMsg/Mission_TrinityBecomeFriend.Comment_16:
Looks like you have your own employees now.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
Have fun with that!
EventFlowMsg/Mission_TrinityBecomeFriend.Comment_17:
Oh... I'm going to have to approve their
time cards, aren't I?

EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.000:
Ay! Ayayay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Hot off the press! Big Man
here with super-big news!)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.002:
Ay![group=0004 type=0005 params=] (I'm OK—it's just that I have this
urgent announcement from Grizzco.)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.003:
Right, they're hiring. They're always hiring.
It's not really news. Lemme see the report...
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.005:
Wait—we're under attack? Is that what
that means? The Salmonids are coming?!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.006:
AAAY![group=0004 type=0005 params=] (A swarm of Salmonids is approaching
[color=0001]Wahoo World[color=ffff]! THIS IS NOT A DRILL!)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.007:
But why Wahoo World? Can Salmonids even
ride rides?
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.008:
Ay? Ay![group=0004 type=0005 params=] (Don't you see? First it's Wahoo
World, then it's the rest of the world!)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.009:
...We are still talking about Salmonids,
right? Maybe dial it back a tad.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.010:
But that's not to say we shouldn't give
them a warm Splatlandian welcome, hm?
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.011:
That means beat 'em up, right? Yeah!
Let's show the Salmonids who's boss.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.012:
Ay...[group=0004 type=0005 params=] (Well, if we'll be working for Grizzco,
then technically THEY'RE the boss, but...)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.013:
Ay![group=0004 type=0005 params=] (It sounds like they're offering some
kind of special reward for helping out!)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.014: Well, well. I'm not above a special reward.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.015:
Prepare yourselves, Deep Cut. Let's get to
Grizzco at the start of the Big Run!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.016:
Wooo! Let's go show those Salmonids who
really runs this city!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.017:
Ay! Ay?! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](A swarm of Salmonids is headed
for [color=0001]Inkblot Art Academy[color=ffff]! But why there?!)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.018:
Maybe they're, like, artsy Salmonids?
OOO! Or maybe they just want to learn!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.019:
Ay? [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Whoa! Will they take classes? Is Splat
History 101 gonna fill before I can sign up?)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.020: You haven't taken Splat History 101 yet?!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.021:
Never mind Splat History. I'm gonna show
those Salmonids a Splat Future. Let's go!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.022:
Yes. Let's expel those Salmonids like so
many delinquent children.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.023:
Ay... Ay?[group=0004 type=0005 params=] (We're probably going to need
some help with this... Anyone?)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.024:
Aaay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](The Salmonids are hitting [color=0001]Undertow
Spillway[color=ffff]! Are they after the Splatlands?!)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.025:
And here I thought their tastes weren't
refined enough to care.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.026:
An ambush from below? Really? Are they
too spineless to come meet us head-on?!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.027:
Ay... [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Like a direct assault would be any
less of a nightmare...)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.028:
Since it's not happening in the city itself,
I say we start showing how we bite back.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.029:
Yeah! Those punks are gonna be sorry they
ever washed up in Splatsville!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.030:
Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](WE'LL be sorry if they break through
the spillway. Let's stop those Salmonids!)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.031:
Aaay! Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Nooo! A swarm of Salmonids
is approaching [color=0001]Barnacle & Dime[color=ffff]!)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.032:
What's the big deal? Maybe they just
need fall coats.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.033:
I don't think they're shopping, Frye.
Everyone knows you wait for a sale.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.034:
Ay?! Ay... [group=0004 type=0005 params=](And do Salmonids even wear
coats?! It would be pretty cute, I guess...)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.035:
Well, coats or no coats, it's OUR mall and
we're gonna defend it!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.036:
That's the spirit! Let's show those window-
shopping Salmonids the door.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.037:
Ay... Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](We'll need more than one door to
evacuate that many Salmonids... But yes!)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.038:
Ay! Ay?! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](A Salmonid swarm is on its way
to [color=0001]Eeltail Alley[color=ffff]! Isn't that right by us?!)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.039: Are you sure you read that right?!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.040:
Eeltail Alley is in Splatsville! They must be
setting their sights on our home turf.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.041:
Ay! Ay? [group=0004 type=0005 params=](This is a problem! Can we do our
broadcasts from home?)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.042:
Why? They're about to dive headfirst into
a city of the toughest punks around!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.043:
They'll tell stories of the time they messed
up invading our neighborhood. Right, guys?
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.044:
Ay. Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](You're right—this isn't the time to
run. Let's all step up to defend Splatsville!)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.500: [group=0004 type=0005 params=]...Hello? Why is the camera still rolling?
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.501:
Ay? Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Technical issues? Try unplugging
it and then NOT plugging it back in.)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.502:
Ah! It's an emergency news report!
Please hold while we read it...
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.503:
Ay. Ay... [group=0004 type=0005 params=](It's from Grizzco. You never know
if that'll be good or bad news...)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.504: Uh, it's bad. There's a [color=0001]Big Run [color=ffff]incoming!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.506:
A swarm of Salmonids is swiftly approaching
[color=0001]Um'ami Ruins[color=ffff]!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.507:
Don't they know there's going to be a
Splatfest? What are they thinking?!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.508:
Ay... [group=0004 type=0005 params=](I don't think the Splatfest is
happening unless we clear this up...)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.509: Right. The Salmonids must be stopped.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.510:
Viewers—we're counting on you! Step up
and help Grizzco put an end to the Big Run.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.511:
Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Pro tip: pick a Splatfest team ASAP so
you can get conch shells while you're at it!)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.512:
They have to wait for the Splatfest Sneak
Peek, but yeah. Then it's game on!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunAnnounce.513:
Ay! Ay! Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Slam those Splatanids! I mean
splat those Salmonids! Stop the Big Run!)

EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld.000:
Oh! It looks like Wahoo World is temporarily
closed for the Big Run.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld.001:
No! I haven't been there in years, but I was
totally going to go this weekend! Probably.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld.002:
Well, [color=0001]Grizzco [color=ffff]is hiring if you want to help
clean up the Salmonid mess...
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld.003:
Ay![group=0004 type=0005 params=] (I could use a job! How many Salmonids
per hour? And can I keep them as pets?)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld.003_1:
The more Golden Eggs you get, the fancier
your reward, right?
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld.003_2:
Ay. Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](More or less. Even if you beat the
highest score, might as well keep going!)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld.003_3:
Ah, yes. The promise of a fancy gift is
quite motivating...
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld.006:
...Ay? Ay.[group=0004 type=0005 params=] (...And you want to help save the
city, right? Good for you.)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld.007:
There's a Big Run going on right now, so you
might want to avoid Inkblot Art Academy...
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld.008:
Yeah, school's in session, but not the way
you think. It's a good day to play hooky.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld.009:
I hear Undertow Spillway is off-limits for
the moment, thanks to the Big Run.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld.010:
We should make it off-limits to Salmonids
too! How'd no one else think of that?
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld.011:
Watch out for the Big Run at Um'ami Ruins!
As if the place wasn't crowded enough...
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld.012:
I bet those Salmonids are sneaking in
without paying admission!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld.013:
With the Big Run underway, some shops at
Barnacle & Dime are closed.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld.014:
Only SOME? You're telling me I could still go
shopping during the chaos of a Big Run?
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld.015:
I wouldn't take any shortcuts down Eeltail
Alley while the Big Run is happening.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld.016:
Though it is going to be the quickest way
to wipe the floor with some Salmonids!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld.500:
You know, [color=0001]Grizzco [color=ffff]is hiring if you want to
help clean up the Salmonid mess...
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld.501:
Ay? [group=0004 type=0005 params=](And they're offering a reward to
anyone who helps out, right?)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld.502:
Yeah, but don't do it just for that. Do it to
clear out Salmonids before the Splatfest!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld.503:
Ay! Ay? Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Yes! We want to show off
the Splatlands, don't we? Let's get to it!)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld.504:
Word to the wise—you're going to want to
pick a Splatfest team before diving in.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld.505: Gotta load up on those conch shells!

EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.000:
Have you seen Wahoo World since the Big
Run started? It's a bit fishy for my taste.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.001:
Ay. Ay![group=0004 type=0005 params=] (I'm hearing that Grizzco could use
all the help it can get. All hands on deck!)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.100:
Yeah! C'mon, we can't let those stinking
Salmonids take over our amusement park!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.101:
Ay![group=0004 type=0005 params=] (You're right. We've got to fight for our
right to go on dangerously outdated rides!)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.110:
Ay?![group=0004 type=0005 params=] (Why would they target Wahoo World
in the first place? Do they hate fun?!)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.111:
They're fish, Big Man. All they do is swim,
spawn, eat, repeat. Sounds nice, actually...
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.120:
I just hope the Wahoo World mascot is OK.
Fresh Fish, wiggle your tail if you're safe!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.121:
Oh, I'm sure Fresh Fish and the Salmonids
are getting along swimmingly.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.200:
Have you seen Inkblot Art Academy since
the Big Run? School is NOT in session!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.201:
Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](If you want to help restore order,
head to Grizzco and volunteer!)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.210:
I can't believe those Salmonids would deface
a school like that. So disrespectful!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.211:
Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](I'm pretty sure we've done worse...
literally every time we battle there.)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.220:
All those Salmonids swarming around
priceless art... The situation itself is art!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.221:
Ay. Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Maybe so, but I wouldn't stand
around admiring it. You'll get splatted!)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.230:
I'm still wondering how all those Salmonids
could afford the entrance fees...
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.231:
They're all part of a school, so I'm sure
they got the student discount.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.300:
Undertow Spillway is even more of a health
hazard than usual, what with the Big Run.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.301:
Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](If you want to pitch in, Grizzco is
looking for Salmonid fodder!)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.310:
Betcha the Salmonids are right at home
with all the running water down there.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.311:
Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](I guess, but there's better real estate
in the city than the sewers.)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.320:
You know, there's a sluice down there.
Why don't we simply open the floodgates?
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.321:
Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](It's busted, and the city won't fix it.
They consider it a "decorative" valve.)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.330:
Pah! Those slimy slobs are messing with an
important Splatlands revenue stream!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.331:
Yeah, it's weird how many tourists go down
there. Call themselves "drainspotters."
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.400:
It sounds like Um'ami Ruins is completely,
well, overrun by the Big Run right now.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.401:
Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Anyone willing to lend a tentacle
should head to Grizzco ASAP!)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.410:
Ay? Ay? [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Why are the Salmonids invading
the ruins though? What's the deal?)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.411:
The same reason I want to invade the
ruins—treasure!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.420:
Well, it sounds like the on-site researchers
have their hands full fighting them off...
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.421:
Ay! Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](I'm glad someone is protecting the
ruins! The site is historically notable!)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.430:
Do you think the Salmonids are actually
there for the history?
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.431: Well, we know YOU aren't, Frye!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.500:
Barnacle & Dime is out of control now, but
not in a fun way, like when there's a sale.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.501:
Ay! Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Ooo, you're talking about the Big
Run! Head to Grizzco if you want to help.)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.510:
I guess a shopping spree at Barnacle & Dime
with my little sisters is out of the question.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.511:
Ay! Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Not if we take it back from the
Salmonids! Let's gooo!)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.520:
Ay? [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Do you think the Salmonids want the
mall space to open their own store?)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.521:
What in the world would they sell?!
Certainly nothing I'm interested in buying.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.530:
Those scheming Salmonids better not buy
up all the best stuff before I get to it!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.531:
Thousands of customers storming the
gates... The shopkeeps might be OK with it.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.600:
I've been hearing a lot of commotion in
Eeltail Alley, thanks to the Big Run.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.601: Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](If you want to help, head to Grizzco!)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.610:
I had to splat like 50 Salmonids on my way
in here! Good luck, everyone!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.611:
Ay! Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](We'll all sink or swim together!
Splatlandians unite!)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.620:
Ay. Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](The people must've left in a hurry.
Their laundry's still hanging on the lines.)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.630:
You hear how the hooligans of Eeltail Alley
are all signing up at Grizzco?
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunBeingHeld_Short.631:
For real? Guess they got civic pride like
anyone else. Let's team up, just this once!

EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunEnd.000:
Ay! Ay![group=0004 type=0005 params=] (Special report! Fresh news,
never frozen!)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunEnd.002:
Ay.[group=0004 type=0005 params=] (I'm being told that the Salmonids that
invaded Wahoo World have been driven out.)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunEnd.004:
Not that I had any doubt. Another win for
us in the books. Well done, team!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunEnd.006:
So where's the thank-you gift? Are they
mailing it directly, or...
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunEnd.007:
Ay![group=0004 type=0005 params=] (Ah! It sounds like Grizzco is checking
the job logs. Hold on to your seahorses!)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunEnd.008:
Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](The Salmonids that invaded Inkblot
Art Academy have been sent back to sea!)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunEnd.009:
Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](The Salmonids that invaded Undertow
Spillway have been sent back to sea!)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunEnd.010:
Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](The Salmonids that invaded Um'ami
Ruins have been sent back to sea!)

EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunEnd2.000:
Ay! Ay... [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Hold the phone! I'm getting some
breaking news...)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunEnd2.002_1:
Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](The Salmonids that invaded
Barnacle & Dime have been expelled!)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunEnd2.002_2:
Ay![group=0004 type=0005 params=] (The Salmonids that descended on
Eeltail Alley have all been driven off!)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunEnd2.003: Oh? Does that mean the [color=0001]Big Run [color=ffff]is over?
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunEnd2.011:
Ay. Ay? [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Oh, there's also a message from
Grizzco. Shiver, would you mind?)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunEnd2.012:
Hmm, it just says, "Thank you for fulfilling
your mandatory duties."
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunEnd2.013:
"Please look forward to a small, corporate
token of thanks based on your high score."
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunEnd2.015:
Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Let's take a look at those high
scores so we can see who gets what.)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunEnd2.016:
Don't sweat the results too much—everyone
who helped gets SOMETHING, at least.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunEnd2.200:
Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](I'm also hearing that Barnacle & Dime
will be able to reopen right away.)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunEnd2.201:
Shoppers everywhere, rejoice! Thanks for
saving the mall from the Salmonids, y'all.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunEnd2.202:
You saved the city's best shopping center,
and you looked good doing it. Kudos.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunEnd2.203:
Well? What are we waiting for? Let's go
celebrate at Barnacle & Dime! FOOD COURT!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunEnd2.204:
Ay! Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Ooo! Let's go to the fancy place
we always talk about going to!)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunEnd2.205:
Feeling like a big spender, Big Man?
I suppose it's OK to splurge every so often.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunEnd2.207:
Yeah, don't even worry about it, Big Man.
Our fearless leader is treating anyway!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunEnd2.208: But... But... Oh, I suppose I deserve this.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunEnd2.210:
Ay![group=0004 type=0005 params=] (Things were looking dicey for a while
there, but Splatsville is safe again!)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunEnd2.211:
Way to take to the streets, Splatlandians!
That's how it's done!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunEnd2.212:
Yes, thank you, everyone. The residents of
Eeltail Alley are breathing easier, I'm sure.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunEnd2.213:
We showed those Salmonids that when we
roll up our sleeves, we can do ANYTHING!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunEnd2.214:
Ay... [group=0004 type=0005 params=](I just hope they take the hint and
don't show up somewhere else...)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunEnd2.215:
Speaking of rolling up our sleeves, there's
a mess in Eeltail Alley that needs cleaning.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunEnd2.216:
Uhhh, when I said we could do ANYTHING,
maybe I was being hasty...

EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.000:
Ay![group=0004 type=0005 params=] (Before we get to the current stages,
I have an announcement!)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.001: What is it? You're so excited!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.002:
Ay! Ay![group=0004 type=0005 params=] (I am, I am! Because the [color=0001]Big Run[color=ffff]
results are in!)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.004:
Really? Grizzco sent a letter? Why don't
you let me read it? Ahem...
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.005:
"Thank you for participating in an official
Grizzco Big Run™."
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.006:
"We appreciate your support and have
prepared a small token of gratitude."
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.007: What is it? What is it? EEEEEE!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.008:
Huh. Now there's a list of [color=0001]high scores[color=ffff]
along with the prize info...
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.014:
A-are those scores real? How are people
so good at this?!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.014_1:
Whoa. Looks like another round of
eye-wateringly high scores...
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.014_2:
Ay?! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Are people really THAT good
at this?!)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.014_3:
I still can't get over how good everyone
is at this!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.015:
Ay! Ay.[group=0004 type=0005 params=] (Practice makes perfect! I guess
they must practice...a LOT.)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.015_1:
The Salmonids came out of the water, so
what do you expect?
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.015_2:
I bet the Salmonids were as surprised
as you are.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.015_3: Aaay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Grizzco must be thrilled!)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.016:
Don't worry, you two. All participants will
get a gift, regardless of score.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.100:
Ay![group=0004 type=0005 params=] (Well, it was touch-and-go for a bit
there, but...we did it! We saved the city!)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.101:
That'll teach those Salmonids to mess with
the Splatlands! I mean...to NOT do that.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.102:
Well done, everyone. On behalf of all of us,
I want to thank you for your service.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.103:
So, now...do we get to ride the coaster or
nah? I want the wind in my tentacles!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.104:
Ay![group=0004 type=0005 params=] (Great idea, Frye! I want to be all
flapppppp-flappp-flappity-flap in the wind!)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.105:
Then it's settled. A trip to Wahoo World is
in the cards...as soon as it reopens.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.107:
Ay![group=0004 type=0005 params=] (Big thanks to everyone who fought off
the Salmonids at Inkblot Art Academy!)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.108:
Yes, it was truly a clinic in Salmonid
repulsion. Well done, everyone!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.109:
Yeah, we schooled 'em! Taught 'em
a lesson! Made 'em think!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.110:
Speaking of art...this reminds me that I've
been neglecting my own projects lately.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.111:
Ay! Ay? [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Oh yeah! You used to be quite a
painter. Didn't you win a contest?)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.112:
That's right! It was that abstract painting
of the Great Zapfish. SO creepy and cool!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.113:
Great Zapfish? Um, the subject of that
painting was my art teacher...
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.114:
Great job, everyone! The Salmonids
never stood a chance.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.115:
Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](And we saved Undertow Spillway! So it
can keep...spilling? Is that what it does?)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.116:
Yeah, it spills money for the Splatlands.
We definitely want it to keep spilling!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.117:
Wait...I just realized that Salmonids could
probably invade ANY waterway!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.118:
Ay. Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](And Splatsville is known for its
waterways. They always creep me out!)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.119:
EEE! Could the famous "Creepy Sewer
Voice" of the Splatlands be Salmonids?!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.120:
Ay? Aaay?! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Creepy Sewer Voice of the
Splatlands? Why does that exist?!)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.121:
Ay! Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](What an epic battle! That will
definitely go down in history.)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.122:
Way to rep the Splatlands, everyone!
We showed those Salmonids what's UP.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.123:
And best of all, the historic site at Um'ami
Ruins is undamaged. Tourism can resume!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.124:
Hey, on the next Anarchy Splatcast...let's
do a deep dive into Um'ami Ruins lore!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.125:
♪ Ay? ♪  [group=0004 type=0005 params=](♪ What are the secrets of
the ruuuinsss? ♪)
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.126:
Sounds like we've got a theme song, but...
we might have to learn some actual history.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.127:
Oh, in that case, let's focus on Splatsville
street food instead. I'm hungry!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.500:
Anyway, the other good news is that we're
all clear for the next Splatfest.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.501:
Bravo, everyone! My path to leadership of
Deep Cut is now wide open.
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.502:
Although, technically, anyone could win.
I wish you both luck!
EventFlowMsg/News_BigRunResult.503: Ay... [group=0004 type=0005 params=](I just hope the fans support us...)

EventFlowMsg/News_Coop.001:
Important update for job seekers—we've
been informed that Grizzco is hiring.
EventFlowMsg/News_Coop.002:
If you've always wanted to show those
Salmonids who's boss, now's your chance!
EventFlowMsg/News_Coop.003:
If you know anyone who's looking for a
teacher, send 'em to me! I know everything!
EventFlowMsg/News_Coop.004:
Ay... [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Or they could—and I'm just spitballing
here—read the employee handbook...)
EventFlowMsg/News_Coop.005:
Teamwork is harder than it looks, especially
if your teammate is prone to dancing spells.
EventFlowMsg/News_Coop.006:
Ay? AAAY?! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Who could you be talking
about? And why wasn't I invited?!)
EventFlowMsg/News_Coop.007: Frye, what's your go-to stress reliever?
EventFlowMsg/News_Coop.008:
Scrappin' with a whole bunch of Salmonids!
Works every time!
EventFlowMsg/News_Coop.009:
I often contribute the most meaningfully
by observing the battle from afar...
EventFlowMsg/News_Coop.010:
Ay?! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](While the rest of us are risking our
necks?! Oh, right... I don't have a neck.)
EventFlowMsg/News_Coop.011:
Clock running out... She fires one at the
egg basket... NAILS IT! GAME OVER!
EventFlowMsg/News_Coop.012:
Ay? [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Been working on your Egg Throws,
have you?)
EventFlowMsg/News_Coop.101:
Frye always has her eyes on the prize—and
NOT the smaller Salmonids swarming her!
EventFlowMsg/News_Coop.102:
So what? It's all about bagging the big
boss. I got no time for little mosquitos!
EventFlowMsg/News_Coop.103:
Until they sting you a thousand times and
you call for my help, right?
EventFlowMsg/News_Coop.104:
Ay?! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Huh? You mean I could've been eating
mosquitoes this WHOLE TIME?!)
EventFlowMsg/News_Coop.105:
Is it just me, or do the Salmonids kinda just
leave Big Man alone?
EventFlowMsg/News_Coop.106:
Aaay? [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Do you think they're scared
because I look so strong?)
EventFlowMsg/News_Coop.107:
Um. Sure. Oh! Or maybe they think YOU'RE
a Salmonid! Because you kinda look like one.
EventFlowMsg/News_Coop.109:
Hm... Can anyone tell me what a million
times a million is?
EventFlowMsg/News_Coop.110:
Ay?! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](A million?! Are you adding up Grizzco
Points? You don't have a million!)
EventFlowMsg/News_Coop.111:
Wouldn't you like to know! Anyway, what's
the answer? A gazillion? A quadbillion?
EventFlowMsg/News_Coop.112: I'm just gonna let her have this...

EventFlowMsg/News_Ending.Comment_02: Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Let's get outta here!)

EventFlowMsg/News_FestAnnounce.000: Ay! Ay![group=0004 type=0005 params=] (Breaking news, you two!)
EventFlowMsg/News_FestAnnounce.001: Oh? What's got your fins aflapping?
EventFlowMsg/News_FestAnnounce.002: Shiver! You oughta know. It's that time!
EventFlowMsg/News_FestAnnounce.003:
AAAY! Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](SPLATFEEEEEEST! Ahem.
It's time for a [color=0001]Splatfest[color=ffff].)
EventFlowMsg/News_FestAnnounce.006: What's the theme? What's the theme?
EventFlowMsg/News_FestAnnounce.007:
Ay...[group=0004 type=0005 params=] (Hold your seahorses... The info's
still downloading...)
EventFlowMsg/News_FestAnnounce.008:
I've got it! The theme is... Huh. Well,
THAT is fascinating...
EventFlowMsg/News_FestAnnounce.009:
Ugh, hurry up and spill it! You're hogging
the Splatfest vibes!
EventFlowMsg/News_FestAnnounce.010:
Chill. I'm getting ready to announce it.
Ahem...
EventFlowMsg/News_FestAnnounce.012:
Without further ado, this Splatfest theme
will be none other than...

EventFlowMsg/News_FestAnnounceEnd.000:
And that's all for now. Make sure to get
your votes in!
EventFlowMsg/News_FestAnnounceEnd.001:
Ay! Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Don't forget your Splatfest Tee!
Check the Equip menu after you vote.)

EventFlowMsg/News_FestBeingHeld.000:
The Splatfest Main Event is underway, so
let's see the [color=0001]Splatfest Sneak Peek [color=ffff]results!
EventFlowMsg/News_FestBeingHeld.001: Which team won? I gotta know!
EventFlowMsg/News_FestBeingHeld.002:
Now, which team got the most [color=0001]conch shells[color=ffff]
during the Splatfest Sneak Peek?
EventFlowMsg/News_FestBeingHeld.007:
Great work on the Splatfest Sneak Peek,
everyone. But the real deal starts now!

EventFlowMsg/News_FestBreaking.000:
News flash! Team [group=0004 type=0004 params=00 00 00 00 01 cd]
just won a 10x Battle!
EventFlowMsg/News_FestBreaking.001:
That's a nice little momentum boost.
Good luck in the next one!
EventFlowMsg/News_FestBreaking.002:
News flash! Team [group=0004 type=0004 params=00 00 00 00 01 cd]
just won a 100x Battle!
EventFlowMsg/News_FestBreaking.003:
I saw every single splat in this one, and you
all are making me proud. Great work!
EventFlowMsg/News_FestBreaking.004:
News flash! Team [group=0004 type=0004 params=00 00 00 00 01 cd]
just won a 333x Battle!
EventFlowMsg/News_FestBreaking.005:
I couldn't have done any better myself.
What a team effort!
EventFlowMsg/News_FestBreaking.006:
Check it—Team [group=0004 type=0004 params=00 00 00 00 02 cd]
just won a 10x Battle!
EventFlowMsg/News_FestBreaking.007:
That's my team! Way to keep the pressure
on, fam.
EventFlowMsg/News_FestBreaking.008:
Check it—Team [group=0004 type=0004 params=00 00 00 00 02 cd]
just won a 100x Battle!
EventFlowMsg/News_FestBreaking.009:
A HUNDRED X. That's big-time! I knew
my team was the best!
EventFlowMsg/News_FestBreaking.010:
Check it—Team [group=0004 type=0004 params=00 00 00 00 02 cd]
just won a 333x Battle!
EventFlowMsg/News_FestBreaking.011: Daaang! You all are ON FIRE!
EventFlowMsg/News_FestBreaking.012:
Ay! (Breaking! Team [group=0004 type=0004 params=00 00 00 00 03 cd]
won a 10x Battle!)
EventFlowMsg/News_FestBreaking.014:
Ay! (Breaking! Team [group=0004 type=0004 params=00 00 00 00 03 cd]
won a 100x Battle!)
EventFlowMsg/News_FestBreaking.015:
Ay. Ay! (And you looked cool doing it.
You're all my heroes!)
EventFlowMsg/News_FestBreaking.016:
Ay! (Breaking! Team [group=0004 type=0004 params=00 00 00 00 03 cd]

EventFlowMsg/News_FestBreaking.017:
Ay! Ay? (Wow! How did I get so lucky to
have a team like you?)

Without further ado, the members of the
fabulous winning team are...

EventFlowMsg/News_FestEnd.000: That's it for the Splatfest. Splatfest over!
EventFlowMsg/News_FestEnd.003:
Ay! Ay... [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Hold on! The totals are still
coming in...)

EventFlowMsg/News_FestIntermediate.000:
Great splatting so far, everyone. Let's
check out the [color=0001]Halftime Report[color=ffff].
EventFlowMsg/News_FestIntermediate.001: Go, SHIVER! Hit us with the results!
EventFlowMsg/News_FestIntermediate.002:
It's the moment of truth...but still anyone's
game. The team currently in first is...
EventFlowMsg/News_FestIntermediate.100: AY?! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](How are we not in first?!)
EventFlowMsg/News_FestIntermediate.101:
Aw. I'd feel bad...but I don't want to.
Team Shiver is ready to win!
EventFlowMsg/News_FestIntermediate.102:
Not so fast! Team Frye, get ready to make
a big push. The [color=0001]Tricolor Battle [color=ffff]is up next!
EventFlowMsg/News_FestIntermediate.103:
Ay! Ay? [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Don't give up, Team Big Man! It's
not over yet![group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] Is that motivating?)
EventFlowMsg/News_FestIntermediate.110: How are THEY in first place right now?
EventFlowMsg/News_FestIntermediate.111:
It's simple. WE'RE ON FIRE! Keep it up,
squad. Follow my lead!
EventFlowMsg/News_FestIntermediate.112:
Aaay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Hey, while they're arguing, let's
steal the win. [color=0001]Tricolor Battle[color=ffff] unlocked!)
EventFlowMsg/News_FestIntermediate.113:
I see you, Big Man. Team Shiver, no more
floundering. Show some teeth!
EventFlowMsg/News_FestIntermediate.120:
I can't believe we're not WINNING this
thing yet!
EventFlowMsg/News_FestIntermediate.121:
AAAY! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Great work, team! Stay focused,
stay positive, and show 'em who's boss!)
EventFlowMsg/News_FestIntermediate.122:
Oh, it's far from over. Are you even ready
for the [color=0001]Tricolor Battle[color=ffff]?!
EventFlowMsg/News_FestIntermediate.123:
Team Frye is ready! Not that we answer
to you... Hmph!

EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.000: Check out the current Splatfest stages!
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.002:
Ooo, I love nighttime stages! They make me
wanna siiing! And dance. And fight!
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.003:
Ay. Ay![group=0004 type=0005 params=] (Sounds like a hit single to me.
Quickly! Write that all down!)
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.004:
Pace yourself, everyone. You want to splat
the hardest at the end of the Splatfest!
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.005:
Doesn't change my plans! Which are to
sing my heart out and battle all night long!
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.006:
It's so calm here at night. Such a different
vibe than the daytime...
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.007:
Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](And the air is really good for my skin.
I'm moisturized and ready for anything!)
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.BigSlope_00_0000:
Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Supposedly anyone can soak for free
at Brinewater Springs during Splatfests!)
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.BigSlope_00_0001:
Too bad the jellyfish community booked all
the local inns already. They're pool hogs!
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.Carousel_00_0000:
Ay! Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Ooo! The ferris wheel at Wahoo
World is all lit up for the Splatfest!)
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.Carousel_00_0001: YES! That makes me so hyped!
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.Cross_00_0000:
Mmm...the giant ramen bowl they have at
Robo ROM-en looks so...inviting.
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.Cross_00_0001:
Ay? Ay?! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](You...you wouldn't SWIM in the
ramen, would you? Would you?!)
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.District_00_0000:
Ugh. I wish all the shops at Eeltail Alley
were open at night.
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.District_00_0001: Uh...I wish they were open, like, ever!
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.Factory_00_0000:
The only time you get to battle at night
in Um'ami Ruins is during a Splatfest.
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.Factory_00_0001:
Ay! Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Oh, right! Because they usually
have those night tours!)
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.Hiagari_00_0000:
Mahi-Mahi Resort is so chill at night.
The pool is all glassy and calm...
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.Hiagari_00_0001:
Uh...you're not thinking about trying to
swim, are you?
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.Jyoheki_00_0000:
Ay... [group=0004 type=0005 params=](We should try not to disturb the
people who live at Flounder Heights...)
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.Jyoheki_00_0001:
During a Splatfest?! C'mon, we can just
hand out earplugs or something.
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.Kaisou_00_0000:
Is it cold on Hammerhead Bridge at night,
or is it just me?
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.Kaisou_00_0001:
I'm always ROASTING there, so it's
definitely you.
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.Line_00_0000:
Why is MakoMart always so busy at night?
Who's out shopping in their PJs?!
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.Line_00_0001:
You don't ever decide that you need nachos
and orange juice at 3 AM? Must be nice.
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.Nagasaki_00_0000:
I thought I saw the Crab-N-Go lady hanging
around at Sturgeon Shipyard one time...
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.Nagasaki_00_0001:
Ay? Ay... [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Are you sure? Because I saw the
Recon Guide there once...)
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.Pillar_00_0000:
Arrr! I always feel like a pirate on the
Manta Maria at night.
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.Pillar_00_0001: Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](I mean, you kinda ARE a pirate!)
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.Pivot_00_0000:
I find Museum d'Alfonsino creepy at night.
Like the paintings are watching me!
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.Pivot_00_0001:
Ay?! Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Why did you have to say that?!
New fear unlocked!)
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.Propeller_00_0000:
Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Splatsville really sparkles when seen
from an airplane window!)
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.Propeller_00_0001:
Trust that I get no kickbacks from saying
that night flights here are an experience.
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.Ruins_00_0000:
Bluefin Depot is quite beautiful at night.
The lights from the boats twinkling away...
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.Ruins_00_0001:
The more I look at them, the more I feel like
stealing a boat... OK, OK! I mean buying one.
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.Scrap_00_0000:
They don't EVER stop work at Mincemeat
Metalworks. Even at night! Do they?
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.Scrap_00_0001:
Ay! Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Nope! The metal's not going to
mince itself!)
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.Section_00_0000:
Battle got you hungry? Barnacle & Dime
has you covered with great food options!
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.Section_00_0001:
Why are you being so weird, Shiver?
...Oh, right. They're one of our sponsors.
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.Spider_00_0000:
Ahhh...there's nothing like a nighttime
cityscape viewed from up high...
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.Spider_00_0001:
Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Sure, sure... Just try to ink some turf
when you take a break from sightseeing!)
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.Temple_00_0000:
There's something mystical about the way
the moonlight shines on Undertow Spillway...
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.Temple_00_0001:
Ay! Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Yeah! Who would have thought
that a sewer could look so good!)
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.Twist_00_0000:
On a clear, cold night aboard a Shipshape
Cargo Co. vessel, they say you can see...
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.Twist_00_0001:
Ay! Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Your breath! It's freezing
out there!)
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.Upland_00_0000:
Ooo! I know a great ghost story set at
Inkblot Art Academy at night. Wanna hear?
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.Wave_00_0000:
Don't run the opposite way of the arrows at
Humpback Pump Track at night...
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.Wave_00_0001:
Why? What's the worst that could happen?
I didn't know you were superstitious!
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.Yagara_00_0000:
Hagglefish Market at night is really
something to behold.
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.Yagara_00_0001:
I know! All the cute lights...even the ones
on the distant ships... It's TOO charming.
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.Yunohana_00_0000:
Ay. Ay... [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Scorch Gorge is so pretty at
night. All the twinkling stars...)
EventFlowMsg/News_FestMatchVersusStage.Yunohana_00_0001:
You're gonna get splatted if you keep
staring at the stars, Big Man!

EventFlowMsg/News_FestResult.000: Ay! Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Breaking news! Hot off the press!)
EventFlowMsg/News_FestResult.001: Hm? What's got you all flustered?
EventFlowMsg/News_FestResult.002: AY! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](It's the [color=0001]Splatfest [color=ffff]results. Get hype!)
EventFlowMsg/News_FestResult.003: Don't need to tell me twice. YEAHHH!
EventFlowMsg/News_FestResult.006:
First up, Splatfest Sneak Peek results!
The team with the most [color=0001]conch shells [color=ffff]was...
EventFlowMsg/News_FestResult.008:
Next up...which team got the [color=0001]most votes[color=ffff]!
Get on the bandwagon for...
EventFlowMsg/News_FestResult.011: Ay? Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](What's next? Tell meee!)
EventFlowMsg/News_FestResult.012:
Time for a [color=0001]Clout [color=ffff]check! Open, Pro, and
Tricolor Clout results incoming!
EventFlowMsg/News_FestResult.013:
All at once?! Hold up—I need a moment
to cool off before all this excitement...
EventFlowMsg/News_FestResult.016:
And last but not least...the part you've
been waiting for...
EventFlowMsg/News_FestResult.018:
Listen up! It's going down... The overall
Splatfest win goes to...
EventFlowMsg/News_FestResult.019: Ay! Ay... [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Ack! I can't take the suspense...)

EventFlowMsg/News_FirstBoot.000: Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Breaking news! Hot off the press!)
EventFlowMsg/News_FirstBoot.001:
Oh, you got something, Big Man?
Let's hear it!
EventFlowMsg/News_FirstBoot.002:
Uh, this was MY story to break.
The Great Zapfish is gone!
EventFlowMsg/News_FirstBoot.003:
It basically powers the whole city! We need
it back soon, or it's lights out...
EventFlowMsg/News_FirstBoot.004:
Time to conserve. Turn off lights, and set
the temp to a cool 90 degrees Fahrenheit.
EventFlowMsg/News_FirstBoot.005:
Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](That's 32 degrees Celsius, and it is
NOT cool! Call us if you find the Zapfish!)

EventFlowMsg/News_FirstBootSdodr.000:
That last song was a request from the
redoubtable SplatsvilleRulz, titled...
EventFlowMsg/News_FirstBootSdodr.001:
Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](#47 onward, by Dedf1sh feat. Off
the Hook!)
EventFlowMsg/News_FirstBootSdodr.002:
Hold up—artists from Inkopolis?! I thought
we repped Splatsville! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0a 00 00 00]AN[group=0001 type=0000 params=0a 00 00 00]AR[group=0001 type=0000 params=0a 00 00 00]CHY!
EventFlowMsg/News_FirstBootSdodr.003:
You say that, Frye, but I've heard you gush
over their talent before.
EventFlowMsg/News_FirstBootSdodr.004:
Speaking of Off the Hook, word is they're
back in Inkopolis Square after the big tour.
EventFlowMsg/News_FirstBootSdodr.005:
Ay! Ay? [group=0004 type=0005 params=](That's right! Did you see they
announced a new song after the tour?)
EventFlowMsg/News_FirstBootSdodr.006:
Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](I caught an interview with Pearl where
she said, "We're not done fighting yet!")
EventFlowMsg/News_FirstBootSdodr.007:
Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](I don't know what that means, but
it SOUNDS cool!)
EventFlowMsg/News_FirstBootSdodr.008:
Uh, isn't their world tour over? Maybe they
still have a score to settle with someone.
EventFlowMsg/News_FirstBootSdodr.009:
Hm? Apparently that's not all the news
we have for you today.
EventFlowMsg/News_FirstBootSdodr.011:
Turf War is making a comeback at Inkopolis
Square. The hype is real, it seems.
EventFlowMsg/News_FirstBootSdodr.012:
Another Inkopolis story?! Don't we have
any REAL news?
EventFlowMsg/News_FirstBootSdodr.013:
Wasn't Inkopolis Square filled with spaced-
out slouches, last we heard?
EventFlowMsg/News_FirstBootSdodr.014:
Ay... [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Seems like most folks snapped out of
it, but some people still aren't all there...)
EventFlowMsg/News_FirstBootSdodr.015:
C'mon, everyone zones out sometimes.
You've been a li'l spacey yourself, Big Man!
EventFlowMsg/News_FirstBootSdodr.016:
Ay?! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Didn't I have to ask someone to pass
the soy sauce three times yesterday?!)
EventFlowMsg/News_FirstBootSdodr.017:
What of it? It's not like we're involved in
whatever's happening at Inkopolis Square.
EventFlowMsg/News_FirstBootSdodr.018: Yup. Nothing to do with us, that's for sure!

EventFlowMsg/News_IntroFsodr.000:
OK, I've got some good news and some bad
news. Which do you want to hear first?
EventFlowMsg/News_IntroFsodr.001:
Good news! Then I can pretend I didn't
hear the bad news afterward.
EventFlowMsg/News_IntroFsodr.002:
Alright! Well, if you can believe it, they're
finally done rebuilding the [color=0001]train station[color=ffff]!
EventFlowMsg/News_IntroFsodr.003: Ay? Ay?! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Seriously? It's actually done?!)
EventFlowMsg/News_IntroFsodr.004:
Wow! That took forever, but it's gonna be
totally worth the wait.
EventFlowMsg/News_IntroFsodr.005:
Ay! Ay![group=0004 type=0005 params=] (Yeah! Now we can get to Inkopolis
and back in a flash!)
EventFlowMsg/News_IntroFsodr.006: Ay? [group=0004 type=0005 params=](So, wait... What's the bad news?)
EventFlowMsg/News_IntroFsodr.007:
Folks from Inkopolis can also come HERE.
Our TURF. Think of how hard parking will be!
EventFlowMsg/News_IntroFsodr.008:
What? Noooooo! I can barely find a place
to park my eels as it is!
EventFlowMsg/News_IntroFsodr.009:
...Ay? [group=0004 type=0005 params=](...But if they're riding the train,
why would they need to park?)

EventFlowMsg/News_IntroSdodr.000: Time for our next segment, Rumor Fillet!
EventFlowMsg/News_IntroSdodr.001: Ay? Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](That's a segment? Sounds fishy.)
EventFlowMsg/News_IntroSdodr.002:
Would this be the rumor about the spaced-
out wretches packing [color=0001]Inkopolis Square[color=ffff]?
EventFlowMsg/News_IntroSdodr.003:
Ay. Ay? [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Yeah, I heard about that. Do you
think it's true?)
EventFlowMsg/News_IntroSdodr.004:
I have seen fewer people from Inkopolis
Square in Turf War or punching the clock...
EventFlowMsg/News_IntroSdodr.005:
Hey, you're right, now that I think of it.
What's up with that?!
EventFlowMsg/News_IntroSdodr.006:
Did they find out how rad the Splatlands
are and throw in the towel?
EventFlowMsg/News_IntroSdodr.007:
Ay! Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](I know! We should go live from
Inkopolis Square to get the truth!)
EventFlowMsg/News_IntroSdodr.008:
Big Man...are you just angling for a way to
expense a trip to Inkopolis Square?
EventFlowMsg/News_IntroSdodr.009:
Ay... [group=0004 type=0005 params=](I just thought it'd be cool for our
viewers to see another side of Inkopolis...)

EventFlowMsg/News_LeagueBeingHeld.000:
Hey, it looks like there's a Challenge
available today!
EventFlowMsg/News_LeagueBeingHeld.001: Check out the rules, then give it a shot!

EventFlowMsg/News_LimitedCoop.000:
Ooo, we have a special announcement from
Grizzco Industries...
EventFlowMsg/News_LimitedCoop.001: Ay. Ay? [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Uh-oh. What is it?)
EventFlowMsg/News_LimitedCoop.002:
Oh, I think it's good news. Maybe? They're
looking for volunteers for [color=0001]Eggstra Work[color=ffff]!
EventFlowMsg/News_LimitedCoop.003:
Ay. Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Oh, it's available right now. So it IS
good news, if you want Eggstra Work.)
EventFlowMsg/News_LimitedCoop.004:
Yep! If you want to get in on it, call up
some friends and head over to Grizzco.
EventFlowMsg/News_LimitedCoop.005:
Is it weird that I love Eggstra Work? Just
another chance for my team to dominate!

EventFlowMsg/News_LimitedCoop_Short.000:
We've got a note from Grizzco...
[color=0001]Eggstra Work [color=ffff]is available now!
EventFlowMsg/News_LimitedCoop_Short.001:
Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](If you want in on it, grab some friends
and head to Grizzco.)
EventFlowMsg/News_LimitedCoop_Short.010: Hop to it, workers! If you want to.
EventFlowMsg/News_LimitedCoop_Short.011:
Yeah, grab some work buds and build
those teamwork connections!
EventFlowMsg/News_LimitedCoop_Short.020:
Ay? [group=0004 type=0005 params=](You get a commemorative gift
for doing [color=0001]Eggstra Work[color=ffff], right?)
EventFlowMsg/News_LimitedCoop_Short.021: Oh, yeah! I wonder what it'll be this time...

EventFlowMsg/News_MissionEnding.003:
Is this about the return of the
Great Zapfish?
EventFlowMsg/News_MissionEnding.004: Oh yeah...I almost forgot about that.
EventFlowMsg/News_MissionEnding.005: [group=0004 type=0005 params=]...[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Is that how it always looked?
EventFlowMsg/News_MissionEnding.006:
Who cares? It's safe! Yay! Is that
all you got, Big Man? What's next?
EventFlowMsg/News_MissionEnding.007: Ay! Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](No, there's more! Broken news!)
EventFlowMsg/News_MissionEnding.008:
That's breakING. So...hurry up and
break it already!
EventFlowMsg/News_MissionEnding.009:
Ooo, lemme guess. This is about the
new Squid Sisters single, right?
EventFlowMsg/News_MissionEnding.010:
Because if so, YEAH, I've heard about it,
and YEAH, I'm big MAD about it!
EventFlowMsg/News_MissionEnding.011:
Wait...it says Squid Sisters on the label,
but look at these two!
EventFlowMsg/News_MissionEnding.012: Ay? [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Is it really them?)
EventFlowMsg/News_MissionEnding.013:
Th-that's Boss Marie! And her assistant
lady! They're the Squid Sisters?!
EventFlowMsg/News_MissionEnding.014: Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Forgive us, Boss Ladies!)
EventFlowMsg/News_MissionEnding.016:
Yes! Great idea, Shiver. Deep Cut and
Squid Sisters World Toooooour!
EventFlowMsg/News_MissionEnding.017:
Well...until then, let's just play their latest.
Here's [color=0001]Wave Goodbye[color=ffff]! Catch ya later!
EventFlowMsg/News_MissionEnding.018:
Deep Cut will open for the Squid Sisters
anytime! When are we going on tour?!

EventFlowMsg/News_Opening.Comment_01: Repping the Splatlands, we are DEEP CUT!
EventFlowMsg/News_Opening.Comment_05: Ay, ay, ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Shiver, Frye, and Big Man!)

EventFlowMsg/News_Season02.000:
Oh, this is exciting. The [color=0001]new season[color=ffff]
has started!
EventFlowMsg/News_Season02.002:
Ay! Ay.[group=0004 type=0005 params=] (Yes! Chill Season! I can't wait to
break out my sweaters and get cozy.)
EventFlowMsg/News_Season02.003:
Well, don't get TOO cozy. Looks like an
intense new mode is here. [color=0001]X Battles[color=ffff] are go!
EventFlowMsg/News_Season02.005:
Ay. Ay.[group=0004 type=0005 params=] (Whoa. Looks like you need to be
ranked [color=0001]Ｓ+[size=75%]0[size=100%] or higher[color=ffff] to try it.)
EventFlowMsg/News_Season02.006:
Look out, world. I'm gonna blaze a path
to the top spot.
EventFlowMsg/News_Season02.007: I'm here for the shiny [color=0001]new weapons[color=ffff], duh!
EventFlowMsg/News_Season02.008:
Ay. Ay?[group=0004 type=0005 params=] (Those look cool. Are any of 'em
fin operated? Asking for me.)
EventFlowMsg/News_Season02.008_01:
So pretty... Which one will be my new main?
I'll have to splat test 'em all...
EventFlowMsg/News_Season02.009:
Knock yourself out. I'll just listen to what
Sheldon says. I might be the only one...
EventFlowMsg/News_Season02.010:
Listening? No time for it. Not when
[color=0001]NEW STAGES[color=ffff] JUST DROPPED!
EventFlowMsg/News_Season02.011:
Ay. Ay![group=0004 type=0005 params=] (I'll still make time for listening.
But those new stages do look good...)
EventFlowMsg/News_Season02.012:
You mean good for [color=0001]battling[color=ffff], right? 'Cause
that's what they're there for!

EventFlowMsg/News_Season03.000: Ay! Ay![group=0004 type=0005 params=] (Yes! The [color=0001]new season[color=ffff] has started!)
EventFlowMsg/News_Season03.001: Ahahaha! Yes! I'm here for it.
EventFlowMsg/News_Season03.002:
Well, well! Let's see what Frye is here
for, shall we?
EventFlowMsg/News_Season03.014:
Up next, we have the latest from
Grizzco Industries.
EventFlowMsg/News_Season03.014_01:
AAAY! Ay. Ay? [group=0004 type=0005 params=](AAAUGH! I mean...aaah.
What is that...horrifying...thing?)
EventFlowMsg/News_Season03.015:
I think it's cool! Apparently a [color=0001]new type[color=ffff]
[color=0001]of King Salmonid [color=ffff]has been sighted!
EventFlowMsg/News_Season03.016:
Hm. The picture we have isn't the highest
quality. I can't quite make it out...
EventFlowMsg/News_Season03.017:
Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](I have a feeling there may be some
real-life sightings, so watch out!)

EventFlowMsg/News_Season04.000:
Oh, this is exciting. The [color=0001]new season[color=ffff]
has started!
EventFlowMsg/News_Season04.002:
Aaay! Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](I'm ready! Nothing like a fresh
start to get my fins aflapping.)
EventFlowMsg/News_Season04.003:
Ooo! It looks like [color=0001]Challenges [color=ffff]have been
added to the mix! Keep an eye out for them.
EventFlowMsg/News_Season04.004:
YES. Look out, world. Frye's comin' for ya!
...Wait—what are Challenges again?
EventFlowMsg/News_Season04.005:
They're special events that might have
different rules or restrictions than usual.
EventFlowMsg/News_Season04.006:
Ay? Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](And they're kind of random, right?
So if you see one, you should check it out!)
EventFlowMsg/News_Season04.018:
It looks like Grizzco has opened up
a [color=0001]new job site[color=ffff]!
EventFlowMsg/News_Season04.019:
Ay. Ay? [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Oh. That's it, huh? I was picturing
more of an open office with foosball...)
EventFlowMsg/News_Season04.020:
Looks like it's ripe for collecting Golden Eggs
to me. Employee of the Month, here I come!
EventFlowMsg/News_Season04.021:
Ay... [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Just...try not to fall into the ocean
this time...)

EventFlowMsg/News_Season05.000: Ay! Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Yes! The [color=0001]new season[color=ffff] has started!)
EventFlowMsg/News_Season05.001: Ahahaha! Yes! I'm here for it.
EventFlowMsg/News_Season05.002:
Well, well! Let's see what Frye is here
for, shall we?

EventFlowMsg/News_Season06.000:
Oh, this is exciting. The [color=0001]new season[color=ffff]
has started!
EventFlowMsg/News_Season06.002:
Aaay! Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](I'm ready! Nothing like a fresh
start to get my fins aflapping.)
EventFlowMsg/News_Season06.008_1:
Ay! Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Ooo! It looks like everyone gets a
[color=0001]Sheldon License[color=ffff] as a gift after this! Neat!)
EventFlowMsg/News_Season06.009:
Ammo Knights will have a line out the door.
Especially if folks listen to Sheldon's spiels.

EventFlowMsg/News_Season07.000: Ay! Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Yes! The [color=0001]new season[color=ffff] has started!)
EventFlowMsg/News_Season07.001: Ahahaha! Yes! I'm here for it.
EventFlowMsg/News_Season07.002:
Well, well! Let's see what Frye is here
for, shall we?

EventFlowMsg/News_SeasonEndBonus.000:
Ooo, important reminder. The season is
nearly over!
EventFlowMsg/News_SeasonEndBonus.001:
Ay![group=0004 type=0005 params=] (And you know what that means... You
can earn more [color=0001]Catalog Points[color=ffff] than normal!)
EventFlowMsg/News_SeasonEndBonus.002:
Right. So if there's something you've had
your eye on, now's the time to make a push!

EventFlowMsg/News_SeasonPost.001:
That's the spirit, Frye. Let's all hit the
ground running at the start of the season!
EventFlowMsg/News_SeasonPost.002:
As long as you're all running FROM me.
Muhahaha! Let's goooooo!

EventFlowMsg/News_TricolorVersusStage.000:
And here's where the Tricolor Battles are
happening!
EventFlowMsg/News_TricolorVersusStage.001:
Let's go, Big Man! Between the two of our
teams, we can knock first place down a peg!
EventFlowMsg/News_TricolorVersusStage.002:
Ay! Ay...[group=0004 type=0005 params=] (I'm with you! At least...until it's
no longer in my team's interest...)
EventFlowMsg/News_TricolorVersusStage.003:
Ay![group=0004 type=0005 params=] (Let's work together to knock off
the leaders!)
EventFlowMsg/News_TricolorVersusStage.004:
Big Man! I didn't know you had it in you.
But yes...let's swarm 'em!
EventFlowMsg/News_TricolorVersusStage.005:
Frye! Let's call a truce between our teams
and take down the leader. Idol solidarity!
EventFlowMsg/News_TricolorVersusStage.006:
You're on! Until the grand finale, at least...
[size=75%]'Cause THIS idol wants the spotlight all to herself![size=100%]

EventFlowMsg/News_UpdateInfo.000: Ay! Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Update! I've got an update!)
EventFlowMsg/News_UpdateInfo.001: What is it? What is it?

EventFlowMsg/News_VersionUp.000: Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Heads up—the game was updated!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersionUp.001: Check the official site for details.

EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.000: Let's see the current battle stages.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.002:
Wanna win your Turf War battle? Splat the
enemy...then splat 'em again! And again!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.003:
Ay... [group=0004 type=0005 params=](You should also probably ink the
ground at some point...)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.004:
Always keep your cool in battle. When the
enemy goes FLOOMP, you go KA-GLUMP!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.006:
There is an optimal moment to use a special
weapon in every Turf War battle...
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.007:
Yeah! It's called "the exact millisecond the
gauge fills up"!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.008:
When I say GO, race to the middle of the
stage! Whoever gets there first wins!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.009:
Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Ooo, a race? I'll hand out water and
shiny blankets at the end!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.010:
Yeah, splatting enemies is cool, but Turf
War battles are all about inking turf!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.011:
Says the one who's ALWAYS on the front
line, tracking her splat count obsessively...
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.012:
Big Man! It's your time to shine. Hit us
with your best advice!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.013:
A-ay![group=0004 type=0005 params=] (Uh...try different weapons? And
different strategies! Ack! I panicked!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.014:
Catch me in the front ALWAYS. I'm talking
battles, concerts...you name it.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.015:
Ay? [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Is that why you elbowed me aside
when we were in line for ice cream?)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.016:
I lost a battle at the last second once. One
year, two days, six hours, nine seconds ago.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.017:
