Aaay?! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](At least you don't think about
it all the time! Right?!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.022:
So that's that, or whatever! Until next time
on the Anarchy Splatcast...
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.023: Ay? [group=0004 type=0005 params=](You know we're not done yet, right?)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.BigSlope_00_0000:
Ah, I love sprinting down the slopes of
Brinewater Springs... Feels like flying!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.BigSlope_00_0001:
I mean, you WERE actually airborne for a
moment when you tripped over your feet...
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.BigSlope_01_0000:
Nothing beats the snacks at Brinewater
Springs. They have the best sweet buns!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.BigSlope_01_0001:
Ay?! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](You've been eating sweet buns and
not sharing this whole time?!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.BigSlope_02_0000:
Brinewater Springs has been so popular
lately. I hope I can get a private cabana.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.BigSlope_02_0001:
Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Just tell anyone who comes by that
there are sharks in the water!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.BigSlope_03_0000:
I wasn't paid to say this, but I always love
the vibes at Brinewater Springs.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.BigSlope_03_0001:
Totally! And the food they serve at the inn
is delish. I'm hungry thinking about it!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.BigSlope_03_0002:
Ugh! Now I'm hungry! A massage, a snack,
maybe a little table tennis... Let's go!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.BigSlope_03_0003:
Ay. Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Wait. Maybe we SHOULD be getting
paid to say this!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.BigSlope_04_0000:
They're always talking about how using the
sauna at Brinewater Springs is healthy...
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.BigSlope_04_0001:
Well, I heard that it helps a body's cells go
AHHHHHH. And the mind go MMMMMM!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.BigSlope_04_0002:
Ay? [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Dumb it down for me a little,
would you?)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Carousel_00_0000:
Sometimes I get totally turned around by
the rotating floor at Wahoo World...
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Carousel_00_0001: Oh, is that why you blasted ME with ink?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Carousel_01_0000:
Forget battling. I go to Wahoo World
for the ice cream!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Carousel_01_0001:
Ay? Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Yeah...didn't you buy an annual
ice-cream pass? Who knew THAT existed!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Carousel_02_0000:
I can never get the timing of the bridges
at Wahoo World quite right...
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Carousel_02_0001:
Ay? Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Really? Because there are
multiple signs explaining the schedule!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Carousel_03_0000:
Remember the last time we went to Wahoo
World? Big Man got mobbed by fans!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Carousel_03_0001:
Ay! Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](That was so cool! I even got to
sign an autograph.)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Carousel_03_0002:
...That was just the lunch bill.
Thanks for treating, by the way!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Carousel_04_0000:
You know, we ought to play a show at
Wahoo World one of these days...
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Carousel_04_0001: Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Hey, that's a great idea!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Carousel_04_0002:
Now you're talking! But which ride should
we be riding when we perform?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Carousel_04_0003: Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](I don't do my own stunts!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Cross_00_0000:
Nobody beats Robo ROM-en when it comes
to speed, accuracy, and cleanliness!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Cross_01_0000:
Ay? [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Didn't you get INTO the big ramen bowl
at Robo ROM-en once, Frye?)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Cross_01_0001: Yeah, so? I had to know what flavor it was.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Cross_02_0000:
What happens to all the ink spilled during
battles at Robo ROM-en?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Cross_02_0001:
Ay... [group=0004 type=0005 params=](I don't know, but none of the jellyfish
diners seem to mind it...)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Cross_03_0000:
Tell us, Frye—what's the key to winning
at Robo ROM-en?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Cross_03_0001:
Get there early and order tonkotsu. OH!
You mean in battle? The high ground, duh!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Cross_03_0002:
No, I actually want to hear more
about the ramen...
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Cross_03_0003:
Ay?! Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](What's wrong with both of you?!
You gotta order shoyu with extra garlic!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Cross_04_0000:
I could watch the robots working at
Robo ROM-en all day...
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Cross_04_0001:
Ay... Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Yeah...robots making ramen...
We're living in the future!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Cross_04_0002:
Is it really that mesmerizing? Every time
we go, you end up staring for hours!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Cross_04_0003:
Ay... [group=0004 type=0005 params=](I guess there are probably folks
waiting for those seats...)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.District_00_0000:
Ooo, Eeltail Alley is the perfect stage for
a well-crafted surprise attack...
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.District_00_0001:
If I know a surprise attack is coming,
is it really a surprise?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.District_01_0000:
I wonder if they still have those yummy
food stands set up in Eeltail Alley...
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.District_01_0001:
Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Oh yeah, we stopped there every day
after school! Best deep-fried tofu ever!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.District_02_0000:
Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Hey, I saw a bird's nest up in the
scaffolding at Eeltail Alley the other day!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.District_02_0001: How did you get up in the scaffolding?!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.District_03_0000:
Isn't Eeltail Alley the perfect stringer
stage? I love sniping from the bridge!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.District_03_0001:
Nah. I think you want a weapon that's
good in tight spaces. Splatanas for life!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.District_03_0002:
Ay? [group=0004 type=0005 params=](What about sloshers? I mean, I guess
splashing buckets of ink is fun anywhere...)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.District_04_0000:
I don't know why, but I always feel like I'm
being WATCHED at Eeltail Alley...
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.District_04_0001:
That's 'cause you're Shiver! It's the price
of fame, baby. I say...lean into it!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.District_04_0002:
Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](But you used to tussle with hooligans
there! It's not just paparazzi watching...)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Factory_00_0000:
I've always wondered why they made the
Um'ami Ruins all, y'know, ruined...
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Factory_01_0000:
Um, do you think it's bad that I sprayed ink
all over the artifacts at Um'ami Ruins?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Factory_01_0001:
Ay. Ay... [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Nah, the ink disappears pretty
quickly. It's probably fine...)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Factory_02_0000:
Ay... [group=0004 type=0005 params=](I hear that Um'ami Ruins isn't making
as much money off tourism as it hoped...)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Factory_02_0001:
Well, duh! They don't even have a
concession stand!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Factory_03_0000:
You all heard about the movie they shot
on-site at Um'ami Ruins, right?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Factory_03_0001:
Ay! Ay. Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Yeah! I watched it recently
with Big Dad. It holds up!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Factory_03_0002:
Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](The part where the archaeologist
fights a hundred ninjas is SO good.)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Factory_03_0003:
Oh, please. When she took out 10 at once
with a tiny fossil brush? I coulda got 20.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Factory_04_0000:
You know, I've always suspected that
there's a treasure under Um'ami Ruins...
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Factory_04_0001:
Shiver! You're a genius. Why didn't we think
of this before? C'mon, get your pickax!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Factory_04_0002:
Ay! Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Ack! We can't loot a historic
cultural artifact, you two!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Hiagari_00_0000:
Mahi-Mahi Resort has a poolside stage.
That's fun, isn't it?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Hiagari_00_0001:
Eh. We could make it fun if we were
headlining there!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Hiagari_01_0000:
Just once, I wanna drain the pool at
Mahi-Mahi Resort and battle in it!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Hiagari_01_0001:
Ay?! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Do you think you could even make a
dent with only three minutes to ink it?!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Hiagari_02_0000:
Ugh. The sun is so unbearably hot by
the pool at Mahi-Mahi Resort.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Hiagari_02_0001:
Ay? Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Why don't you just take a dip?
Oh...right.)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Hiagari_03_0000:
It's extremely posh to rent out Mahi-Mahi
Resort for a birthday party these days.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Hiagari_03_0001:
Hey, that sounds like a great idea!
I wanna do that sometime!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Hiagari_03_0002:
Yes, well... Maybe one day. But for now,
all we can afford is Big Man's house.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Hiagari_03_0003:
Ay! Ay... [group=0004 type=0005 params=](And you two didn't pay me
ANYTHING last time! Hey...)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Hiagari_04_0000:
I must admit...the shaved ice at Mahi-Mahi
Resort always looks quite tasty.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Hiagari_04_0001:
Ay?! Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Have you not tried it?! The
Purpleberry Rasp-Blend is amazing!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Hiagari_04_0002:
The only problem is it turns your tongue
and mouth totally blue.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Jyoheki_00_0000:
I kinda want to live at Flounder Heights.
I could be friends with my neighbors!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Jyoheki_00_0001:
Sure, until they borrow a cup of sugar. And
then a cup of flour! Where will it end?!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Jyoheki_01_0000:
You guys ever nap on the futon that
someone left outside at Flounder Heights?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Jyoheki_01_0001:
Ay! Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Frye! Please don't sleep on random
futons that you find outside!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Jyoheki_02_0000:
If you want to win at Flounder Heights, take
the high ground and never cede it.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Jyoheki_02_0001:
Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](And if the other team is camping up
there, Squid Surge up and surprise 'em!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Jyoheki_03_0000:
Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](I guess living at Flounder Heights is
pretty popular with the Turf War crowd.)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Jyoheki_03_0001:
That makes sense. You can walk out your
door and hop into a battle instantly!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Jyoheki_03_0002:
So is everyone who lives there just, like,
insanely good at battling?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Jyoheki_03_0003:
No, but you don't have to be good at
battling to love it!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Jyoheki_04_0000:
They remodeled Flounder Heights, didn't
they? It's so fancy now!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Jyoheki_04_0001:
Yes. There's a terrace, trendy shops, and
fresh paint. It REEKS of Inkopolis!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Jyoheki_04_0002:
...Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](...Shiver, I think Inkopolis smells
kinda nice.)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Kaisou_00_0000:
Why'd it take so long for them to finish
construction on Hammerhead Bridge?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Kaisou_00_0001:
I heard that the construction workers
spent half their time battling...
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Kaisou_01_0000:
I like battling on Hammerhead Bridge 'cause
it's a no-brainer. Just charge ahead!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Kaisou_01_0001:
Ay? [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Uhhh...you know there are open
areas on either side of the map, right?)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Kaisou_02_0000:
Fun fact—Hammerhead Bridge is the longest
bridge in the Splatlands.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Kaisou_02_0001:
...Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](...It also has the most expensive
toll to cross.)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Kaisou_03_0000:
You know, that odd statue that emerged
near Hammerhead Bridge is still there...
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Kaisou_03_0001:
Ay! Ay? Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Oh, yeah! Why doesn't anyone
talk about that anymore? It's so weird!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Kaisou_03_0002:
They still have boat tours that'll take you
right up next to it.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Kaisou_03_0003: What WON'T people sign up for...
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Kaisou_04_0000:
Didn't we record a music video on
Hammerhead Bridge once?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Kaisou_04_0001:
Yeah, that one never saw the light of day.
And we don't really talk about it...
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Kaisou_04_0002:
AY! Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](I'm RIGHT HERE! And yes, the wind
blew me off the bridge. I'll never forget!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Line_00_0000:
Ooo, I love a battle at MakoMart, 'cause I
can stock up on sweets while I'm there!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Line_00_0001:
You keep a stock of sweets, and you
haven't been sharing them?!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Line_01_0000:
If you can hold the central high ground at
MakoMart, I like your chances to win.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Line_01_0001: Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Don't ignore the side paths though!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Line_02_0000:
Ay! Ay? [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Hey, Shiver! Any tips for
MakoMart?)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Line_02_0001:
Yeah! Be sure to stock up on Tuesdays
during their MakoSaver sale event!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Line_03_0000:
Whenever I shop at MakoMart, I seem to
end up with mystery items at checkout...
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Line_03_0002:
Ay. Ay? [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Yeah, what a MYSTERY. How could
that possibly happen, FRYE?)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Line_03_0003:
I-I... The items just fly out of my hands
and into the cart. DON'T JUDGE ME!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Line_04_0000:
Thinking of MakoMart reminds me how far
I've come as a chef. I barely cooked before!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Line_04_0001:
Yeah, me either. Good thing we had Big Man
to teach us the finer points of cooking!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Line_04_0002:
Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Frye, adding a cup of sugar to every
dish is NOT one of the finer points.)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Nagasaki_00_0000:
Last time I battled at Sturgeon Shipyard,
there were jellyfish working nonstop!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Nagasaki_00_0001:
They were unbothered by all the ink splats?
I guess that's why they were hired...
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Nagasaki_01_0000:
Those huge cranes at Sturgeon Shipyard
are impressive. There are so many of them!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Nagasaki_01_0001:
Ay... [group=0004 type=0005 params=](I like to imagine them combining
into a giant robot...)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Nagasaki_02_0000:
Hasn't the battleship at Sturgeon Shipyard
been under construction for ages?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Nagasaki_02_0001:
Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](It's probably hard to get anything
done with all the splatting and battling!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Nagasaki_03_0000:
Nothing beats nailing enemies with a
Triple Inkstrike at Sturgeon Shipyard!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Nagasaki_03_0001:
Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](It does seem to bring you a massive
amount of joy. I see your eyes light up!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Nagasaki_03_0002:
Didn't we name that move? When you land
a Triple Inkstrike at the end of a battle?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Nagasaki_04_0000:
What's up with that yo-yo-looking thing
that's dangling in Sturgeon Shipyard?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Nagasaki_04_0001:
Oh, that cursed thing. It just makes it hard
to target enemies from the high ground.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Nagasaki_04_0002:
Really? It just makes me sleepy. The more
I stare, the more...I lose...focuhhhhhh...
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Nagasaki_04_0003:
Ay. Ay! Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Not again. Frye! Wake up—
we're still on the air!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Pillar_00_0000:
I've always wondered about that golden
thing on the Manta Maria's bow. What is it?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Pillar_00_0001:
Oh, probably some sort of ancient charm.
I already tried looting it, and it won't budge.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Pillar_01_0000:
Hey, Big Man... Is the Manta Maria named
after you?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Pillar_01_0001:
Ay. Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](No, it's way older than I am.
Maybe I'm named after it!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Pillar_02_0000:
You'd better ink the deck from port to
starboard if you want to win!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Pillar_02_0001:
Ay! Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Don't forget those little lifeboats
too! Those count!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Pillar_03_0000:
Why doesn't the Manta Maria ever dock in
the Splatlands, you guys?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Pillar_03_0001:
Ay. Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](I don't think it sails anymore,
Frye. It just...floats.)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Pillar_03_0002:
Bah! If it floats, it can sail. Maybe they'd
let us take it for a spin...
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Pillar_03_0003: Ay?! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](What exactly are you planning?!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Pillar_04_0000:
Ooo, I've got to warn everyone. If you're
battling on Manta Maria, watch for seagulls!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Pillar_04_0001:
Ay. Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Oh, good call. I'd feel so bad if I
accidentally splatted one.)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Pillar_04_0002:
What? No, that's not it. Watch out, 'cause
they'll steal food right out of your hand!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Pillar_04_0003:
Frye, most people use both hands in battle.
You're the only one who snack attacks!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Pivot_00_0000:
I hate it when someone jumps out from
behind the spinny wall thing and splats me!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Pivot_00_0001:
Well, that's Museum d'Alfonsino for you.
Protect yourself at all times!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Pivot_01_0000:
Ay... [group=0004 type=0005 params=](I love the modern art they always
showcase at Museum d'Alfonsino...)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Pivot_01_0001: Big Man, those are literally just ink stains...
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Pivot_02_0000:
You ever climb the walls at Museum
d'Alfonsino and just...zone out?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Pivot_02_0001:
Ay! AY. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](No! I'm too busy inking my base,
like you SHOULD BE DOING.)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Pivot_03_0000:
You two seen the Greater Inkopolis and
Splatlands exhibit at Museum d'Alfonsino?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Pivot_03_0001:
Ay! Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](I did! It was really educational and
highlighted some interesting differences.)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Pivot_03_0003:
Ay! Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Uh, you can't WIN a museum
exhibit! But...Splatlands won.)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Pivot_04_0000:
Do you two remember our field trip to
Museum d'Alfonsino back in school?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Pivot_04_0001:
Of course! You took that funny picture
posing with the statue by the fountain.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Pivot_04_0002:
Ay! Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Right! And then you fell over and
everyone laughed. Oh. Sorry to remind you.)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Pivot_04_0003:
Oh, so THAT'S why everyone kept making
"field slip" jokes all day long. I get it now.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Propeller_00_0000:
Ever shout into the propellers at Marlin
Airport? It makes your voice go all warbly.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Propeller_00_0001:
Can't say I've ever found the time in the
heat of battle, but you do you.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Propeller_01_0000:
Ay. Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Marlin Airport is a major hub.
It's a Splatlands national treasure!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Propeller_01_0001:
What?! I thought WE were the Splatlands
national treasure!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Propeller_02_0000:
When battling down at Marlin Airport, the
propeller-driven platforms can be handy.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Propeller_02_0001:
Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](But don't let the propellers spatter
ink on you when the enemy's using them!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Propeller_03_0000:
Please, PLEASE mind your teammates when
activating the propellers at Marlin Airport.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Propeller_03_0001:
Yeah, there might be others trying to catch
the same flight!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Propeller_03_0003:
Ay... [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Guess she doesn't remember how
she made you miss your connection...)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Propeller_04_0000:
Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](You wouldn't believe how popular Marlie
stuff is with students now.)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Propeller_04_0001:
"Marlie"? The mascot character for
Marlin Airport?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Propeller_04_0002:
Yeah, the airplane with legs! It's too weird
not to love.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Propeller_04_0003:
Ay. Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](The mascot doesn't have legs, just
the costume. Someone's gotta wear it!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Ruins_00_0000:
Did you know that the elevators at Bluefin
Depot are automatic? Just step in and go!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Ruins_00_0001:
All elevators are automatic if you have
an assistant push the button for you...
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Ruins_01_0000:
I always wanted to work in a coal mine like
Bluefin Depot so I could ride the coasters!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Ruins_01_0001:
Ay?! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Coasters?! There's so much wrong
with that, I don't even know how to start.)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Ruins_02_0000:
Did you know that Bluefin Depot used to
be a bit dilapidated?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Ruins_02_0001:
Ay! Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Well, now it's practically a tourist
attraction! The remodel really worked.)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Ruins_03_0000:
Pro tip for Bluefin Depot—always attack
from the right side first!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Ruins_03_0001: Actually, I prefer to attack from the left.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Ruins_03_0002: I bet Big Man goes right up the middle.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Ruins_03_0003:
Ay? Ay? [group=0004 type=0005 params=](The...what? We are talking
about Bluefin Depot, aren't we?)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Ruins_04_0000:
I heard that Bluefin Depot doesn't meet
the ORCA standards for safety.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Ruins_04_0001:
Ay? [group=0004 type=0005 params=](You mean the Occupational
Regulatory Commission for Accidents?)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Ruins_04_0002:
Yeah, them! There are supposed to be rails
near the edges. Ask me how I know.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Ruins_04_0003:
Just do the opposite of whatever Frye's
doing, and you'll be in ORCA compliance...
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Scrap_00_0000:
How do you two avoid getting targeted in
the middle area at Mincemeat Metalworks?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Scrap_00_0001:
Just a suggestion, but you could TRY not
doing a war cry every time you advance...
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Scrap_01_0000:
Ay. Ay? [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Sell me on Mincemeat Metalworks,
you two. Why are people drawn to it?)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Scrap_01_0001:
Employee discount! All the scrap metal you
can fit in your pockets for a nickel!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Scrap_02_0000:
I've been thinking—aren't the trucks at
Mincemeat Metalworks a bit drab?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Scrap_02_0001:
Ay. Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Yeah, they should add lights and
stuff. From junkyard to funkyard!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Scrap_03_0000:
It's a shame that they're gonna scrap that
giant boat near Mincemeat Metalworks...
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Scrap_03_0001:
Ay... Ay... [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Oh, yeah... Imagine the stories
it could tell. The voyages it undertook...)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Scrap_03_0002:
I mean, they're probably just going to make
it into a new boat.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Scrap_03_0003:
Ay! Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Awww! Then it can sail the high
seas again!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Scrap_04_0000:
Didn't we film a music video at Mincemeat
Metalworks once? Like, a million years ago?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Scrap_04_0001:
Ay! Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Oh, yeah! What a blast from
the past.)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Scrap_04_0002:
You aren't kidding. Remember the
pyrotechnics? And all the dust?!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Scrap_04_0003:
Every so often, I give my tentacles a shake,
and some of that blasted dust falls out...
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Section_00_0000:
Far be it from me to complain, but don't you
think Barnacle & Dime is overly vast?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Section_00_0001:
Totally. Not even you could shop the whole
thing in one day.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Section_01_0000:
Ay? Ay? [group=0004 type=0005 params=](What's the best part of Barnacle
& Dime? The fashion? The electronics?)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Section_01_0001:
The food court! Have you tried the
Anarchy Ramen?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Section_02_0000:
Ay... [group=0004 type=0005 params=](I hear Barnacle & Dime is the fashion
hub of the Splatlands...)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Section_02_0001:
It is! Are you in the market for a new look?
Perhaps in the cape or poncho category?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Section_03_0000:
You know the fish statues at Barnacle &
Dime? The ones that shoot water?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Section_03_0001:
Out of their noses, right? Oh. OH!
Wait. It is water, isn't it?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Section_03_0002:
Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](If it's not water, I don't want to
know what it is.)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Section_04_0000:
Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Guess what. You can buy Tacticooler
drinks at the Barnacle & Dime mall!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Section_04_0001:
Ehhh. They taste good but they're too
carbonated. I hate burping in battle!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Section_04_0002:
Speaking of Tacticooler drinks... What did
we call it when we guzzle them and charge?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Section_04_0003: The Chug and Run Soda POP!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Spider_00_0000:
Watch out for the unfinished sections at
Crableg Capital!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Spider_00_0001:
Or use 'em to your advantage! I've seen ink
spray through the grating there like crazy...
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Spider_01_0000:
Ooo, I love standing on the grates at Crableg
Capital. My tummy FLIPS when I look down!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Spider_01_0001:
Ay. Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](She's not joking. I don't recommend
looking down if you're scared of heights!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Spider_02_0000:
How can they have battles at Crableg
Capital? It's still under construction!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Spider_02_0001:
Ay... [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Well, I'm not sure these are
"officially sanctioned" battles...)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Spider_03_0000:
Ay? [group=0004 type=0005 params=](How tall do you think Crableg Capital
is, anyway?)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Spider_03_0001:
That's easy! I'll just count the stories.
One, two, three...
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Spider_03_0002:
Fifteen, sixteen...uh...eighty-five...two
hundred...uh... It's four hundred stories!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Spider_03_0003:
Is it REALLY that tall, or did you just get
tired of counting?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Spider_04_0000:
It's always worth admiring the scenery from
this stage. Talk about a view!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Spider_04_0001:
Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Yeah, you can even see
Hagglefish Market!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Spider_04_0002:
I brought a friend up there the other day,
and they literally cried at the view!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Spider_04_0003:
That's just because they're terrified of
heights, Frye!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Temple_00_0000:
I'm still shocked that battle is allowed at
Undertow Spillway. It's an important utility!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Temple_00_0001:
Shiver, it's made of industrial concrete,
and we're shooting ink. It'll be fine.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Temple_01_0000:
Watch out when you lose the high ground
on the left side at Undertow Spillway...
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Temple_01_0001:
Ay! Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Yeah! If you focus too much on
taking it back, everything else'll get inked!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Temple_02_0000:
Ay. Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](I'm always a bit wary of Undertow
Spillway. I got lost there when I was little.)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Temple_02_0001:
You were chasing a butterfly, right?
Or was it chasing you?!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Temple_03_0000:
Oh, I used to skip dance practice to spelunk
at Undertow Spillway with my little bro!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Temple_03_0001:
Ay... [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Your brother says it wasn't
spelunking so much as looking for loot...)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Temple_03_0002:
He would say that! He never found any loot!
That ungrateful little urchin...
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Temple_03_0003:
Hey, I remember you when you were that
age. Maybe give him a break.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Temple_04_0000:
So, what's the deal with Undertow Spillway?
What's spilling and why?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Temple_04_0001:
Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](It protects the city from flooding by
allowing water to drain.)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Temple_04_0002:
Yeah! Don't you remember learning in school
about how the Splatlands are flood prone?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Temple_04_0003:
Don't YOU remember me skipping most
of those classes?!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Twist_00_0000:
I love hopping around on the platforms at
Shipshape Cargo Co. Can't catch me, haha!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Twist_00_0001:
Until you fall all the way to the bottom.
Not that that's ever happened to me...
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Twist_01_0000:
Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](I hear that Shipshape Cargo Co. is the
top shipping company in the Splatlands!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Twist_01_0001:
They must not have sent the stuff I bought
online...'cause I STILL DON'T HAVE IT!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Twist_02_0000:
Big Man, hit us with one key fact about
Shipshape Cargo Co. GO!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Twist_02_0001:
Ay...ay! Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Ummm...there's no internet
signal! Sorry—I blanked a little bit.)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Twist_03_0000:
♪ Sail away from the Splatlands...aboard
Ship[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]shaaape[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] Cargo Co.! Just go! ♪
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Twist_03_0002:
...Ay? Ay? [group=0004 type=0005 params=](...Wait—is that how it goes?
Is that even a real jingle?)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Twist_03_0003:
It is now! Shipshape Cargo Co., you can
send royalties to Deep Cut, care of Shiver...
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Twist_04_0000:
Have you seen that...thing...way up high on
the Shipshape Cargo Co. boat? What is it?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Twist_04_0001:
Ay! Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](I know! It's a drill for surveying
the seabed! It weighs four metric tons!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Twist_04_0002:
H-how do you even know that, Big Man?
Are you some kind of drill expert?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Twist_04_0003:
...Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](...I probably just watch too many
boring documentaries.)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Upland_00_0000:
Try saying Inkblot Art Academy three
times in a row. I dare you.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Upland_00_0001:
Inkblot Art Academy, Binklot Art Dichotomy,
Blingpot Tart Ackmadame. Nailed it.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Upland_01_0000:
So why is it Inkblot Art Academy and not
Inkblot School or Inkblot College?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Upland_01_0001:
Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](If I explained it to you, I'd have
to charge tuition.)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Upland_02_0000:
I guess Inkblot Art Academy has a few
Splatlandian students enrolled right now.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Upland_02_0001:
Ay! Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Cool! I can't wait to see what
comes from an Inkopolis-Splatlands collab!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Upland_03_0000:
If you ask me, Inkblot Art Academy is the
perfect stage for stringer mains.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Upland_03_0001: I think you mean splatana mains.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Upland_03_0002:
Ay? Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Am I the only one using a brush?
It's an art academy!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Upland_04_0000:
I've heard that students at Inkblot Art
Academy can study whatever they like.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Upland_04_0001:
What?! Why didn't I go to a school like
that? I had to learn algebra like a sucker!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Upland_04_0002:
Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](I don't think they would have let you
major in "skipping school," Frye.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Wave_00_0000:
The secret to winning at Humpback Pump
Track? Go clockwise.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Wave_00_0001: No! The secret is going counterclockwise!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Wave_01_0000:
Alright, Big Man... You're in a battle at
Humpback Pump Track. What's your move?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Wave_01_0001:
Ay. Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Hmmm. I'd bring a blaster to flush
out any enemies hiding behind the hill!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Wave_02_0000:
Humpback Pump Track is a legendary bike
course. But wait...can Big Man even ride?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Wave_02_0001:
Ay! Ay... [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Only if someone else pedals!
My feet don't reach...)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Wave_03_0000:
Supposedly there's a great bike shop
on-site at Humpback Pump Track!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Wave_03_0001:
Ay. Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Yeah, I heard they'll match ANYONE
to a bike. Can't wait to see if it's true!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Wave_03_0002:
Custom bikes, eh? Do you suppose I could
get one with a giant dorsal fin?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Wave_03_0003:
Ay! Ay?! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](That's so cool! But...where would
you sit?!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Wave_04_0000:
There's no feeling like pumping pedals with
all your might at Humpback Pump Track...
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Wave_04_0001:
Ay? [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Didn't your parents say that riding
was too dangerous when you were a kid?)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Wave_04_0002: Yes. Too dangerous for OTHER PEOPLE.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Wave_04_0003:
Yeah, I can definitely imagine getting
obliterated by Shiver on a ten-speed...
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Yagara_00_0000: What's your strategy at Hagglefish Market?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Yagara_00_0001:
It's simple. I haggle until the merchant is
so annoyed that they give in!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Yagara_01_0000:
The central plaza is where all the action
goes down in Hagglefish Market.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Yagara_01_0001:
Ay... [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Yeah, but the side paths are where
all the sneaky folks hide out...)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Yagara_02_0000:
Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Buyer beware at Hagglefish Market!
I think my sea-cucumber phone is fake...)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Yagara_02_0001: Big Man, that's an actual cucumber.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Yagara_03_0000:
I just love Hagglefish Market...for shopping!
It's got everything! Clothes, food, jewelry...
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Yagara_03_0001:
And that one vendor who buys all the
treasure that we loot from the Crater...
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Yagara_03_0002:
Ay! AY! Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Frye! SHHH! Ahem. She was
just joking, everyone!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Yagara_04_0000:
Ay. Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](I love the inkrails at Hagglefish
Market. I can get on the roof in a jiffy!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Yagara_04_0001:
Wait. That was you on the roof of
the tent?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Yagara_04_0002:
So much for that "new species of giant
bird" you discovered, huh.
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Yunohana_00_0000:
There's a souvenir shop at Scorch Gorge
with cute stuff but PUSHY employees!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Yunohana_00_0001:
Is that why you have so many weird
key chains and little spoons?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Yunohana_01_0000:
Wouldn't it be incredible to do a huge live
show outdoors at Scorch Gorge?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Yunohana_01_0001:
Ay! Ay... [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Ooo, that's a fun idea! I wonder
how many fans we could pack in there...)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Yunohana_02_0000:
Don't tell him I told you, but I saw Judd
taking a cat nap at Scorch Gorge...
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Yunohana_02_0001:
Ay. Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](No shame in a shaded nap at the
gorge. I've done it myself!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Yunohana_03_0000:
You know those weird birdcage-type things
at Scorch Gorge? You can get inside them!
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Yunohana_03_0001:
Ay? Ay?! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](With the Zipcaster, right? But
the question is...how do you get out?!)
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Yunohana_03_0002: Yeah, how DO you get out, Frye?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Yunohana_04_0000:
Ah...Scorch Gorge. Remember how we were
movie extras there back in the early days?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Yunohana_04_0001:
Oh yeah, that was fun! What was that
movie about, anyway?
EventFlowMsg/News_VersusStage.Yunohana_04_0002:
Ay. Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](I don't know. I only watched the two
seconds we were in it.)

EventFlowMsg/Plaza_Intro.000:
Welcome to [color=0001]Splatsville[color=ffff]![page break]This is the place to see and be seen. The hottest
spot on the map!
EventFlowMsg/Plaza_Intro.001:
If you wanna make it in THIS town, you gotta
be your freshest.
EventFlowMsg/Plaza_Intro.002:
And how do you show off your extremely fresh
self? Online battles! Just hit up the [color=0001]lobby[color=ffff].[page break]Seriously, if you start making waves in battles,
everyone around here will know your name.
EventFlowMsg/Plaza_Intro.002_1:
Hey, check out the [color=0001]train station[color=ffff]![page break]Looks like you can get to Inkopolis Square
and back from here.
EventFlowMsg/Plaza_Intro.004:
You're new here, and I don't mean to alarm you, but...
that dude is seriously scoping you from the sewer.[page break]Whatever. It's fishy, but we'll get to that later.
EventFlowMsg/Plaza_Intro.005:
So where were we? Oh, right. Battles! Time to sink
into the ink!
EventFlowMsg/Plaza_Intro.006:
If you wanna get right to it, check out the [color=0001]lobby[color=ffff].
Or...follow that [color=0001]weirdo [color=ffff]down the [color=0001]sewer[color=ffff]. Up to you.

EventFlowMsg/Plaza_IntroStation.000:
Construction on the train station is complete,
so you can now visit [color=0001]Inkopolis [color=ffff]with ease![page break]Don't know Inkopolis? Well, it's a bit like
Splatsville but a little more...shiny.
EventFlowMsg/Plaza_IntroStation.001:
Here's the entrance to the [color=0001]train station[color=ffff].[page break]Now that it's easier to go back and forth, we're
hearing that all shops are better stocked...
EventFlowMsg/Plaza_IntroStation.002:
So if you've had your eye on some new gear,
it's a great time to do a little shopping!
EventFlowMsg/Plaza_IntroStation.003:
The trains even run to [color=0001]Inkopolis Square[color=ffff]![page break]Although something fishy is going on there.
Your call whether you want to get involved!

EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_BonusFirst.000: Huh? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Do we get something extra on the next floor?
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_BonusFirst.001:
Ah! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]You found a [color=0004]bonus [color=ffff]floor![page break]On floors like this, [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]you get either a [color=0004]Color-Chip
Saturation [color=ffff]or a [color=0004]Bonus Challenge[color=ffff].
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_BonusFirst.002:
A Color-Chip Saturation sets color chips to [color=0004]all empty
slots[color=ffff] in your Palette. Only for that floor though.[page break]The color chips you get are randomly picked. All they
have in common is their tone.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_BonusFirst.003:
Whereas a Bonus Challenge gives you an [color=0004]extra
objective [color=ffff]separate from the main one on the floor.[page break]You don't have to do it. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]But if you do, it'll earn you
some bonus [group=0003 type=003f params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00]Membux!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_BonusFirst.004:
Not seeing a downside here. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]What do you think, Eight?[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]
Wanna give it a go?

EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerFirst.000:
Hey, [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]what's this? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Yo, Marina! It's your diary![page break]Shouldn't you keep this under lock and key?[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
Wait, I guess you kinda did.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerFirst.001:
Oh...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] Well... [group=0001 type=0000 params=3c 00 00 00]Maybe it's for the best.[page break]It's a little embarrassing, but...[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]if you two want to
read it, [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]feel free.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerFirst.002:
You sure, 'Rina?[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00][page break]I'm gonna leave this with you, Eight. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]If you wanna
read it, you can do that from the menu on [group=0003 type=0048 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00].

EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerHalf.000:
Awesome! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]That's about half the lockers open now.[page break]We can't stop until the other half are open too, Eight![group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
I wanna see what happens next in Marina's Dev Diary!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerHalf.001: Pearl, don't drool over my diaries. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]I'm right here![page break]Also, [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]please stop reading them out loud.

EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerJem.000:
Oooh! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Some of these have Prlz in 'em! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]We can give
those to Marina for some sweet hacks.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerJem.001:
Did someone say hacking?! That's me! That's my thing![page break]Prlz are valuable, [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]but you get more after every run
at the Spire of Order. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]So don't feel like you have to
hoard them!

EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerLast.001:
I...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]did NOT expect that. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Kinda weird that your Palette
was the lockers themselves, Eight!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerLast.002:
But this is the last one, yeah? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]We just gotta
reconfigure it, and we're done here!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerLast.003:
Er, wait. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Something's odd about your Palette, Eight.[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]
It seems a bit resistant to hacking.[page break]In fact...[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]the more hacks you have active, [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]the fewer
[color=0004]color chips you can set[color=ffff].
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerLast.004:
Huh. That throws a wrench into the usual plan.[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]
I like it![page break]Alright, Eight! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]First, check with Marina to see if you
can live without any of those hacks. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Then we'll get
your Palette to the top of the Spire, no sweat!

EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerLastDiary.000:
That's the last of your dev diaries, Marina![page break]Man...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]I can't believe you were doing this the whole time
we were on tour. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]How did I never notice?!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerLastDiary.001:
Now you know how you and Eight got dragged into this.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
I'm so sorry!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerLastDiary.002:
What for? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]You were just doing your best so people
could remember how they used to be.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerLastDiary.003: Awww... [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Thanks, Pearl! That means so much!

EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerOneThird.000:
We've opened about a third of the lockers now![page break]But there's still Palettes we ain't seen yet.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] What kinda
weapons do you think they'll have?
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerOneThird.001:
Even if they're weapons you're not sure about, Eight,[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]
my hacks might help you clear the tower anyway.[page break]Just say the word so I can help!

EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerPaletteComm.1Left_001:
Y'know, we've found a lot of Palettes so far. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]But none
of them have been Eight's.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerPaletteComm.1Left_002:
You're right. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]But I'm definitely getting a signal from
Eight's Palette somewhere in those lockers.[page break]And there's one Palette left, [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]so it must be Eight's.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
Let's keep collecting keys until we find it!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerPaletteComm.BigMan_001:
Hey, [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]it's Big Man's Palette![page break]Oh man, that Ian BGM alias is super fresh.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] He shoulda
just gone with that stage name for everything.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerPaletteComm.BigMan_002:
WHAT? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Are you telling me Ian BGM and Big Man are
the same person?!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerPaletteComm.Callie_001: Aaah! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]This is Callie's Palette!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerPaletteComm.Callie_002:
Man, I haven't caught up with Callie in a minute. Hope
she's doing OK. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]She seems pretty good every time
I see her on TV.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerPaletteComm.Callie_003: Yeah. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]But can you even picture Callie NOT doing well?
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerPaletteComm.Frye_001: Yesss! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]We found Frye's Palette!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerPaletteComm.Frye_002:
Frye is so adorable. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]I love how every time we meet,
she makes a beeline right for you!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerPaletteComm.Frye_003:
Yeah, though it's always a toss-up whether she's
coming in to hug me or punch me.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerPaletteComm.Marie_001:
No way! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Marie's Palette is here too?![page break]Wait. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Then you're holding...a piece of Marie's soul?[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
That's too cool! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]And I'm close enough to TOUCH it.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
I'm freaking out over here!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerPaletteComm.Marie_002: Whoa there, 'Rina! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Breathe, girl. Find your chill.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerPaletteComm.Octavio_001: What the?! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Even Octavio has a Palette here?
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerPaletteComm.Octavio_002:
He used to be your boss, right? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]We'll put this thing
to work as revenge for him running you ragged!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerPaletteComm.Octavio_003:
I mean...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]he didn't work me THAT hard. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]But we're going
to get a lot of use out of this anyway! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Sorry, sir!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerPaletteComm.PaletteHint_001:
Come to think of it...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]the [color=0004]glowing doors[color=ffff] on these lockers[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]
seem to indicate which ones have Palettes.[page break]I'm still getting lots of Palette signals in there, [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]so keep
switching up Palettes and collecting keys!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerPaletteComm.Sheldon_001:
Oh, [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]this Palette is from Sheldon![page break]Where'd Sheldon move to again? [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Splatsville?[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
He's found a whole new audience for his lectures
on weapons, and I love that for him!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerPaletteComm.Sheldon_002: Oof. Those poor, poor saps in Splatsville...
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerPaletteComm.Shiver_001: Shiver is so graceful and elegant...
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerPaletteComm.Shiver_002:
Yeah, I guess. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]It's just, sometimes when I'm talking
to Frye,[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] I can feel Shiver's eyes boring holes in me.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerPaletteComm.Shiver_003: Really? Huh. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Can't say I've ever noticed that.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerPaletteComm.Vendor_001: Murch? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Oh yeah, [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]that little squirt!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerPaletteComm.Vendor_002:
"Little squirt"? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Pearl, he's been taller than you for
a while now.[page break]I heard that Murch found a job out of town. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]I'd love
to catch up with him for a chat.

EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerSecond.000:
Hey, a banner! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]They put all kinds of stuff in these.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
We got the keys to open any more, Eight?

EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerThird.000: What in the world? [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]This is Agent 4's Palette!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerThird.001: Oh yeah, Agent 4! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Uh, who was that again?
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerThird.002:
One of the New Squidbeak Splatoon members that
Cap'n Cuttlefish introduced us to.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerThird.003:
Ohhh yeah, the one who was supposed to be such a big
shot. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Uh, what's Agent 4's Palette doing here?
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerThird.004:
Well, [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Palettes are actually a representation of [color=0004]part of
someone's soul[color=ffff].[page break]I guess Order somehow pulled a part of Agent 4's soul
into the Memverse, turning it into a Palette.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerThird.005:
What, for real?! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Man, we better keep this with us.
Wouldn't want anything happening to it.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerThird.006:
I'm still getting signals from other Palettes in the
lockers. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Let's keep opening them as we find keys!

EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_CoinLockerTipsKey.000:
So far, we've gotten a new locker key every time we
beat a boss with a new Palette.[page break]On our next Spire of Order run,[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] why not try out a
[color=0004]Palette we don't have any keys for yet[color=ffff]?

EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D010.002: Heeey! HELLOOOOOOOOO?![group=0001 type=0000 params=28 00 00 00] Up and at 'em, [color=0004]Eight[color=ffff]!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D010.003: Yo, Eight! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]You awake or what?!

EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D020.001: Nice. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]If you hadn't come around, I didn't have a plan B!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D020.002: What's up? [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]I got something on my face?
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D020.003: Oh, right! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]You wouldn't recognize me like this.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D020.004: I'm [color=0004]Pearl[color=ffff]! [group=0001 type=0000 params=3c 00 00 00]You know, your bestie!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D020.005: [group=0004 type=0005 params=].[group=0001 type=0000 params=0a 00 00 00].[group=0001 type=0000 params=0a 00 00 00].
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D020.006: No, for serious! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]I'm legit Pearl!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D020.007: Not sure how I got this way, but here I am.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D020.008:
Not sure where [color=0004]Marina[color=ffff] went either. She's supposed to
be with me.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D020.009: Eight...[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]don't tell me you don't remember Marina either.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D020.010:
It's cool. You just woke up. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Might take some time for
your head to clear.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D020.011:
That's Regular Me on the left, OK? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]And the one on
the right is Marina!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D020.012:
You got any idea where we should go from here?
Marina's usually around to help me with that.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D020.013:
Oh! Duh! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]We should go find Marina. She'll know
what to do!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D020.014: C'mon, Eight! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Let's get going!

EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D040.001: You with those fish we busted up?!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D040.002: Cool it. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]I'm not your enemy.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D040.003: Just another bystander who got sucked in.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D040.004: I take it you two followed Marina's voice here.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D040.006: Say what?! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]You know Marina too?!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D040.007:
First things first: I'm [color=0004]Acht[color=ffff]. [group=0001 type=0000 params=3c 00 00 00]As for Marina and me...
we go way back.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D040.008: For real?! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Yo, lead with that next time!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D040.009: I'm Pearl, and this's Eight! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Cool meeting you, Acht.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D040.010: I've been in the area since I came to.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D040.011:
I heard Marina's voice from up the Spire, so I came
to find her.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D040.013:
But those bony fish found me first. I call them
[color=0004]Jelletons[color=ffff]. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]They're why I'm trapped in an elevator.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D040.014:
The Spire is crammed with Jelletons. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]This wound they
gave me hasn't healed. So I'm stuck.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D040.016:
Yikes. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Things aren't looking super good for the home
team, huh?
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D040.018:
I've been waiting for an [color=0004]Octoling with a drone[color=ffff]. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Said your
name was Eight? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]You're the one I needed to see.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D040.019:
OK, Pearl. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Now check out what happens when you set
this [color=0004]color chip [color=ffff]into that [color=0004]Palette[color=ffff].
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D040.020: Palette? [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]I'm supposed to know what that is?
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D040.021: Oh, are you talking about this thing?
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D040.022: You got it. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Now set this color chip into it.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D040.023:
OK, but whatever happens is on you. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Here goes
nothing, Eight! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Slap that chip on in there!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D040.024: WHOA! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Is it me, or did [color=0004]your weapon get stronger[color=ffff]?
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D040.025:
If you set a whole bunch of color chips in here, [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]you
could walk all over those fishy freaks!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D040.026:
No doubt. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Play your chips right, and you could make it
all the way to the top.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D040.027:
Whatever's going on in this city, Marina's in the thick
of it. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Or so I'm assuming.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D040.028:
But this injury has left me sidelined. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Our strike team
will be limited to you two.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D040.029:
We're on it, Acht! [group=0001 type=0000 params=50 00 00 00]Deep breaths, Eight. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]It's time to go
find Marina!

EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D050.002: Hey, 'Rina! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Yo, can she even hear me?!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D050.003: Guess not. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]She's all tangled up in that weird machine!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D050.005: Sit tight! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]We're gonna get you outta that thing!

EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D060.001: Uuugh... [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Is that...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Eight? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]And Pearl?
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D060.002:
ERROR. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Grayscaling interrupted. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Intruders
confirmed disorderly. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Classifying as dissidents.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D060.004:
I am[color=0004] Order [color=ffff]itself. [group=0001 type=0000 params=2d 00 00 00]A consciousness generated from
the processes of many who yearn for stability.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D060.005:
I am now fully realized. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]I therefore have no further
use for a host vessel.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D060.006: All things...[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]will be converted to memory.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D060.008: Oh, this is bad... [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]The tower's shaking like crazy!

EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D070.001: Eight![group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] Eight![group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] Please be OK!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D070.002: Oh, thank goodness. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Pearl! Eight's woken up!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D070.003: Eight! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Thank you so much for freeing me.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D070.004:
Surprised to see me in the flesh? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Marina worked some
magic and BAM! I'm back, bay-bee!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D070.005:
I'm really, really sorry. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]It was the Dramatic Days in
Orderland module that stuck you in drone form. And...
did all the other stuff too.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D070.006: Say what? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]"Dramatic Days in..."?
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D070.007: Uh,[group=0001 type=0000 params=05 00 00 00] right. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Let me back up a bit.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D070.008:
This is the [color=0004]Memverse[color=ffff]. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]It's a prototype VR...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]that is,
a virtual reality that I made.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D070.009:
Your virtual reality? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Hold up! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]You're saying we've been
in a fake place this whole time?!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D070.010:
That's right. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]The only "real" things in the Memverse
are our minds.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D070.011:
That fuzzy cloud we met was [color=0004]Order[color=ffff]. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]It took control of
me and caused the whole Memverse to go haywire.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D070.012:
It's forcibly connected who-knows-how-many people to
the Memverse. Their minds are all in here now.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D070.013: Which is how I got pulled into all this, I take it?
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D070.015:
Acht...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]I'm so sorry. I never intended for you to get
roped into my mess.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D070.016:
It's fine. We have other problems. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Like what to do about
the situation we're in.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D070.017:
You're absolutely right! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]We need to do something
about Order.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D070.024: Order's ultimate goal is a [color=0004]colorless world of order[color=ffff].
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D070.025:
A place where nobody has a will of their own. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]They just
do whatever they're told, day in, day out.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D070.026:
Order's using the Memverse to make the dream of that
changeless world a reality.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D070.027:
What's its beef with change? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Actually, hold up.[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]
I thought the Memverse isn't real?
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D070.028:
Even if it gets what it wants in the Memverse...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]who
cares? The real world stays the real world, right?
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D070.029:
Yeahhh, about that...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] Order is using what it calls
"[color=0004]Grayscaling[color=ffff]" to neutralize the will of everyone
that's trapped here.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D070.030:
So if someone goes through Grayscaling here in the
Memverse...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]it has an effect on the real person.[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]
That about sum it up?
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D070.031:
Yeah. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Anyone who goes through Grayscaling will slowly
start to lose their will in actual reality too.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D070.032:
And Order's just getting started. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]It plans to keep pulling
people into the Memverse.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D070.033:
If we don't stop it, people all over the world will lose
their wills. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Life as we know it will be over!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D070.034: Yo, that sounds BAD. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Not on our watch, Order!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D070.035: Again, I'm REALLY sorry. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]This is all my fault...
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D070.036:
Nope! Nah! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]I know you had good reasons for making
the Memverse.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D070.037:
If that creep Order hijacked your work...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]it's gonna be
sorry it ever tried!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D070.038: We're all gonna kick that loser out together!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D070.039: Aw, Pearlie! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]You say the coolest things.

EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D080.002:
A perfect world is a stable world. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]It has no need for
change. For variation.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D080.003: It has no need for desire. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]For conflict.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D080.004:
In this world, none desire what might be. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]They embrace
what is. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Their lives are peaceful ones.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D080.005:
I will achieve a quiet and peaceful world. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Reasons to
oppose this include: [group=0004 type=0005 params=].[group=0001 type=0000 params=05 00 00 00].[group=0001 type=0000 params=05 00 00 00]. ERROR:[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] no reasons found.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D080.006:
I can't deny that a chaotic world is an unstable one.[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]
That uncertainty can tire you out or make you scared
of what tomorrow might bring.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D080.007:
There've been times when I wished everything could
stay the same forever.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D080.008:
Sometimes when colors clash and mix,[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] you end up
with mud. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]But every now and then, you get to see
a beautiful rainbow!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D080.009:
And in the end...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]that's a gamble I'm willing to take!
With Pearl, and Eight, and Acht, and everyone else!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D080.010:
This world's architect...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]my creator...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]would deny me.[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]
Illogical. Irrational. ERROR.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D080.011:
ERROR.[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] ERROR.[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] ERROR.[group=0001 type=0000 params=05 00 00 00] ERROR.[group=0001 type=0000 params=05 00 00 00] ERROR. An unrecoverable
mentality error has occurred.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D080.012: The sentence for interruption of order is eradication.

EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D090.002: Such chaotic strength. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]It is fearsome.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D090.003: But the program is now fully executed.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D090.004: The rebooted world will know the tranquility of order.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D090.005: No...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] After all that, we were too late?!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D090.006: I don't want a blank world...
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D090.007: Maybe I can shut down Order's program!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D090.008: No good! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]It's propagating too fast!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D090.009: ...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Pearl...[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] I... [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]...

EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D100.001: There it is... Eight! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]I'm feeling your vibe!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D100.002: And Marina! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Your backing track SLAPS!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D100.003: Cancel that snooze button! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Hit me with the beat, DJ!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D100.005: Of what use is this resistance.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D100.007: You kidding? We're still on tour!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D100.008:
Keep your boring gigs for boring people. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]We're out
here LIVING, loser!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D100.009: Right, gang? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Crank it up!

EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D105.001: My limbs are self-animating. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Why.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D105.002:
This is outside my parameters. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]An undefined error
is occurring.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D105.003:
Ha! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]This world you dreamed up is so boring, even you
can't stand it anymore!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D105.004: But we got the ink to fix that.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D105.005: Don't get cooked... [group=0001 type=0000 params=82 00 00 00]Stay off the hook!

EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D110.001: Warning. An undefined error is occurring. Warning.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D110.004: Wait, what's that? It's...it's...[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]IT'S SO CUTE!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D110.005:
You wuined everything. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]I was so cwose to my perfect
world of order.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D110.006:
It's like Order, except...[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]a lot less scary. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]I don't think
we have much to worry about here.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D110.008: Yo, babypus! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]You were down with our music, right?
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D110.009:
We can getcha VIP seats to our show...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]IF you promise

EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D110.012:
Awright, time for us to bounce. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]We gotta get back to
the REAL Inkopolis Square!

EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D120.003:
Thanks again for helping us put a stop to Order's
terrible plan.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D120.004:
You cut Order off from most of its power. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]So there's
no need to worry about it pulling anyone else in here.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D120.005: Yeah, everything's chill! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Well. Mostly.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D120.006:
Sooo...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]the bad news is, I've discovered an issue with the
Palettes still in the Memverse.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D120.007:
Remember when I told you that Palettes are part of a
soul belonging to someone pulled into the Memverse?
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D120.008:
That shouldn't have happened, but Order pulling them
in must have forced them into becoming Palettes.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D120.008_01:
The safeguards in place to protect the soul's owner
must have been tampered with.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D120.009: Sounds like a serious security flaw.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D120.010:
Yeah. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]And if it's not fixed, it could have equally serious
consequences in the real world.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D120.011:
If we take a Palette to the [color=0004]control room[color=ffff] on the top floor
of the Spire, [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]we should be able to reconfigure the
settings to patch the issue.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D120.012:
But...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]we can only reconfigure the Palette we take with
us. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]The problem won't really be addressed until [color=0004]we go
up the Spire with every Palette[color=ffff].
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D120.013:
And the lockers are still giving off signals from Palettes
inside. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]There are still Palettes we haven't even seen!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D120.014:
OK, game plan. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]First, get our hands on all the Palettes.
Next, take every single one up every floor of the Spire.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D120.015: Sounds like...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]a big job, honestly.
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D120.016: But the sooner we get started, the sooner it'll be done!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D120.017:
Eight's a powerhouse. And with us helping? [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]We'll be
done quicker than it takes me to empty an ink tank!
EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D120.018: Yay, Pearl! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]That's the spirit!

You're so annoying! I'm not gonna let you weconfigure

HUMPH! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]I don't cawe what you say. My mind is made

HUWWUMF! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Are you making fun of me?! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]I'll turn you

Now, if you'd be so kind, pwease get wost and go

Anyway, you stawted it. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]All of you are the weason why

Ohoho! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Evewyone will be happy with me when I cwush

OK! Time for us to fight! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]And if you win, you have my

Oh, yeah. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]I guess we already proved our point with this

GWAAAH! [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]Don't you DARE pway it back! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Let's just fight

EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D140.014:
Nuh-uh, no way! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]I'm gonna make a world of order where

Evewyone helped make the Memverse, [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]so it should be

I'm sick of wooking at you dum-dums! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Go away,

Alright, we spanked you yet again. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]So...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]you gonna spill

EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D140.033:
You dwive a hard bargain, [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]but I'm a good AI who keeps

That's a good question. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]And you meanies are NEVER

EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D140.043:
I wost again... [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Why can't I win? They're a bunch of

Ummm...[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]what did you mean when you said we're the

EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D140.055:
The Octoling world used to be peaceful and stable.[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]
But it's changed. All because of the bwockheads who

Which is why an unchanging world was so appealing
to them...

YUP! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Evewyone hates the dummies who threw away the

Y'know something weird? [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]You got this look on your

alla that. [group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]But is this REALLY what you want?

Of course I wost. [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]I'm just...sniff...a weak

EventFlowMsg/Sdodr_D140.076:
Just this once...[group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]I'll wook the other way! [group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00]Do your
