LayoutMsg/Tuto_GuideMsg_00.MsgS_BasicStance: Press [group=0003 type=0003 params=00 00 20 40 00 00 00 00] to return to this view anytime.
LayoutMsg/Tuto_GuideMsg_00.MsgS_EnemyInk: Moving through enemy ink [color=0001]slows you down[color=ffff].
LayoutMsg/Tuto_GuideMsg_00.MsgS_FollowBalloon: You can move around with [group=0003 type=0007 params=00 00 20 40 00 00 00 00].
LayoutMsg/Tuto_GuideMsg_00.MsgS_IkaNobori: [color=0001]Hold [color=ffff][group=0003 type=0001 params=00 00 20 40 00 00 00 00] for a sec, then release. [color=0001]Squid Surge[color=ffff]!
LayoutMsg/Tuto_GuideMsg_00.MsgS_LookSalmon: Tilt the controller to move your [group=0003 type=0010 params=00 00 20 40 00 00 00 00]reticle.
LayoutMsg/Tuto_GuideMsg_00.MsgS_Paint: Your [group=0003 type=0011 params=00 00 20 40 00 00 00 00][color=0001]ink refills [color=ffff]while you swim.
LayoutMsg/Tuto_GuideMsg_00.MsgS_PickUpWeapon: Jump down and check it out!
LayoutMsg/Tuto_GuideMsg_00.MsgS_RThrowBomb: Don't forget to swim with [group=0003 type=000b params=00 00 20 40 00 00 00 00] to [color=0001]refill your [group=0003 type=0011 params=00 00 20 40 00 00 00 00]ink[color=ffff]!
LayoutMsg/Tuto_GuideMsg_00.MsgS_YCameraReset: Hold the controller in a [color=0001]comfy position[color=ffff], and press [group=0003 type=0003 params=00 00 20 40 00 00 00 00].
LayoutMsg/Tuto_GuideMsg_00.MsgS_ZLSquid: That's how you [group=0003 type=0013 params=00 00 20 40 00 00 00 00][color=0001]swim through ink[color=ffff]!
LayoutMsg/Tuto_GuideMsg_00.MsgS_ZRShoot: Tilt the controller to aim with your [group=0003 type=0010 params=00 00 20 40 00 00 00 00]reticle.
LayoutMsg/Tuto_GuideMsg_00.Msg_BJump: Press [group=0003 type=0001 params=00 00 20 40 00 00 00 00] to [color=0001]jump[color=ffff]—[color=0001]even in[color=ffff] [color=0001][group=0003 type=0012 params=00 00 20 40 00 00 00 00]swim form[color=ffff]!
LayoutMsg/Tuto_GuideMsg_00.Msg_EnemyInk: Use [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 20 40 00 00 00 00] to [color=0001]spray your ink color[color=ffff] over that [color=0001]enemy ink[color=ffff]!
LayoutMsg/Tuto_GuideMsg_00.Msg_FollowBalloon: Pop the [group=0003 type=0014 params=00 00 20 40 00 00 00 00]balloons as you go!
LayoutMsg/Tuto_GuideMsg_00.Msg_IkaNobori: Ink that wall, then hop on in [color=0001]swim form[color=ffff]...
LayoutMsg/Tuto_GuideMsg_00.Msg_LookSalmon: Aim for your [color=0001]little [group=0003 type=000f params=00 00 20 40 00 00 00 00]Smallfry buddy[color=ffff]!
LayoutMsg/Tuto_GuideMsg_00.Msg_Paint: You can even [color=0001][group=0003 type=0013 params=00 00 20 40 00 00 00 00]swim up walls[color=ffff]!
LayoutMsg/Tuto_GuideMsg_00.Msg_PickUpWeapon: Looks like your [group=0003 type=000f params=00 00 20 40 00 00 00 00]buddy found something.
LayoutMsg/Tuto_GuideMsg_00.Msg_RThrowBomb: Try throwing [group=0003 type=0015 params=00 00 20 40 00 00 00 00][color=0001]bombs[color=ffff] with [group=0003 type=000a params=00 00 20 40 00 00 00 00]!
LayoutMsg/Tuto_GuideMsg_00.Msg_ThroughMesh: You can [color=0001]swim through grates[color=ffff] in [group=0003 type=0013 params=00 00 20 40 00 00 00 00]swim form!
LayoutMsg/Tuto_GuideMsg_00.Msg_YCameraReset: You can[color=0001] reset the camera [color=ffff]with [group=0003 type=0003 params=00 00 20 40 00 00 00 00]!
LayoutMsg/Tuto_GuideMsg_00.Msg_ZLSquid: Press [group=0003 type=000b params=00 00 20 40 00 00 00 00] to enter [group=0003 type=0012 params=00 00 20 40 00 00 00 00]swim form!
LayoutMsg/Tuto_GuideMsg_00.Msg_ZRShoot: Press [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 20 40 00 00 00 00] to blast those [group=0003 type=0014 params=00 00 20 40 00 00 00 00]balloons with ink!

LayoutMsg/Tuto_TutorialPicture_00.T_Msg_03: we'll hit you with the basics!

LayoutMsg/VS_Beaten_00.105:
Splatted by the
Sprinkler of Doom!

LayoutMsg/VS_StandbyScene_00.000: Ink the most turf to win!
LayoutMsg/VS_StandbyScene_00.007:
Take control of the Ultra Signal
and ink the most turf to win!
LayoutMsg/VS_StandbyScene_00.008:
Defend the Ultra Signal and ink the
most turf to win!

LogicMsg/1shot.10e33f5e-4c85-4cb2-82b0-71018c52deef: Maybe there's something helpful hiding in this mess...
LogicMsg/1shot.2926ba6f-98c5-4cd5-9d06-a9d9f87b5ebb:
How are you supposed to break all of these targets
with a single shot?! It's impossible!

LogicMsg/BigWorld.0360d9c8-29b0-4611-b2c9-9c9855d90c6f:
Why is this pipe so long? I'm going to take a nap.
Wake me up when we get there.
LogicMsg/BigWorld.04075ea7-f96c-48a5-85e5-44a8c4943536:
Can we do something to pass the time?[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] Let's play 20
questions![group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] I'll go. Is it blue? Is it huge? Is it a whale?
LogicMsg/BigWorld.065abbdc-b41c-440c-a0a6-925719c993de: Ooo! Be sure to pick that up!
LogicMsg/BigWorld.231349e6-976e-4905-9d7b-62e7b4ca7f32:
You're gonna need more [color=0001]Power Eggs[color=ffff]...
C'mon, go find some!
LogicMsg/BigWorld.2d618c7e-162c-4ac8-ad73-bd1df52c7bb5: Ah! There are two more pipes way back there!
LogicMsg/BigWorld.3634d043-907e-40f4-9146-a601b39bb999:
And WHOA. Close-up view of the fuzziest rocket
in history to your right.
LogicMsg/BigWorld.47993a16-6ad3-4884-8f36-468da3b7f63e: Whee! It's like I'm right there with you, Agent 3!
LogicMsg/BigWorld.4fb26ef1-bccd-48e9-9358-020346038435: Mmm... I could get used to this.
LogicMsg/BigWorld.62445050-1d0d-4481-8992-349279852c1f:
Seeing you in that pipe reminds me of when Agent 2
and I used to work in a warehouse... Good times.
LogicMsg/BigWorld.6809a38c-50bf-4bd8-a281-2f56d7c7e5a5: Hey, your little buddy found something!
LogicMsg/BigWorld.85e8c9f1-fe2d-4c56-8830-72475250178a:
Smallfry's not touching that Fuzzball till it gets some
[color=0001]Power Eggs[color=ffff]. Hit [group=0003 type=0008 params=cd cc 4c 3f 00 00 00 00] to give it some!
LogicMsg/BigWorld.85f1c5e1-b146-4ee2-aefc-1919b917dee0:
Now I'm suddenly panicking about Agent 3 getting
stuck in the middle somehow...
LogicMsg/BigWorld.92c20f80-9335-4aa1-94bf-d600f721022a:
Heroes get up no matter how many times they fall.
...That's what the Captain says, anyway.
LogicMsg/BigWorld.a4a4222c-a8a7-4259-b582-758c480947d4: Power Eggs! Nice! Can't have too many.
LogicMsg/BigWorld.afd67f37-d756-46ca-9159-44bce594dce9: I think Smallfry is trying to tell you something...
LogicMsg/BigWorld.b0807a37-df8e-448f-9fc4-bb1540bcc4a3: Is this one the farthest out? Sure feels like it.
LogicMsg/BigWorld.b3da7fea-aac5-436e-b3fb-50b14dda1869:
To your right, you can see a mysterious fuzzy rocket
in the distance. Huh, that's a new sentence.
LogicMsg/BigWorld.bef5a5c2-5dbc-42aa-9567-c671a043c46b: I just hope Gramps is safe wherever he is...
LogicMsg/BigWorld.c5812a5c-191a-43d3-ad07-e767268726b7: What did they even DO with these pipes?
LogicMsg/BigWorld.c7fa03f7-7210-48c4-943c-c3ea8f3bafa9:
I'm sure we'll find out when we get there.
For better or for worse.
LogicMsg/BigWorld.d67e8a8b-67ec-4b16-aa4f-58883fa1065d: I'm preeetty sure you don't have enough [color=0001]Power Eggs[color=ffff].
LogicMsg/BigWorld.e00d3639-beb7-4e24-91e7-0e547ae241a3:
[group=0004 type=0005 params=]... ... ... AHHHH![group=0001 type=0000 params=1e 00 00 00] I was holding my breath.
Don't try that at home.
LogicMsg/BigWorld.e765fc6f-5aca-45bf-bf24-2e2e28ae0a9c:
Alright...let's see what we can find out at
the next site!
LogicMsg/BigWorld.f3df7e2f-f912-46d8-bb41-426d4a606397:
I don't know if I can ever wrap myself in a fuzzy
blanket again after seeing this.
LogicMsg/BigWorld.f97bcace-0ec0-4d7b-986c-39d6a8c60651:
What was that in the water? I thought
I saw something.
LogicMsg/BigWorld.fa23145f-0019-49dc-8680-04fb921adbee:
If things aren't going your way, maybe take a break.
I've been on one for years.

LogicMsg/CraterFirst00.01e79298-775f-47c5-85c8-7f8814007952:
Tryin' to splat juuust so? Aim carefully with
the [group=0003 type=0010 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] in the middle of your screen.
LogicMsg/CraterFirst00.0d515dff-a5fe-4848-8e7b-bb14015573a5:
Blammo! That was somethin', wasn't it? Those're called
[color=0001]balloon fish[color=ffff], and they go kablooey when you pop 'em.
LogicMsg/CraterFirst00.0db8fc65-e008-4237-a01f-a1f55b86144f: Hey, that's a [color=0001]launchpad[color=ffff]! Hop on and buckle up.
LogicMsg/CraterFirst00.3dcf2629-4914-4166-ae15-8420cbccc5bd:
If you get discombobulated, you can [color=0001]reset the camera[color=ffff]
with [group=0003 type=0003 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00]. It's a real neat trick.
LogicMsg/CraterFirst00.53f1afa7-5ba3-4033-a209-55b886048694: Here we go! It's the real deal, Agent 3!
LogicMsg/CraterFirst00.5e02fb84-c754-4245-a412-83977dfceac2:
Ah! Another job for your Smallfry buddy.
Press [group=0003 type=000a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to give it a toss!
LogicMsg/CraterFirst00.76286180-bd10-4637-a645-4064e9819185:
REAL quick before you engage... When the goin' gets
tough, the tough hide behind walls. No shame in it!
LogicMsg/CraterFirst00.a05a0e60-3ebf-4d19-bed2-4850c8d9fd3a:
Take a good look around. You see somethin' you wanna
ink, you press [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to fire away!
LogicMsg/CraterFirst00.a0d33691-d114-48a6-a5f6-e700aa8683f6:
Ah, you found some [color=0001]armor[color=ffff]. Slap that on, and it'll
give you a little protection against enemy ink.
LogicMsg/CraterFirst00.aae850dd-dfee-4660-aaaa-d49bb37e8d3a: Wow! That crate never stood a chance!
LogicMsg/CraterFirst00.bd611283-f774-49e0-a5c7-bcac89954652:
Remember—you can use [group=0003 type=0008 params=cd cc 4c 3f 00 00 00 00] to look around.
Think before you ink! Then let loose. Hah!
LogicMsg/CraterFirst00.d2124b23-2490-4c11-b51b-1b785d685ccb:
Lookin' at a faraway crate and dreaming? Maybe
your [color=0001]Smallfry [color=ffff]buddy can help. Try pressing [group=0003 type=000a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00]!
LogicMsg/CraterFirst00.ddfce6b9-32a3-4745-9ad5-eb4a49b7f1bf:
Ah, looks like you found a [color=0001]splat switch[color=ffff]. Go ahead—splat
it and see what happens.
LogicMsg/CraterFirst00.e8bf642e-9bcf-4457-a923-611c068468ad:
That's a [color=0001]Zapfish[color=ffff]! Ink up that force field until it bursts,
and then bring it on home.

LogicMsg/CraterFourth00.27258447-a228-41d4-9b01-6b7fe7baa10b: Ba-BAM! Way to make a mess!
LogicMsg/CraterFourth00.39f3aa7d-bf03-4602-a33f-f3821ca2e68e:
Heads up, Agent 3...your special gauge is full.
You can press [group=0003 type=0008 params=cd cc 4c 3f 00 00 00 00] to activate a [color=0001]Splashdown[color=ffff]!
LogicMsg/CraterFourth00.40e171e4-7230-47b0-8081-e171324ca65e:
Looks free and clear up ahead...and that sets off
my alarm bells! Be careful, Agent 3!
LogicMsg/CraterFourth00.69362011-33f7-47cf-90fe-17b87ec8c9eb:
Your [color=0001]Splashdown [color=ffff]special is ready for action again.
Press [group=0003 type=0008 params=cd cc 4c 3f 00 00 00 00] when you wanna make a splash!
LogicMsg/CraterFourth00.74a57e1d-40ab-4ee1-8ba6-8f2255e0b421:
Try pressin' [group=0003 type=000a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to throw your [color=0001]Smallfry[color=ffff]
and distract 'em!
LogicMsg/CraterFourth00.74e8d6b8-9e17-4119-a6a7-7e3060b5011a:
There's always at least one more hidin' out...
That's a Cuttlefish guarantee!
LogicMsg/CraterFourth00.799a5ab8-89bb-43f2-986f-9da8260fd10e:
You might make good use outta those walls.
See if you can get any closer...
LogicMsg/CraterFourth00.a5acbc55-e246-4fd7-8972-c21f64d1e783:
This place is packed with Octarians! Take aim,
and then take 'em out!
LogicMsg/CraterFourth00.ae1da840-6d66-43a8-9c3f-36b87ad32bfc:
You've taken some hits! Your [color=0001]Hero Suit[color=ffff] is damaged!
[color=0001]Submerge yourself[color=ffff] in some ink to fix it up quick!
LogicMsg/CraterFourth00.aeac4508-24ad-47c9-87bd-db0cf16cdcf5:
Whew. Thanks for savin' the suit. And, uh...
congrats on surviving and all.
LogicMsg/CraterFourth00.b9f7356a-63c0-4bb6-a375-0b26c6f28088:
Well done! Looks like you got a whole mess of
pillars movin'.
LogicMsg/CraterFourth00.c958b75c-f9b7-476e-be7c-6710929b2154: Nice inking! Looks like you activated some kinda pillar...
LogicMsg/CraterFourth00.e01f0b1a-47d9-48ad-be24-96e950c7cdd5:
Ha! I knew it. That won't be the last of 'em.
You can count on that. Stay on your toes!
LogicMsg/CraterFourth00.ee4a0fa1-d57e-40b1-9381-8487ba1c31bf: You thinking of just jumpin' in there? Be careful...

LogicMsg/CraterSecond00.063057dc-6367-46c7-ad8c-4157a13ecf6f:
Hey, those're [color=0001]dash tracks [color=ffff]up ahead! Dive onto one,
and you'll go flyin'!
LogicMsg/CraterSecond00.3c65ff85-1310-4b35-a2d7-39789d76a492: Booyah! Now just grab that [color=0001]Zapfish[color=ffff] and skedaddle!
LogicMsg/CraterSecond00.762f2d5c-6af2-4c2f-8784-fdaeda4a9452:
Not sure what you're lookin' for, but I don't think
it's here, kiddo.
LogicMsg/CraterSecond00.bd6545ac-4bde-419d-afd5-009d3f4b1b63:
Now's the time to squid after it! Press [group=0003 type=000b params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to
bloop [color=0001]into the ink[color=ffff] and start swimmin'!

LogicMsg/CraterThird00.1ed6a49e-02f4-4a9b-af33-e8f201375cb5: How 'bout that. Nice moves you got there!
LogicMsg/CraterThird00.2a6f3a3f-1b16-4972-9232-63fe2acd38f2: Thar she glows! I can see the [color=0001]Zapfish [color=ffff]from here.
LogicMsg/CraterThird00.2ba5d4e9-597f-4de1-8c73-48131e6f5fd0:
Remember—you can slip under or through [color=0001]grates[color=ffff]
by pressin' [group=0003 type=000b params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to get into swim form.
LogicMsg/CraterThird00.3059a4ae-0a59-4c06-abdb-3f0fd9bbffad:
Aha! You activated an [color=0001]inkrail[color=ffff]! Hop on and ride it
by pressing [group=0003 type=000b params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00].
LogicMsg/CraterThird00.395e39cc-c42c-4d0f-8a6c-f053f3a18089: If your ink won't reach, it's [color=0001]Smallfry[color=ffff]'s time to shine!
LogicMsg/CraterThird00.54b9bec6-7e26-4773-8538-28b481d5f874:
You wanna get to what's inside that [group=0003 type=001b params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0001]vault[color=ffff]?
You gotta find a [group=0003 type=001a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0001]key[color=ffff]!
LogicMsg/CraterThird00.bb1da935-3fe2-4326-b66c-267b2580f4a3:
Think you could [color=0001]jump[color=ffff] from one [color=0001]inkrail [color=ffff]to another?
It's worth a shot!
LogicMsg/CraterThird00.c0b184e2-64c7-458a-854e-100541badfcd:
Now, don't panic, but if you let go of [group=0003 type=000b params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00],
you'll fall to your doom. So hold on tight!
LogicMsg/CraterThird00.c65af139-bb36-4136-91b9-1dcc5f97c140:
Try as you might, I don't think you're gonna be
able to hop onto the inkrail from here...
LogicMsg/CraterThird00.dc655922-99dc-4d59-baae-313ee714ea11: Well, well, well. Another [color=0001]vault[color=ffff]. Find the [color=0001]key[color=ffff]!
LogicMsg/CraterThird00.f2834fc5-0e87-45c1-8a2e-25b997fde6fa: There it is! Grab that [color=0001]key [color=ffff]and unlock the vault.
LogicMsg/CraterThird00.f875fdf4-5f72-4172-87fb-3c99f8417f46: There you go. Now ink up that thingamabob!

LogicMsg/EX01.3a9e70dc-bcf0-404a-ad73-c0fa71d5eeb8:
Try another [color=0001]Squid Surge [color=ffff]here. Just check
the area above you and time it right!
LogicMsg/EX01.57ba1eb7-b557-4858-a35e-805d1a6d49f4: You made it! Let's see where that [color=0001]launchpad[color=ffff] takes you.
LogicMsg/EX01.6c33d03a-c557-43a8-8002-509dc5db8e3f: Guess you have to go down from here...
LogicMsg/EX01.8427df56-c753-4fdf-929c-05b6e62633e2: Ha! Now you're just showing off.
LogicMsg/EX01.a448547a-c7b3-45dd-9160-e68aff42382d: Don't give up! You can do this!
LogicMsg/EX01.c04a9c6a-a5c6-44ed-8591-f2c6346db1a2: Ooo! You could [color=0001]Squid Roll[color=ffff] toward the platform here.
LogicMsg/EX01.d37fdfb0-36f6-466b-85a2-ed952a4e5b1a: WHOA! Keep watching your step, I guess!
LogicMsg/EX01.d9e8e02f-575c-4476-84c5-b23064537992:
Oops! You went too far. A backward [color=0001]Squid Roll [color=ffff]might
drop you riiight onto the next platform...
LogicMsg/EX01.ee5f0c1b-728f-4fed-8a5a-5aa902a05ae5: Ooo, you can ink the bottom half of this pillar!

LogicMsg/EX02.64cd2b37-6234-4985-aa5f-1e714b79be66: Yeah, great job! You're not done yet, but keep it up!
LogicMsg/EX02.afdd96e1-52c6-48ed-bfb7-37f49c10512e: You probably have to pop ALL of these [color=0001]targets[color=ffff], huh?

LogicMsg/EX03.65fd376b-37b7-4f6b-80e5-4f005061e83e:
Ooo, there are [color=0001]soaker blocks [color=ffff]in here. You probably don't
need an explanation for those by now, right?
LogicMsg/EX03.6899fef3-4267-4716-be12-657117d1a1a5:
It's shrinking back from those blocks behind you!
Hurry, Agent 3! MOVE IT!
LogicMsg/EX03.96f7d1d6-6d4f-4f15-95a6-da999ee4be97:
The end of this stage must be at the last stop...
but I guess that's obvious, huh?
LogicMsg/EX03.9c20e33e-1fab-4d87-89d9-74596a9b059a: Hey, you can finally see the last stop! So close!
LogicMsg/EX03.d83154b8-01fc-48de-a840-77ab0316d0f3: Should be easy peasy for Agent 3 and li'l Smallfry!
LogicMsg/EX03.e8293ce1-3217-401a-b658-fc334911d623: I spy an [color=0001]Octocommander[color=ffff]. Be careful up ahead!

LogicMsg/EX04.1041e5cf-246b-405c-8ecd-4c05ced0ce08: Was that all of them? I think that was all of them...
LogicMsg/EX04.11e8d2d7-66d9-44dd-b30d-cd706d4cd22a: Only three more to go. Be careful!
LogicMsg/EX04.3f9af97a-fb90-473d-9e57-3321de494cdf:
Look! Each time you grab a can, the next
one appears on the other side.
LogicMsg/EX04.550e2c40-300a-49c9-9a59-9fbb0074a66e: What? There are more of them?!
LogicMsg/EX04.562c0cb6-b4cf-48c5-9ff6-532cd49be2a5: Wait—why am I worried? You're you! Go splat 'em!
LogicMsg/EX04.8032c2a4-5460-4072-b055-119a783f9379: Oh! Some [color=0001]armor[color=ffff]! Grab it, grab it, grab it!
LogicMsg/EX04.b94869fd-1c6f-49f6-8603-13613b6c0db8: Hmph! That was the last of 'em, right?
LogicMsg/EX04.c04d8748-7e36-49f2-97be-657eb106fefa: Only three more. Don't slow down now, Agent 3!
LogicMsg/EX04.c365fb39-46d1-4141-a930-e3067fb9b903: Is that the goal back there? Like, waaay back there?
LogicMsg/EX04.ed69d6bd-4b38-4271-85e7-78d545dea1a8: Seriously! You were SO fresh out there. Congrats!
LogicMsg/EX04.f620dbc0-1edd-446a-a571-398f81165087: Oh, come on! There's even MORE of them?!

LogicMsg/LaunchPadWorld.08e83b0f-327b-41a0-9a67-f473797243c1: There are three components to my business plan...
LogicMsg/LaunchPadWorld.119b6802-4b5f-4eb5-8680-7a8960cf6afd: Oh, sure. NOW they want to help.
LogicMsg/LaunchPadWorld.124d4a2e-bac1-4664-b26d-490b2b13d5d1:
I must leverage the suffering of my employees into
a brighter, fuzzier future for all!
LogicMsg/LaunchPadWorld.24e4bd9e-bdfc-428d-8b52-482fbec38cd0:
Your brain...ensconced though it may be in your
hideous form...contains the beautiful essence I need!
LogicMsg/LaunchPadWorld.2c37b6c3-0025-4610-b3dc-b8addf67d8de:
I can't stop thinking about poor Gramps...all alone up
there somewhere. We've got to focus and move on!
LogicMsg/LaunchPadWorld.2c6b1709-ced4-4648-8432-242055fab416:
The world as it exists now is out of balance. One
cannot run a world—or a business—in this manner.
LogicMsg/LaunchPadWorld.310d9b6b-e68c-4e63-bd71-d797eee64837:
Anyway, if you really DO want help, I sure can't do
much like this. Untie me, and we'll yak about it.
LogicMsg/LaunchPadWorld.37b988b5-a494-491e-aa12-f05c8b0b75cd:
Um, it seems like things are going kind of badly
for Gramps right now...
LogicMsg/LaunchPadWorld.37e93cf2-24d0-46b9-aded-1ee9433b2cb3: I mean...we're standing right here. We're helping too!
LogicMsg/LaunchPadWorld.424ea49b-c15e-4ead-ba3f-0c939b8042e5:
For now...I will let the Fuzzy Ooze spread.
And watch the Golden Eggs pile up...
LogicMsg/LaunchPadWorld.578b79e3-214a-427f-914c-9b50de941021:
Yeah. I hope his brain can hold out until we get there.
Please hurry, Agent 3!
LogicMsg/LaunchPadWorld.6350126b-3ef9-4ad7-9ad0-ca09e0b4090a: My employees have been extremely diligent.
LogicMsg/LaunchPadWorld.66257e90-944d-44f6-9952-bb3eabdde395:
That's right. We plan to sell the treasure and divide the
profits among the needy. We'll keep a...shallow cut.
LogicMsg/LaunchPadWorld.672a8b0a-b3c2-41c2-9fdc-7961d29cf7c7:
Hey. Buddy. You talkin' to me? 'Cause I got NO idea
what you're saying.
LogicMsg/LaunchPadWorld.6b786032-0556-42f6-b21b-98704cddb6da:
Hey, so this has been bugging me... Why were you
after the treasure, anyway? Just 'cause...treasure?
LogicMsg/LaunchPadWorld.71217ddf-2270-49e4-a013-b6fd21b79dac:
We're doing it for Splatsville! Not everyone there is
as fresh as we are. Some of them are really hurting!
LogicMsg/LaunchPadWorld.76aa7cf7-8b5d-4ed7-ac3a-779576f7d7c6:
To be a visionary in business—and in life—one must
be prepared to make tough decisions.
LogicMsg/LaunchPadWorld.782b95b0-e0ef-496e-8b6b-806af7b94ec8:
Ropes? Those are Corporate Engagement Facilitators.
And they are helping me save the world.
LogicMsg/LaunchPadWorld.786e3a44-d228-4b61-a0a2-30cfa35b2455:
Leave my brain outta this! HEY! What's that for?
Get away from me! AAAH!
LogicMsg/LaunchPadWorld.795e7776-bc53-4c71-a4c2-a4547ed29e33:
Oh, I get it. You've gone fishin'. Completely out to sea.
You're just trawling us, right?
LogicMsg/LaunchPadWorld.8238efc5-6a86-4d96-8228-579f9c9814ae: As CEO, I must be the one to restore balance to nature.
LogicMsg/LaunchPadWorld.96b15df9-567b-469a-83fb-95cf8136e15d:
What are you blatherin' on about? HEY!
D-don't come any closer...
LogicMsg/LaunchPadWorld.9bba56d3-c861-4a1f-8abf-fbc71033df64:
Whoa. You're actually heroes. And here we thought...
Well, I don't want to say what we thought.
LogicMsg/LaunchPadWorld.bd1e958c-a233-4f81-8cc7-2dc35d2a685b:
I simply require a representative of Earth. Like you.
Don't you see? You're going to help me.
LogicMsg/LaunchPadWorld.c7f4f901-fd48-4d96-9671-805c61560a0b:
And together we shall bristle forth...into a fuzzy
and profitable new era!
LogicMsg/LaunchPadWorld.caf38b73-bbfa-4f7d-909a-fa84d9dbd9f9: Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Yeah, don't forget about us. Let's go!)
LogicMsg/LaunchPadWorld.ce851d6f-84d4-4b70-adbd-ed19657b7d01: Never fear. You will be free soon.
LogicMsg/LaunchPadWorld.d1161297-75ee-4f83-91a1-0f34225d1b9b:
The vessel. The spirit. And the wisdom of ages.
Someone is taking notes, yes?
LogicMsg/LaunchPadWorld.d73abc52-4a26-41be-a3c9-a10e0a8957c2:
I can't believe they turned out to be so nice.
And so FAMILIAR. Where have I seen them...
LogicMsg/LaunchPadWorld.d83a6ff6-db13-4d73-8d6a-fc706cba5c40:
Alright, Grizz, or whatever your name is...
What's the deal with these ropes?
LogicMsg/LaunchPadWorld.e84f631b-0ed6-4987-9624-7c23a3828710:
Mammals and marine creatures have traded places.
And not for the better.

LogicMsg/Msn_LastBoss01.14e090a0-ad4d-49b3-b282-a66c43f18975: Mr. Grizz is sitting down! He's up to something...
LogicMsg/Msn_LastBoss01.5c7e2651-66a4-4bb4-beb0-a423e3a38b06: Whoa! A [group=0003 type=0016 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0001]Fuzzball[color=ffff] came out!
LogicMsg/Msn_LastBoss01.5eafff55-1554-4069-9ed4-6e76eae1e1ad:
Try inking that one weird splotch, and see if he
has any reaction!
LogicMsg/Msn_LastBoss01.76931577-5e70-4013-b718-cea1a9a7bf6c: Keep it up! You're halfway through a full rotation!
LogicMsg/Msn_LastBoss01.b40eab39-2c05-4490-9388-6c28ed8412b9: What's up with the oozy splotches on his belly?
LogicMsg/Msn_LastBoss01.b833dc76-cfa8-48f8-a5e3-2cefa214b43e: A Golden Egg! You might be able to use that!
LogicMsg/Msn_LastBoss01.c5269e9f-fc25-4e20-b635-0fde232b354b: Looks like he's gonna roll again. Brace yourself!
LogicMsg/Msn_LastBoss01.cd16b0b0-c294-4093-87f8-e70e59855fe6: Nice work, Agent 3—and Smallfry too! Keep going!
LogicMsg/Msn_LastBoss01.fe9b924a-0c3a-4338-b6b5-0a0a4bda6170:
He's making the whole rocket rotate!
Move with the rotation, Agent 3!

LogicMsg/Msn_LastBoss02.1bf6d535-17ab-4ddb-a558-b732df112665: That's it! Keep holding him down!
LogicMsg/Msn_LastBoss02.20c3b73e-003b-4cca-8e4f-70d75bf125f8: Don't hit those things! They'll send you flying!
LogicMsg/Msn_LastBoss02.405f7ea6-69b1-472a-8305-5f3b2d4bcd16: Make sure you're in range of the Fuzzball, kiddo!
LogicMsg/Msn_LastBoss02.4405a677-71c3-4133-a4fa-2a4a5df7d38c: YES! Go, Hugefry! Get in there!
LogicMsg/Msn_LastBoss02.54315d73-6f63-4a15-a37f-1c914e0b8ff5: You slow down when the Ink Vac is active. Stay alert!
LogicMsg/Msn_LastBoss02.5458b414-d635-45c9-a687-69b6e0d5b755: I'll TELL you what! We fire that fuzz right back!
LogicMsg/Msn_LastBoss02.590bafcb-c7eb-4f6d-9b0c-a0a3af789b4b: Aaay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Now! While you can!)
LogicMsg/Msn_LastBoss02.5eb2b808-0591-4f3b-840b-eac634111485: You [color=0001]can't suck up[color=ffff] the fakes?! Yikes!
LogicMsg/Msn_LastBoss02.5f7de01d-7332-4a0b-bacc-e6a1d679076c: First rule of the battlefield! NEVER GIVE UP!
LogicMsg/Msn_LastBoss02.7589e7e7-88ba-4bfd-9ce9-a157c767e4ad:
You've got to get closer. Use [group=0003 type=0007 params=cd cc 4c 3f 00 00 00 00] to steer and
move the Octobot King forward!
LogicMsg/Msn_LastBoss02.81860e16-bae3-4663-9fc1-8ea5106a460a: GYAH! Don't fall for the fakes! You can't suck 'em up!
LogicMsg/Msn_LastBoss02.8c58f4b3-8880-4d61-b773-cc5d2f413253:
You got all of the Fuzzballs... Now what?
He's still on the move!
LogicMsg/Msn_LastBoss02.93825f65-ce08-4d18-b61a-884d256302e6:
The Ink Vac will stretch waaay out there
if you hold [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00]!
LogicMsg/Msn_LastBoss02.9da62711-da15-438a-a2e0-4d49204e33c9:
Hop in with [group=0003 type=000b params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00], and use [group=0003 type=0007 params=cd cc 4c 3f 00 00 00 00] to steer and
move forward!
LogicMsg/Msn_LastBoss02.9f0b1ca9-27bb-479e-b733-2211cd72ad08: Keep the enemy in sight, and aim carefully!
LogicMsg/Msn_LastBoss02.a421dc52-08e6-42ad-9756-08fd7aab7e8b: Yesss! Just one more to go!
LogicMsg/Msn_LastBoss02.c700b25f-f1d9-4871-8ad9-616340785ac9:
The [color=0001]Ink Vac will extend [color=ffff]when you hold [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00],
so reach for the Fuzzballs and suck 'em up!
LogicMsg/Msn_LastBoss02.da1d6d58-4576-4114-b4ab-7a9b5015eb5c: This is it, Agent 3! IT'S NOW OR NEVER!
LogicMsg/Msn_LastBoss02.df3251b6-c87f-4551-9534-9da2952f86c2:
"Blast the stuffing out of him with [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00]!"
That's an order from the Captain!
LogicMsg/Msn_LastBoss02.f91218a5-c3c7-4da1-8506-86fa3dc1e1b4: There are [color=0001]fake [color=ffff]Fuzzballs[color=0001] [color=ffff]floatin' out there! Be careful!
LogicMsg/Msn_LastBoss02.fba52049-0ecd-4aef-a1c7-2b6893643a55: There are more Fuzzballs up ahead! Get the next one!

LogicMsg/Msn_MantaKing.09120582-2c84-4476-a549-010ce3850747:
There has to be some way to stop the Octopods
from popping out of his shadows...
LogicMsg/Msn_MantaKing.232b7991-d835-44b3-a653-d69940ceb433:
You'll get sniped if you stand still. Focus on
inking the ground so you can keep moving!
LogicMsg/Msn_MantaKing.2ac482b6-f6f9-4707-8978-24651cc5c9a5:
"The energy in here... He must be back for more!"
That's what the Captain is saying, anyway.
LogicMsg/Msn_MantaKing.3fcbfd48-cc95-4f8b-a58e-9b8d43d3e66d: The Captain's cheering you on! "Great job, Agent 3!"
LogicMsg/Msn_MantaKing.452d8ad9-4222-4ce8-b4eb-77b2a92bd35f: AAAY! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Watch me slink through this ink!)
LogicMsg/Msn_MantaKing.74a3120b-23e9-41ab-8f0a-8fd529f4fbbe:
Well, it's not Gramps...but we should probably grab this
thing anyway since we fought for it.
LogicMsg/Msn_MantaKing.b566ac7a-5b19-467b-90ad-ab165325e580: Aaay? [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Can you guess which me is the REAL me?)
LogicMsg/Msn_MantaKing.b653c1fd-2c36-4c05-a80a-d40ab4c09fdb: Oh! His actual body is out! Strike now, Agent 3!
LogicMsg/Msn_MantaKing.cc9a4652-e654-4445-a7b3-66a968ca8157: Don't stop now, or you'll get sniped!
LogicMsg/Msn_MantaKing.ce0bd2fa-0b02-4c63-b02f-68f8a3855351:
Oof. This guy's pretty tough... Maybe you should
upgrade your Hero Gear first!
LogicMsg/Msn_MantaKing.d1871aff-5347-4848-938f-9c98f6962bb9: He's out again! Let 'em have it, Agent 3!
LogicMsg/Msn_MantaKing.da34f305-1d1b-4e9e-862f-908fd644c916: Aaay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Check out my sweet moves!)
LogicMsg/Msn_MantaKing.e6d8bdb9-dd16-4f31-9c65-c33fd3262c5d:
Our Captain is picking up a strong signal!
"It might be Ex-Captain Cuttlefish!"
LogicMsg/Msn_MantaKing.f2dc7fe9-71df-4982-89e4-45e86c9b483d: Aaay? [group=0004 type=0005 params=](No hard feelings when you lose, OK?)

LogicMsg/Msn_MorayKing.151c3e8e-7f4d-4cb2-a6de-92a845203563: Something tells me Frye hasn't learned her lesson...
LogicMsg/Msn_MorayKing.267d4b6a-938e-4299-9114-5c0c237eed1d:
I'm getting a strong reading up ahead.
It might be Gramps!
LogicMsg/Msn_MorayKing.2f60a2c2-89a7-4416-9256-6d770f0cf5c4:
Looks like her eels stay down after you defeat 'em.
Take out as many as you can!
LogicMsg/Msn_MorayKing.58291d68-a1ff-4d42-b0f5-3cd9fd73f8b0: HEY! Take your hits like an eel! Don't fly back at ME!
LogicMsg/Msn_MorayKing.76d96cc6-4f03-4468-9f64-27dae9785d2b:
"Make those eels squeal!" Wow, the Captain
is fired up.
LogicMsg/Msn_MorayKing.77599259-3f1b-424b-9086-08c6b1a9da1e: OK, OK! Let's take it from the top!
LogicMsg/Msn_MorayKing.84c9343c-f968-4176-849b-0cf0d73ccbf1: Ahaha! You're probably right. She's a feisty one.
LogicMsg/Msn_MorayKing.9f507447-c945-4cbb-92e8-30ca19d64e90:
Oh. The reading was coming from...this thing.
Well, we fought for it, so nab it anyway!
LogicMsg/Msn_MorayKing.a1800bfb-698e-47d7-ab51-5e0e21b7a8c2:
If this fight is too tough, upgrading your Hero Gear
might help a whooole lot.
LogicMsg/Msn_MorayKing.c7fc3a1d-2276-480b-9771-3acd94d83b31: GWAH! You threw my balance off!
LogicMsg/Msn_MorayKing.e9749077-cca7-40c7-aa9e-251fe320ace9:
Ooo, hey! If you beat up the masked eels, they'll hit
her instead of you!
LogicMsg/Msn_MorayKing.eac1d387-ba77-4938-95ce-1d12f1606d89: Ready or not, here we come!

LogicMsg/Msn_R_01.0a57495b-c692-43d9-8414-2ee30b56f9e1:
OK, that was cool, but let's not get ahead of
ourselves. I like fancy weapons!
LogicMsg/Msn_R_01.102e550a-5da4-4e91-a28b-bc30bdc3dea3: Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Smart! Great plan, Shiver.)
LogicMsg/Msn_R_01.2b4cb73f-9c10-41ae-bbc8-5886928815a8: What do you mean? I don't smell anything...
LogicMsg/Msn_R_01.31aa0736-afc7-4410-ba7e-5caf3dfa0a16: Daaang! Who was worried about Agent 3? Not me!
LogicMsg/Msn_R_01.3d2e1ca6-caf7-4e95-b1e7-265a025fb158: AY! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](I think that's Frye's way of sniffing out a [color=0001]key[color=ffff]!)
LogicMsg/Msn_R_01.3edb70bf-1209-4b28-bec3-b7dd5726e609:
Never fear—Agent 3 and Smallfry are here! After
everything we've seen, I KNOW they've got this.
LogicMsg/Msn_R_01.47632459-c5ff-4325-bdab-9d57a34d0608: Haha! That little thing really has an appetite.
LogicMsg/Msn_R_01.493b32af-3965-4565-b740-9b1b558eca41:
Uh, they seem overly excited to see you.
What are you gonna do?!
LogicMsg/Msn_R_01.4ca308ba-ac9f-4f56-ab65-68382efa3ddf:
At least they sent a welcoming committee.
How thoughtful!
LogicMsg/Msn_R_01.569bb0de-0234-431c-919e-70060f714842: We must be getting close to the exit...
LogicMsg/Msn_R_01.741de3bd-4cb4-495c-99a3-87f04addea22:
Careful, Agent 3! Ever heard of "death by
committee"? You're looking at it!
LogicMsg/Msn_R_01.776af03a-a04a-4e08-b6fa-4bf25637455f:
Oh, you need help with this? Just do a double floop
and skim the blorble, stealth-style. EZ!
LogicMsg/Msn_R_01.82d62a68-3950-4258-a8b7-23a547d2d104: Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Eating contest when, little guy?)
LogicMsg/Msn_R_01.89f75ba7-d0b0-44e8-b63a-d17a20e1f692:
...Oh. I thought it was going to be a snack.[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]
I should have eaten something before this.
LogicMsg/Msn_R_01.8be1a7aa-b0f3-4221-85a2-b3f0613ae5d4: Finally. I'm dying to see what's in those [color=0001]vaults[color=ffff]!
LogicMsg/Msn_R_01.9236d0a9-4740-48d5-b89b-4434aa236f59: It worked! You found the second [color=0001]key[color=ffff]!
LogicMsg/Msn_R_01.a42775aa-9146-47e0-bb18-e8f2705bb848:
Yeah, but I don't think the same trick is going
to work twice.
LogicMsg/Msn_R_01.a658a952-b82f-462f-a1bb-cc89c40632f8:
That's one key in your pocket! Now, where could
the other one be...
LogicMsg/Msn_R_01.ab6c8127-484e-4fcc-8ac6-a555bf0f1fae:
It's the size of the fight in the Salmonid, not the
size of the Salmonid in the fight!
LogicMsg/Msn_R_01.cdc16a1e-e69d-4e76-abab-68ce4053592a: Ay... [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Huh...two [color=0001]vaults[color=ffff]. But are there any keys?!)
LogicMsg/Msn_R_01.fb085416-d399-454a-85e1-9731fc67ff80: Now I just hope there are some [group=0003 type=001a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0001]keys[color=ffff] nearby...
LogicMsg/Msn_R_01.fe819378-fe22-4dc5-b13e-863bab193bcc: They look like candies! Gonna feed 'em to Smallfry?
LogicMsg/Msn_R_01.fea60abd-6f17-4ca2-8709-ccbed858d007:
Well, look at that! Between Agent 3 and Smallfry,
who needs fancy weapons?

LogicMsg/Msn_R_02.07c609cd-193f-4c2f-b099-51070e988764:
Don't forget about Smallfry in times like these.
Let your buddy put in some work!
LogicMsg/Msn_R_02.14509dd9-5d12-49c3-b554-e2eea516fcad:
Don't hesitate now, or we'll lose everything!
Just listen to our music and stay pumped!
LogicMsg/Msn_R_02.17a0755a-3504-40b2-a9ac-bb0c0af4f7a6: More of 'em ahead. Clear the way with your [color=0001]Crab Tank[color=ffff]!
LogicMsg/Msn_R_02.250ee3f5-0733-4a0d-84e4-74385261f6c1:
Rising to the top...just like the superstar that
you are, Agent 3!
LogicMsg/Msn_R_02.3d030a47-9880-496d-a5dc-caa7e1c3bce1:
So much for the area being restricted.
Take out the Octarians, and we're in!
LogicMsg/Msn_R_02.3d6b0b7f-0866-41a5-86a0-9ee8de781eed:
Ooo, fun! A [color=0001]Reefslider[color=ffff]! Ride that shark into the fray
while attacking, and then hit [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] for one last BITE!
LogicMsg/Msn_R_02.6cc49754-229b-4785-b802-ed1e62e712a0:
YES! That's an [color=0001]Ink Vac[color=ffff]. Hold [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to siphon up
the enemy ink, and then send it right back!
LogicMsg/Msn_R_02.7242d43e-3ec9-44e2-9940-750b219fe33e:
Another elevator...but look what's waiting for us
on it. Another [color=0001]Crab Tank[color=ffff]!
LogicMsg/Msn_R_02.95d975b7-4226-489d-a923-bfd27366098e: They REALLY don't want you to go that way...
LogicMsg/Msn_R_02.9cc78a18-02f7-4462-a200-6da26385245e: Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Keep it up! You've made it so far!)
LogicMsg/Msn_R_02.afaed687-2c93-47f3-9f35-f7eef12e2f60:
Hey, that's a [color=0001]Wave Breaker[color=ffff]! Toss that in the middle of
a gaggle of Octarians, and watch 'em squirm!
LogicMsg/Msn_R_02.c9a5c725-b38b-477b-827f-f78570db0365:
Let me give you a tip. You can't change direction, nor
would you want to. You're at the top of the food chain!
LogicMsg/Msn_R_02.e8e54e59-7982-4cc2-9007-88ca9c3dcea1: It can't be a dead end...can it?

LogicMsg/Msn_R_03.4b17012d-6f49-4fdc-90d7-601efc79fd96: I wish this thing moved faster.
LogicMsg/Msn_R_03.8a9bbad4-a378-407a-8238-fb8571b7a8bf: If only we were so lucky.
LogicMsg/Msn_R_03.e00e3254-e1c9-4e79-8c16-c8c272aae656: Aaay? [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Oh! Is this the end?)

LogicMsg/Msn_R_04.634b5970-06ab-4b83-b233-f968ad93a98d: AAAH! The Great Zapfish is in that huge container!
LogicMsg/Msn_R_04.681440f8-051b-4cc1-8ef4-268a65e49b95: Ugh! Such heavy security in here... I hate that!
LogicMsg/Msn_R_04.8136722e-6236-4628-b8ae-3db1238a1f49:
An [color=0001]Ultra Stamp[color=ffff]! Press [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] and WHAM, SLAM, BAM!
Got it?
LogicMsg/Msn_R_04.8484ca13-5552-4bfc-8c0b-8be6a75e9503:
So this is where it's been. We need to bring it back!
But y'know...later, or something.
LogicMsg/Msn_R_04.8dcabab4-e2bc-4c53-83d0-3b5908d54b35: Still a long way to go...but you'll get there in no time!
LogicMsg/Msn_R_04.a22c5a93-1bf7-425a-a7a6-774c746ba018: Phew! Looks like you can take a quick breather...
LogicMsg/Msn_R_04.f89dd579-fe53-4be9-8b61-ebe6558782be:
Are you sure you can make that jump?
'Cause I'm not...

LogicMsg/Msn_R_05.0155795c-2eb2-445c-a5ca-4793b92a404b: Emergency systems activated. Releasing door lock.
LogicMsg/Msn_R_05.1f074bf5-0681-40e8-b41d-7378ed6b26df:
Activating system... Activation failed!
Insufficient energy.
LogicMsg/Msn_R_05.2f6619eb-b163-4861-80f3-775efac80ff8: That's definitely all of them. Let's head to the exit.
LogicMsg/Msn_R_05.451d1b09-e7bb-47e2-bcaf-b81924fbf6a0: Just one left. Go get it!
LogicMsg/Msn_R_05.5ca7a838-bf65-44ee-ae48-aeca3ed22c53:
Nice, a [color=0001]Zipcaster[color=ffff]! That'll make collecting
[color=0001]energy cores [color=ffff]easier for sure.
LogicMsg/Msn_R_05.7a4ae44f-18b3-44e3-90a8-176fff77fb51: Hold on—I'm getting a signal. There are five remaining!

LogicMsg/Sdodr_City.c2d55068-b052-4a68-bf3a-8eb61b3a65dc: Are those lockers? I don't remember those bein' there.

LogicMsg/Sdodr_StoryBoss.LastMegaPhone03:
Let's hit that creep with every color chip at once!
Just press in the Right Stick ([group=0003 type=004c params=ec 51 38 3f fe ff ff ff])!
LogicMsg/Sdodr_StoryBoss.LastMegaPhoneAttack01: You folks ready to see a Color Wail?
LogicMsg/Sdodr_StoryBoss.LastMegaPhoneAttack02: Ha! This is gonna leave a stain.
LogicMsg/Sdodr_StoryBoss.LastOdako050:
Catastrophic-error recovery process... Failed.
Imminent existential danger. Danger. DANGER.
LogicMsg/Sdodr_StoryBoss.LastOdako075: Gonna keep pushing till it's done? Works for me!
LogicMsg/Sdodr_StoryBoss.LastOdako100: Grrraaahhhhhh. How. How are you so determined.
LogicMsg/Sdodr_StoryBoss.PortalAttack: I knew it! Those portals are hiding the color chips!
LogicMsg/Sdodr_StoryBoss.PortalBreak01_02: Whoa, the color chips are more saturated than usual!
LogicMsg/Sdodr_StoryBoss.PortalBreak02:
Oooh, a [color=0004]new portal[color=ffff]! There must be more color chips
in that one.
LogicMsg/Sdodr_StoryBoss.PortalBreak03: What is happening. Running diagnostics... Error!
LogicMsg/Sdodr_StoryBoss.PortalBreak04: Grayscaling is running in reverse. Impossible.
LogicMsg/Sdodr_StoryBoss.PortalBreakAll: Think you found the last chips!
LogicMsg/Sdodr_StoryBoss.PortalBreakDrone:
Oh, sweet, we snagged the [color=0004]Drone[color=ffff] chips! Just what
I was waiting for!
LogicMsg/Sdodr_StoryBoss.PortalBreakLucky: The [color=0004]Lucky[color=ffff] chips! You hit the jackpot, Eight!
LogicMsg/Sdodr_StoryBoss.PotalBreak01:
Incredible...all the energy from those color chips
surged directly into the Palette!
LogicMsg/Sdodr_StoryBoss.PotalBreakSupport: Oh, this time you got the [color=0004]Support[color=ffff] chips!
LogicMsg/Sdodr_StoryBoss.Start:
Running compulsory Grayscaling. Error.
Retrying... Error persists.

LogicMsg/Sdodr_TowerKing_10F.1176bb9a-2e19-46ee-8f9e-45bd191782ca:
Now's your chance, Eight. Go for the face!
Which face? ANY FACE!

for the finisher!
