LogicMsg/Sdodr_beginning_1F.3254865b-96d3-4528-ae41-82007bf287e8: That's what we're here to bust up!
LogicMsg/Sdodr_beginning_1F.64e12266-038a-410a-b45a-7ae04ea13aca: You hyped for this, Eight? Me too!
LogicMsg/Sdodr_beginning_1F.d5cfaf0e-93c4-44d4-be6f-36780a01435b: Jelletons [color=0004]spawn from those portals[color=ffff]. Watch yourselves.

LogicMsg/Sdodr_beginning_2F.c3dffacd-f7fe-465c-a624-62b15870a5c7: The big Jelletons will ram you if they can.
LogicMsg/Sdodr_beginning_2F.dfb7175e-35f4-423a-8354-0ffcf5796110: Check out these fools. They don't even ink turf!
LogicMsg/Sdodr_beginning_2F.fd8f2a49-afcd-49fa-994c-9dc589eacdbc:
See that [group=0003 type=0042 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0004]ink bottle[color=ffff]? Pick it up, and you'll get
half your ink back.

LogicMsg/Sdodr_beginning_3F.41d7eb6c-0282-4b90-bb68-f731e8a407ec: Hm. Lot of enemies on this floor.
LogicMsg/Sdodr_beginning_3F.7b6a85e1-1b84-4a1c-a953-3dfdd6cf0525: This one's almost in the bag!

LogicMsg/Sdodr_beginning_4F.2ebf9c89-b315-45d2-8dab-975333e64bc4:
Gross! Those enemies coming at us are spraying their
ink all over!
LogicMsg/Sdodr_beginning_4F.2f30d460-3bb8-4367-b6fd-5fe12b24a33c:
Eight, if you wanna grab on and [color=0004]glide[color=ffff], just jump
and press [group=0003 type=0047 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00]!
LogicMsg/Sdodr_beginning_4F.365e8747-3af2-4f32-8bdd-f38a876eecd6: Zone secure. Now the countdown starts.
LogicMsg/Sdodr_beginning_4F.43a45ef3-307d-4a11-98c2-9ac23e12182f:
Well, you won't be getting to the zone from
down there.
LogicMsg/Sdodr_beginning_4F.bb9b2615-72c5-4ebb-81f2-d48fb37317ea:
We can make it over by [color=0004]gliding[color=ffff] from somewhere
high up, right? Just press [group=0003 type=0047 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] while in midair!
LogicMsg/Sdodr_beginning_4F.d61bb7be-e761-4461-93d7-3e02d3e04129:
Those enemies are pouring out from another kind of
[color=0004]portal[color=ffff]. Except these [color=0004]can't be destroyed[color=ffff].

LogicMsg/Sdodr_beginning_5F.13e545d4-8afc-49a8-9ad1-a66f25f28eb9:
You hit a [color=0004]checkpoint[color=ffff]. The turbine tower moves much
slower through there.
LogicMsg/Sdodr_beginning_5F.144debdc-e563-41e7-afb6-7cf262bae34c:
See how part of that Jelleton got left behind?
There might be a use for it.
LogicMsg/Sdodr_beginning_5F.8b3daca3-6560-44b0-ad9d-a17eb716906a:
Eyes up, Eight! There's some weird bouncy thing
after us!
LogicMsg/Sdodr_beginning_5F.ac903e8a-f0db-412a-a5ef-16a4bebe5035:
Huh. Breaking through a checkpoint causes a
shock wave. Now we know.
LogicMsg/Sdodr_beginning_5F.afea61d7-3803-4fc6-a24d-2c279a7377b2: WOOO! Check out the air from that [color=0004]jump[color=ffff]!
LogicMsg/Sdodr_beginning_5F.ec37b631-a551-4744-8256-b895cdc6ab53: Oh, word! These fill up TONS of drone gauge!

LogicMsg/Sdodr_beginning_6F.0660b7cb-e815-4824-bc12-f8e87b85b5be:
Very cool. Whatever you did sent everything around
you flying. The [color=0004]portal's not looking too good[color=ffff] either.
LogicMsg/Sdodr_beginning_6F.2444e4fe-493d-47a0-a743-60154965c47e: You asked for it! Here comes the [color=0004]Step-Off Song[color=ffff]!
LogicMsg/Sdodr_beginning_6F.adb8ed4a-b39d-4db0-a578-511f1ad92b5c: You're going to have to ink both the zones there.
LogicMsg/Sdodr_beginning_6F.b6255445-e775-4335-b635-edd88a3754aa:
Looks like nothing can spawn from the portal while
it's jammed.
LogicMsg/Sdodr_beginning_6F.fd977d4a-0601-4121-bee4-63271eda1567:
Two out of three pieces! One more, and I can let loose
with my Step-Off Song!

LogicMsg/Sdodr_beginning_7F.1bef1742-e641-43bd-b6b8-91996e07de4b: They're slippery, but there's only one left.
LogicMsg/Sdodr_beginning_7F.2ff46da6-802e-43cf-bbba-e922a0b0eb6a:
Try inking the ground around where [group=0003 type=003c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00]they're
chilling. That should halt them in their tracks.
LogicMsg/Sdodr_beginning_7F.3cc92024-c9b0-4a0b-b289-d87aff48eb4c: Armor's good insurance against getting splatted.
LogicMsg/Sdodr_beginning_7F.71d1ebe6-2d88-418b-a8bf-31f5acc6cafd:
I should've mentioned this, but you can make the
cage go faster by tilting [group=0003 type=004b params=ec 51 38 3f fe ff ff ff].

LogicMsg/Sdodr_beginning_8F.48a439b0-8ef1-4a64-ac94-58569162feea: Looks fairly harmless. Try touching it.
LogicMsg/Sdodr_beginning_8F.6b95b14e-be7e-4e7e-9046-d6c2cbdeb594: Yo, there's something weird out in the open here.

LogicMsg/Sdodr_beginning_9F.a0b539d5-0a9d-46c0-b2d5-c9acbc83d234:
Those Jelletons can't help themselves from chasing
any ∞-ball they see.
LogicMsg/Sdodr_beginning_9F.c520da61-1014-4556-b345-41272b5bf115:
Huh! Guess even if something happens to the
∞-ball, it'll bounce back.

LogicMsg/SmallWorld.089b5cd1-9674-40ea-885f-262c7909bbcb:
Hey, looks like you found a [color=0001]loot anchor[color=ffff]! Anytime you
find one of those, splat it up for a fun surprise.
LogicMsg/SmallWorld.1328e717-32f6-4bc2-a2f6-cf53ac4b9e94:
Alright, let's look for a way into the [color=0001]Octarian base[color=ffff]...
And keep your ears open for my nuggets of wisdom!
LogicMsg/SmallWorld.21ff056d-bb3f-488a-b74c-9a0f310cb233:
Oof. This whole place could use a shave...or a shower...
or whatever cleans up Fuzzy Ooze!
LogicMsg/SmallWorld.2681ba24-8466-4318-b0a2-e3d78df8ff43:
Mind your step! The second rule of battle is don't
take yourself out by fallin' off a cliff!
LogicMsg/SmallWorld.298d2273-a09a-4848-886c-baf66dfef571:
Lookit that rascal go. Think there's somethin' worth
checking out nearby?
LogicMsg/SmallWorld.32824a09-b565-4de1-ad5e-0f16c96a38cf:
What's that? I think your little buddy is tryin' to
get your attention again.
LogicMsg/SmallWorld.3326e409-bc78-4f03-9150-c7cf0fad934f:
That Smallfry might be a goofball, but I'd follow its
nose if I were you...
LogicMsg/SmallWorld.3437df5f-46c4-4398-8f8a-c18abca93f59:
Don't sweat it, Agent 3. When life gives you lemons,
you throw 'em at an Octarian as hard as you can!
LogicMsg/SmallWorld.36effd91-a5dd-4606-b9fa-ccc24972b36b: Hey, nice score! Add it to the collection!
LogicMsg/SmallWorld.38eb557d-1a5d-4e0c-a79f-5f2b72ee6f17:
You gonna jump down there? Make sure you got a
safe place to land!
LogicMsg/SmallWorld.3c43fef5-0275-47fb-aae6-ecf3d068d388:
Hm? What're you doing here again? You lose
your wallet or something?
LogicMsg/SmallWorld.4d935a83-4e75-47e5-b0ed-6f21c70aa6ba:
A [color=0001]loot anchor[color=ffff]. There? You've got a good eye.
Those things could be hidden anywhere!
LogicMsg/SmallWorld.5087f971-62a1-4c31-9ec9-85ee1100c845:
That's OK—try again! Press the Right Stick ([group=0003 type=0008 params=cd cc 4c 3f 00 00 00 00]) to
power up, then throw it at the [color=0001]Fuzzball [color=ffff]with [group=0003 type=000a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00]!
LogicMsg/SmallWorld.575aaf16-4099-4b0c-9c4c-2ab0a4435e4e:
Oh, right. I know what'll happen. FLOOF! Instant
full-body beard...whether you want it or not!
LogicMsg/SmallWorld.58052b9c-e335-4c17-b2e2-f2802b186f00:
There! That kettle oughta take us right to 'em.
Shoot the lid with [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] and blow it open!
LogicMsg/SmallWorld.60fd5350-28b0-40a2-8817-a2c2938a3ab0: Watch where you're goin'! That last step is a DOOZY.
LogicMsg/SmallWorld.618321da-390d-4cb3-a92e-792da1825ae9:
Hm, doesn't look like the ol' ink is doin' much.
We got anything with more OOMPH?
LogicMsg/SmallWorld.678fcdb2-d920-4eae-a2f7-390239c2ef9b:
Told you that stuff was trouble! Stick to the ink
if you wanna avoid another close shave...
LogicMsg/SmallWorld.69ceea28-ad90-4eac-a12a-808d33534e30:
You gotta hit the [color=0001]Fuzzball [color=ffff]directly, so take careful
aim and try again.
LogicMsg/SmallWorld.796db7e5-31c0-42ee-a836-49d0dd0e2d6e:
Mind the [color=0001]Fuzzy Ooze[color=ffff] that's all over the place.
Touch that stuff, and who knows what'll happen.
LogicMsg/SmallWorld.79ebd8bf-e9c5-4133-8568-9bebfeed83ea:
Careful here! It's a looong way down, and one false
step could send you over the edge.
LogicMsg/SmallWorld.90dcfafa-a26d-48f4-8dea-9db977a6c086:
[color=0001]Fuzzball [color=ffff]ahoy! Confirmed with my own bulgin' eyes,
dead center of the Crater.
LogicMsg/SmallWorld.920b37ae-ea45-4245-91a0-d4a43389909d:
Your little buddy needs more Power Eggs than you have.
Why don't you hop into a kettle first?
LogicMsg/SmallWorld.92c440df-4b6d-4dce-9640-b88928aeb1ca:
Dagnabbit! We're at a dead end.[group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00] Let's double back,
Agent 3. We must have missed something!
LogicMsg/SmallWorld.9ff5b8d6-e03a-4831-a852-5ac970b60efd: Whew! I was gettin' a little nervous there.
LogicMsg/SmallWorld.a07f0133-1e47-479d-b146-cf118a25221d:
Pack of cards, huh? I never knew Octarians
were cardplayer types...
LogicMsg/SmallWorld.a840b10d-138c-416c-a05e-04c070cf5b46:
Look—another Fuzzball! Let's try again. Press [group=0003 type=0008 params=cd cc 4c 3f 00 00 00 00]
to power up your buddy, then throw it with [group=0003 type=000a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00].
LogicMsg/SmallWorld.a9228c67-5d0a-45f5-849a-b724ef57a19b:
Agent 3! You still with me?! You gotta be more
careful than that!
LogicMsg/SmallWorld.b3996e94-2a7f-44e5-a549-a3e08f1e59bc:
To power up your Smallfry so it can take down that
Fuzzball, press [group=0003 type=0008 params=cd cc 4c 3f 00 00 00 00] to feed it [color=0001]Power Eggs[color=ffff]!
LogicMsg/SmallWorld.ba2f0335-26f9-4534-b268-5a5ae951546d:
Whew! Glad to see you're still with us. No more
skydivin' without a chute, OK?
LogicMsg/SmallWorld.be58c4cd-a1d3-44e0-b12b-5e18ee343082:
Uh...you are aiming for the [color=0001]Fuzzball[color=ffff], right? That nasty,
hairy bubble thing on the Fuzzy Ooze?
LogicMsg/SmallWorld.cad1f675-3301-409b-80ff-53df1ce37b85:
Ack! Your little pal needs more power. Press [group=0003 type=0008 params=cd cc 4c 3f 00 00 00 00] to
give it some [color=0001]Power Eggs[color=ffff], and try again!
LogicMsg/SmallWorld.d2bc1fb0-ce5d-426e-b2a4-acc2bf1dd48c:
Whoa! That did something. Try throwing it at
the Fuzzball!
LogicMsg/SmallWorld.dc918e12-63c9-47ba-bb28-d5908941bd2a:
Yep. That Fuzzy Ooze is way overgrown and blockin'
our path. Confirmed!

LogicMsg/airJam.00b3b4c4-b818-410a-a4b5-40de5200097b:
We'll have to get farther away before we can
get higher up. Time to hitch a ride!
LogicMsg/airJam.2ee05052-aab6-49f0-ac01-caa3ab432a18: Ooo, looks like you found something good!
LogicMsg/airJam.92146094-1edf-4358-b18f-0ebe770b8853: The [color=0001]goal[color=ffff] is right below you! Dive, dive!
LogicMsg/airJam.f4a06dd1-57cf-4a08-81d0-786b6e6904c0:
Aw, no fair! The[color=0001] goal[color=ffff] is right there...but we can't
reach it! Any ideas?
LogicMsg/airJam.fb5de069-97fb-4bd6-a5e1-189d458b37c3:
Whoa! What's with the air show? Sky's looking
a bit crowded...

LogicMsg/allPaint.122ecfba-09df-41ef-9e8c-c25e978bd914: Hey, nice work! Really good coverage.
LogicMsg/allPaint.32b81e49-4529-4d01-b9bb-103295e701f7:
I guess you're just supposed to ink it up?
I don't ask questions.
LogicMsg/allPaint.466013b8-77bc-4e57-95eb-5d807792f10c:
Who taught Agent 3 to ink this well?
Surely it wasn't Agent 1...
LogicMsg/allPaint.482d135f-dffa-4315-9b7f-1575f25bdb22: Keep it up! Cover as much as you can with ink!
LogicMsg/allPaint.6ff905e0-ef11-4123-83dc-af65bd2a62bf: You aren't afraid of heights, are you? Agent 3?
LogicMsg/allPaint.d427e78b-be4b-46bd-87bf-a79a45193b27: And I thought Callie had a big head!
LogicMsg/allPaint.e7b820db-7b8f-48b0-8773-183c0e74a994:
You have inked in excess of 20 percent of all surface
area. Perhaps some [color=0001]platforms [color=ffff]will help with the rest.
LogicMsg/allPaint.e7f3b11c-60a2-4320-9a88-fdeecdd6547b: I'd say you're about halfway there. Keep it up!

LogicMsg/barriar.2d180a25-c62f-4d35-a258-b9d0fe6de838:
OK, if you wanna take down an Octodisco, you gotta
either [color=0001]hit 'em from up top[color=ffff] or [color=0001]go inside[color=ffff] their barrier.
LogicMsg/barriar.4c07b79f-076a-4914-8f07-55220fe0d11b: Ugh... This is gonna be annoying...
LogicMsg/barriar.5bb0322a-1ab2-4051-b377-b470c89cc54b:
That's a lot of Octarians... Maybe you can use the
walls to get around 'em?
LogicMsg/barriar.988795d0-4cff-4c4a-9bf5-0de79c0a47bc:
You're almost there. Psych yourself up and
LET'S DO THIS!
LogicMsg/barriar.9924108a-7b1c-4b7b-9762-ec97eefddda7:
An [color=0001]Octodisco[color=ffff]... Their barriers make them a real pain
to deal with.
LogicMsg/barriar.c43bf8ce-543e-40c7-98f9-874b3d5a018a: Hm... How do you wanna tackle this, Agent 3?
LogicMsg/barriar.cd7b83bb-f388-4fc4-b07c-42c9a8ca271a: An [color=0001]Amped Octostamp[color=ffff]! Watch out for shock waves!
LogicMsg/barriar.fb965b3a-ee69-4443-aef5-e220bb952eef:
You're not gonna have any luck shooting
through that barrier.

LogicMsg/battleHill.130eb909-e0fb-4dd6-99c7-a4b17e18e50a:
Try picking them off one at a time. That'll give you
a little room to breathe.
LogicMsg/battleHill.230619da-e780-44c1-9a8a-232a4f98d51d: OK, right off the bat, I'm seeing a lot of Octarians...
LogicMsg/battleHill.303f5433-b46b-4c20-8b74-02d360652a7e:
Ah, you got an [color=0001]Ink Storm[color=ffff]! Throw that wherever
you want it to rain ink.
LogicMsg/battleHill.72d934d5-9821-4d6f-81ed-bd8f36c246a0:
Nice! [color=0001]Tenta Missiles[color=ffff]! You could finish 'em off in
one fell swoop with those.

LogicMsg/bitakoHidding.18cf0761-7d99-405f-8a81-2114d376114e: That [color=0001]Trizooka[color=ffff] will let you splat far-off Octarians!
LogicMsg/bitakoHidding.7cd85c8c-af89-4be5-9215-696815776681:
Ugh, there's so many of them! And they're hogging
all the high ground...
LogicMsg/bitakoHidding.ad1913ed-6bb8-4397-a88b-e74f241156db:
Watch out! There's a Twintacle Octotrooper up there!
They're way tougher than regular Octotroopers.
LogicMsg/bitakoHidding.d16441dd-8c43-4c85-99f8-5bb4cf10231c: Maybe Smallfry can help you out here...

LogicMsg/boxSashi.1f55cf9d-b512-4b4d-80fd-f0ed0af2eb6e:
Uh-oh! Try doing a Dodge Roll with your [color=0001]Dapple Dualies[color=ffff]
to break that one.
LogicMsg/boxSashi.44e01ad4-a10d-4f6f-a2cd-84064a32d19b: THERE we go. Here comes the first [color=0001][group=0003 type=0018 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00]target[color=ffff]!
LogicMsg/boxSashi.788da1fa-8424-48ee-9a59-c6ca5acc7c85: Uh-oh! You're gonna need charged shots for that one.
LogicMsg/boxSashi.e1c37d4d-032a-4dd0-87b3-aab946aa6e13: Alright, break the [color=0001]tar[color=ffff]— Uh, where are the [color=0001]targets[color=ffff]?
LogicMsg/boxSashi.f1dd12b6-05f4-40b5-8033-3a78c854205d:
If two hits at full charge don't break that [color=0001]target[color=ffff],
nothing will.

LogicMsg/brushRush.51fb62b5-41f1-4a10-8eb1-1a17d28793e9:
If you would like to remain alive, please avoid being
caught by the [color=0001]ink stick[color=ffff].
LogicMsg/brushRush.5f521f98-89a9-4778-8553-09135a673955:
Be sure to top up your ink by swimming
with [group=0003 type=000b params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00], Agent 3!
LogicMsg/brushRush.736bba10-eed4-4a2c-a980-93dc638e67f6: Whoa! The whole floor is moving!
LogicMsg/brushRush.e496baae-6f82-46fd-8a9a-748e5ecd82dd: Just one left! You can do it!

LogicMsg/buildingSnipe.2d911bf9-8c00-40d5-ad82-344e4deae6da: Whew! You made it to the top!
LogicMsg/buildingSnipe.536fc6d2-e114-4d78-a745-bdc0dfb05cd8: Still more climbing to do, huh?
LogicMsg/buildingSnipe.6412c563-f35a-4963-8ed5-89fc6fdf06aa: You're a regular crate magnet, Agent 3!
LogicMsg/buildingSnipe.88f949d5-7a2d-48da-bddd-fe20a19c4c9d: Watch out! They've got you in their sights already.
LogicMsg/buildingSnipe.ced5a6e4-0259-4378-a2a1-5a9875e1bcaf:
There's got to be a way up there... Keep looking for
a surface you can ink and climb, Agent 3.

LogicMsg/chargeKeep.2ccf5c12-fdcf-47d6-bb11-89c436ad8ea8: Oh, hey! More stuff to shoot at!
LogicMsg/chargeKeep.2f13d932-dd75-45dc-928d-659f0cbfab65: Wonder what's up ahead. My guess is more Octojerks.
LogicMsg/chargeKeep.582915df-dcc7-46db-91d6-f80473ba3541: Try this: charge up a shot, get by a rail, and blast off!
LogicMsg/chargeKeep.5e7d7c68-3e3a-49ed-892e-fdb8f10de353:
The coolest part of a charger? Charging, obviously.
Just hold [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to charge a shot!
LogicMsg/chargeKeep.634f7768-7c7f-440b-9c50-6c8a821a590a: You can keep your charge when you're on an [color=0001]inkrail [color=ffff]too!
LogicMsg/chargeKeep.914cae90-d00a-4dcb-95c6-8361cee82c60:
Try this—start charging, swim in your ink, then come
out blasting. Surprise! Ha ha ha!
LogicMsg/chargeKeep.9164d406-c830-417d-98a5-d78ebe698781: Maybe a charged shot could reach?
LogicMsg/chargeKeep.a9a29d7e-81b5-47c6-881a-727c6dd37a1e:
Mkay... There's the hard way through the front door
or the slow and easy way around the outside.
LogicMsg/chargeKeep.c7e5199e-0e1d-4fa9-ba17-b4d9191d266f: They're not letting up, are they?
LogicMsg/chargeKeep.d2799044-1b6c-4577-9b5c-946c62fb96f8:
Don't forget—even if you're holding [group=0003 type=000b params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] and diving
into ink, you'll still keep your charge going for a bit.
LogicMsg/chargeKeep.ded1f65b-1b3a-4a35-b386-47c78c5733b4: Hang back and charge somewhere safe.
LogicMsg/chargeKeep.f6e8a499-9fd8-4b61-b1a8-dd705364a4a8:
That [color=0001]Octodisco [color=ffff]is gonna be a problem.
Stupid barriers...
LogicMsg/chargeKeep.ff9d5535-fdf8-4c97-8303-c03d68e30164: Ha! Bet they never saw THAT coming!

LogicMsg/chase.3ce4ff63-7a4d-49fd-bbbd-b3a8fdfed2e1: Stick 'em in the [color=0001]Tentakooks[color=ffff]' paths with [group=0003 type=000a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00]!
LogicMsg/chase.4d7a1dd4-f127-4f67-92ae-48bc6ca959d4: Just a quick climb and we're golden!
LogicMsg/chase.548348fc-a353-47c3-be7a-95a199a54fb1: There's gotta be [group=0003 type=001a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0001]keys[color=ffff] around here, right?
LogicMsg/chase.5b9b8457-569c-42e9-802b-d0030059cfe0: Your shoe's untied. Ha! Kidding. But don't fall, OK?
LogicMsg/chase.5dd76b14-9599-4f2c-9053-69f246c02914: I gotta admit you're kinda good at this.
LogicMsg/chase.75fe6345-d37d-496e-8399-de7e70b5867c: You know what'd be perfect right now? [color=0001]Ink Mines[color=ffff]!
LogicMsg/chase.8da68b31-8689-45f8-9dda-bc1fb1d30399: Looks like this is the way.
LogicMsg/chase.be483814-d143-4e63-a617-96266aed5f90: Pretty sweet [color=0001]key[color=ffff] collection you got there.
LogicMsg/chase.bf3ca01e-aa69-4f15-9fad-120a99eb3d82: Ooo! That was a juicy one!
LogicMsg/chase.d7fb5e64-c9a8-4a1e-9afe-833fa54f0fa2:
There's a bunch of vaults up there. I'm gonna assume
that's what the [color=0001]keys[color=ffff] are for.
LogicMsg/chase.f17ec11c-8f37-4034-a4e4-dcde3b770444: Guess we need to find some [group=0003 type=001a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0001]keys[color=ffff].
LogicMsg/chase.fa18238e-5176-45be-85d2-8ad57c654fa3: I think that's where we're headed.
LogicMsg/chase.fc583009-a1eb-42d5-97e2-bfee9b032f0e: That oughta be the last of 'em.

LogicMsg/courceMake.25bf7a2e-7de9-4993-be79-b2b43d3f1f25: Hey! Come back, Power Egg pack!
LogicMsg/courceMake.273f2f99-a8d0-49a4-ad01-a8a5905cdc52:
Don't forget! Hold [group=0003 type=0001 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] while swimming to do
a [color=0001]Squid Surge[color=ffff]!
LogicMsg/courceMake.41a11f0c-1353-4e00-8143-349210ec165c: We're not done? Where's the last one hiding?!
LogicMsg/courceMake.429853d9-2806-4b9d-98bd-c0c7518fab69: There! That's all of them, right?
LogicMsg/courceMake.554407ce-b31c-494c-a0ce-267ef731943e: You heard her! Surge on up there!
LogicMsg/courceMake.625a2de3-e90b-4c99-bebf-98226086ffcc: Oh! Nice hiding spot. Tricky switches...
LogicMsg/courceMake.66f59d47-b3f3-4848-8d6e-96f90e68174d:
Aha! Inking those [color=0001]splat switches[color=ffff] will send each
block off to join its friends.
LogicMsg/courceMake.9a282615-bb65-44a5-9bce-4b7581fa30eb: There! That's all of them, right?
LogicMsg/courceMake.a406e83c-eb78-4358-83b6-1717b5d5f7ed:
Hmmm. I thought that was it, but there must be one
more hiding out somewhere...
LogicMsg/courceMake.be026b80-143f-4eed-b283-321cfbf5236d: Yes! We got the Power Egg pack back!
LogicMsg/courceMake.da8f9f7a-3002-42e8-b4e7-b7b94ae1ebc4:
Guess we should use the [color=0001]launchpad[color=ffff] to head back
and keep searching...
LogicMsg/courceMake.eaaefa8b-d6ef-42fc-a415-95bf992b895c: Wow. That entire block just...took off, huh?

LogicMsg/curling.01732e4e-c627-4df4-a603-5c372b8cca4c:
Hmmm, what are we supposed to do here...
I don't see any targets!
LogicMsg/curling.0fe5c23c-0ab6-4d3e-b33d-578f8f2bd25b: Oh! I think there's a [color=0001]balloon fish [color=ffff]in there.
LogicMsg/curling.3ceb6bba-77f6-4558-b408-6e0daf3cc187:
Remember—you can change how far the Curling Bombs
go by holding down [group=0003 type=000a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00].
LogicMsg/curling.45e453a9-6ce2-4b3e-aa79-3e7e2d9924b4: Riiight down the center. I know you can do it.
LogicMsg/curling.4619e0ac-fc33-4a7c-a384-1c1c50dacfa8: Hey, it got the job done.
LogicMsg/curling.4e78f643-d247-40e7-b68c-326a37786a2c: Is this the last one? Stay focused...
LogicMsg/curling.6fddc809-15ec-4719-93ab-8be78c26b574: So close! Could have been a one-shot win!
LogicMsg/curling.86f54cfe-ceb5-4bea-a53a-0bf6bc56dadf: Awww...didn't quite get them all at once.
LogicMsg/curling.9f3acb28-cc2a-4e74-a234-02f199474cf0: And we're at the goal. Great job!
LogicMsg/curling.a99e659e-f7c7-4a3c-8c2f-f1c21c3fd760:
Maybe that's some kind of reward for nailing
those targets all at once.
LogicMsg/curling.dfc76c16-e662-41e8-818d-5ab76e9f7a4c: You're pretty good with those things!
LogicMsg/curling.e12843c0-5daf-4d52-ab68-43d51ae401af:
Oh. I think you're going to have to stand on that
checkpoint while you slide Curling Bombs.
LogicMsg/curling.f5b1b82a-61cb-40e3-9df4-51507d79bf30:
I think you're going to want to slide Curling Bombs,
and then swim along behind them with [group=0003 type=000b params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00].
LogicMsg/curling.f80f42e8-55c2-48fe-99ba-0babc038b4ba: Well, that was some of them.
LogicMsg/curling.fdbda3f9-07d9-4035-88c4-f513bed3753a:
There's got to be a way... Maybe if you aim
for the walls?
LogicMsg/curling.ff9030e3-7bb2-4949-906e-68dbaa8df786: Why are you fixated on that, Agent 1?

LogicMsg/curlingDoNotStep.131c7c94-2031-4012-8ced-94aa43a777e6:
If you gotta cancel out of a [color=0001]Curling Bomb[color=ffff], transform
by hitting [group=0003 type=000b params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00], then let go of [group=0003 type=000a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00].
LogicMsg/curlingDoNotStep.510d6d4f-c7e0-4ff3-8e5c-4dae39c24ccf: Can we use those moving thingies somehow?
LogicMsg/curlingDoNotStep.57128c6a-8db9-40db-8f55-7b28473f725f: Now just follow the path the bomb made.
LogicMsg/curlingDoNotStep.97c0e58d-26ec-49a8-a5d6-6e2da04ee09c:
You only get one [color=0001]Curling Bomb[color=ffff] per area,
so watch your aim!
LogicMsg/curlingDoNotStep.97fe52b5-b98d-4379-9e78-93eea13a52c2: Never doubted you for a minute!
LogicMsg/curlingDoNotStep.9cc2a08c-ad9a-4d09-a374-89d841fa80d5: Really gotta time the throw here, huh...
LogicMsg/curlingDoNotStep.d8756542-6ae6-4ce4-8ea9-c51dbf69158d:
Whatever you do, don't touch the bad guys' ink.
You're gonna need to use the [color=0001]Curling Bomb[color=ffff] to move.
LogicMsg/curlingDoNotStep.e40cc108-699a-4824-b7a3-aaff01d219cf:
Careful! If you hold [group=0003 type=000a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] and charge a [color=0001]Curling Bomb[color=ffff],
it'll get bigger, but it won't travel as far.
LogicMsg/curlingDoNotStep.f35bbd6e-e726-4231-b121-449959cf93ae: It's too bad you can't throw out a few more, huh?
LogicMsg/curlingDoNotStep.f846d37a-dc13-499a-82da-660d541038fb: There's the end, but...look at that mess!

LogicMsg/dendenSalmon.15986b3e-7bf1-414e-be45-ec0214ad4609:
To call your Smallfry buddy back to you,
shout, "[color=0001]This way![color=ffff]" with [group=0003 type=000e params=29 5c 4f 3f 00 00 00 00].
LogicMsg/dendenSalmon.1eb26247-5295-4193-bb5c-d3323b1582e0: Alright, on to the next one!
LogicMsg/dendenSalmon.480d35ab-e7dd-4db0-a069-866c8e06dff3:
Press [group=0003 type=000a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to send your li'l [color=0001]Smallfry[color=ffff] buddy frying!
Uh. Flying. I meant flying.
LogicMsg/dendenSalmon.492ef334-126b-421e-ac63-7c39cb8cd933: Uh-oh. You don't have a weapon, do you, Agent 3?
LogicMsg/dendenSalmon.4cdf7a62-0286-4bd8-a023-4bddad65e138: Awww, so close! You were almost there...
LogicMsg/dendenSalmon.5fee01ca-c2ca-4148-b47a-13f5f45d542a:
After you toss your [color=0001]Smallfry[color=ffff], you can [color=0001]call it back[color=ffff]
to you with [group=0003 type=000e params=29 5c 4f 3f 00 00 00 00].
LogicMsg/dendenSalmon.77aa8809-80ad-4f22-a52f-d8d98736fdf1: You and that li'l Smallfry make a great team.
LogicMsg/dendenSalmon.80de6497-3350-4ea5-b418-2d71dff34abc: This contraption's pretty big too, huh?
LogicMsg/dendenSalmon.812c43fb-ed45-4e1c-bdf6-b9c2cbaf904b: It's like a [color=0001]key [color=ffff]and [color=0001]Power Egg[color=ffff] party, and we're invited.
LogicMsg/dendenSalmon.8b615815-4c19-4e54-8562-30eac1d6f0dd: [color=0001]Key[color=ffff] status: nabbed! Let's take it to the [color=0001]vault[color=ffff].
LogicMsg/dendenSalmon.8defac15-140d-4f00-8d58-4f0825f312b8: Guess it's Smallfry's time to shine.
LogicMsg/dendenSalmon.90912841-09fe-438f-ba6b-78ce19996432: You can do it, li'l Smallfry!
LogicMsg/dendenSalmon.9348b884-6799-4d84-a7c3-95442e6fe714: Looks like you're supposed to climb the wall.
LogicMsg/dendenSalmon.c717bd03-96a7-46f9-ab51-3100b0e5f8fb: Hm, I see that [group=0003 type=001a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0001]key[color=ffff]...but how do we get to it?
LogicMsg/dendenSalmon.ede02543-c556-47ec-89c0-b5df84bad7b1: Open for business! Aaand now we have a [color=0001]launchpad[color=ffff].

LogicMsg/dieCutting.4182c9c6-a44c-4e3a-8bf9-57678a27adea: Hm. Why does it look so familiar...
LogicMsg/dieCutting.42db31ea-9c2b-4928-b6b1-efcdca1f50cd:
It's all good—don't sweat it. Just keep calm
and take your time.
LogicMsg/dieCutting.458e5e6e-38b2-47fe-b285-f72b1b083cff: Don't forget to admire your handiwork.
LogicMsg/dieCutting.6993ef7d-ea58-4769-ac53-4c825a89fa88: Art takes time, even if you're copying. Don't rush it.
LogicMsg/dieCutting.6c92dd11-6960-4da7-aecc-b7207d940c7b:
We're stuck here if you mess up, so think BEFORE
you ink those crates!
LogicMsg/dieCutting.7239c43a-a753-460e-a78a-f8ab10a1d5d6: I think you gotta copy what's on the left.
LogicMsg/dieCutting.79e5828f-4287-43ee-a157-a82d0b25f65d: We HAVE seen that somewhere, right?
LogicMsg/dieCutting.81dfb674-1ad3-4e98-851d-dab1ff6588a3:
You can use the [color=0001]Zipcaster [color=ffff]to get to those platforms.
Just hit [color=0001][group=0003 type=000a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00][color=ffff].
LogicMsg/dieCutting.90757e58-3cfd-4b1e-969a-ef1fbb908c7f: Remember—the [color=0001]Sloshing Machine[color=ffff] flings ink in an arc.
LogicMsg/dieCutting.a32fe856-865d-412b-a799-a1233705f020: It looks even cooler from here!
LogicMsg/dieCutting.a889ec2e-d131-4245-b674-ee0f41104f30:
Want to take a closer look at your masterpiece?
Or just hit the road?
LogicMsg/dieCutting.a92b8578-0739-44d2-b231-2174a993378d:
It's all good—don't sweat it. Just keep calm
and take your time.
LogicMsg/dieCutting.ba8b2fba-02e7-4a88-8fc6-db674e0fc40c:
Hey, there's no messing up in art! But do be
careful, Agent 3.
LogicMsg/dieCutting.cf74fc31-9d8e-4ed5-9c15-71842f909756:
Y'know, a fully charged shot will blast right through
those crates. Just sayin'.
LogicMsg/dieCutting.d1e6e852-2623-4cd2-8bcb-02fc42716ded:
It's all good—don't sweat it. Just keep calm
and take your time.
LogicMsg/dieCutting.d9c88c5f-2b17-464e-83af-49780860420e: If you REALLY need to get the ink out there, tap [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00]!

LogicMsg/dozer.18375e4b-7580-42bd-8b0e-dd264cfab199:
Think li'l Smallfry might enjoy hitching a ride
on top of a [color=0001]Flooder[color=ffff]? I know I would!
LogicMsg/dozer.3668f355-4dd5-479d-ad10-794e30c5b406:
OK, you just have to nab 60 Power Eggs in here.
No sweat...but get moving!
LogicMsg/dozer.acf40376-a26c-4f64-9754-b920c46ef875:
Curling Bombs can slide right underneath a [color=0001]Flooder[color=ffff].
They're your slippery little helpers!
LogicMsg/dozer.bd62d873-27d7-4691-bf5c-299cc323698f:
If a [color=0001]Flooder [color=ffff]spots you, try hiding in your ink.
It's survival, not cowardice!

LogicMsg/easyKagidume.013a698e-d38f-4ee6-a9d9-e7bf9c611ce6: You reached the top! Spot any crime from up there?
LogicMsg/easyKagidume.26664be1-97e5-4dc2-b046-503c50a43162:
That'll let you sling and cling to far-off walls!
Ugh. I'm so jealous.
LogicMsg/easyKagidume.34fd5abe-43be-4d13-9ae5-2ee7c3e96e3e:
Superhero time! Aim and streeetch out your
arm with [group=0003 type=000a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00].
LogicMsg/easyKagidume.4eab797f-9996-411d-aaa0-63385c0e95a7: Um...INKStraordinary! Whew, running low on these...
LogicMsg/easyKagidume.602791b3-1070-4ed7-a7ae-b1e0353e4023: Every superhero needs a relatable weakness, Agent 1.
LogicMsg/easyKagidume.8df0a558-e5f5-4246-b553-af030096dcef: Whoa. These pillars go up and up...and up...
LogicMsg/easyKagidume.98482ecc-435d-4363-9e7c-441b304f3831: Now for the big, heroic finish! No pressure.
LogicMsg/easyKagidume.9da84c8a-4cc5-4715-9caf-fb8b83f98cca:
Wow, you're pretty high up! Hope you aren't afraid
of heights...
LogicMsg/easyKagidume.a5c4a2c8-ac3c-4f63-99ed-998f0309e62f: INKredible! I can do these all day, Agent 1.
LogicMsg/easyKagidume.b59f8b49-2717-477c-863a-f32df9d9c993: Press [group=0003 type=0001 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] for another heroic leap!
LogicMsg/easyKagidume.b7a19997-6056-4ffc-af1a-3f67250769c8:
But wait! Our hero's path is blocked by a
villainous [color=0001]Octosniper[color=ffff]!
LogicMsg/easyKagidume.b8a9d582-31b4-4052-ae80-2c0b05a58f87:
Pretty cool, right? You can even cling to walls that
can't be inked.
LogicMsg/easyKagidume.c47c420b-4814-482b-b67e-a26a5fc8f419: Wow. Are you an ACTUAL superhero?
LogicMsg/easyKagidume.cb6a1967-7acd-4e38-8fee-5f9f4c932e98:
Don't be afraid to "hang out" for a sec and check
your surroundings...
LogicMsg/easyKagidume.de747c94-358d-4657-a402-8750f5f635f7:
And yet, this sniper is no match for our
hero's super-stretchy arm...
LogicMsg/easyKagidume.e5ae0f97-1dd9-4e6d-b27b-cb4fc23c57a0:
Looks like you can use those pillars to work your
way up in super style!
LogicMsg/easyKagidume.fea5b734-d7a1-403c-9524-2f483a138e6c: Now hop on top of the wall with [group=0003 type=0001 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00]!

LogicMsg/escapeFromShinking.05917a8b-9846-4f03-9ebc-1db7d205e6ad: It's, uh...still sinking. Quick, Agent 3! Up, up, up!
LogicMsg/escapeFromShinking.4a63707b-a8ec-460f-b559-a809d9fc1548: The floor is sinking... Wait—why is the floor sinking?!
LogicMsg/escapeFromShinking.a91853f2-9cd5-49dc-93d0-4d2f0231a114: Well, at least you won't get lost.
LogicMsg/escapeFromShinking.dad96356-000b-4f8d-b520-590c24791459:
So it looks like you're gonna have to go all the way
around, then climb up to the top.

LogicMsg/fastDraw.124c80c6-bf6d-424f-b228-594cc440820e: Whoa! You didn't even break a sweat.
LogicMsg/fastDraw.19f142d4-a758-4119-8f69-6ab9a083c866: They might try to fake you out, so watch your aim.
LogicMsg/fastDraw.5a63982a-0629-435c-9535-5bd578552cd8:
You may begin the test at any time by standing
on the [color=0001]switch[color=ffff].
LogicMsg/fastDraw.642e1e60-70e1-4e26-97d8-df1476f50588:
Oh, I get it! You wanna avoid breaking the [color=0001]fail balloons[color=ffff].
That makes sense.

LogicMsg/fireWorks.13637932-d8e7-4880-932f-da55e1f1ae60:
I see the goal up there, buuuuuut the path to it is
moving. Well, good luck!
LogicMsg/fireWorks.515d7e5b-41d8-41d0-af5a-033691b0535f:
That new way up looks climbable! Just watch
for Octarians...
LogicMsg/fireWorks.98f1800d-9aa7-4462-9f16-27cd7ef1f64d: I think that's the way up.
LogicMsg/fireWorks.b890076e-e92a-415b-bb37-ef856dda00cb: The coast is clear! Let's wrap this up!

LogicMsg/first.0bb83321-9f48-4d79-bd3b-e3f096d8bfbd:
That was the last one! All that's left is a straight
shot along the ride rail!
LogicMsg/first.11093102-d31c-4298-a518-74fd1b2c923f: Doesn't look like a simple jump will get you there...
LogicMsg/first.150de615-8f3c-4817-abe1-67f3b36099f0: Ooo, that was smart. Nice work, Agent 3!
LogicMsg/first.1e6e0414-c755-41f1-b1a7-243b8c14ef11: Press [group=0003 type=0001 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to jump while you're riding a rail.
LogicMsg/first.353ce7bd-212b-4905-adb2-d694700ca498: Alright, Alterna... Let's see what you've got!
LogicMsg/first.3fa81dec-0396-48ea-a530-35e27911a8c1: Press [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to shoot while you're on a [color=0001]ride rail[color=ffff].
LogicMsg/first.48a50b15-8b20-49d2-89c2-c4242b52821d: There's an [color=0001]inkrail[color=ffff] above you. Can Smallfry reach it?
LogicMsg/first.5b67909c-4ff0-4341-8711-e6acef1c371e: Ooo! A can! Open it up and unleash what's inside!
LogicMsg/first.685b1c8b-b21a-47c5-99ca-0f838dca1725: Aaand that's three! All the [color=0001]keys[color=ffff] are yours.
LogicMsg/first.79b54a22-d07f-4da2-99b5-07e0b894ac88:
Oh, nice! You found a [color=0001]bounce pad[color=ffff]. Hold [group=0003 type=0001 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to bounce
SUPER high. For, uh, tactical purposes. Obviously.
LogicMsg/first.8f55f1cb-6c05-4775-adfb-482273a5c884:
Great work, Agent 3. If you can keep this up, we'll have
Alterna mapped out in no time!
LogicMsg/first.9149a031-393b-40c6-86b5-2a8de05907ef:
A [color=0001]Trizooka[color=ffff]! Press [group=0003 type=0008 params=cd cc 4c 3f 00 00 00 00] to get it ready, then
press [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to splat enemies with the big KABOOM!
LogicMsg/first.93a66f83-c9d6-4209-97f5-db582a03e051:
Ooo, dual ride rails. You can hop back and forth on
those, you know. Tilt the Stick and press [group=0003 type=0001 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to hop!
LogicMsg/first.b31225e7-1c5a-4fc3-990a-5740cca3429b:
I spy three [group=0003 type=001b params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0001]vaults[color=ffff] and three [group=0003 type=001a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0001]keys [color=ffff]straight
ahead of you!
LogicMsg/first.bddf4324-8069-4c4a-bc6b-2c1186857d47:
That busy little puck thingy is a [color=0001]Squee-G[color=ffff]. They wash
up any ink they find!
LogicMsg/first.ce9c53ab-5568-453f-9a93-6ba19591feeb:
Don't sweat it, Agent 3. You've got ink and a Smallfry.
Start inking and see what happens!
LogicMsg/first.d0bc97c5-2b3e-4db7-bfe7-ca3b3074494d: Wow. This place has a LOT of stuff going on.
LogicMsg/first.dea53ff1-d9ff-4e2d-8b44-287648fe3296:
That [color=0001]grate [color=ffff]can't stop you if you're in swim form.
Press [group=0003 type=000b params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] and hold it down to slip through!
LogicMsg/first.f091c212-cf5c-4970-b04b-3cac1c9de4bb: Ahhh. I love the feeling of the wind in my tentacles...
LogicMsg/first.fe499a3f-63a3-49bd-a15d-3d158c211078: Two down! Just one more to go...

LogicMsg/fogMaze.0a5c19e2-9f91-49b5-b5e4-90c29ec4eab0: It's turned around! Now's your chance!
LogicMsg/fogMaze.24fb0647-9323-490c-b6d7-dc9c7726b60a: Well, THAT was weird... Not bad, Agent 3. Not bad.
LogicMsg/fogMaze.25db09c5-5b56-4ac9-b73d-696bf360b76d: I have a bad feeling about this... Be careful up ahead.
LogicMsg/fogMaze.397f308b-7886-4e80-b83c-29d7bd0beb77: I'm pretty sure we came through this gate earlier.
LogicMsg/fogMaze.47b6bbc1-96d2-4d10-8197-cad144897c88: No going back now! But it's probably fine. Probably...
LogicMsg/fogMaze.57bdf9ac-0a0b-4945-9519-de38c37027b0: Bad visibility and Octosnipers... Ugh, what a combo!
LogicMsg/fogMaze.6b36bb04-79e9-4aba-9021-7862bafaa4cf: What a climb! I feel tired just talking to you about it!
LogicMsg/fogMaze.7d893147-6fb4-4fff-b83b-893ed68f65f9: You really like the high ground, huh?
LogicMsg/fogMaze.a818f6d9-18bf-4d35-b048-f2b90d400723: Nice gate! It's both inviting AND ominous!
LogicMsg/fogMaze.a82eda97-74ec-4ea3-9448-5d1c87e8623d: Well, there goes our way back outta here...
LogicMsg/fogMaze.aa965b63-386b-4a89-81a3-435ffb918ab9: Those Octarians don't miss anything, do they?

LogicMsg/fogZones.41e9917b-0e53-4399-8bb7-cae53b5f56c1: They just keep on coming, don't they?
LogicMsg/fogZones.881118d8-a71d-4b65-83f8-341fabaf554b: Wait...that's, like, the end. Right there. Isn't it?
LogicMsg/fogZones.91a7fa06-76ea-49ae-9b3c-ec56a6c88750:
I know you like to just dive into stuff, but, uh...
Just be careful.
LogicMsg/fogZones.f3741973-9475-4c37-9492-5490960a0a8d: A [color=0001]Trizooka[color=ffff]! Now it feels more like a fair fight!

LogicMsg/forwardShoot.34b2dfb9-28cd-4570-ae51-4dceb28fd7f5: The countdown will start once you land down there.
LogicMsg/forwardShoot.a0eaf0c0-4fd9-4612-81ca-11171449a289: Keep an eye on your ink level as you go, OK?

LogicMsg/indoor.2d3a4e4c-0f62-4488-9526-d7fd075a4c3a: Whoa! A secret floor! As inconvenient as it is cool.
LogicMsg/indoor.2e70a00b-956d-4d80-be3d-d3a5ca2a8200:
There's gotta be a [group=0003 type=001a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0001]key [color=ffff]around here
somewhere, right?
LogicMsg/indoor.5f32135c-4c04-4b9b-8a56-bc802fc60c05:
Oh, you can see the [color=0001]goal [color=ffff]from here. And my house!
Just kidding. About the house.
LogicMsg/indoor.7300bfab-b5c5-4f65-a9aa-608c10919f85:
Yes! That's the key to reaching the [color=0001]goal[color=ffff]![group=0001 type=0000 params=0f 00 00 00]
...Sorry—I'm just a little keyed up.
LogicMsg/indoor.bcdb4de6-985a-46ee-8380-1574b53cb664:
You're not alone. Keep your eyes OPEN. And your mouth
CLOSED. Y'know, in case ink is flying everywhere.
LogicMsg/indoor.f9f2839a-8134-4261-94a8-571852743fb1:
Ooo, you found a [color=0001]Reefslider[color=ffff]. Aim in the direction
of your enemies, and press [group=0003 type=0008 params=cd cc 4c 3f 00 00 00 00] to peel out!
LogicMsg/indoor.ff35ff10-9143-4fe9-9ba0-4da82ca4411d: Oh, now we've got a nice view of the [color=0001]goal[color=ffff]!

LogicMsg/inkLimitHard.1e7cd79d-dce8-499b-96c4-e40ed42f8d72:
The Captain's all like, "That was pretty good,
but they're still no ME!"
LogicMsg/inkLimitHard.252d9f91-4477-4bac-a4a4-65d2d8827262: Just inkredible! You didn't fire a drop! Wow!
LogicMsg/inkLimitHard.26b04506-69d9-471c-b49a-29f50dd9da01: Now you just gotta get to the end!
LogicMsg/inkLimitHard.2f4cf82a-b402-4bc3-80d4-ceb922b6a9fb: Ugh... How come we're not there yet?
LogicMsg/inkLimitHard.5354c6be-0b1f-47e8-83fb-a52e3a1294fd:
Wanna know what the Captain's saying? "Winning
without fighting...now, THAT'S victory!"
LogicMsg/inkLimitHard.6c84acc7-cb37-4588-8da3-3864867d58e7: Careful! If you run out of ink, that's it. No refills!
LogicMsg/inkLimitHard.799e64b8-7e16-42da-85c2-eb09e218c741: Aaand that's the last of the ink.
LogicMsg/inkLimitHard.94088b0e-137d-419b-b837-208304637622: The Captain's saying, "Yep! That was inkredible!"
LogicMsg/inkLimitHard.968a6426-da9c-43ce-8bb5-09988c9578b6: Keep up the pace. We'll be outta here in no time!
LogicMsg/inkLimitHard.a9ffc2bd-51f1-406e-ba47-2808653a0143:
You're an ace with that [color=0001]Splash-o-matic[color=ffff]!
Great job!
LogicMsg/inkLimitHard.ad4dac46-5dd2-4aa1-8e78-84a811d23991:
Wow! You were sinking 'em left and right.
Way to make every drop count!
LogicMsg/inkLimitHard.ea2e69e5-6033-4562-af8b-8f0c5cf8ebaa: It gets pretty wild up ahead...
LogicMsg/inkLimitHard.f50349d9-b5ea-4c44-9926-060c8ec59e79:
I can hear the Captain saying, "Way to keep 'em out of
your crosshairs."
LogicMsg/inkLimitHard.fccaf659-1f66-4cbe-97e7-32c6f06c17f4:
Now, THAT was slick! You didn't take out a
single one of 'em!

LogicMsg/inkLimitPaintFes.00987464-72db-497a-8190-64e5580f3f98:
So...whaddaya think'll happen if you shoot the
middle [color=0001]ink wheel[color=ffff]?
LogicMsg/inkLimitPaintFes.4b858e0a-a8d4-4cd0-82a9-aa5dce75b99d: Now, THAT'S a lot of [color=0001]splat switches[color=ffff]!
LogicMsg/inkLimitPaintFes.58bbe6ef-d4b7-4126-855e-6b45e24538da: Hear that? Don't waste ANY ink.
LogicMsg/inkLimitPaintFes.9cd0cb9a-d4c0-482d-bfa7-14c162c19c22: Huh! Guess you can't refill your ink here...
LogicMsg/inkLimitPaintFes.d0398d88-e6ac-4aee-a30d-330fb622fd44: Ha! They never stood a chance!
LogicMsg/inkLimitPaintFes.faf060f4-bc50-49d4-a8a1-433319f76292: Gonna be tough to ink 'em all.

LogicMsg/inkRailMountain.07c55aad-0782-4f62-a149-64c0071102d1: An [color=0001]inkrail [color=ffff]to nowhere? What does it meeean?!
LogicMsg/inkRailMountain.0b8bde31-3bdd-4fd4-aaa0-350938113e22:
Ooo, they're doing the wave! It'd be cute if it
wasn't so deadly. Watch your timing...
LogicMsg/inkRailMountain.3c4de050-7fc2-4e5f-a96b-a177a4bf692d: Way to ride that rail, Agent 3!
LogicMsg/inkRailMountain.3e74964f-2904-45a5-a24a-12e68334ba16:
I don't need to tell you to avoid the [color=0001]ink sticks[color=ffff], do I?
Those things STING!
LogicMsg/inkRailMountain.509a09a1-29ab-4e4e-b10a-dc7f1b90d5a3: OK, you're gonna have to time this juuust right...
LogicMsg/inkRailMountain.6fbc3caf-6125-4d28-9f8e-a4c045793d5c:
Can you throw a [group=0003 type=000a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0001]bomb [color=ffff]farther than you can
shoot ink? Worth a try!
LogicMsg/inkRailMountain.75228c14-13e6-4772-89db-097c1a364140: Oh, how the tables have turned. Ink 'em up!
LogicMsg/inkRailMountain.7ac618bb-af8c-4976-a922-4abb7c1a8732: Well done. You even got all the squid rings!
LogicMsg/inkRailMountain.7e30121e-97cc-48a8-8451-4f49ffd64464:
Don't sweat it, Agent 3. The Captain says, "Let the
[color=0001]inkrails [color=ffff]lead the way."
LogicMsg/inkRailMountain.8cca503f-6281-46b1-bcd9-c4f32bc5f920:
Looks like you'll need to do some [color=0001]inkrail [color=ffff]hopping here.
Press [group=0003 type=0001 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] while you're riding to jump!
LogicMsg/inkRailMountain.9e544886-658f-4930-9cf1-42aa58c374d5: Yep, that's an [color=0001]inkrail[color=ffff]. Go ahead and ink it up!

LogicMsg/jetPack.2919dd76-3ed3-438f-aa3d-616d50565ba9: I knew you could do it!
LogicMsg/jetPack.345c74fc-c01e-4e74-a1d0-0f7b1435d0fd: Remember—you can press [group=0003 type=0001 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to get a little extra lift.
LogicMsg/jetPack.599cbc08-e944-48f8-98c2-08a9a99ca644: You can swim with [group=0003 type=000b params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00]! You won't lose your [color=0001]Inkjet[color=ffff].
LogicMsg/jetPack.77ac6a55-e1cb-405a-90f6-c8f0b22b504a:
OK, you're going to have to figure out a way to get
past those [color=0001]ink sticks[color=ffff]...
LogicMsg/jetPack.7bac03f2-c848-4220-a6a7-284640847259:
Agent 1, Agent 3 basically has a jetpack.
I think they can do it!
LogicMsg/jetPack.83a40641-78bb-45ff-b8ba-9a20ff3e4a6e:
I see some platforms below us. Don't look down!
Or...maybe do? It might be helpful.
LogicMsg/jetPack.8eca937e-4583-4917-8ee9-45bd280eaba3:
I think there might be a [color=0001]balloon fish [color=ffff]in the middle
of them all...
LogicMsg/jetPack.ea4e4c69-7f6c-407d-83d6-142be67fb87d: That's all of 'em! Look for a [color=0001]launchpad[color=ffff]...

LogicMsg/kagidumeClimb.33ddac1a-e715-4388-bee0-975523a7a26b: Oh, duh! The [color=0001]Zipcaster[color=ffff] lets you zip right over 'em!
LogicMsg/kagidumeClimb.40403802-1b62-43e2-9e53-665707665a5b: There must be a [group=0003 type=001a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0001]key[color=ffff] around here somewhere.
LogicMsg/kagidumeClimb.5c2c670a-974b-40ab-85f6-d53e5ef8d24b:
♪Swimming through the ink! Dashing through the sky!
Fuzzy Octos tremble as our hero zips by!♪
LogicMsg/kagidumeClimb.7a5064b4-e08c-4f11-85d5-a9643bf42f2e: Zip up close and splat that baddie!
LogicMsg/kagidumeClimb.81a437b4-63a0-4933-9d14-dfb46338544d: Whoa. Those gate doors are huge!
LogicMsg/kagidumeClimb.8b93e8f1-5b1b-4d3a-b33c-df0c3bba985c: Make good use of higher ground whenever you can.
LogicMsg/kagidumeClimb.9730631c-e7ab-416c-b9b5-ea4d1b149d4e: And they've doubled up on gatekeepers to match.
LogicMsg/kagidumeClimb.9b6aadae-58ac-449c-93e4-c88ba0bb4803: More baddies up ahead. Be careful!
LogicMsg/kagidumeClimb.ab0993d9-10c8-4eee-b36e-74c10fcaefa0:
Ooo, that crate looks like it has some goodies...
but they're locked behind that glass!
LogicMsg/kagidumeClimb.b4b2b6cb-8065-408b-8746-2c5854247d79:
Hm. Those Octarians are juuust out of reach...
Looks like a job for the unsplatable [color=0001][group=0003 type=000a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00]Zipcaster[color=ffff]!
LogicMsg/kagidumeClimb.d1ad3b28-5822-4ddd-89be-4108efc93573: Wow! It's a prepacked Power Egg party in here!
LogicMsg/kagidumeClimb.e314d767-dcde-4cb1-8f85-c350b7a51b53: Nothing slips by our splatty hero's senses!

LogicMsg/kanitank.295f05bc-049c-41b3-b66a-e13be46cbb36: Whoops. Roll back up that wall, and try again!
LogicMsg/kanitank.393251fe-9af7-445e-8461-b7024a7b39f8: Ooo! Nicely done, Crab Tank! You too, Agent 3.
LogicMsg/kanitank.48ac2f9b-0105-4fd7-a13e-283902f0802d: That had to be the last of the targets, right?
LogicMsg/kanitank.52a985ee-a99c-4598-a5e5-e735cfd0c893:
I bet there's a cool bad guy behind this wall, and
Crab Tank's about to...uh... Wait. What?
LogicMsg/kanitank.671d18af-c6df-4bc3-9999-e1e42f729d7c:
It'll hold up against attacks from the front,
but it's not invincible. Be good to Crab Tank!
LogicMsg/kanitank.7ed21598-7e29-46d7-8c33-2074c727c848:
No disrespect to Crab Tank, but...there's no way
its li'l crab hop can reach the goal like this.
LogicMsg/kanitank.841d74eb-3c8b-41e3-be2c-d381d37a70d6:
Nice! You splatted all the splat switches!
We're so proud of you, Crab Tank...
LogicMsg/kanitank.a33b1f67-bd33-4198-877c-ae1c182fb621: Whoa! Watch your step, pal! We're crab walkin' here!
LogicMsg/kanitank.a6c4213b-a8f1-45c6-9052-1951180afea2: Wait for it, then hop like you've never hopped before!
LogicMsg/kanitank.aa8dcba2-05f6-4b77-bbf8-b6da6bf859c4:
Hold [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] for [color=0001]rapid-fire shots[color=ffff], and press [group=0003 type=000a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00]
to fire your li'l crabby [color=0001]cannon[color=ffff]!
LogicMsg/kanitank.ae360007-2433-48af-94f1-4fff521698d7:
While you're all rolled up in a ball with [group=0003 type=000b params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00],
press [group=0003 type=0001 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to do a short crab hop.
LogicMsg/kanitank.c4ec7899-81bc-4227-a124-dc34165d1cc6: Is that supposed to be its face? Weird!
LogicMsg/kanitank.cd7d3bfe-c1d2-4a5d-8016-133709c0a6c7:
Hold [group=0003 type=000b params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to [color=0001]curl up into a cute, crabby ball[color=ffff].
Then you can roll around and climb up walls!
LogicMsg/kanitank.ce553624-dfa2-4c1b-8474-874be52b98af: Look! The giant fears the mighty Crab Tank!
LogicMsg/kanitank.d5071914-401f-4263-88dd-d02cb2f2acf3: Way to go, C.T.! Now, onward and upward.
LogicMsg/kanitank.e363cc07-e964-4ef1-95c8-18dd28407011: Oh! Nice shot! Try breaking more [group=0003 type=0018 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0001]targets[color=ffff]...

LogicMsg/liftOnTheWater.8104e11f-0a53-426f-b932-04d7f15730ac: Um, don't panic, but...maybe panic a little bit.
LogicMsg/liftOnTheWater.951a2fc9-f77d-43a1-9a2a-9be6526565de:
That's a lot of propellervators. Ink like the wind,
Agent 3! And watch your step.
LogicMsg/liftOnTheWater.d9f9b9a0-ffcf-408b-91d5-a0613b92110e:
Ugh, [color=0001]Octocommanders[color=ffff] are the WORST. At least you've
got those pillars for cover.
LogicMsg/liftOnTheWater.e6266e66-9bc8-4469-a20f-8dc0df997e2a:
Well, there's the goal, but it looks like it'll
have to wait.
LogicMsg/liftOnTheWater.ec162189-120e-40f7-b6e2-d3b0914fa097:
So far, so good. Ink that wall, and let's see
what we're in for...

LogicMsg/lineMarker.0aa2d2ec-a062-4020-8ea9-7931f01eae06:
One, two, three...four stations. Looks like you'll
have to get creative with that Angle Shooter.
LogicMsg/lineMarker.3221f919-94d0-4b86-b30a-6484baaeefde: You did it! I love to watch an artist at work.
LogicMsg/lineMarker.324dc23c-f647-449b-9bb1-43549413e836:
Now there are THREE [color=0001]splat switches [color=ffff]to hit? Ugh.
Aim carefully!
LogicMsg/lineMarker.47a3ef17-3a52-4936-903d-93af510c973f:
Ready to DRAW your sub weapon? Let's put that
[color=0001]Angle Shooter [color=ffff]to work!
LogicMsg/lineMarker.59d8632c-cb72-40e7-994a-654d1d28b6d4: Wait for it...then blast those [color=0001]balloon fish[color=ffff]!
LogicMsg/lineMarker.7f705d7c-46c5-4937-88c4-aeb9cef83add: Ahhh, I see! Now it's rotating horizontally.
LogicMsg/lineMarker.91f20dd4-0091-4ce4-b8b5-e38b90ede127: Hm. What, uh... What are we looking at here?
LogicMsg/lineMarker.9c2f95b9-f586-4192-a688-e3d38e5029f7: That [color=0001]splat switch [color=ffff]is too far away for normal shots...
LogicMsg/lineMarker.aa2f4e4f-8596-4d74-832e-26d38414ae3f: It's rotating in a different direction now!
LogicMsg/lineMarker.c0e079d2-ec35-41e9-ab66-e5f0d11aeda3: That's the last of them! Way to go, Agent 3.
LogicMsg/lineMarker.c4cf31dd-7c38-4b3d-954e-c0b019e8c357: That's Agent 3's job. You're not even down there!
LogicMsg/lineMarker.ca5b5e25-f3f0-426e-a319-8ca38cffb246:
Ah! There's some [color=0001]splat switches [color=ffff]spinning
behind that glass!
LogicMsg/lineMarker.d984ea43-b9f2-443c-a994-e451b4cc8f95: Now it's moving! That's usually a good sign.
LogicMsg/lineMarker.dfab8c6f-2d70-4884-8f19-da18c682c4e8: Good thing you've got an [color=0001]Angle Shooter[color=ffff] handy.

LogicMsg/mazeClimb.3bf6a58a-b72f-4f43-bba9-e9a87102fb3c: Oops. Guess this isn't the exit...
LogicMsg/mazeClimb.596d2f8a-63ee-4c00-98ec-2f9d8de1109a: You did it! Great swim...I mean climb...I mean SWIMB.
LogicMsg/mazeClimb.85cf0139-bcf1-48cb-8768-4032313c16be:
So you have to climb back up? By swimming?
You have to...SWIMB all the way back?!
LogicMsg/mazeClimb.a9897acb-efc1-4ee5-bc2a-b749b8f132d4: Bwuh?! The whole maze is goin' vertical!

LogicMsg/missileAirship.09fb313c-a6fd-4caa-8f1e-0bde2ff7d5d6:
Normally I wouldn't suggest anything like this, but...
think you could ride an [color=0001]Octomissile[color=ffff]?
LogicMsg/missileAirship.4f1978ba-5dd1-48f9-afe2-1f2f0d168c9a: Awww, a dead end. Let's hop off for now.
LogicMsg/missileAirship.5f1f2aad-1d6f-46cb-b8df-c4e524a1d643:
Attention—this is your pilot speaking. Please return
your seat to its upright position for landing.
LogicMsg/missileAirship.678316a5-2e89-48c4-9a54-916cac3a9dda: Thank you for flying with Octozeppelin Air!
LogicMsg/missileAirship.ad0f2628-6478-4e32-8b09-03e20e0d412f: Hey! The dead end came back to life!

LogicMsg/ninjaParkour.2dd83675-f929-4b79-b834-19af163fabde: Gotta admit it's kinda pretty here.
LogicMsg/ninjaParkour.4573fb3f-f2b4-42d3-8289-1641ac1b013a:
Wow! That's one way to find out if you're afraid
of heights...
LogicMsg/ninjaParkour.a6908cfd-7cd4-436b-9652-758dae02b547:
Well, this should be fun. Get ready to ride
your [color=0001]Zipcaster [color=ffff]all the way to the top!
LogicMsg/ninjaParkour.d2dd5294-043f-4f95-ae64-eda4cabcf6fb:
The sky is real pretty and pretty real.
Even though it's fake.
LogicMsg/ninjaParkour.d5c9f363-55e1-48ad-9a55-6a912f3db305: Hey, uh... Whatever you do, don't slip.

LogicMsg/oneStroke.41e09780-9027-4838-965f-62db9c954cf9: That was tense! Even Smallfry was bouncin'!
LogicMsg/oneStroke.4829f9d3-4c0e-44e3-ac16-317e719c734c: Those refill your ink, so grab 'em when you see 'em.
LogicMsg/oneStroke.49f37cc4-ca22-4a26-8f11-0b651a025172:
Did you miss a [color=0001]splat switch[color=ffff]? 'Cause I feel like you
missed a [color=0001]splat switch[color=ffff]...
LogicMsg/oneStroke.4fcf7db1-294f-497d-bc0c-0cde352bc120:
I see one, two...[group=0001 type=0000 params=05 00 00 00] Whew! That's a LOT of [color=0001]splat switches[color=ffff].[group=0001 type=0000 params=05 00 00 00]
Just ink 'em in order, I guess!
LogicMsg/oneStroke.4fd7c4c3-cd03-43a8-ae17-badcc7024e24:
Nice! Hope you're feeling all warmed up, 'cause it's
about to get serious.
LogicMsg/oneStroke.6e374df9-0208-4fb0-946d-8f2e398fe0cf: I'd say we've earned a few Power Eggs.
LogicMsg/oneStroke.73137a92-9bab-438f-a36b-c54ec985875d:
I'm not gonna lie. You KINDA made an inky mess of
the place. But at least you made it to the end!
LogicMsg/oneStroke.8ec782e5-ab00-4e0e-8aea-53b3aa80e0e3:
Wow... I would NOT wanna be the one to have to clean
this place up. What a mess.
LogicMsg/oneStroke.af3e5138-492b-4a4f-bf6a-a462947e7688:
Yeah, that was pretty good! By the way,
have you seen this?
LogicMsg/oneStroke.db3d0bc3-89a2-483a-aa64-5a12cb03fccc:
Yeah, that was pretty good! By the way,
have you seen this?
LogicMsg/oneStroke.e7c28788-8e85-4de4-bd90-0ac454e0e331:
You can ink a lot of ground by holding [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] while you're
on the move.
LogicMsg/oneStroke.f3841151-f955-4c0f-8a87-83bcb291ef0c: That was tense! Even Smallfry was bouncin'!

LogicMsg/race.2aba29ed-d6a2-433b-80c8-794f1f287e46: Hold [group=0003 type=0001 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to do a [color=0001]Squid Surge[color=ffff]!
LogicMsg/race.640b3e95-4f09-461e-943b-cd4c958a4262: Agent 3, get out of the way!
LogicMsg/race.8ee021aa-fa26-4e41-81d5-49e650526199: The timer is activated! GO, GO, GO!
LogicMsg/race.c80c762a-897b-4286-93c3-a3673012088d: Keep it up! Go, go, go!
LogicMsg/race.dc1be723-83c9-4f88-b4f4-9f411fd466f6: Ready for this? Pressure's on, Agent 3!

LogicMsg/railBaloonEasy.53a257eb-d613-4a58-8061-820e1c346e6c: You'll get yours sooner or later, targets...
LogicMsg/railBaloonEasy.5465e5d5-7115-42e2-b3f6-1c54369fd9d3: C'mon, targets! Cut us a break!
LogicMsg/railBaloonEasy.70e5bf5c-6231-4913-8d02-2bffb3dfe2c1: Big finish coming up! I can feel it!
LogicMsg/railBaloonEasy.9d424236-20ea-4f4e-8516-b7cf4227f3e5:
Well, sometimes that's just how it goes.
But you'll get it next time!
LogicMsg/railBaloonEasy.c6f59161-4b10-4dfe-a3ab-2df61cc6f6b6: Try to keep this up in the second half!
LogicMsg/railBaloonEasy.e20283f4-5fbe-4ca2-a2f0-8990bce20cef:
Those bombs pack a punch when they pop, so they can
trigger all kinds of stuff!
LogicMsg/railBaloonEasy.f7ec12f5-192c-4677-b2c1-1727d9131615:
Ooo, a [color=0001]ride rail[color=ffff]. I like those because they
move automatically.

LogicMsg/railBoxStringer.0c561fd7-f308-4556-8158-d8b12c9c51ae: That was...a lot. Great work out there, Agent 3.
LogicMsg/railBoxStringer.13c8128c-c129-4e3b-a281-0ecbedb83cda: I can't believe what I'm seeing!
LogicMsg/railBoxStringer.1d218e29-61f7-4737-9441-c2a3a4944c3b: Keep it up, Agent 3! Almost done!
LogicMsg/railBoxStringer.6d6c3fbb-6512-4a09-8f1b-34e1d02bade5: You have to hit EVERY target you see!
LogicMsg/railBoxStringer.9faee5e0-2a56-4616-a0ef-202ed194d4e0: Don't give up! When the going gets tough...
LogicMsg/railBoxStringer.bd4fd193-b60c-4fc9-a0ba-fdd291317471: Final stretch! Don't lose focus now!
LogicMsg/railBoxStringer.d7cd4ed3-988a-4d76-b6f0-28017dd0115a: OK, Agent 3! Ready for high-stakes target practice?
LogicMsg/railBoxStringer.e3b03f8c-1e57-4e77-8b55-28290597f7e5: Wow, you're really good at this!

LogicMsg/railFirst.00067465-24c0-442c-8ef1-5367757a6c13: That's the end! You did it!
LogicMsg/railFirst.bab99ff3-86b3-4f44-9059-1c41428dd9e4: Ah! That unlocked a [color=0001]ride rail[color=ffff]. Sweet!

LogicMsg/roller.0031c3f3-5ff7-4173-8ebe-fb7b256d5bad:
This looks like a sweet spot to hold down [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] and
just go to town with the roller.
LogicMsg/roller.0246f8bb-0946-4641-9a7e-f30e36a9ddba:
That was close! I wasn't expecting one to be
hiding right there.
LogicMsg/roller.1d2bc628-c906-42f8-923e-dce35fb70169: You might still be able to sneak behind this one...
LogicMsg/roller.2c40e1ec-2778-4719-adf3-84cd091bc06c:
Oh, boy. You got Octosnipers, shields, and more. But
you know what else you got? THIS. And your roller!
LogicMsg/roller.302c9e68-bcc4-417a-8018-c82edcd034c0:
Sweet! Always nice to pick up some [color=0001]Power Eggs[color=ffff]
for your efforts.
LogicMsg/roller.3251ace2-7f86-4e7a-873b-30454f524f01:
That roller doesn't just roll. Tap [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] for a [color=0001]horizontal
swing[color=ffff], or jump and press [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] for a [color=0001]vertical swing[color=ffff]!
LogicMsg/roller.456b24b9-25e1-4291-8e86-37d6dcc39a34: You're on a roll with that roller!
LogicMsg/roller.5991f815-2dda-443e-b078-d5ebad7c64e7: Ooo, you found a way around!
LogicMsg/roller.aa3cb97b-e1da-4d1c-8020-85dccb4bd61e:
That was awesome! Are you turning into a
roller main?
LogicMsg/roller.ceaad6a7-c669-4398-8ba3-aacf9b1b68be:
Here's another chance to really fling that ink.
Jump and fire at the same time to splat them!
LogicMsg/roller.cf8987a8-a96d-4006-aef1-d993522ff40e:
Remember—you can hold [group=0003 type=0001 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] on a [color=0001]bounce pad[color=ffff]
to jump super high!
LogicMsg/roller.d9f2e6ae-db2a-4ad7-91ac-dd06bd2cf2b9: Heh. Never let your guard down, Oct-HAIR-ian...
LogicMsg/roller.dfebb4e2-a395-4285-a22f-92c247040f27: Uh...we knew that was there. Didn't we, Agent 1?

LogicMsg/savior.3c8d3719-0b71-47a3-82f2-d434157c6e4f:
I smell danger...and food. Those two kinda smell the
same to me.
LogicMsg/savior.6482ff6c-437d-44f0-acfb-568da37f2b21: Great job! Let's get outta here.
LogicMsg/savior.78efe043-9ebd-435a-b106-506eccdc55d2:
A splatana! These are really fun. Hold [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to do
a sweet [color=0001]charged slash[color=ffff]!
LogicMsg/savior.a6f6d857-fa25-4b03-84d8-75bff80ddb7f:
For REALLY stubborn crates, hold [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00], get in close,
and get 'em with a [color=0001]charged slash[color=ffff].

LogicMsg/shock.1df6c256-32a2-4d5b-9a16-115b16e4295f: Here it comes! Press [group=0003 type=0001 params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to dodge!

LogicMsg/shootBack.5beb935f-48f8-4c40-8ed6-6c84bef9fda2: Goal's in sight. Let's do this!
LogicMsg/shootBack.8684e8e8-f9d0-47ef-9aa5-cb7c7d98c2f0:
A shield? Ha! Just hit [group=0003 type=000a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] to distract it with
a [color=0001]bomb[color=ffff] or [color=0001]Smallfry[color=ffff], then shoot it from behind.
LogicMsg/shootBack.f4fa0b7e-c9a5-4c33-b033-877c4c445d49:
Wait for 'em to land, then hit those [color=0001]Octostamps[color=ffff]
where it hurts!
LogicMsg/shootBack.fb6b4047-c84f-4b8e-a3ce-be597de1378b: Here they come again! Watch for those shock waves!

LogicMsg/shootingLong.15d1da38-d26f-46d3-9ec5-e9566ed37226: Oh! Hey there, [color=0001]Octotroopers[color=ffff]. Just hanging out in here?
LogicMsg/shootingLong.36ddbfb0-ddcc-479b-8207-80ecaf3d0b7a: There's the way forward! Why is this so exciting?!
LogicMsg/shootingLong.3d650305-a5df-40c7-989f-450671c8ea3b: Looks like the first step is easy. Ink that [color=0001]splat switch[color=ffff]!
LogicMsg/shootingLong.4893ab24-4312-4e08-9f07-85fcc9ef4a18:
Phew. That sniper had some nerve, ruining your
dramatic entrance.
LogicMsg/shootingLong.8bb1eff4-235b-4e79-bf88-1406c84ac45f: There's our path forward. Let's get climbing!
LogicMsg/shootingLong.905733b6-0b22-4c1d-a311-91526c3f0a25: Oh, hey! You made that platform move!
LogicMsg/shootingLong.9a97c1d4-417f-4e89-b998-f69234b3b88d:
Sure, but Agent 3 has to clear the plaza of all
the Octarians first. And they're...plentiful.
LogicMsg/shootingLong.a27feb12-31ff-4bae-847d-a2e78517d477:
No crate is safe from you, Agent 3! Not even
the high-up ones.
LogicMsg/shootingLong.aab6bdd7-82fa-4a24-8747-1d30d7b9c4f1:
Making use of your weapon's long range, I see.
That's good thINKing!
LogicMsg/shootingLong.e3d54a3c-ee1e-4113-b007-1f9df96bd5e5:
You're on top of the world! At least...this small
part of the world. Nice work, Agent 3!
LogicMsg/shootingLong.ed7f6d5b-9be4-4a74-804b-801112cba8e9:
I see the goal! Just a quick climb up those ramps,
and then we're done.
LogicMsg/shootingLong.f0209afe-bba2-4175-bbf3-3ef41f1fca60:
There's the next [color=0001]splat switch[color=ffff], just behind the glass.
Think you can ink it from here?
LogicMsg/shootingLong.fcf97cb4-b5f1-46cb-bfbd-83c3da309690: The direct approach, eh? Nicely done.

LogicMsg/shortRail.123a9b2a-8d55-4321-b6b6-d3f739d48824: Hidden on the back?! Ooo, sneakyyy...
LogicMsg/shortRail.257ac633-50b6-4e33-9089-077d5399c4d2: Oof. We'll pretend we didn't see that.
LogicMsg/shortRail.34cf09cb-72ce-428b-8612-28fcf09a2a64: You're a ringer with that Tri-Stringer!
LogicMsg/shortRail.3ccce8ba-90a2-4ade-a3aa-44ba1c6b4bfa: Whoa. You're really good at this, Agent 3!
LogicMsg/shortRail.6e3fd53b-2259-45e2-a2d6-f2b20ee9bbd6: Looks like you're stuck in a loop. Miss any switches?
LogicMsg/shortRail.89a18d29-1e04-4e21-9319-4b26508042d1: Jump! Jump like you've never jumped before!
LogicMsg/shortRail.a1b2b6e3-781a-452b-bbcb-838aaf8bb7ac: Go, go, go! Ride that rail all the way to the top!
LogicMsg/shortRail.a24dcd3c-6a5a-44da-b6b5-16b6b1ee41eb: You bamboozle with the bam-best of 'em, Agent 3!
LogicMsg/shortRail.b651df22-4fd1-4b80-a523-e8f563fda7dc: Looks like you're in the clear! Nice job.

LogicMsg/snakeBomb.2b0944bb-6ffd-4206-9653-01998e317178:
Ooo, two paths... Take a look before you seal
your fate, Agent 3!
LogicMsg/snakeBomb.3cde346c-5774-4fb9-b11b-9cf9d1f898a3:
Wait. BOTH paths are packed with [color=0001]Octosnipers[color=ffff]!
Flip a coin...
LogicMsg/snakeBomb.5217078e-3bec-43f5-968f-b739d34c9cb7:
It's a [color=0001]Reefslider[color=ffff]! Aim it and let 'er rip, then hit [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00]
for a killer KABOOM!
LogicMsg/snakeBomb.8ceca47d-e7f7-4d12-a7a3-0a16f2722ce1:
Use those [color=0001]soaker blocks [color=ffff]when you can!
You can't take 'em with you.
LogicMsg/snakeBomb.a6d36d57-b2f6-4eda-8d0b-74e94075d6ba: Yeah! Show those crates who's boss!
LogicMsg/snakeBomb.cacbba35-72af-44e9-943f-eeba62425dcd:
Don't get hurt out there. Remember to use cover!
That's combat 101!
LogicMsg/snakeBomb.dbbd99a4-c412-4514-a40f-068ceb615c71: Wow! Didn't think you'd be able to snag that.

LogicMsg/snakeLecture.0593859f-126f-42e2-b55c-784f75af9ad0:
Oh, a [color=0001]soaker block[color=ffff]! Shoot the base block,
and watch more blocks pop out.
LogicMsg/snakeLecture.26cf78bf-05e2-4e7a-ae92-26339136b59e:
If you gotta back off, don't forget about
the [color=0001]soaker block[color=ffff] here.
LogicMsg/snakeLecture.312b4daf-bd59-4f8d-84ee-f3a81bc86264: Goal time! Let's get outta here!
LogicMsg/snakeLecture.4d5e53f2-4170-47ab-b0dc-0f8f0c5e35a0: Think you can get closer to that [color=0001]Octosniper[color=ffff]?
LogicMsg/snakeLecture.84a8d230-40bb-4721-b535-e7fd376d3cd5: The way those [color=0001]soaker blocks[color=ffff] pop is so satisfying...
LogicMsg/snakeLecture.975a8643-0975-44e8-b0ad-02ec80efff85: Careful. They shrink back down after a few seconds.
LogicMsg/snakeLecture.a33adf86-7944-4b75-806c-ec5119c4d303: You're going THAT way? Nice knowing you...
LogicMsg/snakeLecture.cd5eb09d-1610-4e11-aadd-642acb857048:
Yeah! It's almost worth letting them unpop to
pop them again!
LogicMsg/snakeLecture.cdfbceb2-bbd0-45ab-8742-af0975347a4f:
The road to victory is paved in [color=0001]soaker blocks[color=ffff].
Haha! I made that up myself!
LogicMsg/snakeLecture.d253824b-59a6-4de1-9e01-ecc7ddbb813a: I guess that's one way through...
LogicMsg/snakeLecture.f0fc8399-b421-49ab-89ff-2513aa713017:
If a [color=0001]soaker block [color=ffff]is filled with someone else's ink,
shoot the base block to shrink 'em back down.

LogicMsg/snakeSalmon.34d8cac9-e0d5-4ccc-ae54-3f92457ba19c:
There's a bunch of Octarians on the other side of the
[color=0001]soaker block[color=ffff].
LogicMsg/snakeSalmon.51b9ba0a-911d-4656-a2a5-e748a993da66: The blocks shrink back down after a bit, so move fast!
LogicMsg/snakeSalmon.521165c5-8d59-453f-a360-3465a218e4e3: Ugh, why does it have to be so far?!
LogicMsg/snakeSalmon.9825f725-5559-4417-8df5-9bc5f0373a26: I bet a charged shot could make it. Hold down [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00]!
LogicMsg/snakeSalmon.a6cecfd2-61c1-4dad-af9c-fc3adb8a8b6a:
Hey! Maybe Agent 3 could use a refresher. Shoot the
base block, and more blocks will pop out.
LogicMsg/snakeSalmon.b795bbc8-cee1-455e-8003-0bfd920b7e77:
The blocks shrink back down if an enemy inks them,
so, y'know, don't let 'em do that.
LogicMsg/snakeSalmon.d9d20cd6-e1b4-4d8e-b397-571774e9566f: Oh, hey—[color=0001]soaker blocks[color=ffff]. You know what to do, Agent 3.
LogicMsg/snakeSalmon.e8d654a5-ad3f-4ddb-999f-6aa90fc55c20: Ugh, why does it have to be so far?!
LogicMsg/snakeSalmon.f13cd514-7ff3-42a3-8565-d32d3852c4d8:
You've made it this far...keep using the [color=0001]soaker blocks[color=ffff]
to your advantage, Agent 3.

LogicMsg/spin.2c351813-7b2c-4781-abab-c6daeb712af4:
Ooo, that one's got a shield. Is there any way to
sneak behind it?
LogicMsg/spin.81f36734-9566-4b14-86ae-d98ac85118b6: Oh, that whole THING is spinning!
LogicMsg/spin.97f917a4-2d84-4061-ac3c-a518f4cbba77:
That [color=0001]Trizooka [color=ffff]has some serious range.
Maybe save that for just the right moment?
LogicMsg/spin.af2b0e7a-56fd-4a56-a56e-da5784f2e909:
Those Octosnipers have the high ground.
Watch your back!
LogicMsg/spin.e358b245-51f0-458a-a36e-814de3c09707: Heads up, Agent 3. We've got a spinning Octarian!

LogicMsg/spongeClimb.2ea14a59-cb0b-41ac-88d7-4c1b8b123fe4:
Oh, a [color=0001]Trizooka[color=ffff]. That should help with some of
those enemies who are annoyingly far away.
LogicMsg/spongeClimb.4a800851-d29c-4b8c-98f1-9a047c1789e0:
YES! You got [color=0001]Tenta Missiles[color=ffff]! Just press [group=0003 type=0008 params=cd cc 4c 3f 00 00 00 00] to
prime 'em, then let loose with [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00]. Ka-BLAMMO!
LogicMsg/spongeClimb.bb624f56-9940-4af2-800a-db45156a9003: Could you make a [color=0001]sponge[color=ffff] into a wall? It's worth a try!
LogicMsg/spongeClimb.bc38726c-abf4-4f80-843a-bc0d21704add:
OK...you can work with these [color=0001]sponges[color=ffff]. Fill 'em with
ink, and use them to your advantage!
LogicMsg/spongeClimb.f33249bb-4789-45d9-9e25-dacd1e40cee5:
Alright—there are a lotta Octarians in the way, but it's
basically a straight shot to the goal from here.

LogicMsg/stamp.3c65a63b-c4be-45e3-8689-f3fac4decb67:
So far away! You won't make it unless you hurl
that thing with everything you've got...
LogicMsg/stamp.6eea0bb5-ca15-40fc-96d7-089b0a55d933:
If you can hit that middle ball, I bet you'll
splat 'em in one shot.
LogicMsg/stamp.efbc349f-6b3f-4f1f-a4a0-329616bc2f0d: Don't forget to throw it with [group=0003 type=000a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00]!
LogicMsg/stamp.f7aa1475-cea1-4667-a720-548521c813f5:
You can hold [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] down for rapid stamp smashin'.
If the enemy is far away, hurl it with [group=0003 type=000a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00]!
LogicMsg/stamp.ff2651e2-b51a-4ec6-8bd4-71519ca4871e:
The countdown will start as soon as you splat
one of these bowling-ball bozos.

LogicMsg/stringer.04b11acb-fe27-447f-8710-a520dc3cda8c:
Whoa, you can also CHARGE this thing. Hold [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00]
to try it out.
LogicMsg/stringer.06e40df6-fa59-4345-ab9d-199c55a23a69:
Ooo, new weapon! OK, let's start with the basics.
Tap [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] for a trio of ink blasts.
LogicMsg/stringer.2a0d0848-6d40-41ca-b168-d65ecfed40c5: I think a [color=0001]launchpad[color=ffff] just popped up over there!
LogicMsg/stringer.5147c771-c43d-489d-b60f-c13d3faf577b: Don't tell me that was all of them...
LogicMsg/stringer.5dc441bd-0ac4-421a-9c45-be0d26d80a56:
Charged shots [color=0001]make a BIG mess[color=ffff] wherever they land.
It's awesome!
LogicMsg/stringer.784b9a1c-6252-4a42-921e-e2ecb99f7892: Is that— Yep, there's a [color=0001]launchpad[color=ffff] over there.
LogicMsg/stringer.98a61bb2-9538-4f5d-9013-440836d22e0e:
The manual says if you shoot while jumping, ink will
[color=0001]come out vertically[color=ffff]. Worth a shot here!
LogicMsg/stringer.9f7ee717-0b43-42dc-9d0e-33dae8131a7e:
Oh, yeah! Hit [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00] while jumping to shoot vertically!
Oops, sorry... I'm a page behind.
LogicMsg/stringer.a7681516-ce2a-430c-ad79-3b963c2dcb7a:
So...horizontal or vertical? It's always up to you,
Agent 3. No strings attached!
LogicMsg/stringer.cee12a39-b906-4adb-8bdb-774e2ef8bf05: Free and clear! Splat the goal and let's go.

LogicMsg/superLanding.06a7ee3e-d389-478b-bc18-d19db49332f0: Looks like you can take the low road to get there.
LogicMsg/superLanding.270857c0-71bd-4810-834d-abb2f143d5da: Ah, this lift must move horizontally.
LogicMsg/superLanding.55797d3c-6a4f-4112-934c-b6f21a77c01a:
OK, so...what you want to do here is press [group=0003 type=0008 params=cd cc 4c 3f 00 00 00 00]
to do a [color=0001]Splashdown[color=ffff].
LogicMsg/superLanding.65976bfe-b627-4b2c-a52d-8ae4e95caa05: An "all you can Splashdown" level? NIIICE!
LogicMsg/superLanding.758cbb5b-3458-4e59-a725-cdf1438fdf4f: Here's a pro tip for you... Don't fall!
LogicMsg/superLanding.79b3f7d9-f2d2-4d05-9470-535d7f45c2b8:
[color=0001]Splashdown [color=ffff]as much as you want to get to
the top, Agent 3.
LogicMsg/superLanding.aa043f6a-ab2d-4d79-82c6-fe363eacf4fc: You almost look TOO cool, Agent 3!
LogicMsg/superLanding.b767aa56-5ec3-43cf-aa8e-151cf853e69e:
Ooo, and in this area you can do it as many
times as you like!
LogicMsg/superLanding.cbc98594-717d-4e15-957c-4776b0218055: Try it! You'll splash down where you stand. Ka-SPLAT!

LogicMsg/takoAllStars.28e0369c-2d27-427c-b07a-b9cc0096d752: Sweet! [color=0001]Ultra Stamp[color=ffff]! Time to flatten and splat 'em!
LogicMsg/takoAllStars.2b5aa0fa-86d4-49f2-a06a-218f8a3bca08: OK, it is WAY too quiet in here. Be ready for anything.
LogicMsg/takoAllStars.57a22500-ca92-4e08-ae57-08f692b933a6: [group=0003 type=001a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0001]Key[color=ffff] nabbed! Now...where do we use it?
LogicMsg/takoAllStars.78322f93-9e1f-40f1-9966-0afed328452b:
There's one more camping out up above you.
Climb down and fight fair, you coward!
LogicMsg/takoAllStars.973dd824-2c25-456a-bed3-8bd6e05b79c3:
The goal must be hiding behind this vault...
but we don't have the [color=0001]key[color=ffff]... Ugh.
LogicMsg/takoAllStars.c704b8f7-64ed-4e0c-9c28-8208d56ee56f:
You got the [color=0001]key[color=ffff]! Phew... I didn't realize I was holding
my breath. Can you get out of here now?

LogicMsg/takoHouse.4c077283-3bb9-41c8-a242-c31e29be5cef:
Whew! I hate it when they jump out like that.
Keep your eyes peeled for more in the next area!
LogicMsg/takoHouse.53a0d5de-254b-4343-a0db-2507b6221929:
See the [color=0001]goal[color=ffff]? You're almost there...but don't let
your guard down just yet.
LogicMsg/takoHouse.546db347-e9c7-48d8-a9c7-f66a1723d74a:
Ooo, a [color=0001]Trizooka[color=ffff]! Press [group=0003 type=0008 params=cd cc 4c 3f 00 00 00 00] when you're ready to
use it, then fire away with [group=0003 type=000c params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00].
LogicMsg/takoHouse.60d0b77b-9779-45e0-a293-2bd3ad3fdc69: Wow. You cleared that room like a boss.
LogicMsg/takoHouse.a156604d-3c04-4c14-ae6c-a749da8cb226:
I knew it! You gotta be smarter than the
Octarians, see?
LogicMsg/takoHouse.fb9f39df-60cb-45e9-aa15-cb5fdc157c2b: Now you know what's coming, right?

LogicMsg/takoTower.3f1539fa-b269-4da3-bcce-4d38ece9ddc6: Oh. I guess we're going down now. Sure.
LogicMsg/takoTower.8f1ef994-7b86-4fd9-b009-e9d7891b53d9:
Anyone else picking up a reeeal sinister vibe up here?
Is it just me?
LogicMsg/takoTower.99e35038-8d6c-4e90-b50f-4b59fd48c33a:
[color=0001]Triple Inkstrike[color=ffff]? Yeah, something rough is coming up.
You can throw up to three strikes. Make 'em count!
LogicMsg/takoTower.f2eed4c8-1028-43d5-9b6a-8514555982fb: Door's open! Looks like we have a surprise waiting...
LogicMsg/takoTower.f8800685-a9ec-4a37-8d7e-92be613964c6:
The goal is up above you! You just have to climb
this nightmare tower of death...somehow.

LogicMsg/takohopper.4b101335-2192-4efe-90b2-4ef9b85ab055:
Watch out above you, Agent 3! Don't give 'em
the hopportunity!
LogicMsg/takohopper.8534c64a-4cbf-4e87-92c2-cb1362079363: Looks like those [color=0001]Octohoppers[color=ffff] are hoppy to see you.
LogicMsg/takohopper.b001dbd7-0672-441a-bb95-18ada50bfaad:
Your pun must have really upset them, Agent 1.
They're...hopping mad.
LogicMsg/takohopper.d1f2c5e0-edcf-4472-a96c-5ec33ec0ed63: There's the [color=0001]goal[color=ffff]! Uh...hop to it? Oof. I'm done.
LogicMsg/takohopper.dbefff48-3474-48cd-891b-0c3c8901fc43: Oops! My pun must have enraged them! Sorryyy...

LogicMsg/takopod.03815905-3bf5-45a8-bd76-09ba6fbcfb44:
There's a Power Egg pack here too? Wow. You have
a good sense of smell, Agent 3...
LogicMsg/takopod.03864a0b-4f63-413c-9fce-ab0c756b1fa5:
Careful! If I know anything about being an agent, it's
that an open space like that is BOUND to be trouble...
LogicMsg/takopod.1cda10c8-97c0-441f-9eb7-129b0fc64823: Look! There's an [color=0001]Octopod[color=ffff] way over there.
LogicMsg/takopod.30f7bde5-89ab-479d-ace6-dd71a00fb5dc: Nice work, Agent 3! Splat the goal and let's go.
LogicMsg/takopod.48701cef-8f0f-4c9a-b72e-77dcce0d9ee2: Hey, it's a [color=0001]key[color=ffff]! But how can we get up there?
LogicMsg/takopod.4936532e-8298-48d8-9665-719c4cd0cdd0:
A Power Egg pack in a place like this? You're pretty
sharp, Agent 3!
LogicMsg/takopod.83c35b12-498b-45f3-af0d-2515a4487833: Alllmost there...but what's lurking in that room?
LogicMsg/takopod.a5f3365b-57f9-4f94-924f-a65c921c76ba: Careful! They'll charge if you get too close.
LogicMsg/takopod.ae3672e5-1372-4185-9d43-611881980888:
Watch out! An Oversized Octopod is headed
straight for you!
LogicMsg/takopod.b46c1821-dbce-481c-be9b-2db188d821be:
You can't get past here without a [group=0003 type=001a params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0001]key[color=ffff].
Let's go find it!
LogicMsg/takopod.d3231905-bd2d-4c85-a767-102209fb6f94:
There you go. Now it's just a quick hop down, and
you can go unlock that [group=0003 type=001b params=00 00 80 3f 00 00 00 00][color=0001]vault[color=ffff].
LogicMsg/takopod.f1faa151-0e52-4e44-b072-3b2da6695339:
If it were me out there, I'd tilt [group=0003 type=0008 params=cd cc 4c 3f 00 00 00 00] to peek around
the corner so I don't get ambushed.
LogicMsg/takopod.fdb67fdb-3715-475f-9b00-1aedc5aa17d6: Whoa! There's a ton of them.

LogicMsg/takostrikeFall.45dd0699-e789-45cf-a5f4-b288fdbf8471: Lane after lane of [color=0001]Octoballers[color=ffff]... This is gonna be tough.
LogicMsg/takostrikeFall.64999b3a-4242-433b-b70b-6bbf5b9bbf0a: The big moment! Strike out when you're ready!
LogicMsg/takostrikeFall.93da88ea-55c0-412f-832f-bf7953e56895:
Made it! Close one. We were running out of bowling
puns. Now let's split!
LogicMsg/takostrikeFall.d6492b13-f35a-4704-a0bd-43fc60491dd2:
You know what? We can spare a moment.
Let's catch our breath.
